MAR 4:40 Yesu akavajovela vawuliwa vaki, “Mwiyogopa kyani? Wu, mwakona kusadika?”
MAR 4:41 Ndi penapo vavi na wogohi neju, vakatumbula kukotana, “Mundu uyu yani? Mbaka mpungu na manji gakutimbungana vikumyuwana na kuguna!”
MAR 5:1 Yesu na vawuliwa vaki vakahika kumwambu ya nyanja ya Galilaya, pamulima wa Vagelasi.
MAR 5:2 Bahapo Yesu peahulwiki muwatu mula akakonganeka na mundu mweavi na mzuka mweahumili kumatinda.
MAR 5:3 Mundu mwenuyo atamayi kumbugu la litinda. Kawaka mundu mweahotwili kumkunga kavili hati kwa minyololo.
MAR 5:4 Pamahele valingi kumkunga pingu na minyololo mumagendelu na mu mawoko, nambu pamahele adaulini pingu na minyololo. Avi lepi mundu mweavi na makakala gakumhotola.
MAR 5:5 Kilu na muhi atamayi ku matinda na muvidunda aywangayi na kujidumulana na maganga.
MAR 5:6 Mundu mwenuyo paamuweni Yesu cha kutali, akamjumbalila, na kumfugamila.
MAR 5:7 Akajova kwa lwami luvaha, “Yesu, Mwana wa Chapanga mweavi Kunani Neju, una kyani na nene? Kwa liina la Chapanga, nikuyupa kotoka kuning'aha!”
MAR 5:8 Ajovili genago ndava Yesu amali kumjovela, “Mzuka, muwuka mundu uyu!”
MAR 5:9 Kangi Yesu akamkota, “Liina laku yani?” Mwene akayangula, “Liina langu ‘Msambi’ Ndava tivii tavamahele!”
MAR 5:10 Kangi akamuyupa Yesu neju akotoka kuvavinga pamulima pala.
MAR 5:11 Papipi na mhelelu wa chitumbi, kwavi na maguluvi gamahele gegalyayi.
MAR 5:12 Hinu mizuka yila yikamuyupa Yesu yikajova, “Utiyidakilayi tikagayingila maguluvi gala.”
MAR 5:13 Akagayidakila. Ndi mizuka yila yikawuka na kuyingila mumaguluvi gala. Na msambi woha wa maguluvi wavi ngati elufu zivili, ukajumba pamhelelu wa chitumbi na kudumbukila mumanji na kufwa.
MAR 5:14 Hinu vadimaji va maguluvi vala vakajumba, kuvadandaulila vandu mambu genago kumuji na kumigunda. Vandu vakavya kubwelenela penapo kugalola mambu genago.
MAR 5:15 Vakahika mbaka pala peavi Yesu, vakamlola mundu mweatalaliwi na msambi wa mizuka yula. Atamili pahi na awalili nyula na luhala lwaki lumuwuyili, ndi vakayogopa.
MAR 5:16 Vandu voha vevaloli lijambu lenilo vakavajovela vayavi mambu gala gegamkolili mundu yula na kugavala maguluvi gala.
MAR 5:17 Hinu, vakamuyupa Yesu awuka pamulima wavi.
MAR 5:18 Yesu paayingila muwatu, mundu mweatalaliwi na mizuka yula akamuyupa neju vahamba voha.
MAR 5:19 Nambu Yesu akambelelela mundu yula akamjovela, “Uhambayi ukavajovela vandu va kunyumba yaku Bambu gabwina geakukitili na cheakuhengili lipyana.”
MAR 5:20 Kangi mundu yula akahamba ku Dekapoli kwoha ndi miji kumi, akavadandaulila vandu va mambu goha geahengiwi na Yesu. Na vandu voha vakakangasa.
MAR 5:21 Yesu akakupuka kavili kumwambu ya nyanja. Peavili kwenuko msambi wa vandu ukambwelenela, mwene avili pamuhana ya nyanja.
MAR 5:22 Akabwela chilongosi mmonga wa nyumba ya kukonganekela Vayawudi liina laki Yailusi, hinu paamuwene Yesu, akamfugamila pamagendelu gaki,
MAR 5:23 akamuyupa neju akamjovela, “Pepayi msikana wangu mdebe avi mulung'olelu. Chondi tihambi ukamuvikila mawoko gaku, muni ihotola kulama na kuvya mumi.”
MAR 5:24 Yesu pamonga na mundu yula vakalongosana kuhamba. Msambi wa vandu ukamulanda na kumuhinya pandi zoha.
MAR 5:25 Pagati yavi kwavili na mdala mmonga, mwealwalayi utamu wa kuhuma ngasi mulukumbi lwa miyaka kumi na yivili.
MAR 5:26 Mdala mwenuyo amali kung'ahika neju na kumala mashonga gaki goha, kwa valamisa vamahele ndava ya kulonda kulama, nambu utamu waki wayonjokisiki neju.
MAR 5:27 Mau yula peayuwini kuvya Yesu akuvalamisa vandu ndi akaholota mumbela ya msambi wa vandu wula na kuhamba kupamisa nyula ya Yesu.
MAR 5:28 Akitili chenicho, muni aholalili kuvya, “Nakahotola kupamisa nyula ya Yesu yati nilama.”
MAR 5:29 Peampamisi bahapo akamanya kuvya alamili, muni ngasi yeyahuma yila yikaleka.
MAR 5:30 Yesu akamanya ngati makakala gaki zimulamisi mundu. Akang'anamuka, akakota, “Yani mweanipamisi nyula yangu?”
MAR 5:31 Vawuliwa vaki vakamyangula, “Ndava kyani wikota yani mweakupamisi? Wu, ukuvalola lepi vandu chevakuhinya?”
MAR 5:32 Nambu Yesu akayendelela akalolokesa pandi zoha mundu mweampamisi nyula yaki.
MAR 5:33 Mdala yula kuni imanya gegamkolili akavya na wogohi, akahegelela peavi Yesu kuni ivagaya, ndi akamfugamilila Yesu akamjovela goha kwa uchakaka.
MAR 5:34 Yesu akamjovela, “Msikana wangu, sadika yaku yikulamisi, uhambayi na uteke, utamu waku ulamili.”
MAR 5:35 Yesu palongelayi na mundu yula, lukumbi lulalula vakabwela vajumbi kuhuma kunyumba ya Yailo chilongosi wa nyumba ya kukonganekela Vayawudi akamjovela. “Msikana waku afwili, kyani kumung'aha Muwula?”
MAR 5:36 Yesu agayuwini malovi gala, nambu agavevisi akamjovela mkulu wa nyumba ya kukonganekela Vayawudi yula, “Kotoka kuvya na wogohi, yendelela kusadika.”
MAR 5:37 Yesu ayidakili lepi kulongosana na mundu yoyoha nambu Petili na Yakobo na Yohani muhaja wa Yakobo.
MAR 5:38 Pavahikili kunyumba ya Yailo, Yesu avayuwini vandu vivembeneka neju ndava ya malilu.
MAR 5:39 Akayingila mugati akavajovela, “Ndava kyani mwiywanga na kuvemba? Msikana uyu afwili lepi, pena agonili ndu.”
MAR 5:40 Nambu vene vakamuheka. Akavahumisa kuvala vandu voha vevavi mugati mula, akavatola dadi na nyina wa msikana yula, pamonga na vawuliwa vaki vadatu, ndi vakayingila muchumba cheavili msikana yula.
MAR 5:41 Akamkamula chiwoko, akamjovela, “Talita, kumu,” Mana yaki, “Wamsikana, nikujovela yimuka!”
MAR 5:42 Bahapo msikana yula akayimuka na kutumbula kugenda, vandu voha vakakangasa neju. Msikana mwenuyo avi na miyaka kumi na yivili.
MAR 5:43 Nambu Yesu akavabesa vakotoka kumjovela mundu yoyoha yula. Akavajovela vampela chakulya alyayi.
MAR 6:1 Yesu na vawuliwa vaki, vakawuka penapo vakahamba kuchijiji chaki cha ku Nazaleti.
MAR 6:2 Ligono la Kupumulila, atumbwili kuwula munyumba ya kukonganekela Vayawudi. Vamahele vevamuyuwini vakangisi, vakajova, “Wu, agapatili koki mambu aga geijova? Apatili koki luhala ulu? Kavili ikita wuli gachinamtiti?
MAR 6:3 Wu, mwenuyu lepi selemala, mwana wa Maliya na mlongo wavi Yakobo na Yose na Yuda na Simoni? Wu, valumbu vaki titama nawu lepi bahapa?” Ndi vakabela kumsadika.
MAR 6:4 Yesu akavajovela, “Mlota wa Chapanga itopeswa kila pandi, lepi kunyumba yaki, kwa valongo vaki na pamulima waki.”
MAR 6:5 Ndava yeniyo Yesu akitili lepi mambu gachinamtiti pala, ndi avavikili mawoko vatamu vadebedebe akavalamisa.
MAR 6:6 Akangisi neju ndava ya vandu vangasadika. Kangi Yesu avigendalili muhijiji ya papipi na kuvawula vandu.
MAR 6:7 Akavakemela vawuliwa kumi na vavili, akatumbula akavatuma vandu vavili vavili, akavapela uhotola wa kuvinga mizuka.
MAR 6:8 Akavalagiza akajova, “Kwemwihamba uko, mukotoka kugega chindu chochoha chila ndonga ndu, lepi chakulya, lihaku, amala mashonga pachilolo.
MAR 6:9 Muwala champali nambu mkotoka kugega ligwanda lingi.”
MAR 6:10 Akavajovela, “Nyumba yeyoha yevakuvapokela mutama bahapo mbaka pa ligono lemuwuka.
MAR 6:11 Kwa vandu vevibela kuvapokela amala kuvayuwanila, penapo ndi muwuka na muvakung'undila lububu lwavi, kulangisa kuvya vene vaubeli ujumbi wa Chapanga!”
MAR 6:12 Hinu, vakawuka penapo vakahamba kuvakokosela vandu vamuwuyila Chapanga.
MAR 6:13 Vakayivinga mizuka vamahele. Na kuvanyala mahuta ga zeituni vatamu vamahele, vakavalamiswa.
MAR 6:14 Nkosi Helodi agayuwini goha, muni malovi ga Yesu gayenili pandi zoha. Vandu vangi vajovayi mwenuyu, “Ndi Yohani Mbatizaji ayukili! Ndava muni ihenga gachinamtiti.”
MAR 6:15 Vangi vakajova, “Mwenuyu ndi Eliya.” Vangi vakajova, “Mwenuyu ndi mmonga wa valota va Chapanga va kadeni.”
MAR 6:16 Nambu Helodi peayuwini malovi gala akajova, “Yohani namdumwili mutu, hinu ayukili!”
MAR 6:17 Aholalili genago ndava mu magono ga mumbele, Helodi alagazili Yohani akamuliwa na kukungiwa muchifungu. Genago gahumalili ndava Helodi amgegili Helodiya mdala wa Filipi mweavi mlongo waki.
MAR 6:18 Yohani amjovelayi Helodi, “Chabwina lepi veve kumtola mdala wa mlongo waku.”
MAR 6:19 Hinu Helodiya, mweavi mdala wa nkosi, amuhakalili neju Yohani, akagana kumkoma, nambu ahotwili lepi.
MAR 6:20 Helodi amuyogwipi Yohani muni amanyili kuvya Yohani ndi mundu wa msopi na mbwina. Ndava yeniyo amyangalili. Helodi aganayi kumuyuwanila Yohani, pamonga amyuwanili mtima wamvinili.
MAR 6:21 Ligono limonga mdala wa nkosi apatili fwasi pa ligono la kukumbukwa kwa kuvelekewa Helodi. Hinu akavakemela vagogo va libanji na vachilongosi va Galilaya pamonga na vakulu va manjolinjoli.
MAR 6:22 Hinu msikana waki Helodiya, akayingila na kutumbula kukina ngo'ma. Hinu akavahekesa neju Helodi na vayehe vaki. Nkosi akamjovela msikana yula, “Uniyupa chindu chochoha chila na nene yati nikupela.”
MAR 6:23 Kavili akamlapakisa, akamjovela, “Chochoha cheukuniyupa, yati nikupela, hati ngati kugavana upinga wa unkosi wangu.”
MAR 6:24 Penapo msikana yula akawuka mugati mu libanji, akahamba kumkota nyina waki. “Wigana niyupa kyani?” Namwene akamyangula, “Mutu wa Yohani Mbatizaji.”
MAR 6:25 Msikana yula akawuya kanyata kavili kwa nkosi, akamjovela, “Nigana unipela hinu naha mulupalu mutu wa Yohani Mbatizaji.”
MAR 6:26 Nkosi peayuwini genago, akavya ngolongondi, nambu muni ajilapakisi mwene, na ndava ya vayehe vaki, ahotwili lepi kumbelelela msikana yula ndi akamyidikila.
MAR 6:27 Hinu, akamlagiza linjolinjoli akaleta mutu wa Yohani. Linjolinjoli akahamba kuudumula mutu wa Yohani muchifungu mula,
MAR 6:28 kangi amletili mutu wula mulupalu akampela msikana, namwene akampelekela nyina waki.
MAR 6:29 Vawuliwa va Yohani pevayuwini vakahamba kutola higa yaki vakahamba kuzika.
MAR 6:30 Vamitumi vakawuya mulugendu lwavi vakamjovela Yesu, mambu goha gavakitili na chavawulili vandu.
MAR 6:31 Vandu vamahele neju vabwelayi na kuwuka kwa Yesu, ndi mbaka fwasi ya kulya yavi lepi. Hinu Yesu akavajovela vawuliwa, “Tihamba kuchiyepela mukapumulila padebe.”
MAR 6:32 Hinu, vakawuka ngavene muwatu vakahamba kuchiyepela.
MAR 6:33 Nambu vandu vamahele vavaweni pavawukayi, vakavamanya. Ndi vakalongolela kuhika kula kwa magendelu kweahambayi Yesu na vawuliwa vaki.
MAR 6:34 Yesu na vawuliwa vaki pevahulwiki muwatu kumbwani, ndi auweni msambi uvaha wa vandu, akaviniswa mtima, muni vavi ngati limbelele langali mdimaji. Akatumbula kuvawula mambu gamahele.
MAR 6:35 Lilanga palatipimi, ndi vawuliwa vaki vakahamba kumjovela Yesu, “Penapa palugangatu, lilanga litipama.
MAR 6:36 Mbanga uvalaga vandu vahamba mumigunda na muhijiji ya papipi, vakagula vyakulya.”
MAR 6:37 Yesu akavajovela, “Muvapela nyenye chakulya.” Nambu vene vakamkota, “Tivapela kyani? Yati yikutigana tihenga lihengu kwa miyehi yamahele ndi tipatayi mashonga ga kuvagulila chakulya vandu voha ava?”
MAR 6:38 Yesu akavakota, “Mabumunda gavi galinga? Muhamba mukalola.” Pevamali kulola vakawuya kumjovela, “Yivii mhanu na somba zivili.”
MAR 6:39 Yesu akavalagiza vawuliwa vaki vavatamika vandu voha chikundi chikundi pahi pamanyai.
MAR 6:40 Hinu vene vakatama chikundi chikundi, vingi vandu hamsini, na vingi vandu miya.
MAR 6:41 Kangi Yesu akagatola mabumunda mhanu na somba zila, akalola kunani kwa Chapanga, akamsengusa Chapanga. Ndi akagametula mabumunda gala pamonga na somba zila. Akavapela vawuliwa vaki muni vavagavanisila vandu.
MAR 6:42 Vandu voha vevavi penapo valili vakayukuta.
MAR 6:43 Hinu, vakanonga masigalilu ga mabumunda na somba vakamemesa madengu kumi na gavili.
MAR 6:44 Vevalili chakulya chila, vavi vagosi elufu mhanu.
MAR 6:45 Bahapo Yesu akavalagiza vawuliwa vaki vayingila muwatu valongolela kuhamba kumwambu ya nyanja, kumuji wa Betisaida. Muni mwene avi akona ilagana na msambi wa vandu.
MAR 6:46 Hati peamali kulagana na vandu, akahamba kuchitumbi kumuyupa Chapanga.
MAR 6:47 Lilanga palatipimi, Yesu avi mwene kundumba na watu wamali kuhika pagati ya nyanja.
MAR 6:48 Mwene avaweni vawuliwa chaving'ahika muwatu mula na mipundi muni mpungu wavi uvaha ukuvawuyisa mumbele. Hinu hambakucha, Yesu avahegalili kuni igenda mumanji akagana kuvapita.
MAR 6:49 Nambu pavamuweni igenda panani ya manji vayogwipi, vaholali kuvya lihoka, “Vakaywanga mulete.”
MAR 6:50 Voha pavamuweni vayogwipi neju. Bahapo Yesu akajova nawu, “Mjipolesa mtima. Ndi nene. Mkoto kuyogopa!”
MAR 6:51 Ndi, akayingila muwatu wevavili vawuliwa na mpungu wa luyuga lukaguna lukumbi lulalula. Vawuliwa vakakangasa neju,
MAR 6:52 ndava muni vamanyili lepi mana chinamtiti cha kuyonjokeseka chakulya chila ndava ya kunonopa kwa mitima yavi.
MAR 6:53 Vakakupuka nyanja, vakahika kumuji wa ku Genezaleti vakahuyimika watu.
MAR 6:54 Pevahumili muwatu mula, kanyata vandu vakammanya Yesu.
MAR 6:55 Hinu, kanyata vakahamba kila chijiji pandu pala, vakatumbula kuvatola vatamu vevagonili mumipasa, vakavapeleka kila pevayuwini Yesu avili.
MAR 6:56 Pandu poha peahambili Yesu, muhijiji na mumiji na mumigunda, vandu vavavikili vatamu pandu pakugulisila vindu, vandu vakamuyupa neju avayidakila vatamu vala, vapamisayi lugunyilu lwa nyula yaki. Ndi voha vevampamisi valamili.
MAR 7:1 Kangi Vafalisayu vangi na Vawula va Malagizu vevahumili ku Yelusalemu valundumini palongolo ya Yesu.
MAR 7:2 Vavaweni vawuliwa vangi va Yesu vilya chakulya kwa mawoko changasamba ngati cheyiganikiwa na malagizu.
MAR 7:3 Muni Vafalisayu na Vayawudi vangi vayovalili kulanda mivelu ya vagogo wavi, muni valyayi lepi changasamba mawoko bwina.
MAR 7:4 Kavili vakagula chakulya kuhuma pandu pakugulisila vindu, vilya lepi mbaka vasanja hoti. Mewa vavi na mivelu yingi ya namuna ya kusanja vikombi na viviga na vyombo ya shaba.
MAR 7:5 Hinu, Vafalisayu na Vawula va Malagizu vangi vakamkota Yesu, “Ndava kyani vawuliwa vaku vilanda lepi mambu ga kadeni kuhuma kwa vagogo vitu, ndava vilya changasamba mawoko?”
MAR 7:6 Yesu akavayangula, “Vandu mwavahomela! Isaya mweavi Mlota wa Chapanga, alotili chakaka kuvavala nyenye peayandiki, ‘Chapanga ijova, vandu venava vakunitopesa kwa malovi ndu, nambu mitima yavi yivii kutali na nene.
MAR 7:7 Kunigundamila kwavi chindu lepi, muni mambu geviwula ndi malagizu ga vandu ndu. Ngati malagizu ga Chapanga.’ ”
MAR 7:8 “Nyenye mulekili mihilu ya Chapanga na kukamulila mawuliwu ga vandu.”
MAR 7:9 Yesu akayendelela kujova, “Nyenye mumanyili kuyepa cha kuchenjela mihilu ya Chapanga na kulanda mivelu yinu!
MAR 7:10 Muni Musa alagizi, ‘Muvatopesa dadi waku na nyina waku,’ Na, ‘Mweakumliga dadi waki amala nyina waki, yikumugana akomiwa.’
MAR 7:11 Nambu nyenye muwula, ngati mundu avi na chindu chakumtangatila dadi waki amala nyina waki, nambu akajova, chindu chenicho ndi ‘Kolibani,’ Mana yaki njombi kwa Chapanga,
MAR 7:12 hinu yikumugana lepi kumtangatila dadi waki amala nyina waki.
MAR 7:13 Chenichi ndi chemukulivevesa Lilovi la Chapanga ndava ya mawuliwu ga kuhalilana. Kangi mkita mambu gamahele ngati genago.”
MAR 7:14 Yesu aukemili kangi msambi wa vandu, akavajovela, “Muniyuwanilayi mwavoha na kumanya malovi aga.
MAR 7:15 Kawaka chakulya cheilya mundu chechihotola kumuhakasa palongolo ya Chapanga. Nambu mambu gegihuma mugati ya mundu ndi gegihotola kumuhakasa.
MAR 7:16 Mweavi na makutu ga kuyuwana na amanyayi!”
MAR 7:17 Paaulekili msambi wa vandu na kuyingila mu nyumba, vawuliwa vaki vakamkota mana ya luhumu lula.
MAR 7:18 Mwene akavajovela, “Wu, hati nyenye mwimanya lepi? Kawaka chakulya chechikumyingila mundu chihotola lepi, kumuhakasa mundu palongolo ya Chapanga.
MAR 7:19 Ndava muni chikumyingila lepi mumtima, nambu mulileme, kangi chihumiswa kundindima.” Ndava ya kujova chenicho Yesu ayidikili vyakulya vyoha viliwayi.
MAR 7:20 Yesu akayendelela kujova, “Chechihuma mumtima wa mundu chihotola kumuhakasa palongolo ya Chapanga.
MAR 7:21 Muni mugati ya mumtima wa mundu, gihuma maholo gahakau, ukemi na kuyiva na kukoma,
MAR 7:22 ugoni na unota na udese na uhakau na kuyiva na kunogela vindu vya vangi na luhonda na wihu na ng'omo na uyimu na maligu.
MAR 7:23 Gahakau goha ago gihuma mumtima wa mundu, genago ndi gakumhakasa mundu palongolo ya Chapanga.”
MAR 7:24 Yesu awukili penapo akahamba kumuji wa Tilo. Kwenuko ayingili munyumba yimonga, mwene aganili lepi mundu amanyayi kuvya avili mugati, nambu ahotwili lepi kujifiya.
MAR 7:25 Mdala mmonga, msikana waki avili na mzuka, peayuwini malovi ga Yesu, kanyata akabwela akafugama palongolo ya magendelu ga Yesu.
MAR 7:26 Mdala mwenuyo, avi Mgiliki, ndi mkolonjinji wa muji wa Foinike mulima wa ku Silia. Hinu akamuyupa Yesu amuwusa mzuka msikana waki.
MAR 7:27 Yesu akavajovela, vana vayukuta hoti, “Chabwina lepi kutola chakulya cha kuvayukutisa vana na kugatagila mabwa.”
MAR 7:28 Nambu mdala yula akamyangula, “Chakaka, Bambu, hati mabwa gegavi pahi ya meza gilya masigalilu ga chakulya cha vana.”
MAR 7:29 Yesu akamjovela, “Ndava ya lilovi lenilo, wuyayi kunyumba yaku. Mzuka umuwukili msikana waku!”
MAR 7:30 Hinu, akahamba kunyumba yaki, amkolili msikana waki agonili palusongwani, na mzuka wamali kumuwuka.
MAR 7:31 Kangi Yesu akawuka kumuji wa Tilo, akapitila pagati ya ku Sidoni, akahamba mbaka kunyanja ya Galilaya kuvedukila pamulima wa Dekapoli mana yaki miji kumi.
MAR 7:32 Ndi vakamletela ngayuwa nambu mewawa avi ngajova kwa Yesu, vakamuyupa amvikilayi mawoko muni amlamisa.
MAR 7:33 Yesu akamvika pamuhana na msambi wa vandu mundu uyo. Akamsopa ngonji mumakutu. Kangi akahunya mata mulungoji lwaki na kumpamisa mululimi lwa mundu yula.
MAR 7:34 Kangi Yesu akalola kunani kwa Chapanga, akakeka kwa likakala, akamjovela, “Efata,” Mana yaki “Dindukayi.”
MAR 7:35 Lukumbi lulalula akatumbula kuyuwana bwina, mewawa lulimi lwaki lukajova bwina.
MAR 7:36 Yesu akavalagiza vakotoka kumjovela mundu lijambu lila. Nambu cheayonjokisi kuvabesa, ndi chevadandisi malovi gala.
MAR 7:37 Vandu vakangisi neju, vakajova, “Avakitili goha gabwina hati vangayuwa kuyuwana, na vangajova kujova!”
MAR 8:1 Lukumbi lwenulo, msambi uvaha wa vandu wakonganiki kavili hinu vavi lepi na chakulya, na Yesu avakemili vawuliwa vaki, akavajovela,
MAR 8:2 “Nikuvahengela lipyana vandu venava muni vatamii na nene mu ligono la datu, nambu vavi lepi na chakulya.
MAR 8:3 Ngati nikavajovela vawuya kunyumba na njala yati vihinduka munjila, muni vangi vahumili kutali.”
MAR 8:4 Vawuliwa vaki vakamkota, “Penapa palugangatu yati tipata koki mabumunda ga kuvayukutisa vandu voha ava?”
MAR 8:5 Yesu akavakota, “Muvi na mabumunda galinga?” Vakamyangula. “Gavii saba.”
MAR 8:6 Hinu, akavalagiza vandu vatama pahi. Akagatola mabumunda gala saba, akamsengusa Chapanga, akayimetula, akavapela vawuliwa vaki vavagavanisilayi vandu, navene vakavagavila.
MAR 8:7 Vavi mewa na somba zidebedebe. Yesu akayimotisa, mewawa akalagazila vawuliwa vaki vavagavila vandu.
MAR 8:8 Vandu valili na kuyukuta. Kangi vawuliwa vakanonga masigalilu na kumemesa madengu saba.
MAR 8:9 Vandu vevalili vavi ngati elufu mcheche. Yesu peamali kuvalaga,
MAR 8:10 Bahapo Yesu akayingila muwatu pamonga na vawuliwa vaki, vakahamba kumulima wa Dalimanuta.
MAR 8:11 Vafalisayu vangi vakambwela na kutumbula kujovesana na Yesu. Vamlingili, vamganayi avalangisa ulangisu kuhuma kunani kwa Chapanga, kulangisa kuvya uhotola waki uhumili kwa Chapanga.
MAR 8:12 Nambu Yesu mtima wamvinili neju na akajova, “Ndava kyani vandu va chiveleku ichi vigana ulangisu? Chakaka nikuvajovela, vandu va chiveleku ichi vipewa lepi ulangisu!”
MAR 8:13 Kangi akavaleka akayingila kavili muwatu, akakupuka kuhamba kumwambu ya nyanja.
MAR 8:14 Vawuliwa vakosiwi kutola mabumunda yamahele, ndi vavi na libumunda limonga ndu muwatu.
MAR 8:15 Yesu akavalagiza, “Mlola neju! Mjiyangalila na ngemeku ya Vafalisayu na ngemeku ya Helodi.”
MAR 8:16 Vawuliwa vakatumbula kukotana vene kwa vene, “Ijova chenichi ndava tangali mabumunda.”
MAR 8:17 Yesu agamanyili gala gevajovisini akavajovela, “Ndava kyani mkotana ndava ya mabumunda? Wu, mwakona mwangamanya amala mwangalola? Wu, ndava kyani mwiholalela lepi?
MAR 8:18 Muna mihu nambu mwilola lepi? Muvi na makutu nambu mwiyuwana lepi? Wu, mukosiwi
MAR 8:19 lukumbi lula panakametwili mabumunda mhanu na kuvapela vandu elufu mhanu mwamemisi masigalilu madengu galinga?” Vakamyangula, “Madengu kumi na gavili.”
MAR 8:20 Akavakota kavili, “Na panametwili mabumunda saba na kuvapela vandu elufu mcheche mwamemisi masigalilu madengu galinga?” Vene vakamyangula, “Madengu saba.”
MAR 8:21 Hinu, akavajovela, “Pamonga na ago, wu, mwakona mwangamanya?”
MAR 8:22 Yesu ahikili ku Betisaida pamonga na vawuliwa vaki. Kwenuko vandu vakamletela ngalola, vakamuyupa ampamisa muni amlamisa.
MAR 8:23 Yesu amkamwili chiwoko ngalola yula, ampeliki kuvala ya chijiji. Akamhunyila mata mumihu, akampamisa mawoko, akamkota “Wu, wihotola kulola chindu?”
MAR 8:24 Ngalola yula akalola, akajova “Nikuvalola vandu vevilolekana ngati mikongo yeyigenda.”
MAR 8:25 Kangi Yesu akampamisa kavili mawoko mumihu, mwene akamuhutusila mihu, uhotola waki wa kulola ukamuwuyila namwene akalola.
MAR 8:26 Yesu akamjovela awuya kunyumba yaki na kumlagiza “Ukotoka kuwuya ku Betisaida.”
MAR 8:27 Kangi Yesu na vawuliwa vaki vahambili kuvijiji vya pandu ku Kaisalia Filipi. Pevavi munjila, Yesu akavakota vawuliwa vaki, “Vandu vijova nene ndi nayani?”
MAR 8:28 Vakamyangula, “Vangi vijova veve ndi Yohani Mbatizaji na vangi vijova veve ndi Eliya na vangi vijova veve ndi mmonga wa Valota va Chapanga.”
MAR 8:29 Kangi Yesu akavakota, “Na nyenye mwijova nene kuvya ndi yani?” Petili akamyangula, “Veve ndi Kilisitu, mweuhaguliwi na Chapanga.”
MAR 8:30 Kangi Yesu akavalagiza vakotoka kumjovela mundu yeyoha kuvya mwene ndi Kilisitu.
MAR 8:31 Kangi Yesu atumbwili kuvawula vawuliwa vaki, kuvya yikumgana “Mwana wa Mundu kung'ahika na kubelelewa na vagogo na vakulu va kuteta na Vawula va Malagizu. Kangi yati ikomiwa, nambu pa ligono la datu yati iyuka.”
MAR 8:32 Yesu avajovili lijambu lenilo hotohoto. Penapo, Petili akamtola pamuhana akatumbula akamhakalila akotoka kujova mambu ago.
MAR 8:33 Nambu Yesu akang'anamuka akavalolokesa vawuliwa vaki, akamhakalila Petili, akamjovela, “Setani, wuka palongolo yangu! Maholo gaku gihuma lepi kwa Chapanga, nambu ga umundu.”
MAR 8:34 Kangi Yesu akaukemela msambi wa vandu na vawuliwa vaki akavajovela, “Ngati mundu yeyoha igana kunilanda nene yikumgana ajibela mwene na agega msalaba waki anilandayi.
MAR 8:35 Ndava mundu mweigana kusangula wumi waki, yati akuuyagisa, nambu mundu mweakuuyagisa wumi waki ndava ya nene na ndava ya Lilovi la Bwina, yati akuusangula.
MAR 8:36 Wu, chiyonjokeseka kyani mundu kupata mulima woha na kuuyagisa fwasi ya kuyingila muwumi wa magono goha?
MAR 8:37 Mundu yati iwusa chindu kiki muni apatayi wumi wa magono goha?
MAR 8:38 Ngati mundu yeyoha muvandu va chiveleku ichi chihakau na chechimbudili Chapanga ngati ikola soni kwa nene na malovi gangu, Mwana wa Mundu yati akumulolela soni mundu mwenuyo, lukumbi peibwela muukulu wa Dadi waki pamonga na vamitumu va kunani kwa Chapanga vamsopi.”
MAR 9:1 Yesu akayendelela kuvajovela, “Chakaka nikuvajovela, vavi vandu vangi penapo yati vifwa lepi changamlola Chapanga ilongosa kwa makakala munjila ndalindali.”
MAR 9:2 Pegamaliki magono sita, Yesu avatolili Petili na Yakobo na Yohani vene ndu kuhamba kunani ya chitumbi. Kwenuko Yesu ndi agewiki pamihu palongolo yavi.
MAR 9:3 Nyula zaki yang'asimi yikavya yamsopi pehe, avi lepi mchapa nyula yeyoha pamulima mweihotola kuganyambisa ngati ago.
MAR 9:4 Kangi vawuliwa vadatu vala vavawene Eliya na Musa vilongela na Yesu.
MAR 9:5 Petili akamjovela Yesu, “Muwula wangu, chabwina tete kuvya bahapa. Mbanga tete tijenge vindanda vidatu. Chimonga cha veve na chingi cha Musa na chingi cha Eliya.”
MAR 9:6 Amanyili lepi chakujova, ndava mwene na vayaki wogohi wavayingili.
MAR 9:7 Kangi likahumila lihundi likavagubika, na lwami lukayuwanika kuhuma mulihundi mula, “Mwenuyu ndi Mwana mwenimganili, mumyuwanila.”
MAR 9:8 Bahapo vawuliwa vala vakalola kuni na kuni, nambu vamuwene lepi mundu yeyoha, nga Yesu pamonga na vene.
MAR 9:9 Hinu, pavahelelayi kuchitumbi, Yesu akavabesa vakotoka kumjovela mundu mambu gevagaweni mbaka Mwana wa Mundu peiyuka.
MAR 9:10 Vakakamula malagizu gala, nambu vakatumbula kukotana vene kwa vene, “Kuyuka mana yaki kyani?”
MAR 9:11 Kangi vakamkota Yesu, “Ndava kyani Vawula va Malagizu vijova yiganikiwa hoti Eliya abwela?”
MAR 9:12 Mwene akavayangula, “Ena, Eliya ibwela hoti kutendelekela kila chindu. Pamonga na ago, ndava kyani yiyandikiwi mu Mayandiku Gamsopi kuvya Mwana wa Mundu gakumkolela mang'ahiso neju na kuveveswa?
MAR 9:13 Nambu nikuvajovela, Eliya amali kubwela, na vene vakamkitili chavaganili ngati Mayandiku Gamsopi chegijova kumvala mwene.”
MAR 9:14 Lukumbi Yesu na vawuliwa vadatu pavawuyili pandu pevavi vawuliwa vangi vala. Vauweni msambi uvaha wa vandu pamonga na Vawula va Malagizu vijovesana.
MAR 9:15 Bahapo msambi wa vandu pawamuweni Yesu, vakakangasa neju, vakamjumbalila na kumjambusa.
MAR 9:16 Yesu akavakota vawuliwa, “Mjovesana nawu kyani?”
MAR 9:17 Penapo mundu mmonga mu msambi wa vandu wula akamyangula, “Muwula, nimletili mwana vangu mweavi na mzuka weumkita kuvya ngajova.
MAR 9:18 Kila peukumkamula ukumgwisa pahi na kumuhumisa lihuluhulu mumlomo, kuni iyaga minu na kuvya myumu higa yoha. Nivayupili vawuliwa vaku vauvinga mzuka wenuwo nambu vahotwili lepi.”
MAR 9:19 Yesu akavajovela, “Mwe vandu va chiveleku changali sadika! Yati nitama na nyenye mbaka ndali? Nikuvasindimalila hati ndali? Mumleta kwa nene.”
MAR 9:20 Vampeliki msongolo kwa Yesu. Kanyata mzuka wula paumuweni Yesu, wamuhindwisi mwana yula na kumgwisa pahi akabilinduka na kuhuma lihuluhulu mumlomo.
MAR 9:21 Yesu akamkota dadi wa msongolo yula, “Mambu genaga gampatili ndali?” Akamyangula, “Gatumbwili kuhuma uwana waki.
MAR 9:22 Lukumbi lungi mzuka uwu ukumgwisa pamotu na mumanji, muni umkomekesa. Hinu ngati uhotola utihengela lipyana na kutitangatila!”
MAR 9:23 Yesu akamjovela, “Ukotoka kujova, ‘Ngati nihotola?’ Mambu goha gihotoleka kwa mundu mweisadika.”
MAR 9:24 Penapo dadi yula akajova kwa lwami luvaha, “Nisadika, nambu sadika yangu yidebe! Nitangatilayi, sadika yangu yiyonjokesa!”
MAR 9:25 Yesu pauweni msambi wa vandu wiyonjokeseka kanyata palongolo yaki, akauhakalila mzuka wula, “Mzuka weukumkita mwana kuvya ngayuwa na ngajova, nikulagazila muwukayi mwana uyu kotoka kumyingila kavili!”
MAR 9:26 Penapo mzuka wula ukakwesa lwami, ukamgwisa mwana yula pahi na kumuwuka. Mwana awonikini ngati mtuhi, ndi vangi vakajova, “Afwili!”
MAR 9:27 Nambu Yesu akamkamula chiwoko, akamyinula namwene akayima.
MAR 9:28 Hinu Yesu peayingili mu nyumba, vawuliwa vaki vakamkota pachiepela, “Ndava kyani tete tahotwili lepi kuvinga mzuka wula?”
MAR 9:29 Mwene akavajovela, “Mzuka ngati wenuwu uhotoleka lepi kuwusiwa ndu, nambu kwa njila ya kumuyupa Chapanga.”
MAR 9:30 Yesu na vawuliwa vaki vakawuka penapo na kuyendelela na lugendu lwavi kuvedukila mulima wa ku Galilaya. Yesu aganili lepi mundu yeyoha amanyayi kweavili,
MAR 9:31 ndava muni avawulayi vawuliwa vaki. Avajovili, “Mwana wa Mundu yati igotolewa kwa vandu vevakumkoma, nambu pa ligono la datu yati iyuka.”
MAR 9:32 Nambu vawuliwa vamanyili lepi mana ya mawuliwu gala. Ndi vakayogopa kumkota.
MAR 9:33 Hinu, vakahika muji wa Kapelanaumu na kuyingila mu nyumba, Yesu akavakota vawuliwa vaki, “Mwajovisini kyani munjila?”
MAR 9:34 Nambu vene vakaguna, muni munjila vakalikotana yani mweavi mkulu pagati yavi.
MAR 9:35 Yesu akatama pahi na kuvakemela vawuliwa kumi na vavili vala, akavajovela, “Mundu akagana kuvya mkulu ndi yikumgana avyai mdebe kavili avyai mtumisi wa voha.”
MAR 9:36 Ndi akamtola mwana mdebe akamyimika pagati yavi akamkumbatila kangi akavajovela,
MAR 9:37 “Mweakumpokela mwana ngati uyu ndava ya nene, akunipokela nene, na mweakunipokela nene, akunipokela lepi namwene ndu, nambu akumpokela mewa na yula mweanitumili.”
MAR 9:38 Yohani akamjovela Yesu, “Muwula, tamuweni mundu mmonga ivinga mizuka kwa kuhengela liina lako, tikambesa, muni lepi wa chikundi chitu.”
MAR 9:39 Nambu Yesu akavajovela, “Mkoto kulinga kumbesa, ndava avi lepi mundu mweihenga gachinamtiti kwa liina langu, na bahapo akatumbula kunilongalela gahakau.”
MAR 9:40 Ndava mundu mweangapingana na tete avili upandi witu.
MAR 9:41 Chakaka nikuvajovela, mundu yeyoha mweakuvapela nyenye chikombi cha manji ga kunywa, ndava nyenye vandu va Kilisitu, chakaka yati ipata njombi yaki.
MAR 9:42 Ngati mundu yeyoha akumyokesa mmonga wa vadebe ava kuyagisa sadika yaki, ndi mbanga mundu mwenuyo kukungiwa liganga livaha la kuyagila musingu yaki na kutagiwa munyanja kuliku kuhamuliwa na Chapanga.
MAR 9:43 Na chiwoko chaku ngati chikubudisa sadika yaku, chidumula! Mbanga kuyingila muwumi changali chiwoko chimonga, kuliku kuvya na mawoko gavili, na kuyingila, kumotu wangajimika magono goha.
MAR 9:44 Hinu mwenumo masomi gifwa lepi, wala motu waki wijimika lepi.
MAR 9:45 Na chigendelu chaku ngati chikakubudisai, chidumula! Mbanga kuyingila muwumi changali chigendelu chimonga kuliku kuvya na magendelu goha gavili na kutagiwa kumotu wangajimika magono goha.
MAR 9:46 Mwenumo masomi gifwa lepi na motu waki wijimika lepi.
MAR 9:47 Na lihu lako likayagisa sadika yaku litupulai! Ulitaga, mbanga kuyingila Muunkosi wa Chapanga na lihu limonga kuliku kuvya na mihu gavili na kutagiwa kumotu wangajimika wa magono goha.
MAR 9:48 Mwenumo, masomi gaki gifwa lepi na motu waki wijimika lepi.
MAR 9:49 “Muni kila mundu yati inyambiswa kwa motu ngati luteta cheyinyambiswa kwa mwinyu.”
MAR 9:50 “Mwinyu wabwina, nambu ngati iyagisi lunyong'onyo lwaki, yati iyonjokeswa na kyani?” “Muvya na mwinyu wa unkozi mugati yinu na kusindimalisa na uteke pagati yinu.”
MAR 10:1 Yesu awukili penapo akahamba kumuji wa Yudea, kumwambu ya mfuleni Yoludani. Msambi wa vandu wamuhambalili kavili, mwene akavawula ngati chayavili mvelu waki.
MAR 10:2 Vafalisayu vangi vamhambalili vakamkota chakumlinga, “Wu, Malagizu ga Chapanga giyidakila mgosi kumleka mdala waki?”
MAR 10:3 Yesu akavayangula, “Musa avalagizi kyani?”
MAR 10:4 Vene vakajova, “Musa atiyidakili kuvya mgosi ihotola kumpela mdala waki balua na kumleka.”
MAR 10:5 Nambu Yesu akavajovela, “Musa ayidikili kuvayandikila Mihilu yeniyi, ndava ya unonopa neju wa kuwuliwa kwinu.
MAR 10:6 Nambu Musa ayandiki kutumbula kuwumbwa kwa mulima, Chapanga awumbili mgosi na mdala.
MAR 10:7 Ndava yeniyo mgosi yati akumleka dadi na nyina waki, yati iwungana na mdala waki,
MAR 10:8 navene vavili yati vivya higa yimonga. Hinu vene vavili lepi kavili, nambu higa yimonga.
MAR 10:9 Hinu, mundu akotoka kuchilekanesa chila cheachiwunganisi Chapanga.”
MAR 10:10 Pevayingili kavili mu nyumba, vawuliwa vaki vakamkota ndava ya lijambu lenilo.
MAR 10:11 Mwene akavajovela, “Mundu yeyoha mweakumleka mdala waki na kugega mdala yungi akumkitila ugoni.
MAR 10:12 Mewawa na mdala mweakumleka mngwana waki na kugegewa na mgosi yungi ikita ugoni.”
MAR 10:13 Vandu vamletili Yesu vana vadebe avapamisa, nambu vawuliwa vaki vakavahakalila vandu vala.
MAR 10:14 Yesu paalolili genago akayoma akavajovela, “Mvaleka vana ava vabwela kwangu, mkotoka kuvabesa, muni Unkosi wa Chapanga ndi wa vandu ngati ava.
MAR 10:15 Chakaka nikuvajovela, mundu yeyoha mweangaupokela Ulongosi wa Chapanga ngati mwana mdebe katu iyingila lepi mwenumo.”
MAR 10:16 Kangi akavapokela vana vala akavavikila mawoko panani yavi, kuvamotisa.
MAR 10:17 Yesu paatumbwili lugendu, mundu mmonga ambwelili, akamfugamila na kumkota, “Muwula mbwina, nikita wuli muni nipokela wumi wa magono goha wangali mwishu?”
MAR 10:18 Yesu akamyangula, “Ndava kyani ukunikemela mbwina? Avi lepi mweavili mbwina ndi Chapanga ndu.
MAR 10:19 Uzimanyili ‘Amuli, ukotoka kukita ugoni na ukoto kukoma na ukoto kuyiva na ukoto kumjovela muyaku gaudese na ukoto kukonga na vatopesa dadi waku na nyina waku.’ ”
MAR 10:20 Mwene akamyangula, “Muwula, genago goha nigakamwili kutumbula muusongolo wangu.”
MAR 10:21 Yesu akamlolakesa cha uganu, akamjovela, “Upungukiwi na chindu chimonga. Hamba ukagulisa kila chindu cheuvili nachu, uvapela vangangu mashonga ago, ndi veve yati ukujivikila vindu vyaku kunani kwa Chapanga. Kangi ubwela unilandayi.”
MAR 10:22 Mundu yula peayuwini genago, akavya ngolongondi akahamba kuni akwinyini pamihu muni avili na vindu vyamahele na aganili lepi kuwusa vindu vyaki.
MAR 10:23 Yesu akalola pandi zoha akavajovela vawuliwa vaki, “Chakaka yihotoleka lepi kwa vandu vana vindu vyamahele kumlekela Chapanga alongosa wumi wavi!”
MAR 10:24 Vawuliwa vakakangasa ndava ya malovi gala. Nambu Yesu akavajovela kavili, “Vana vangu mlola cheyinonopa neju kumlekela Chapanga alongosa wumi wavi!
MAR 10:25 Yihotoleka kuchikita chinyama chechikemiwa ngamiya kuholota mulibowo la sindanu, mewawa yilolekana, yati yinonopa neju kwa mundu mweavi na vindu vyamahele kumlekela Chapanga alongosa wumi waki!”
MAR 10:26 Vawuliwa vaki vakayendelela kukangasa neju, hati vakakotana vene kwa vene, “Yani hinu mweihotola kusanguliwa?”
MAR 10:27 Yesu akavalola, akavajovela, “Kwa vandu yihotoleka lepi, nambu kwa Chapanga chenicho lepi. Kwa Chapanga kila chindu chihotoleka.”
MAR 10:28 Kangi Petili akajova, “Lola! Tete talekili vindu vyoha, tikukulanda!”
MAR 10:29 Yesu akayangula, “Chakaka nikuvajovela, mundu yeyoha mweailekili nyumba amala valongo amala valumbu amala mau amala dadi amala vana na migunda ndava yangu na ndava ya Lilovi la Bwina,
MAR 10:30 yati ipokela mala miya ng'onyo mulukumbi lwa hinu. Yati ipokela nyumba na valongo na vahaja na valumbu na mau, pamonga na mang'ahiso. Na palukumbi lwelubwela yati ipokela wumi wa magono goha wangali mwishu.
MAR 10:31 Nambu vamahele vevavi vakulu hinu yati vivya vadebe na vamahele vevavi vadebe hinu yati vivya vakulu.”
MAR 10:32 Yesu na vawuliwa vaki vavi mulugendu kuhamba ku Yelusalemu, mwene avalongolili. Vawuliwa vaki vakakangasa na vandu vevavalandayi vakavya na wogohi. Yesu akavatola kavili kuchiyepela vawuliwa kumi ni vavili, akatumbula kuvajovela gala gegakumkolela.
MAR 10:33 Akavajovela, “Muyuwanila! Tihamba ku Yelusalemu. Kwenuko Mwana wa Mundu yati vakumgotola mu mawoko ga vakulu va kuteta na Vawula va Malagizu, navene yati vakamhamula akomiwa na kumgotola kwa vandu vangali Vayawudi,
MAR 10:34 vene yati vakumvevesa, vakumuhunyila mata, yati vakumtova michapilu na kumkoma. Nambu pa ligono la datu yati iyuka.”
MAR 10:35 Yakobo na Yohani, vana va Zebedayo, vamuhambalili Yesu vakamjovela, “Muwula, tigana utihengela chindu chetikuyupa.”
MAR 10:36 Yesu akavakota, “Mwigana nivahengela kyani?”
MAR 10:37 Vene vakamyangula, “Pewilongosa muukulu waku, utiyidakila kutama mmonga upandi waku wa kulyelela na yungi upandi waku wa kumangeya.”
MAR 10:38 Yesu akavajovela, “Mumanyi lepi chemwiyupa! Wu, yati mwihotola kunywelela chikombi cha mang'ahiso cheninywelela? Amala ubatizu ngati wenibatiziwi?”
MAR 10:39 Vakamyangula, “Tihotola.” Yesu akavajovela, “Chikombi cha mang'ahiso cheninywelela chakaka yati mwinywelela na kavili yati mbatiziwa ngati chenibatiziwi.
MAR 10:40 Nambu uhotola wa kuhagula yani atama upandi wa kulyela amala kumangeya. Chapanga alavapela fwasi zenizo vala voha veavatendelekili.”
MAR 10:41 Vawuliwa vangi kumi vala pevayuwini ago, vakavayomela vayavi Yakobo na Yohani.
MAR 10:42 Hinu Yesu akavakemela, akavajovela, “Mumanyili kuvya vala veviholalewa kuvya vakulu va milima vakuvalongosa vandu vavi kwa makakala na vakulu venavo vakuvatalalila vandu vavi.
MAR 10:43 Nambu kwinu yikoto kuvya chenichi, yula mweigana kuvya mkulu pagati yinu yikumgana avya mtumisi winu.
MAR 10:44 Mweigana kuvya mkulu kuliku voha, yikumgana avya mvanda wa voha.
MAR 10:45 Hati Mwana wa Mundu abwelili lepi kuhengewa nambu kuvahengela na kuwusa wumi waki uvya luhuna ndava ya kuvagombola vandu vamahele.”
MAR 10:46 Vakahamba mbaka ku Yeliko. Yesu paawukayi pamuji wenuwo pamonga na vawuliwa vaki na msambi uvaha wa vandu. Ngalola mmonga mwana wa Timayo mweikemelewa Batimayo, atamili pamuhana ya njila, iyupa yala.
MAR 10:47 Peayuwini kuvya Yesu wa ku Nazaleti ipita pandu pala, akatumbula kukwesa lwami, “Yesu, Mwana wa Daudi, unihengela lipyana!”
MAR 10:48 Vandu vamahele vakamlakali kumgunisa, nambu mwene akayonjokesa kukwesa lwami, “Mwana wa Daudi, unihengela lipyana!”
MAR 10:49 Yesu akayima, akajova, “Mumkemela.” Hinu vakamkemela ngalola yula, vakamjovela, “Jipolesa mtima! Yima, akukemela.”
MAR 10:50 Batimayo akataga likoti laki, akahumba kanyata na kumhambila Yesu.
MAR 10:51 Yesu akamkota, “Ugana nikukitila kyani?” Ngalola yula akamyangula, “Muwula, niyupa kulola.”
MAR 10:52 Yesu akamjovela, “Hamba, sadika yaku yikulamisi.” Bahapo ngalola yula akahotola kulola, akalongosana na Yesu munjila.
MAR 11:1 Yesu na vawuliwa vaki pavavi papipi na Yelusalemu muji wa Betifage na Betania, papipi na Chitumbi cha Mizeituni. Penapo avatumili vawuliwa vaki vavili,
MAR 11:2 akavajovela, “Muhamba kuchijiji chechivii palongolo yinu. Pemuyingila penapo yati mkumkolela mwanapunda akungiwi, na akona angahengewa na mundu. Mumuwopola mkamleta.
MAR 11:3 Ngati mundu akuvakota, ‘Ndava kyani muwopola lipunda?’ Mumjovela, ‘Bambu akumgana na yati akumuwuyisa mwanakandahi.’ ”
MAR 11:4 Hinu, vakahamba, vakamkolela mwanapunda akungiwi kuvala ya mlyangu wa nyumba yeyavi pamuhana ya njila. Pevamuwopolayi,
MAR 11:5 vandu vangi vevayimili penapo vakavakota, “Ndava kyani muwopola mwanapunda?”
MAR 11:6 Vawuliwa vakavayangula ngati Yesu cheavalagizi na vene vakavaleka vahamba nayu.
MAR 11:7 Vamletili Yesu mwanapunda. Pavamalili kuyambatisa nyula yavi panani ya mwanapunda yula. Yesu akatama panani yaki.
MAR 11:8 Vandu vamahele vakadandasa nyula zavi munjila kwa kumtopesa, na vangi vakadandasa matutu gadebe gadebe gavadumwili mumigunda.
MAR 11:9 Vandu voha vevalongolili na vala vevalandayi, vakakwesa lwami lwavi vakajova, “Alumbiwa! Amotisiwa mweibwela kwa liina la Bambu!
MAR 11:10 Umotisiwa unkosi weubwela wa dadi witu Daudi. Chapanga alumbiwa mweavi kunani!”
MAR 11:11 Yesu ayingili pamuji wa Yelusalemu akahamba mbaka mu Nyumba ya Chapanga, akalola vindu vyoha kwa ubwina. Nambu yamali kuvya chitita akahamba ku Betania pamonga na vawuliwa vaki kumi na vavili vala.
MAR 11:12 Chilau yaki, pavahumili ku Betania, Yesu njala yamvinili.
MAR 11:13 Hinu auweni mkongo wa mtini chakutali wewavi na mahamba gamahele. Hinu akauhambila aganayi alolayi ngati upambiki matunda. Nambu peahikili, nakugakolela matunda ndi mahamba gene, muni yavi lepi lusenje lwa kupambika matunda.
MAR 11:14 Penapo akaujovela mkongo wula, “Kutumbula lelu na magono goha mundu yeyoha akotoka kulya matunda gaku!” Na vawuliwa vaki vagayuwini malovi genago.
MAR 11:15 Hinu vahikili ku Yelusalemu, Yesu ayingili mu Nyumba ya Chapanga na kutumbula kuvavinga vandu vevagulisai na kugula vindu mwenumo. Azing'anambwisi meza za vala vevagulisana mashonga, na vigoda vya vandu vevagulisa ngunda.
MAR 11:16 Amyidakili lepi mundu yeyoha kuvedukila mu Nyumba ya Chapanga kuni agegili chindu.
MAR 11:17 Kangi akavawula, “Yiyandikwi, ‘Nyumba yangu yati yivya msambi wa vandu vevakumsadika Kilisitu ndava ya vandu milima yoha!’ Nambu nyenye mukuikita libokosela la vanyagaji!”
MAR 11:18 Vakulu va kuteta na Vawula va Malagizu pevayuwini malovi gala, vakatumbula kulonda njila ya kumkoma. Nambu vayogwipi ndava msambi wa vandu wakangiswi mawuliwu gaki.
MAR 11:19 Kimihi payahikili, Yesu na vawuliwa vaki vakawuka pamuji wula.
MAR 11:20 Lukela pavapitayi, vauweni mkongo wa mkuyu wula uyumili hotohoto, kuhuma mumikiga mbaka kunani.
MAR 11:21 Petili alikumbwiki lijambu lila, akamjovela Yesu, “Muwula, lolayi! Mkongo wa mtini wewaupelili likoto ula uyumili!”
MAR 11:22 Yesu akavajovela, “Mumsadika Chapanga.
MAR 11:23 Nikuvajovela chakaka, mundu akachijovela chitumbi, ‘Tupukayi ukajitaga munyanja,’ Changali kuvya na wogoyi mumtima waki, nambu ngati isadika mambu goha gihengeka yati ihengewa lijambu lenilo.
MAR 11:24 Ndava yeniyo nikuvajovela, pemukumuyupa Chapanga na kuyupa chindu, musadika kuvya mpokili, na nyenye yati mwipewa.
MAR 11:25 Pamwiyima kumuyupa Chapanga, mumlekekesa mundu yeyoha mweavakitili gahakau, ndi Dadi winu wa kunani avalekekesa nyenye mabudilu ginu.
MAR 11:26 Nambu ngati mukuvalekekesa lepi vangi, mewawa na Dadi winu mweavili kunani kwaki akuvalekekesa lepi nyenye mabudilu ginu.”
MAR 11:27 Hinu, vahikili kavili ku Yelusalemu. Yesu paagendayi pa Nyumba ya Chapanga, vakulu va kuteta na Vawula va Malagizu na vagogo vamuhambalili,
MAR 11:28 vakamkota, “Ukita mambu genaga kwa uhotola wa yani? Yani mweakupelili uhotola wa kukita mambu genago?”
MAR 11:29 Nambu Yesu akavajovela, “Yati nikuvakota lijambu limonga. Mukaniyangula, na nene mewa yati nikuvajovela nikita mambu aga kwa uhotola wa Yani.
MAR 11:30 Wu, Yohani apatili uhotola wa kubatiza kuhuma kwa Chapanga amala kwa vandu? Munijovela.”
MAR 11:31 Vakatumbula kukotana, “Tikayangula, ‘Gahumili kwa Chapanga,’ Yati akutikota, ndava kyani mwasadiki lepi?
MAR 11:32 Na tikayangula, ‘Gahumili kwa vandu,’ Yati yivya wuli?” Vayogwipi vandu, ndava vandu voha wamyidakili kuvya chakaka Yohani avi mlota wa Chapanga.
MAR 11:33 Hinu vakamyangula Yesu, “Tete timanyili lepi.” Na Yesu akavajovela, “Na nene mewa nikuvajovela lepi nikita mambu aga kwa uhotola wa yani.”
MAR 12:1 Yesu akatumbula kulongela nawu, kwa luhumu akajova, mundu mmonga alimili mgunda wa mizabibu, Atindisili luwumba, na pagati yaki agimili ligodi la kuminyila divayi ajengili mnala, akalikodisha kwa valimaji, akahamba mulima wa kutali.
MAR 12:2 Lusenje lwa mabenu, amtumili mvanda waki kwa valimaji vala, akamletela pandu paki pa mabenu.
MAR 12:3 Nambu valimaji vala, vakamkamula mvanda yula, vakamtova vakamuwuyisa mawoko gawaka.
MAR 12:4 Mkolo mgunda amtumili kavili mvanda yungi. Mewa mwenuyo vakamulemasa kumutu na kumkitila mambu ga soni.
MAR 12:5 Mewawa, mkolo mgunda yula akamtuma mvanda yungi, mwenuyo vakamkoma. Vangi vamahele veavatumili, vangi pagati yavi vatoviwi na vangi vakomiwi.
MAR 12:6 Asigalili mundu mmonga, ndi mwana waki chiganu. Pamwishu amtumili mwenuyo akajova, nimanyili yati vakumtopesa mwana vangu.
MAR 12:7 “Nambu valimaji vala pavamuwene ibwela, vakajovesana, ‘Mwenuyu ndi mhali, ndi timkomayi muni uhali waki uvyai witu!’
MAR 12:8 Hinu vakamkamula, vakamkoma na kumtaga kuvala ya mgunda wa mizabibu wula.”
MAR 12:9 “Akavakota, hinu mkolo mgunda yati ikita kyani? Yati ibwela kuvakoma valimaji vala na kuvapela mgunda wa mizabibu wula vandu vangi.”
MAR 12:10 Wu, mwangasoma Mayandiku Gamsopi? Liganga levalibelili vakujenga, hinu ndi liganga lelikamulila nyumba.
MAR 12:11 Bambu ndi mweakitili lijambu lenili, lenili ndi lachinamtiti neju kwitu!
MAR 12:12 Vachilongosi va Vayawudi na Vawula va Malagizu na vagogo, vamanyili kuvya luhumu wenuwo ukuvavala vene. Vaganili kumkamula, nambu vayogwipi msambi wa vandu. Vakamleka vakawuka.
MAR 12:13 Vangi pagati ya Vafalisayu na valanda va chikundi cha Helodi vatumwili vamyonjola Yesu kwa malovi gaki.
MAR 12:14 Vamhambili, vakamjovela, “Muwula, timanyili kuvya veve wamundu wa chakaka mweujova chakaka. Veve ukumlola lepi mundu mwene ndi yani, ukulu wa mundu chindu lepi kwa veve, nambu wiwula chakaka munjila ya Chapanga. Wu, chabwina kulipa kodi kwa nkosi wa ku Loma amala lepi? Tilipayi amala tikotoka kulipa?”
MAR 12:15 Nambu Yesu amanyili uhomela wavi, akavajovela, “Ndava kyani mukunilinga? Muniletelayi lishonga lene nililolayi.”
MAR 12:16 Vakampela lishonga lila, na mwene akavakota, “Pamihu na liina la yani?” Vakamyangula, “Vya nkosi wa ku Loma.”
MAR 12:17 Hinu Yesu akavajovela, “Mumpelayi nkosi wa ku Loma vyevivili vyaki na mumpelayi Chapanga vyevivii vyaki.” Vakakangaswa nayu neju.
MAR 12:18 Kangi Vasadukayu vevijova kawaka kuyuka vamuhambalili Yesu vakamkota,
MAR 12:19 “Muwula, Musa atilagazili, mundu akafwayi na kuleka mdala changali mwana mlongo vaki yikumgana amuhala lipwela yula, ndi ambabakisila vana mlongo vaki.
MAR 12:20 Leka tijova pavi na valongo saba. Mwealongolili kuvelekewa agegili afwili changaleka mwana.
MAR 12:21 Mbena waki akamuhala lipwela yula, namwene afwili changaleka mwana, yikavya mewawa na mlongo wa datu.
MAR 12:22 Voha saba vafwili changaleka mwana. Kangi lipwela yula afwili.
MAR 12:23 Hinu ligono vandu paviyuka, mau yula yati ivya mdala wa yani? Ndava voha saba vamgegili.”
MAR 12:24 Yesu akavayangula, nyenye mbudili ndava mmanyi lepi Mayandiku Gamsopi amala makakala ga Chapanga.
MAR 12:25 Muni vevafwili peviyuka yati vigega lepi amala kugegewa, yati vivya ngati vamitumu va kunani kwa Chapanga.
MAR 12:26 Nambu ndava ya kuyuka kwa vevafwili, msomili lepi chitabu cha Musa pandu pepivala dasi yeyiyaka motu? Chapanga amjovili Musa, nene ndi Chapanga wa Ibulahimu na Chapanga wa Izaki na Chapanga wa Yakobo.
MAR 12:27 Hinu, mwene lepi “Chapanga wa vevafwili, nambu Chapanga wa vevavi wumi. Nyenye mbudili neju!”
MAR 12:28 Mmonga wa vawula va malagizu abwelili na kayuwana mhutanu wavi. Peaweni Yesu akuvayangula bwina, akamhegelela na kumkota Yesu, “Pagati ya malagizu goha yoki yikulu?”
MAR 12:29 Yesu akamyangula, “Malagizu gakulu pagati ya goha ndi aga: ‘Myuwanila nyenye vandu wa ku Isilaeli! Bambu Chapanga witu, ngamwene Bambu.
MAR 12:30 Umgana Bambu Chapanga waku kwa wumi waku woha na mtima waku woha na luhala lwaku lwoha, na makakala gaku goha.’
MAR 12:31 Na muhilu wa pili ndi uwu: ‘Umgana muyaku ngati cheukujigana wamwene.’ Gavi lepi malagizu gakulu gangi ngati aga.”
MAR 12:32 Hinu, muwula wa malagizu yula akamjovela Yesu, “Muwula! Ujovili chakaka kuvya Bambu ndi Chapanga, kawaka yungi nambu mwene.
MAR 12:33 Na yikumgana mundu kumgana Chapanga kwa mtima woha na luhala lwoha na makakala gaki goha, na kumgana muyaki ngati cheakujigana mwene. Lijambu lenili ndi labwina neju kuliku kumpela Chapanga hinyama ya kutinyisa na teta zozoha zingi.”
MAR 12:34 Yesu pealoli mundu yula ayangwili kwa ukekesi, akamjovela, “Veve uvi papipi kumyidakila Chapanga atalalila wumi waku.” Kangi peamali kujova ago kawaka mundu mwealingi kumkota Yesu lilovi.
MAR 12:35 Lukumbi Yesu iwula mu Nyumba ya Chapanga, akotili, “Ndava kyani Vawula va Malagizu vijova kuvya Kilisitu ndi mmonga ndu pagati ya vana va Daudi?
MAR 12:36 Daudi mwene kwa kulongoswa na Mpungu Msopi ajovili, ‘Bambu amjovili Bambu wangu, tama upandi wangu wa kulyelela, mbaka nivavika vamakoko vaku pahi pa magendelu gaku.’
MAR 12:37 Daudi mwene akumkemela Kilisitu ‘Bambu.’ Yihotoleka wuli hinu kuvya mmonga ndu pagati ya vana vaki?” Msambi wa vandu wamuyuwanila kwa luheku.
MAR 12:38 Mukuwula kwaki, Yesu avajovili, “Mujiyangalila na Vawula va Malagizu, vevigana kugenda kuni vawalili magwanda gatali na kujambuswa na kwa utopesa vandu pandu pakugulisila vindu.
MAR 12:39 Mewawa vigana kutama palongolo munyumba za kukonganekela Vayawudi na mvigoda vya palongolo pamgongolelu wa chakulya.
MAR 12:40 Vene vitola nyumba na vindu vya valipwela kwa kuvakonga, kuni vakujidekesa kumuyupa Chapanga mulukumbi lutali. Ligono la mwishu yati vilipiswa pavaha.”
MAR 12:41 Yesu atamili papipi na chijomela cha kusopela luteta mu Nyumba ya Chapanga. Avalolili vandu chavasopa teta muchijomela chila. Vandu vana vindu vyamahele, vasopili mashonga gamahele mugati yaki.
MAR 12:42 Kangi akabwela lipwela mngangu mmonga, akasopa sendi zivili videbe neju.
MAR 12:43 Yesu avakemili vawuliwa vaki akavajovela, “Chakaka nikuvajovela, lipwela uyu mngangu asopili mashonga gamahele muchijomela kuliku vangi voha.
MAR 12:44 Muni vandu voha vangi vawusili chiyonjokesu cha vindu, nambu mau uyu mngangu, asopili vindu vyoha vyeviganikwa ndava ya kulama.”
MAR 13:1 Yesu peahumayi mu Nyumba ya Chapanga, mmonga wa vawuliwa vaki amjovili, “Muwula, lola maganga na majengu aga chegavili gabwina na kukangasa!”
MAR 13:2 Yesu akamyangula, “Wu, ukugalola majengu aga zivaha? Kawaka liganga hati limonga lelisigalila panani ya liganga lingi, kila liganga yati ligwisiwa.”
MAR 13:3 Yesu paatamili panani ya chitumbi cha Mizeituni kulolokesa Nyumba ya Chapanga, Petili na Yakobo na Yohani na Andelea vakamkota pevavi ngavene,
MAR 13:4 “Tijovela mambu genago yati gihumila ndali? Na ulangisu woki weulangisa kuvya mambu aga gavi papipi kuhumila?”
MAR 13:5 Yesu akatumbula kuvajovela, “Mujiyangalilayi mundu akotoka kuvakonga.”
MAR 13:6 Muni vamahele yati vibwela na kulihengela liina langu, kila mundu yati ijova kuvya mwene ndi Kilisitu! Vene yati vakuvakonga vandu vamahele.
MAR 13:7 Pemyuwana gegivala ngondo na vandu vilongelela mambu ga ngondo mkotoka kuvagaya. Yikugagana mambu genaga kuhumila, nambu mwishu wene wakona.
MAR 13:8 Vandu va mulima umonga yati utovana na vandu va mulima wungi, unkosi umonga yati utovana na unkosi wungi, yati kwiva na mindendemo ya ndima pamonga na njala. Mambu ago ndi ngati utumbula wa lipyanda la kuveleka mwana.
MAR 13:9 Nambu nyenye mjiyangalila. Muni yati vakuvatakila mumabanji ga mihalu, na kutovewa munyumba za kukonganekela Vayawudi. Mewawa yati vakuvapeleka palongolo ya vachilongosi na vankosi ndava ya nene, muni mujova ndava yangu.
MAR 13:10 Nambu yiganikiwa hoti lilovi la Bwina likokosewayi kwa vandu voha kwakona mwishu wangahika.
MAR 13:11 Na pamwikamuliwa na kupelekwa mumabanji ga mihalu, mkoto kuhololela chakujova. Lukumbi lwenulo. Nambu mjova chechoha chemwipewa kujova, muni yati gihuma kwa Mpungu Msopi.
MAR 13:12 Mlongo yati akumng'anamukila mhaja waki akomiwa na dadi yati akumng'anamukila mwana waki, na vana yati vakuvang'anamukila dadi na nyina vavi vakomewayi.
MAR 13:13 Vandu voha yati vakuvagana lepi ndava ya liina langu. Nambu mweisindimala mbaka mwishu ndi Chapanga akumsangula kuhuma uhamula wa magono goha gangali mwishu.
MAR 13:14 “Pemwilola ‘Yomeso lihakau lelilangisa uhalabisu’ Liyimili pandu pangaganikiwa kuvya.” Mweisoma malovi aga amanyalila. Hinu vevavili ku Yudea na vajumbalila kuchitumbi.
MAR 13:15 Mundu mweavili kuvala ya nyumba yaku akotoka kuyingila mugati kutola chindu, nambu atilayi!
MAR 13:16 Mewawa mundu mweavili kumgunda akotoka kuwuya kunyumba yaki kutola nyula yaki.
MAR 13:17 Niviniswa mtima ndava ya vanandumbu na vevinyong'esa magono ago, ndava yati kwivya na mang'ahiso neju.
MAR 13:18 Nambu mumuyupayi Chapanga mambu ago gakotoka kuhumila lukumbi lwa mbepu.
MAR 13:19 Muni magono ago yati kwiva na mang'ahiso gakulu, gangahumila kuhuma Chapanga kuwumba mulima mbaka lelu, katu yati gihumila lepi kavili.
MAR 13:20 Ngati Bambu ngagapunguziwi lepi magono kawaka hati mundu mmonga wa kusanguliwa. Nambu ndava ya vahaguliwa vaki, Bambu agapungwizi magono ago.
MAR 13:21 Kangi, mundu akavajovela, lolayi, Kilisitu avili apa! Amala, avili pala, mkotoka kusadika.
MAR 13:22 Muni yati vihumalila vakina Kilisitu vaudese na vamlota va udese, yati vikita ulangisu na chinamtiti, ngati yihotoleka ndava ya kuvabudisa hati vahaguliwa va Chapanga.
MAR 13:23 Nambu nyenye mujiyangalila. Nene nivajovili mambu genaga kwakona gangahumila.
MAR 13:24 “Nambu pegimalika magono ago ga mang'ahiso, lilanga yati lisopewa chitita na mwehi yati ulangasa lepi.
MAR 13:25 Ndondo yati zigwa kuhuma kunani, na vindu vyoha vya kumahundi yati vinyuguswa.
MAR 13:26 Penapo yati vakumlola Mwana wa Mundu, ibwela mulihundi kwa makakala gamahele na ukulu.
MAR 13:27 Ndi yati akuvatuma vamitumu va kunani kwa Chapanga vavalunda vandu vevahaguliwi na Chapanga, kuhuma pandi mcheche za mulima, na hati kuhuma pandu pa kutali ya mulima woha.”
MAR 13:28 “Mujiwula kuhuma mumkongo wa mtini. Pemwilola mahamba gimela, nyenye mwimanya kuvya lusenje lwa fula luhegalili.
MAR 13:29 Mewawa na nyenye pemwilola mambu genago gihengeka, mmanya kuvya Mwana wa Mundu avi papipi neju kuhika.
MAR 13:30 Chakaka nikuvajovela, chiveleku ichi chipita lepi kwakona mambu aga kuhumila.
MAR 13:31 Hati ngati kunani kwa Chapanga na pamulima yati ziwuka, nambu malovi gangu yati gihumila ngati chenajovili.”
MAR 13:32 “Nambu, avi lepi mundu mweimanya ligono la mwishu yati libwela ndali, hati vamitumu va kunani kwa Chapanga, hati Mwana wa Chapanga. Dadi Chapanga ndu mweamanyili.
MAR 13:33 Mujiyangalila na mujitendekela, muni mumanyili lepi ligono amala lukumbi peluhumila.
MAR 13:34 Yati yivya ngati mundu mweahambi lugendu na kuvalekela vahengaji utalalila, kila mundu na lihengu laki, akumjovela mlonda wa mlyangu avyai mihu.
MAR 13:35 Mujitendelekela, ndava muni mmanyi lepi mkolo nyumba iwuya ndali. Pangi yivya kimihi, pagati ya kilu, hambakucha amala lukela.
MAR 13:36 Mujitendelekela, muni ngati abwelili cha kukenyemusa, akotoka kuvakolela mgonili.
MAR 13:37 Genikuvajovela nyenye, nikuvajovela mwavoha. Muvya mihu!”
MAR 14:1 Gavili gakona magono gavili kuhika Mselebuko wa Pasaka na Mselebuko wa kulya mabumunda gangali ngemeku. Vakulu va kuteta na Vawula va Malagizu valondayi njila ya kumkamula Yesu cha mfiyu na kumkoma.
MAR 14:2 Nambu vakajova, “Tikotoka kukita chenicho lukumbi lwa mselebuko, ndava vandu yati vikita chitututu.”
MAR 14:3 Yesu avili ku Betania kunyumba ya Simoni mweavi na mabudi. Peavili pameza kulya chakulya, mau mmonga mweavili na kachupa kadebe kaganga ka alabasta kamahuta geginungalilayi neju, mahuta geginungalila bwina gegatenganizwi kwa nado, akabwela. Akayidindula chupa yila, na kumyitila Yesu mahuta gala kumutu.
MAR 14:4 Vandu vangi vevavi penapo vayomiswi na chitendu chila vakajijovela, “Ndava kyani kuyagisa waka mahuta geginungalila bwina?
MAR 14:5 Mahuta ago ngagagulisiwi kwa mashonga gamahele, ngavapewili vangangu!” Vakamywangila mau yula.
MAR 14:6 Nambu Yesu akavajovela, “Mumleka! Ndava ya kyani mukumung'aha? Anikitili nene lijambu labwina.
MAR 14:7 Vangangu muvinawu magono goha, muhotola kuvatangatila lukumbi lwolwoha lwa mwigana. Nambu nene yati nivya lepi na nyenye lukumbi lwoha.
MAR 14:8 Mwene akitili chaehotwili. Alongolili kuniyitila mahuta geginungalila muhiga yangu anitendelekili kwakona kuzikiwa kwangu palongolo.
MAR 14:9 Chakaka nikuvajovela, pamulima woha Lilovi la Bwina yati likokoswa, chitendu ichi cheakitili yati chiluwuliwa kwa kumkumbuka mdala uyu.”
MAR 14:10 Kangi Yuda Isikalioti, mmonga wa vawuliwa kumi na vavili vala, akahamba kwa vakulu va kuteta ndava ya kumgotola Yesu.
MAR 14:11 Vakulu va kuteta pevayuwini malovi genago, vahekalili, vayidakilini kumpela mashonga. Ndi, Yuda akatumbula kulonda lukumbi lwa kumgotola Yesu.
MAR 14:12 Ligono la kutumbula kwa Mselebuko wa Mabumunda yangali ngemeku, lukumbi lwa kuhinja mwanalimbelele wa Pasaka, vawuliwa vaki vakamkota, “Ugana tikakutendelekelayi koki chakulya cha Pasaka?”
MAR 14:13 Hinu, Yesu avatumili vawuliwa vaki vavili akavajovela, “Muhambayi kumuji, kwenuko yati mkumkolela mgosi mmonga agegili chihulu cha manji. Mumlanda
MAR 14:14 mbaka munyumba yeiyingila, mkamjovelayi mkolo nyumba, ‘Muwula ikota, chivi koki chumba cha vayehe penilya Pasaka pamonga na vawuliwa vangu?’
MAR 14:15 Mwene yati akuvalangisa chumba chivaha kunani ya kugolofa chechitendelekiwi. Mtendekelayi mwenumo.”
MAR 14:16 Hinu, vawuliwa vakawuka, vakahamba kumuji, vakakolela kila chindu chivi bwina ngati Yesu cheavajovili. Ndi vakatendelekela chakulya cha Pasaka.
MAR 14:17 Payavili kimihi, Yesu ahikili penapo pamonga na vawuliwa vaki kumi na vavili.
MAR 14:18 Pevalyayi pamonga, Yesu akajova, “Chakaka nikuvajovela, mmonga winu mweilya pamonga na nene, yati akunigotola.”
MAR 14:19 Penapo vawuliwa vaki vakatumbula kuviniswa mitima, vakatumbula kumkota mmonga mmonga, “Wu, ndi nene?”
MAR 14:20 Yesu akavajovela, “Ndi mmonga winu pagati yinu nyenye kumi na vavili, mweijwiga libumunda pamonga na nene munkeve.
MAR 14:21 Chakaka Mwana wa Mundu yati ifwa ngati Mayandiku Gamsopi chegijova. Nambu alachikolela mundu yula mweakumgotola Mwana wa Mundu! Mbanga kwa mundu mwenuyo ngati ngavelekiwi lepi!”
MAR 14:22 Pevalyayi, Yesu akatola libumunda, akamsengusa Chapanga, akalimetula na kuvapela vawuliwa vaki akajova, “Mtola, yeniyi, ndi higa yangu.”
MAR 14:23 Kangi akatola chikombi cha divayi, akamsengusa Chapanga, akavapela voha vanywelili divayi muchikombi chila.
MAR 14:24 Akavajovela, “Yeniyi ndi ngasi yangu yeyilangisa lilaganu la Chapanga kwa vandu vaki, ngasi yeyiyitika ndava ya kulekekesa mabudilu ga vandu vamahele.
MAR 14:25 Chakaka nikuvajovela, ninywa lepi kavili divayi mbaka ligono lila peninywa kavili mu Unkosi wa Chapanga.”
MAR 14:26 Kangi vakayimba lunyimbu lwa kumsengusa Chapanga, vakawuka, vakahamba ku Chitumbi cha Mizeituni.
MAR 14:27 Yesu akavajovela vawuliwa vaki, “Mwavoha nyenye yati mwitila na kunileka nene, mu Mayandiku Gamsopi Chapanga ijova, ‘Yati nikumkoma mdimaji, na mambelele yati gipechengana.’
MAR 14:28 Nambu nikayukayi, yati nikuvalongolela ku Galilaya.”
MAR 14:29 Petili akamjovela, “Hati ngati voha yati vakukuleka, nene katu nikukuleka lepi!”
MAR 14:30 Yesu akamjovela, “Chakaka nikujovela, kilu iyi, kwakona lijogolo langakokoleka mala zivili, yati ukunibela mala zidatu kuvya unimanyili lepi.”
MAR 14:31 Nambu Petili akakangamala kujova, “Hati ngati yikunigana nifwa pamonga na veve, katu yati nikukuleka lepi!” Vawuliwa voha vakajova mewawa.
MAR 14:32 Hinu, vakahika kulidimba lelikemelewa Gesemane. Yesu akavajovela vawuliwa vaki, “Mtama apa lukumbi penikumuyupa Chapanga.”
MAR 14:33 Kangi akavatola Petili na Yakobo na Yohani. Akatumbula kuviniswa mtima na kung'ahika neju.
MAR 14:34 Akavajovela, “Niviniswa mtima neju hati papipi kufwa. Mtama na muvya mihu.”
MAR 14:35 Akahamba palongolo padebe akajitaga cha kukupama pahi, akamuyupa Chapanga, kuvya ngati yihotoleka, lukumbi ulo lwa mang'ahiso lumupitila kutali.
MAR 14:36 Akajova, “Dadi wangu, kwa veve mambu goha gihotoleka. Uniwusilayi chikombi ichi cha mang'ahiso. Nambu lepi ngati chenigana nene, nambu cheugana wamwene.”
MAR 14:37 Kangi akawuya kwa vawuliwa vadatu vala akavakolela vagonili. Hinu, akamkota Petili, “Simoni, wu, ugonili? Uhotwi lepi kuvya mihu hati lukumbi ludebe?”
MAR 14:38 Kangi akavajovela, “Muvyai mihu na kumuyupa Chapanga mkotoka kuyingila mukulingiwa. Mpungu ugana, nambu higa yitotokela.”
MAR 14:39 Akahamba kumuyupa Chapanga kavili akawuyila malovi galagala.
MAR 14:40 Peavawuyili vawuliwa vaki avakolili vagonili kavili. Ndava mihu gavi na lugono. Vamanyi lepi chakumyangula.
MAR 14:41 Peabwelili mala ya datu akavajovela, “Mwakona mwigona na kupumulila? Hinu yikoli! Lukumbi luhikili! Mwana wa Mundu igotolewa kwa vandu vevambudila Chapanga.
MAR 14:42 Muyimuka, tihambi. Mlolayi yula mweakunigotola ahegalili.”
MAR 14:43 Yesu peavi akona ijova, Yuda mmonga wa kumi na vavili vala, akabwela pamonga na msambi wa vandu wewavili na mapanga na vibonga. Vandu venavo vatumwili na vakulu va kuteta, Vawula va Malagizu na vagogo.
MAR 14:44 Yuda, yula mweamgotwili Yesu, avapelili ulangisu msambi wa vandu wula, “Kuvya yula mwenikumjambusa cha kumkumbatila, ndi mumkamula na mumpeleka kuni avi muulonda.”
MAR 14:45 Yuda peahikili ndu amuhambalili Yesu akamjovela, “Muwula!” Kangi akamjambusa cha kumkumbatila.
MAR 14:46 Hinu vandu vala vakamkamula Yesu na kumkunga.
MAR 14:47 Mmonga mweayimili pamonga na Yesu, akaholomola upanga waki, akamdumula likutu mvanda wa Mteta Mkulu.
MAR 14:48 Yesu akamjovela, “Wu, mbwelili na mapanga na vibonga kunikamula ngati kuvya nene mnyagaji?
MAR 14:49 Magono goha navi pamonga na nyenye, niwula ku Nyumba ya Chapanga, nambu mwanikamwili lepi. Nambu hinu yikugagana Mayandiku Gamsopi gatimilayi.”
MAR 14:50 Penapo vawuliwa voha vakamleka na kutila.
MAR 14:51 Kwavili na msongolo mmonga mweamlandayi Yesu awalili chikwinda. Vene valingili kumkamula.
MAR 14:52 Nambu mwene akalema, akachileka chikwinda chila, akajumba waka.
MAR 14:53 Hinu, vampeliki Yesu kunyumba ya Mteta Mkulu, penapo ndi pevakonganiki pamonga vakulu va kuteta voha na vagogo na Vawula va Malagizu.
MAR 14:54 Petili amlandili Yesu chapatali, akayingila muluvanja lwa nyumba ya Mteta Mkulu. Akatama pamonga na valonda kuyota motu.
MAR 14:55 Vakulu va kuteta na libanji loha valondai lilovi la kumtakila Yesu muni vahotola kumkoma, nambu valipati lepi.
MAR 14:56 Vandu vamahele vajovili gaudese ndava ya Yesu, nambu malovi gavi gayidakilini lepi.
MAR 14:57 Kangi vandu vangi vakayima kujova udese ndava ya Yesu, vakajova,
MAR 14:58 “Tete tamuyuwini ijova, ‘Nene yati nigwisa Nyumba ya Chapanga iyi yeyijengiwi na vandu, na mu magono gadatu yati nijenga yingi yangajengewa na vandu.’ ”
MAR 14:59 Nambu pamonga na ago, malovi gavi gayidikilini lepi.
MAR 14:60 Hinu, Mteta Mkulu akayima pagati yavi akamkota Yesu, “Wu, wiyangula lepi lilovi, vandu venava vakukutakila kyani?”
MAR 14:61 Nambu mwene agunili, ajovili lepi lilovi hati limonga. Mkulu wa kuteta akamkota kavili, “Veve ndi Kilisitu, Mwana wa Chapanga Mmotisa?”
MAR 14:62 Yesu akayangula, “Ena, ndi nene. Kavili yati mukumlola Mwana wa Mundu atamili upandi wa kulyelela cha Bambu yula mweavi na makakala. Ibwela kuhumila mumahundi ga kunani kwa Chapanga!”
MAR 14:63 Penapo ndi Mteta Mkulu akapapula nyula zaki, akajova, “Tigana lepi kuyuwana malovi gangi ndava ya mundu uyu!
MAR 14:64 Mumyuwini cheakumliga Chapanga! Nyenye mjova wuli?” Voha vamganili akomiwa.
MAR 14:65 Hinu, vangi pagati yavi vakatumbula kumuhunyila mata, vakamgubika pamihu vakamtova na kumjovela, “Lotelayi, ndi yani mweakutovili!” Hati valonda vakamtola, vakampamanda.
MAR 14:66 Petili peavi akona muluvanja lwa nyumba, mtumisi mmonga wa chidala wa Mteta Mkulu abwelili.
MAR 14:67 Peamuweni Petili iyota motu, amlolili, akamjovela, “Hati veve wavili pamonga na Yesu wa ku Nazaleti.”
MAR 14:68 Nambu Petili akabela, “Kwali, nakuchimanya cheujova!” Petili akawuka akahamba pamlyangu wa kuyingilila. Penapo ndi lijogolo likakokoleka.
MAR 14:69 Muhengaji mdala yula, peamuwene kavili Petili, akatumbula kangi kuvajovela vandu vevavi penapo, “Mundu uyu ndi mmonga wavi.”
MAR 14:70 Nambu Petili akabela kavili. Mwanakandahi, vandu vevayimili penapo vamjovili Petili, “Chakaka veve ndi mmonga wavi, muni veve mewawa ndi mundu wa ku Galilaya.”
MAR 14:71 Nambu Petili akatumbula kujova, “Nipewa likoto ngati nijova udese! Nilapa nimmanyili lepi mundu uyu mwemukumuluwula.”
MAR 14:72 Bahapo lijogolo likakokoleka mala ya pavili. Petili akumbwiki Yesu cheamjovili, “Kwakona lijogolo langakokoleka yati ukunibela mala zidatu.” Petili akajitaga pahi na kuvemba.
MAR 15:1 Lukela pehe, vakulu va kuteta vayidakilini pamonga na vagogo na Vawula va Malagizu na vanalibanji voha, vakamkunga Yesu, vakampeleka na kumgotola kwa Pilatu.
MAR 15:2 Pilatu akamkota Yesu, “Wu, veve ndi Nkosi wa Vayawudi?” Yesu akayangula. “Ena, ndi ngati wamwene cheujova.”
MAR 15:3 Vakulu va kuteta vamtakili Yesu mambu gamahele.
MAR 15:4 Hinu, Pilatu akamkota kavili Yesu, “Wu, wiyangula lepi lilovi? Yuwanila chevakutakila mambu gamahele kukuvala veve.”
MAR 15:5 Nambu Yesu ayangwili lepi lilovi, hati Pilatu akakangasa.
MAR 15:6 Kila lukumbi lwa mselebuko wa Pasaka, Pilatu avi na mvelu wa kuvadindulila vandu mkungiwa mmonga mwevamganayi.
MAR 15:7 Lukumbi lwenulo kwavili mundu mmonga liina laki Balaba, mweakungiwi muchifungu pamonga na vayaki ndava ya kukita chitututu na kukoma vandu.
MAR 15:8 Vandu vamahele vakamhambila Pilatu vakamuyupa avakitila ngati cheyavili mvelu waki.
MAR 15:9 Pilatu akavakota, “Wu, mwigana nivadindulilayi Nkosi wa Vayawudi?”
MAR 15:10 Ajovili chenicho ndava vakulu vakuteta vamgotwili Yesu kwaki, ndava ya wihu.
MAR 15:11 Nambu vakulu va kuteta vakavakoakesa vandu vamuyupa Pilatu avadindulila Balaba pahali pa Yesu.
MAR 15:12 Pilatu akavakota kavili, “Hinu, mwigana nimkita chindu kiki na mundu uyu mwemkumkemela Nkosi wa Vayawudi?”
MAR 15:13 Vandu voha vakajova kavili kwa lwami luvaha, “Mvamba mu msalaba!”
MAR 15:14 Nambu Pilatu akavakota, “Ndava kyani? Ahokili kyani?” Nambu vene vakayonjokesa kujova kwa lwami luvaha, “Mvamba pamsalaba!”
MAR 15:15 Pilatu aganili kuuganisa msambi wa vandu, akamudindulila Balaba kuhuma muchifungu. Kangi akalagizila Yesu vamtova michapilu, kangi akamgotola vamvamba pamsalaba.
MAR 15:16 Kangi manjolinjoli vala vampeliki Yesu mugati ya luvanja lwa nyumba ya Pilatu, mkulu wa mulima, vakavakemela pamonga msambi woha wa manjolinjoli.
MAR 15:17 Vamuwaliki nyula za langi ya zambalau ngati nkosi, vabotili njingwa ya minga, vakamuwalika kumutu.
MAR 15:18 Vakatumbula kumjambusa, “Tikuwoni, Nkosi wa Vayawudi!”
MAR 15:19 Vakamtova kumutu na ndonga, vakamuhunyila mata, vakamfugamila na kumgundamila.
MAR 15:20 Pavamalili kumvevesa, vakamuhula nyula ya zambalau yila, vakamuwalika nyula zaki, kangi vakamuwusa kuvala kumvamba pamsalaba.
MAR 15:21 Pevavi munjila vakonganiki na mundu mmonga liina laki Simoni, mkolonjinji wa Kulene mwene avili dadi wavi Alekizanda na Lufo. Lukumbi lwenulo apitayi kuhuma kuvala ya muji kuyingila pabomani. Manjolinjoli vakamkamula Simoni na kumgegesa msalaba weavi nawu Yesu.
MAR 15:22 Kangi vampeliki Yesu mbaka pandu pepikemelewa Goligota, maana yaki “Libangu la Mutu.”
MAR 15:23 Kangi vakampela divayi yevahangisini na mtela wewukemelewa manemane, nambu Yesu abelili kunywa.
MAR 15:24 Hinu vakamvamba pamsalaba, vakagavana nyula zaki, kwa gudugudu muni vamanya kila mmonga yati ipata kyani.
MAR 15:25 Yavili saa yidatu ya lukela pavamvamba pamsalaba.
MAR 15:26 Panani ya msalaba wula vaviki chibawu, chevayandiki matakilu gaki, mwenuyu ndi, “Nkosi wa Vayawudi.”
MAR 15:27 Mewawa vavavambili panani ya pamisalaba vanyagaji vavili, papipi na Yesu, mmonga upandi waki wa kulyelela na yungi upandi waki wa kumangeya.
MAR 15:28 Mambu aga ndi gitimisa Mayandiku Gamsopi gegijova, “Avikiwi pamonga na vehenga gahakau.”
MAR 15:29 Vandu vevapitayi pandu apo vakamliga na kunyugusa mitu yavi na kujova, “Mwe! Veve mweugwisa Nyumba ya Chapanga na kuyijenga kavili mu magono gadatu!
MAR 15:30 Hinu, huluka pamsalaba ujisangulayi wamwene!”
MAR 15:31 Mewawa vakulu va kuteta pamonga na vawula va malagizu vamvevisi vajovesana vene kwa vene, “Avasangwili vangi nambu kujisangula mwene itola lepi!
MAR 15:32 Ati, mwene ndi Kilisitu, Nkosi wa Isilaeli! Hinu ahulukayi kuhuma pamsalaba muni tilola na kumsadika.” Hati vandu vala vevavambiwi pamsalaba papipi nayu, navene mewa vamligili.
MAR 15:33 Kutumbula saa sita ya muhi mbaka saa tisa, chitita chagubiki mulima woha.
MAR 15:34 Saa tisa muhi Yesu akajova kwa lwami luvaha, akajova, “Eloi, Eloi, lema sabakitani?” Mana yaki “Chapanga wangu, Chapanga wangu, ndava kyani unilekili?”
MAR 15:35 Vandu vangi pagati ya vevayimili pala, pevayuwini ago, vakajova, “Yuwanila! Akumkemela Eliya.”
MAR 15:36 Mundu mmonga akajumba, akajwiga chindu ngati lidodoki mudivayi yeyivava, akavika panani ya ndonga, akamvikila pamlomo akajova, “Linda tilola ngati Eliya yati ibwela kumuhulusa pamsalaba!”
MAR 15:37 Yesu akakwesa lwami luvaha, afwili.
MAR 15:38 Hinu, lipazia la Nyumba ya Chapanga likapapuka pagati kuhuma kunani mbaka pahi.
MAR 15:39 Mkulu mmonga wa msambi wa manjolinjoli mweayimili palongolo yaki peamuwene Yesu cheifwa, akajova, “Chakaka mundu uyu avili Mwana wa Chapanga!”
MAR 15:40 Kwavili na vadala vevalolayi chakutali, pagati yavi avi Maliya mkolonjinji wa Magidala, na Maliya nyina wavi Yakobo mdebe na Yose mewa na Salome.
MAR 15:41 Vadala ava ndi vevamlandili Yesu ku Galilaya ndava ya kumhengela. Kwavili na vadala vangi vamahele vevabwelili ku Yelusalemu pamonga nayu.
MAR 15:42 Kimihi yamali kuhika, ndi yavili ligono la kutendelekela kwakona Ligono la Kupumulila.
MAR 15:43 Penapo abwelili Yosefu mkolonjinji wa ku Alimatei, mmonga pagati ya vanalibanji likulu, mweitopeswa neju. Mwene mewa alindilayi kubwela kwa Unkosi wa Chapanga. Hinu amhambalili Pilatu changali wogohi, akamuyupa apewayi higa ya Yesu.
MAR 15:44 Pilatu akakangasa kuyuwana kuvya Yesu amali kufwa. Hinu akamkemela chilongosi wa msambi wa manjolinjoli, akamkota ngati lumali kupita lukumbi lutali kutumbula Yesu peafwili.
MAR 15:45 Pilatu peamali kujoviwa uchakaka kuhuma kwa chilongosi wa msambi wa manjolinjoli yula kuvya Yesu amali kufwa, akamyidakila Yosefu atola higa ya Yesu.
MAR 15:46 Yosefu akagula nyula ya msopi, akayihulusa pahi higa yila, akayitindisila nyula ya msopi, akayivika mulitinda la mbugu lelahongoliwi palitalau, akabilingisa liganga pamlyangu wa litinda.
MAR 15:47 Maliya mkolonjinji wa Magidala na Maliya nyina wa Yose vapawene pandu pala pevayivikili higa ya Yesu.
MAR 16:1 Palapitili Ligono la Kupumulila, Maliya mkolonjinji wa Magidala, Salome na Maliya nyina waki Yakobo vagulili mahuta gakunungalila bwina ndi vakanyala higa ya Yesu.
MAR 16:2 Hinu, lukela pehe ligono la Dominika, lilanga palatumbulayi kuhuma, vahikili pa litinda.
MAR 16:3 Munjila vakotanayi vene kwa vene, “Yani yati akutiwusila liganga pamlyangu wa litinda?”
MAR 16:4 Nambu pavalolili, valiweni liganga limali kuwusiwa. Liganga lenilo lavili livaha neju.
MAR 16:5 Pevayingili mu litinda la mbugu, vamuweni msongolo mmonga awalili nyula yamsopi, atamili upandi wa kulyelela, vakakangasa neju.
MAR 16:6 Nambu msongolo yula akavajovela, “Mkotoka kukenyemuka. Mukumlonda Yesu wa ku Nazaleti mweavambiwi pamsalaba. Ayukili, avi lepi apa. Mlolayi, pandu pavamgonisi.
MAR 16:7 Hinu muhambayi mukavajovela vawuliwa vaki pamonga na Petili kuvya, ‘Akuvalongolela ku Galilaya, kwenuko yati mukumlola ngati cheavajovili.’ ”
MAR 16:8 Ndi, vawukili vakajumba kuhuma mulitinda mula, muni vandendimi kwa wogoyi na kukangasa. Vamjovili lepi chindu mundu yeyoha, ndava muni vayogwipi neju.
MAR 16:9 Yesu peayukili lukela pehe ligono la Dominika, amuhumalili hoti Maliya mundu wa Magidala, yula mweamuwusili mizuka saba.
MAR 16:10 Maliya akahamba kuvajovela vawuliwa vevavili pamonga na Yesu, na lukumbi lwenulo vavembayi na kutinda.
MAR 16:11 Nambu pevayuwini ngati Yesu avili mumi na kuvya Maliya mkolonjinji wa Magidala amuweni, vasadiki lepi.
MAR 16:12 Mwanakandayi Yesu avahumalili vawuliwa vavili vevahambayi kuchijiji. Vawuliwa avo hoti vammanyili lepi.
MAR 16:13 Vene vakahamba na kuvajovela vayavi, nambu mewawa vayavi vasadiki lepi.
MAR 16:14 Pamwishu Yesu avahumalili vawuliwa kumi na mmonga pevavi pamonga pameza. Akavaywangila neju ndava vasadiki lepi na ndava ya kunonopa kwa mitima yavi, muni vavasadiki lepi vala vevamuweni peamali kuyuka.
MAR 16:15 Hinu, akavajovela, “Muhambayi pamulima woha mkakokosa Lilovi la Bwina kwa vandu voha.
MAR 16:16 Mundu yeyoha mweisadika na kubatiziwa Chapanga yati akumsangula, nambu mundu yeyoha angasadika Chapanga yati akumhamula.
MAR 16:17 Na ulangisu uwu yati ulandana na vevisadika, yati vivinga mizuka kwa liina langu na kulongela kwa luga ya mupya.
MAR 16:18 Vakakamulayi liyoka amala kunywa chindu chochoha chechikoma yati vifwa lepi. Yati vakuvavikila mawoko vatamu, na yati Chapanga akuvalamisa.”
MAR 16:19 Hinu, Bambu Yesu peamalili kulongela nawu, akatoliwa kuhamba kunani kwa Chapanga, akatama upandi wa kulyelela wa chiwoko cha Chapanga.
MAR 16:20 Vawuliwa vakahamba na kukokosa Lilovi la Bwina kila pandu. Bambu akahenga lihengu pamonga nawu, kukita milangisu, ndava ya kulangisa ujumbi wenuwo kumvala mwene ndi chakaka.
LUK 1:1 Mkulungu Teofili. Vandu vamahele valingi kuyandika bwina mambu gegahengiki pagati yitu.
LUK 1:2 Vayandiki ngati chevatijovili vevagaweni penapo pegatumbukini magono ga mumbele mambu genago na kuvakokosela lilovi la Chapanga.
LUK 1:3 Mewa na Mkulungu Teofili penamali kulolokesa uchakaka waki kwa magono gamahele, nilola mbanga nikuyandikila veve kwa uchakaka waki.
LUK 1:4 Nikiti chenichi muni nigana wamwene umanyayi mambu goha gevakuwulili.
LUK 1:5 Lukumbi Helodi peavi Nkosi wa ku Yudea, ndi pavi na Mteta wa Chapanga mweikemiwa Zakalia wa chikundi cha uteta cha Abiya, na mdala waki avi Elizabeti wa lukolo lwa Aloni.
LUK 1:6 Voha vavili vahenga ga kumganisa Chapanga na kuyidakila mihilu na malagizu ga Bambu changabuda.
LUK 1:7 Vavi lepi na mwana mbaka muugogolo wavi, ndava Elizabeti avi lepi na chiveleku.
LUK 1:8 Ligono limonga, Zakalia peavi mukuhenga lihengu laki la uteta mu Nyumba ya Chapanga,
LUK 1:9 Ngati cheyavili mivelu ya vamteta va Chapanga, Zakalia ahaguliwi kwa gudugudu kuyingila mu Nyumba ya Bambu ndava ya kuhukisa ubani.
LUK 1:10 Na lukumbi lwa kuhukisa ubani palwahikili, vala voha vevakonganiki kumuyupa Chapanga vavi cha kuvala vayupayi.
LUK 1:11 Mtumu wa kunani kwa Bambu, akamuhumila na kuyima upandi wa kulyela wa lusanja lwa luteta lwa kuhukisa ubani.
LUK 1:12 Zakalia peamuweni mtumu wa kunani kwa Chapanga yula, akakenyemuka.
LUK 1:13 Mtumu wa kunani kwa Chapanga akamjovela, “Zakalia, kotoka kuyogopa muni Bambu ayuwini chawamuyupili, ndava mdala waku Elizabeti yati akubabila mwana mgosi na veve walamkemela Yohani.
LUK 1:14 Ndi wamwene yati uheka pavaha na vandu vamahele valahekelela ndava ya kuvelekewa kwaki.
LUK 1:15 Mwenuyo yati ivya mkulu, pamihu ga Bambu, alanywa lepi divayi wala ugimbi, yati ilongoswa na Mpungu Msopi kuhumila mulileme la nyina waki.
LUK 1:16 Yati akuvawuyisa vandu vamahele wa pa Isilaeli, vamuwuyilayi Bambu Chapanga wavi.
LUK 1:17 Yati akumlongolela Bambu kuni ilongosiwa na makakala na Mpungu ngati Eliya. Ndava ya kuvatepulanisa vadadi na vana vavi, yati avakita vangamyidakila vavyayi na luhala ngati lwa vala vevakumyidikila, na kumtendelekela Bambu vandu vaki.”
LUK 1:18 Zakalia akamkota Mtumu wa kunani kwa Chapanga, “Yati nimanya wuli ngati givya chenicho? Muni nene na mdala wangu tavagogolo.”
LUK 1:19 Mtumu wa kunani kwa Chapanga akayangula, “Nene na Gabulieli na mtumisi wa Chapanga. Ndi anitumili nijova na veve nikujovela lilovi la bwina lenili.
LUK 1:20 Yuwanila, yati wivya ngajova yati nakuhotola kujova, mbaka ligono lila pegihumila ago ndava ubeli kunisadika malovi gangu gene gihumila palukumbi lwaki.”
LUK 1:21 Lukumbi lwenulo vandu vevamulindilayi Zakalia kuvala vakakangasa, muni atamakisi lukumbi lutali mu Nyumba ya Chapanga.
LUK 1:22 Peahumili kuvala nakuhotola kujova na vayaki, vayaki vakamanya kuvya mu Nyumba ya Chapanga mula, muyavi agaweni maono ndi akayendelela kulangisa na mawoko muni avi ngajova.
LUK 1:23 Lukumbi lwaki lwa kuhenga lihengu la uteta palwamaliki, akawuya kunyumba yaki.
LUK 1:24 Lukumbi luhupi palwamaliki Elizabeti mdala wa Zakalia yula akavya na ndumbu, akawela munyumba miheyi mhanu,
LUK 1:25 kuni ajova “Bambu anitangatili na aniloli, hinu cheaniwusili soni pavandu!”
LUK 1:26 Mu mwehi wa sita, Chapanga amtumili mtumu waki wa kunani Gabulieli kumuji wa Nazaleti, ku Galilaya.
LUK 1:27 Kwa kamwali mmonga mwavamkemela Maliya, Mwenuyo ahongiwi na mgosi mmonga liina laki Yosefu wa lukolo lwa Daudi.
LUK 1:28 Mtumu wa kunani kwa Chapanga Akamuhegelela akamjambusa, “Tikuwoni! Bambu avi pamonga na veve kangi akugubiki uganu waki!”
LUK 1:29 Maliya peayuwini malovi gala, akakenyemuka, akahololela, jambusa yeniyi mana yaki kyani?
LUK 1:30 Mtumu wa kunani kwa Chapanga akamjovela, “Kotoka kuyogopa Maliya, muni Chapanga aganisiwi na veve.
LUK 1:31 Walavya na ndumbu, walaveleka mwana mgosi, yati ukumkemela liina laki Yesu.
LUK 1:32 Mwenuyo yati ivya mkulu, yati ikemelewa Mwana wa Chapanga Mkulu. Bambu Chapanga yati amuvika kuvya Nkosi, ngati cheamuviki Nkosi Daudi mweavi gogo waki.
LUK 1:33 Ndi yati ivya Nkosi wa lukolo lwa Yakobo magono goha, na unkosi waki wangali na mwishu!”
LUK 1:34 Maliya akamyangula, “Genago galavya wuli, muni nene nangammanya mgosi?”
LUK 1:35 Mtumu wa kunani kwa Chapanga akayangula, “Mpungu Msopi yati ukuhelelela, na uhotola waki Chapanga Mkulu walakugubika ngati chimuwili, muni mwana mweubwela kumveleka uyo, yati ikemelawa msopi na Mwana wa Chapanga.
LUK 1:36 Hati mlongo waku Elizabeti, agegi ndumbu ya mwana mgosi na hinu mumwehi wa sita, pamonga na ugogolo waki, mweamanyikini na vandu kuvya ngaveleka.
LUK 1:37 Muni kawaka lilovi langahotoleka kwa Chapanga.”
LUK 1:38 Maliya akajova, “Nene nivii penapa namvanda wa bambu, nikitiwayi ngati chaukajovili.” Ndi mtumi wa kunani kwa Chapanga akawuka.
LUK 1:39 Ndi lwapiti lepi lukumbi lutali, Maliya akapanganyika akayumbatika kuhamba kumuji wewavi kuvidunda vya ku Yudea.
LUK 1:40 Kwenuko akayingila munyumba ya Zakalia akamjambusa Elizabeti.
LUK 1:41 Bahapo Elizabeti peayuwini jambusa ya Maliya, kamwana kakahumba chaluheku mulileme la Elizabeti. Elizabeti akalongoswa Mpungu Msopi
LUK 1:42 akajova kwa lwami luvaha, “Umotisiwi kuliku vadala voha, na mweubwela kumveleka huyo amotisiwi!
LUK 1:43 Nene nayani hati nyina wa Bambu wangu anibwelili?
LUK 1:44 Nikujovela, panayuwini jambusa yaku, kamwana kakahumba mulileme langu chaluheku.
LUK 1:45 Umotisiwi veve mweusadika kuvya yati gihumila gala geakujovili Bambu.”
LUK 1:46 Maliya akajova, “Mtima wangu ukumlumba Bambu,
LUK 1:47 mpungu wangu umhekela Bambu, ndava Msangula wangu.
LUK 1:48 Muni aulolili cha lipyana ungolongondi wa mvanda waki! Kutumbula hinu viveleku vyoha yati vakunikemela mwenisangalwiki,
LUK 1:49 ndava muni Chapanga ana makakala anihengili gakulu, na liina laki ndi msopi
LUK 1:50 Chivelekelu mbaka chivelekelu mwene magono goha avi na lipyana kwa vandu vevakumtopesa.
LUK 1:51 Alangisi makakala gaki kwa kukita mambu gakulu. Avapechengini vevimeka mumaholo ga mitima yavi.
LUK 1:52 Avahelisi vankosi vana makakala kuhumila muvigoda vya kulongosa, na avakwesi vevavi ngolongondi.
LUK 1:53 Vangangu avayukutisi mambu gabwina, na vana vindu vyamahele avalekili vahamba mawoko gawaka.
LUK 1:54 Amtangatili mulima wa Isilaeli mtumi waki. Akumbwiki lipyana laki,
LUK 1:55 Ngati chaajovili kuvya na lipyana kwa Ibulahimu na chivelekelu chaki, magono goha.”
LUK 1:56 Maliya akatama kwa Elizabeti ngati miyehi yidatu, ndi akawuya kunyumba yaki.
LUK 1:57 Palwahiki lukumbi lwa Elizabeti kuveleka ndi akavya na mwana mgosi.
LUK 1:58 Vandu va mu lukolo na veitamanila nawu papipi, pevayuwini Bambu amkitili lipyana neju, voha vakahekelela pamonga nayu.
LUK 1:59 Ligono la nane vakabwela kumdumula jandu mwana, vaganayi kumpela liina Zakalia, liina la dadi waki.
LUK 1:60 Nambu nyina waki akajova, “Lepi, mwenuyu ikemelewa Yohani.”
LUK 1:61 Vakamjovela, “Kawaka mu lukolo lwaki mweavi na liina ngati lenili!”
LUK 1:62 Hinu vakamkota dadi waki chakumlangisa, muni vamanyayi aganili kumpela liina loki.
LUK 1:63 Zakalia akayupa chibawu cha kuyandikila, akayandika, “Liina laki Yohani.” Vandu voha vakakangasa!
LUK 1:64 Bahapo mlomo wa Zakalia akatumbula kulongela kangi akamulumba Chapanga.
LUK 1:65 Vandu voha veatama nawu vakavya na wogohi, mambu ago gakalongaleka mulima woha wa vidunda vya ku Yudea.
LUK 1:66 Vandu voha vevayuwini mambu genago, vakaholalela mumitima yavi na kukotana vene kwa vene mumitima yavi, “Mwe mwana uyu yati ivya wuli?” Chakaka, makakala ga Bambu gavi pamonga na mwene.
LUK 1:67 Zakalia dadi mwana yula akalongoswa na Mpungu Msopi akatumbula kulotela ulota uwu.
LUK 1:68 “Ulumbiwa Bambu Chapanga wa Isilaeli! Ndava ubweli kuvatangatila vandu vaki na kuvagombola.
LUK 1:69 Atipeli Msangula mkekesi, mu chiveleku cha Daudi mtumisi waki.
LUK 1:70 Ndi atijovili kadeni munjila ya vamlota vaki va msopi,
LUK 1:71 Yati atisangula kuhuma mu mawoko ga makoko gitu, na mumakakala ga voha vavakutihakalila.
LUK 1:72 Ajovili yati avakitila lipyana vagogo vitu na akulihololela lilaganu laki la msopi.
LUK 1:73 Chilapu alapili kwa dadi witu Ibulahimu, kuvya akutitangatila tete
LUK 1:74 tigomboka kuhuma mu mawoko ga makoko gitu, na timugundamila changali wogohi,
LUK 1:75 muusopi na kukita gegakumganisa Chapanga, magono goha ga wumi witu.”
LUK 1:76 “Wamwanangu veve, yati ukemelewa, mlota wa Chapanga mkulu, ndava walamlongolela Bambu kumkwalila njila yaki,
LUK 1:77 na kuvakokosela vandu kuvya valasanguliwa kwa kulekekesewa kumbudila Chapanga wavi.
LUK 1:78 Chapanga witu yati ikita genago ndava lipyana ya mtima waki wa ngolongondi. Usangula waki yati ubwela kuhuma kunani ngati lumuli chelulangasa chelihumila lilanga,
LUK 1:79 na kuvalangasila voha vevitama muchitita chikulu cha lifwa, na kutilongosa titama wumi wa uteke.”
LUK 1:80 Mwana yula akakula, na akakangamala mumpungu waki. Akatama kulugangatu mbaka ligono paajilangisi pavandu va pa Isilaeli.
LUK 2:1 Lukumbi lwenulo, Agusiti mweavi nkosi mkulu wa vankosi va unkosi va ku Loma, alagizili vandu voha vayandikwa muchitabu.
LUK 2:2 Kuyandakiswa kwenuko kwakita kutumbukana, na lukumbi lwenulo Kulenio avi chilongosi wa ku Silia.
LUK 2:3 Kila mundu, akahamba kumuji waki muni ajiyandikisayi.
LUK 2:4 Na Yosefu mewa akawuka pamuji wa Nazaleti wewavi kumulima wa Galilaya, akahamba kumuji wa Betelehemu wewavi pamulima wa ku Yudea, kweavelikiwi nkosi Daudi.
LUK 2:5 Akahamba kuyandakiswa pamonga na maliya mweavimchumba waki, mweavi na ndumbu.
LUK 2:6 Pevavi ku Betelehemu ligono laki likahika akavya na mwana.
LUK 2:7 Akaveleka mwana waki mtumbulanu mwana mgosi, akamtindisila tunyula twa vana, kangi akamgonesa muwatu wa kulisila mifuya, ndava vapati lepi fwasi munyumba za vayehe.
LUK 2:8 Pamulima wenuwo kwavi na vadimaji vevatama pandu pa kudimila na kulindalila mambelele gavi cha kupishana kilu.
LUK 2:9 Mtumu wa Chapanga akavahumila na lumuli lukulu lwa Bambu lwavalangasili, pandu poha. Vayogwipi neju.
LUK 2:10 Nambu Mtumu wa Chapanga akavajovela, “Mkotoka kuyogopa! Myuwanayi nivaletili lilovi la bwina la luheku neju kwa vandu voha va Paisilaeli.
LUK 2:11 Muni lelu pamuji wa Daudi avelikiwi msangula winu, Kilisitu ndi Bambu.
LUK 2:12 Na ulangisu wa kummanya ndi uwu, yati mukumkolela mwana vamtindisili tunyula twa vana vamgonisi muwatu wa kulisila mifuya.”
