LUK 13:35 Lola! Nyenye yati mulekewa muji winu. Na nene nikuvajovela yati nakunilola kavili mbaka lukumbi pa mwijova, Amotisiwa mweibwela kwa uhotola wa Bambu.”
LUK 14:1 Ligono Limonga la Kupumulila, Yesu ahambili kulya chakulya, kunyumba ya chilongosi mmonga wa Vafalisayu, na vandu vakavya kumlingulila.
LUK 14:2 Palongolo ya Yesu avi mundu mweavi na utamu wa kuhimba higa
LUK 14:3 Yesu akavakota vawula va malagizu ga Chapanga geampeli Musa na Vafalisayu, “Wu, mhilu wijova wuli, chabwina amala chabwina lepi, kumlamisa mundu Ligono la Kupumulila?”
LUK 14:4 Nambu vene vakaguna. Yesu akamtola mundu yula na kumlamisa, akamleka ahambayi.
LUK 14:5 Kangi akavajovela, “Yani pagati yinu mweavi na mwana waki amala ng'ombi yaki yeyidumbukili muchiliva nakuyihumisa bahapo, ndava mu Ligono la Kupumulila?”
LUK 14:6 Nambu vene nakuhotola kumyangula.
LUK 14:7 Yesu akavalola vavagongoliwi chavajihagulila vigoda vya palongolo, ndi akavajovela,
LUK 14:8 “Ngati mundu akugongolili, kundowa ukotoka kutama pavigoda vya palongolo, Pangi agongoliwi yungi mkulu kuliku veve.
LUK 14:9 Mweavagongolili mwavoha nyenye vavili, yati ibwela na kukujovela, ‘Uwuka atama uyu.’ Penapo yati wikola soni na kuhamba kutama pandu pa mwishu.
LUK 14:10 Ngati mundu akugongolili kundowa, veve uhamba ukatama muvigoda vya mumbele, muni mweakugongolili yula, paibwela yati akukujovela, ‘Wankozi wangu yima ubwela utama pa vigoda vya palongolo.’ Penapo yati utopela pavandu voha, vevatamili pamonga na veve.
LUK 14:11 Muni mundu yoyoha mweakujikwiha yati iheleswa, na yeyoha mweakujihelesa yati ikwihiwa.”
LUK 14:12 Kangi akamjovela mwaigongolela yula, “Ngati uvatendelekili vandu chakulya cha muhi amala kimihi, kotoka kuvagongolela vankozi vaku amala valongo vaku amala veutamanila nawu papipi vevavi na vindu vyamahele, muni na vene vihotola kukugongolela ndava na kukuwuyisila chewavahengili.
LUK 14:13 Nambu peundelekela chakulya cha mselebuko, vagongolela vangangu na vevagogodili higa vangagenda na vangalola,
LUK 14:14 na veve yati umotisiwa muni uvagongolili vangahotola kukuwuyisila. Nambu Chapanga yati akuwuyisila gabwina mu ligono la kuyukiswa vandu vabwina.”
LUK 14:15 Mmonga wa vala vavatamili na Yesu pameza, akajova amotisiwa mundu yula mweibwela kuyla chakulya cha mselebuko Muunkosi wa Chapanga!
LUK 14:16 Yesu akamjovela, “Mundu mmonga atendekili mselebuko uvaha, na kuvagongolela vandu vamahele.
LUK 14:17 Palwahiki lukumbi lwa kulya, amtumili mvanda waki akavakemela vevagongoliwi, ‘Mbwela, kila chindu chitendelekiwi!’
LUK 14:18 Nambu voha, mmonga na kugelekela yungi vakutumbula kujova chondi pepayi. Mundu wa kutumbula akamjovela, mvanda yula, ‘Niguli mgunda yikunigana nihamba nikaulola pepayi yati nibwela lepi.’
LUK 14:19 Na yungi akajova, ‘Niguli ng'ombi kumi za kulimila nihamba kuzilinga kulima chondi unilekekesa.’
LUK 14:20 Na yungi akajova, ‘Nigegili mdala ndava ya genago, nakuhotola kubwela.’”
LUK 14:21 “Mtumisi yula akawuya na kumjovela bambu waki mambu goha. Mkolo nyumba yula akayoma na kumlagiza mvanda waki, ‘Kita kanyata uhamba munjila yivaha na tunjila twa muji ukavaleta vangangu na vangagenda na vangalola na vevagogodili higa.’
LUK 14:22 Mtumisi yula Paawuyili kuhuma kweatumiwili akamjovela, ‘Bambu, goha geukalagizi gahengiki, nambu pakona pandu pakutama vandu.’
LUK 14:23 Bambu yula akamjovela mvanda. Uhamba munjila yivaha na tunjila twa muji, ukavakamula vandu kuyingila munyumba yangu yimema.
LUK 14:24 Nikuvajovela nyenye, voha vevatumbwili kugongolewa, kawaka hati mmonga, mweimywanga chakulya cha mselebuko wangu!”
LUK 14:25 Msambi wa vandu walongosini na Yesu, mwene akang'anamuka na kuvajovela,
LUK 14:26 Mundu yoyoha mweibwela kwa nene yikumgana aniganayi neju nene, kuliku kumgana dadi waki na nyina waki na mdala waki na vana vaki na valongo vaki na valumbu vaki, pamonga na wumi waki, changakita ago, nakuhotola kuvya muwuliwa wangu.
LUK 14:27 Mundu yoyoha yula mwangagega msalaba waki na kunilanda mwenuyo nakuhotola kuvya muwuliwa wangu.
LUK 14:28 Wu, yani pagati yinu mweigana kujenga mnala nakutama hoti pahi, kuvalanga mashonga kumanya ngati avi nagu gegitosha kumalakisa kujenga?
LUK 14:29 Ngati lepi, akatumbula kujenga mkingisa, nakuhotola kumalakisa vandu voha vevilola yati vakumuheka.
LUK 14:30 Yati vijova, Mundu uyu atumbwili kujenga. Nambu nakuhotola kumalakisila!
LUK 14:31 “Wu, Nkosi yani mweigana kuhamba kutovana ngondo na Nkosi yungi, nakutama hoti pahi na kuhololela, wu, ihotola kwa manjolinjoli waki elufu kumi, kutovana ngondo na nkosi yula mweibwela kutovana nayu ngondo mweavi na manjolinjoli elufu ishilini?
LUK 14:32 Ngati amanyili kuvya nakuhotola, yati avatuma vajumbi kuyupa vakotoka kutova, lukumbi nkosi yungi akona kutali.
LUK 14:33 Mewawa,” Kawaka mundu mweihotola kuvya muwuliwa wangu, changaleka vindu vyoha vye avi navyu.
LUK 14:34 “Mwinyu chindu cha bwina, nambu mwinyu ngati uyagisi lunyong'onyo lwaki, yati usopewa kyani mbaka kuvya kavili mwinyu?
LUK 14:35 Yabwina lepi kusopewa muludaka amala mabuli. Vandu vakuyitaga kuvala. Mundu mweavi na makutu na ayuwana!”
LUK 15:1 Ligono limonga vatola kodi na vevambudila Chapanga vamahele vahambili kumuyuwanila Yesu.
LUK 15:2 Vafalisayu na vawula va malagizu ga Chapanga geampeli Musa vakatumbula kung'ung'uta, “Mumlola mundu mwenuyu, akuvakemela vandu vevambudila Chapanga na kavili ilya nawu!”
LUK 15:3 Yesu akavajovela luhumu ulu,
LUK 15:4 “Ngati mmonga winu avi na mambelele, miya yimonga na akamanya kuvya mmonga pagati yavi ayagili, yati ikita kyani? Yati akugaleka mambelele tisini na tisa gala kulugangatu na kuhamba kulonda yila yeyiyagili mbaka ampatayi.
LUK 15:5 Ngati amuwona yati akuyigega mumavega kwa luheku.
LUK 15:6 Peihika panyumba, Yati akuvakemela vamukozi vaki na veitama nawu papipi na kuvajovela, ‘Tivyai na luheku pamonga na nene ndava niliweni limbelele langu lelayagili.’
LUK 15:7 Mewawa nikuvajovela, yati kwivya na luheku kunani kwa Chapanga, mundu mmonga mweakumbudila Chapanga, paileka kubuda, kuliku vandu tisini na tisa vabwina na viganikwa lepi kumuwuyila Chapanga.”
LUK 15:8 “Amala mdala yoki mweavi na mashonga kumi, limonga likamyaga, yati ikita wuli? Nakupambika hahi, na kutyanyila nyumba na kuilonda neju mbaka ayilola?
LUK 15:9 Akamala kuipata, akuvakemela vankozi vaki na veitama nawu papipi na kuvajovela, ‘Mvya na luheku pamonga na nene muni nilipatili lishonga langu lelayagili!’
LUK 15:10 Mewawa nikuvajovela, ndi chavivya na luheku vamitumu va kunani kwa Chapanga, ndava ya mundu mmonga mweambudili Chapanga, paileka kubudila Chapanga.”
LUK 15:11 Yesu akayendelela kujova. Kwavili na mundu mmonga mweavi na vana vasongolo vavili.
LUK 15:12 Mdebe yula akamjovela dadi waki, Dadi, nipelayi uhali wa vindu vyeviganikiwa kupewa, Dadi waki akavagavanisila vindu vyaki.
LUK 15:13 Gapitili lepi Magono gamahele, mwana mdebe yula akagulisa vindu vyaki vyoha, na kuwuka na mashonga geapewili, akahamba kumulima wa kutali, kwenuko akazipomondana kwa mambu ga ukemi mashonga gala.
LUK 15:14 Peamalili kila chindu cheavili nachu, ndi yikahumila njala yivaha pamulima wenuwo na mwene akatumbula kung'ahika.
LUK 15:15 Akahamba kwa mkolonjinji mmonga, wa mulima wenuwo na kuyupa lihengu, mwene akampela lihengu la kudima maguluvi kumgunda waki.
LUK 15:16 Anogili kulya chakulya cha maguluvi gala, nambu kawaka mundu mweampeli chindu cha kulya.
LUK 15:17 Mumbele luhala lwamuyili akajova mumtima waki. Kuvi na vana lihengu, valinga kwa Dadi wangu, vevilya na kusigalisa chakulya na nene nifwa penapa na njala!
LUK 15:18 Yati niwuya kwa dadi wangu na kumjovela, Dadi, nimbudili Chapanga na nikubudili veve mewa.
LUK 15:19 Niganikiwa lepi kavili kukemelewa, mwana waku, unikita ngati mmonga wa vana lihengu vaku.
LUK 15:20 Ndi akatumbula lugendu kuwuya kwa dadi waki. “Mwene peavili cha kutali, dadi waki amuweni, kwa mtima wa lipyana amjumbalili na kumjambusa cha uganu.
LUK 15:21 Mwana yula akamjovela, ‘Dadi, nimbudili Chapanga, na nikubudili veve mewa. Nene niganikiwa lepi kavili kukemelewa mwana waku.’
LUK 15:22 Nambu dadi waki akavajovela vanalihengu vaki, ‘Kanyata!’ Muleta nyula yabwina mumuwalika. Mumuwalika na pete pamonga na champali!
LUK 15:23 Mukatola mpapakasi wa mweakulupi mukahinja, tilyayi na kuselebuka!
LUK 15:24 Ndava muni mwana vangu uyu kwa nene avi ngati afwili, nambu hinu akona mumi, ayagili hinu awonikini. Vakatumbula kuselebuka.”
LUK 15:25 “Lukumbi lwenulo muhaja waki avi akona kumgunda. Ndi peawuyayi kuhegelela panyumba, akayuwana vilulu na vandu vikina ng'oma.
LUK 15:26 Akamkemela mmonga wa mtumisi kumkota, ‘Chivii kyani kwenuko?’
LUK 15:27 Mtumisi yula akayangula, ‘Mlongo waku awuyili kunyumba, na dadi waku amuhinjili mpapakasi mweakulupili, muni ampatili akona mumi.’ ”
LUK 15:28 “Nambu mvaha yula akavya na ligoga na kubela kuyingila mugati. Ndi dadi waki akahuma kuvala na kumuyupa neju ayingila mugati.
LUK 15:29 Nambu mwene akamyangula dadi waki, ‘Lola, Nikuhengili mahengu Miyaka yoha iyi ngati mvanda changabela malagizu gaku hati padebe. Unipeli kyani? Unipeli lepi hati kamene kadebe na nene nganiselebwiki na vankozi vangu.
LUK 15:30 Nambu mwana waku uyu mwepomondini mashonga gaku pamonga na vakemi, peabweli umuhinji mpapakasi mweakulupili!’
LUK 15:31 Dadi waki akamyangula, ‘Mwana vangu, veve uvi pamonga na nene magono goha na vindu vyoha vyenivi navyu vyaku.
LUK 15:32 Nambu yatiganili kukita mselebuko na luheku ndava mlongo waku mweavi ngati afwili, hinu akona mumi, mweayagili nambu hinu awonikini.’ ”
LUK 16:1 Yesu akavajovela vawuliwa vaki, “Mundu mmonga mweavi na vindu vyamahele, avi na mundu wa kuyimilila lihengu laki. Mkolo vindu ayuwini kuvya myimilila lihengu yula ipomondana vindu.
LUK 16:2 Mkolo vindu, akamkemela myimila lihengu yula na kumkota, ‘kyani cheniyuwana? Nigana univalangila vindu vyoha, muni nakuhotola kuyimalila lihengu langu kavili.’
LUK 16:3 Myimalila lihengu yula akahololela mumtima waki, ‘Bambu wangu igana kunivinga lihengu, yati nikita kyani? Makakala ga kulima nakuhotola na kuhamba kuyupayupa ngati namngangu niwona soni.
LUK 16:4 Hinu nimanyili chakukita, muni penivingiwayi lihengu, muni vandu vanikemelayi kunyumba zavi.’”
LUK 16:5 “Akavakemela voha vevidayiwa vindu na bambu waki, mmonga mmonga akatumbula kumkota yula wa kutumbula. ‘Udayiwa vindu vilinga na bambu wangu?’
LUK 16:6 Mwene akamyangula. ‘Makalangi kumi na mcheche ga mahuta ya mizeituni,’ Ndi myimalila lihengu yula akajova, ‘Tola balua laku lewidayiwa, tama kanyata, yandika saba.’
LUK 16:7 Kangi akamkota yungi, ‘Veve wakalidayiwa vindu vilinga?’ Akayangula, ‘Magunila ga nganu miya yimonga.’ Muyimilila lihengu yula akamjovela. ‘Tola balua laku la gewidayiwa Yandika semanini.’”
LUK 16:8 “Bambu yula akamulumba myimila lihengu mwachenjili yula, muni ahengili kwa luhala. Ndava vandu va mulima uwu vana luhala neju pevihenga vindu na vandu ngati avo, kuliku vandu vevavi munkosi wa Chapanga.”
LUK 16:9 Yesu akayendelela kujova, “Nikuvajovela nyenye, mjipatila vankozi kuhuma mumashonga na vindu vya pamulima uwu, muni pevimalika, vavakemela mumatamilu gavi ga magono goha.
LUK 16:10 Mundu yoyoha mwaisadikiwa muvindu videbe, mewa yati isadikiwa muvindu vyamahele. Na yoyoha angasadikiwa muvindu videbe isadikiwa lepi muvindu vyamahele.
LUK 16:11 Ngati nyenye mwisadikiwa lepi mumashonga na vindu vya pamulima, ndi yani akuvagotolela na vindu vya uchakaka?
LUK 16:12 Ngati nakuhotola kusadikiwa mumashonga na muvindu vya mundu yungi, yani mweihotola kuvagotolela vindu vinu mwavene?”
LUK 16:13 “Kawaka mvanda mweihotola kuvahengela vabambu vavili, muni yati amgana mmonga na kumhakalila yungi, amala yati ilongosana na mmonga na kumuvevesa yungi. Mwihotola lepi kumuhengela Chapanga na mashonga.”
LUK 16:14 Vafalisayu pevayuwini genago, vakamvevesa Yesu, ndava vene vavi vandu vakugana mashonga,
LUK 16:15 Yesu akavajovela, “Nyenye mujilola mwavabwina palongolo ya vandu, nambu Chapanga ayimanyili mitima yinu. Ndava chindu chechilolekana chabwina neju palongo ya vandu, kwa Chapanga chilolekana chihakau.”
LUK 16:16 “Malagizu ga Chapanga geampelii Musa na mayandiku ga valota va Chapanga gakokwiswi mbaka lukumbi lwa Yohani wa Kubatiza. Kutumbula penapo, Lilovi la Bwina la Unkosi wa Chapanga ukokoswa, na kila mundu iyingila kwa makakala.
LUK 16:17 Nambu yiyeywa neju kunani kwa Chapanga na mulima kuyaga kuliku kayandiku kadebe kuhunguliwa mu Malagizu ga Musa.”
LUK 16:18 “Mundu yoyoha mweakumuleka mdala waki na kugega yungi, mwenuyo ikita ugoni na mundu yoyoha mwaakumgega, mdala mwaalekiwi yula.” Namwene mewa ikita ugoni.
LUK 16:19 “Kwavili na mundu mmonga mweavi na vindu vyamahele, mwaawala nyula zezaguliwa kwa mashonga gamahele na nyula zezing'asima na kulya vindu vyabwina magono goha.”
LUK 16:20 Na pamlyangu uvaha wa mundu mwenuyo, vavi kumvika mundu mmonga mngangu, liina laki Lazalu, mweavi na vilonda vyamahele.
LUK 16:21 Mngangu mwenuyo, anogela kupewa vyakulya vevyagwayi pahi kuhuma pameza ya mkolo vindu vyamahele yula. Hati mabwa gabwela na kumihyanga vilonda vyaki.
LUK 16:22 Lwakabwela lukumbi Lazalu yula afwili na vamitumu va kunani vakamtola na kumuvika papipi ya Ibulahimu. Na mkolo vindu vyamahele mewa afwili vakamzika.
LUK 16:23 Mkolo vindu vya mahele yula, paavi mukung'ahika neju kuligodi litali langali mwishu, akamlola Ibulahimu cha kutali na Lazalu papipi yaki.
LUK 16:24 Ndi akamkemela. Dadi, Ibulahimu! Nihengela lipyana, umtuma Lazalu ajwisa lung'onji lwaki mumanji na kunipolesa lulimi lwangu, muni ning'ahika neju mumotu uwu!
LUK 16:25 “Nambu Ibulahimu akamyangula, mwana vangu. Holalela, wapokili vindu vyabwina pawavi muwumi waku, na Lazalu opokili vindu vihakau. Hinu Lazalu ipumuliswa, na veve uvi mumang'ahiso.
LUK 16:26 Pamonga na genago, pagati ya nyenye na tete, kuvili na ligodi livaha, muni vevigana kubwela kwa nyenye nakuhotola, na vevigana kuwuka kwa nyenye kubwela kwa tete nakuhotola,
LUK 16:27 Mkolo vindu vyamahele yula akajova, ‘Hinu Dadi Ibulahimu nikuyupa umtuma Lazalu ahamba kunyumba ya valongo vangu,
LUK 16:28 muni nivii nawu valongo mhanu, ahamba akavajovela vajiyangalila vakotoka navene vakotoka kubwela kumang'ahiso kuni.’ ”
LUK 16:29 “Ibulahimu akamjovela, kwenuko ‘Valongo vaku vavi na mayandiku ga Musa na vamlota va Chapanga, valeka, vavayuwanila venavo.’
LUK 16:30 Mkolo vindu vyamahele yula akajova kavili, ‘Lepi dadi Ibulahimu! Nambu ngati avahambalili mundu mweayukili kuhuma kwa vafwili, yati vileka kubuda kwavi.’
LUK 16:31 Ibulahimu akajova, ‘Ngati nakuvayuwanila mayandiku ga Musa na vamlota va Chapanga, nakumyuwanila mundu yoyoha hati ngati ayukili kuhuma kwe vevafwili.’ ”
LUK 17:1 Yesu akavajovela vawuliwa vaki, “Nakuhotola mambu ga kuvakita vandu vambudila Chapanga gakotoka kuhumila, nambu alachikolela mundu yula mweikita genago gahumila.”
LUK 17:2 Ngayivii mbanga mundu mwenuyo, kukungiwa livala livaha la kuyagila musingu na kujwigiswa munyanja, kuliku kumyokisa mmonga wa vadebe ava.
LUK 17:3 Mujiyangalila! Ngati mlongo waku akuhokili, mywangila, akakukamula chigendelu umulekesayi.
LUK 17:4 Hati ngati akuhokili mala saba kwa ligono limonga, na kukuwuyila mala saba. Kukukamula chigendelu, umulekesayi.
LUK 17:5 Vamitumi vakamjovela Bambu Yesu, “Utiyonjakesa kusadika.”
LUK 17:6 Ndi Bambu akayangula, “Kusadika kwinu ngakuvi kudebe ngati lumbeyu ulu lwa haladali, ngamuhotwili kuujovela mkongo wa mkuyu, ‘Jitupula na ukajimelesa munyanja.’ Na wene ngauvayidakili.”
LUK 17:7 “Tijova mmonga winu, ana mvanda wa lihengu kumgunda, amala kudima mambelele. Mvanda yula peiwuya kuhuma kulihengu, Wu, ijoviwa na mkulu waki, ‘Bwela kanyata utama ulyayi chakulya?’
LUK 17:8 Lepi! Nambu yati akumjovela, ‘Nitendelekela chakulya na kunihengela mbaka penimala kulya na kuywelela, ndi na veve pewilya na kunywelela.’
LUK 17:9 Wu, mkulu yula yati amsengusa mtumisi yula ndava akitili goha geamlagazili?
LUK 17:10 Na nyenye mewawa, mukahengayi kila chindu chemulagizwi kuhenga, mujovayi, ‘Tete vavanda tihengili lihengu litu ndu.’ ”
LUK 17:11 Yesu peavi mulugendu kuhamba ku Yelusalemu, akapitila mumbaka ya Samaliya na Galilaya.
LUK 17:12 Peayingili muchijiji chimonga vandu kumi vevavi na mabudi vakambwelela. Vakayima cha patali.
LUK 17:13 Vakajova kwa lwami luvaha, “Yesu! Bambu! Utihengela lipyana!”
LUK 17:14 Yesu peavaweni akavajovela, “Muhamba mukajilangisa kwa vakuteta va Chapanga.” Ndi pevavi mukuhamba vakanyamba.
LUK 17:15 Mmonga wavi peajimanyi kuvya alamiswi, awuyili kuni akumlumbalila Chapanga kwa lwami luvaha.
LUK 17:16 Akamfugamila Yesu mumagendelu na kumsengusa. Mundu mwenuyo avi Msamaliya.
LUK 17:17 Nambu Yesu akakota, “Wu, vavi lepi vandu kumi vevanyambisiwi? Vangi tisa vala vavi koki?
LUK 17:18 Hinu kawaka vandu vangi vevawuyi kumsengusa Chapanga ndi ngayuyu myehe?”
LUK 17:19 Penapo akamjovela mundu mwenuyo, “Yima uhamba, kusadika kwaku kukulamisi.”
LUK 17:20 Vafalisayu vamkoti Yesu kuvya Unkosi wa Chapanga yati ubwela ndali. Mwene akavayangula, “Unkosi wa Chapanga yati ubwela lepi cha kulolekana.
LUK 17:21 Kawaka mundu mweihotola kujova, ‘Uvi kuni, amala uvi kula!’ Muni unkosi wa Chapanga uvi pagati yinu.”
LUK 17:22 Kangi akavajovela vawuliwa vaki, “Galabwela magono yati mwinogela kuliwona ligono limonga mumagono gaki Mwana wa Mundu, nambu yati nakuyiwona.
LUK 17:23 Vandu yati vakuvajovela, ‘Lola, avi kula!’ Amala ‘Lola, avi kuni!’ Nambu nyenye mukoto kuwuka wala kuvalanda.
LUK 17:24 Muni yati yivya ngati mbamba cheyimwetula chigafula kuhumila upandi umonga mbaka wungi, ndi yati cheivya ligono la kubwela kwaki Mwana wa Mundu.
LUK 17:25 Nambu yikumgana hoti, kung'ahika neju na kubelelewa na vandu va chiveleku ichi.
LUK 17:26 Ngati chayavili lusenje lwa Nuhu, ndi cheyibwela kuvya magono ga kuwuya kwaki Mwana wa Mundu.
LUK 17:27 Vandu vayendalili kulya na kuywelela, kugega na kugegewa mbaka Nuhu peayingili muwatu uvaha. Fula yivaha yatonyili na manji gakamema na kuvakoma vandu voha.
LUK 17:28 Mewawa ngati cheyavili magono ga Lutu. Vandu vayendalili kulya na kuywelela, kugula na kugulisa, kuhila mbeyu na kujenga nyumba.
LUK 17:29 Nambu ligono Lutu paawukili ku Sodoma, motu na chibiliti vyatonyili ngati fula kuhuma kunani kwa Chapanga na kuvakoma voha.
LUK 17:30 Mewawa ndi cheyivya ligono la Mwana wa Mundu peiwuya.”
LUK 17:31 “Ligono lenilo, mundu yoyoha mweivya kuvala ya nyumba akotoka kuyingila munyumba yaki kutola vindu vyaki, mewawa na yoyoha mweavikumgunda akotoka kuwuya mumbele.
LUK 17:32 Muhololela gegamkolili mdala wa Lutu!
LUK 17:33 Mundu Yoyoha mweigana kuusangula wumi waki, yati auyagisa na mundu yoyoha mweakuyagisa wumi waki yati akuugombola.
LUK 17:34 Nikuvajovela kilu ya ligono lenilo, vandu vavili vevagonili pamonga palusongwani, mmonga yati itoliwa na yungi yati ilekewa.
LUK 17:35 Kangi vadala vavili yati vivya pamonga mukuyaga mbeyu, mmonga yati itolewa na yungi yati ilekewa.”
LUK 17:36 Vandu vavili yati vivya kumgunda mmonga yati itoliwa na yungi yati ilekewa.
LUK 17:37 Penapo vakamkota, “Koki Bambu?” Mwene akavayangula, “Pewivya mtuhi, ndi pevikonganekela manditi.”
LUK 18:1 Kangi Yesu akavajovela, luhumu yikuvagana kuyupa magono goha changali kukotoka.
LUK 18:2 Akajova, “Kwavili na mhamula mihalu kumuji wenuwo iyupa lepi kwa Chapanga wala nakuvahengela vandu bwina.
LUK 18:3 Mumuji wenuwo, pavi na lipwela mmonga, mweamhambila mhamula mihalu ligono kwa ligono, amkengelela kwa kuhamula bwina apatayi vindu vyaki kuhuma kwa likoko waki.
LUK 18:4 Kwa magono gamahele Mhamula mihalu yula akabela kumkengelela, nambu pamwishu akahololela mumtima waki, ‘Pamonga na nene niyupa lepi kwa Chapanga wala kuvahengela vandu bwina,
LUK 18:5 Nambu ndava ya lipwela uyu akuning'aha yati nikumkengelela kuhamula bwina, ngati lepi, yati iyendelela kunibwelela, na pamwishu yati akunitotokeha!’ ”
LUK 18:6 Bambu akajova, “Myuwanila cheijova muhamula mihalu mhakau.
LUK 18:7 Kujova Chapanga yati akuvakengelela lepi vandu veavahagwili, vevakumvembela muhi na kilu? Wu, yati ikavila kuvayuwanila?
LUK 18:8 Nikuvajovela, yati akuvakengelela kanyata. Pamonga na genago, Wu, yati kwivya na sadika pamulima lukumbi peibwela Mwana wa Mundu?”
LUK 18:9 Kangi Yesu akavajovela luhumu wa vandu vala vevakujilola vabwina na kuvavesa vangi.
LUK 18:10 “Vandu vavili vahambili ku Nyumba ya Chapanga kumuyupa. Mmonga Mfalisayu na yungi mtola kodi.”
LUK 18:11 Mfalisayu yula akayima, kuyupa kwa Chapanga chakumtima akajova, Veve Chapanga, nikusengusa ndava muni nene nivii lepi ngati vandu vangi, vanyagaji na vivikita gahakau na vevikita ugoni. Nikusengusa ndava muni nene nivii lepi ngati mtola kodi uyu.
LUK 18:12 Nikujiinisa chakulya ndava ya Chapanga mala zivili kwa lijuma, niwusa lilundu limonga pagati ya kumi muvindu vyangu.
LUK 18:13 Nambu mtola kodi yula, ayimili cha kutali, changali hati kulolokesa mihu kunani kwa Chapanga ndi ajitovili nganga cha ngolongondi, akajova. Chapanga veve, unihengala lipyana nene mwenikubudili!
LUK 18:14 Yesu akavajovela, mtola kodi yula awuyili kunyumba kuni ayidakiliwi na Chapanga. Nambu Mfalisayu yula lepi, ndava muni kila mundu mweakujikwiha yati iheleswa na kila mundu mweakujihelesa yati ikwihiwa.
LUK 18:15 Vandu vangi vamletili Yesu vana vadebe muni avavikila mawoko na kuvamotisa. Vawuliwa vaki pevavawene vakavaywangila.
LUK 18:16 Nambu Yesu akavakemela na kujova, “Muvaleka vana vedebe vabwela kwangu, wala mkoto kuvabesa, muni unkosi wa Chapanga ndava ya vandu ngati venava.
LUK 18:17 Chakaka nikuvajovela, mundu yoyoha mwanga upokela Unkosi wa Chapanga ngati mwana mdebe, yati iyingila lepi muunkosi wenuwo.”
LUK 18:18 Mkolo vindu vyamahele mmonga Myawudi, amkotili Yesu, “Muwula mbwina, nikita wuli muni nipokela wumi wa magono goha?”
LUK 18:19 Yesu akamjovela, “Ndava kyani ukunikemela mbwina? Kawaka mweavimbwina nga Chapanga mwene.
LUK 18:20 Uyimanya mihilu ya Chapanga, ukoto kukita ugoni na ukoto kukoma na ukoto kuyiva na ukoto kujova ga udese vakitila gabwina dadi na nyina waku.”
LUK 18:21 Mwene akajova, “Genago goha nigakamwili kutumbula uwana wangu.”
LUK 18:22 Yesu peayuwini, akamjovela, “Yikugana wakona kukita chindu chimonga, gulisa kila chindu cheuvi nachu, vapela vangangu mashonga ago, ndi veve yati ukujivikila vindu vyaku kunani kwa Chapanga, kangi bwela unilandayi.”
LUK 18:23 Nambu mundu mwenuyo peayuwini genago, akavya ngolongondi neju ndava avi na vindu vyamahele.
LUK 18:24 Yesu peamuwene mundu mwenuyu avi ngolongondi akajova, “Yinonopa neju kwa vakolo vindu vyamahele kuyingila mu Unkosi wa Chapanga!
LUK 18:25 Muni yiyuyuka kwa hinyama yeyikemiwa ngamiya kuholota palibowo la sindanu, kuliku mweavi na vindu vyamahele kuyingila Muunkosi wa Chapanga.”
LUK 18:26 Vandu vevayuwini ago, vakakota, “Yani hinu, mweisanguliwa?”
LUK 18:27 Yesu akayangula, “Gangahotoleka kwa vandu, kwa Chapanga gihotoleka.”
LUK 18:28 Kangi Petili akamkota, “Na tete wuli? Tuvilekili vindu vyoha na kukulanda.”
LUK 18:29 Yesu akavajovela, “Chakaka nikuvajovela, mundu yoyoha mwaileki nyumba amala mdala waki amala mlongo amala dadi na nyina waki amala vana vaki ndava ya unkosi wa Chapanga,
LUK 18:30 Yati ipokela gamahele neju mulukumbi ulu lwa hinu, na wumi wa magono goha palusenje lwelubwela.”
LUK 18:31 Yesu akavakemela kuchiyepela vawuliwa vaki kumi na vavili, na kuvajovela, “Myuwanila! Tihamba ku Yelusalemu na kila chindu chechiyandikiwi na vamlota va Chapanga ndava ya Mwana wa Mundu yati chihengeka.
LUK 18:32 Muni alagotolewa kwa vandu vangali kuvya Vayawudi vene yati vakumvevesa na kumliga na kumuhunyila mata.
LUK 18:33 Vene yati Vakumtova na michapilu na kumkoma, nambu paligono la datu yati iyuka.”
LUK 18:34 Nambu vene vagamanyi lepi malovi genago hati padebe, lijambu lenilo lafiyiki kwa vene, ndi vagamanyili lepi geavajovili.
LUK 18:35 Lukumbi Yesu peahegalili ku Yeliko, kwavi na mundu mmonga ngalola atamili pamuhana ya njila ayupayi.
LUK 18:36 Peayuwini msambi wa vandu wipita akakota, “Chivii kyani?”
LUK 18:37 Vakamjovela, “Yesu wa Nazaleti ipita.”
LUK 18:38 Akajova kwa lwami luvaha, “Yesu, wa chiveleku cha Daudi unihengela lipyana!”
LUK 18:39 Vandu vevalongolili vala vakamywangila aguna, nambu mwene akayonjokesa kujova kwa lwami luvaha, “Yesu wa chiveleku cha Daudi, unihengela lipyana!”
LUK 18:40 Yesu akayima, akalagiza vandu vamleta palongolo yaki. Ngalola yula peahikili papipi, Yesu akamkota,
LUK 18:41 “Wigana nikukitila kyani?” Ngalola akayangula, “Bambu, nihotola kulola kavili.”
LUK 18:42 Yesu akamjovela, “Lola! Kusadika kwaku kukulamisi.”
LUK 18:43 Bahapo ngalola yula akalola, akamlanda Yesu kuni akumulumba Chapanga. Vandu voha pavagawene genago, vakamulumba Chapanga.
LUK 19:1 Yesu payingili ku Yeliko, apitayi munjila za muji wenuwo.
LUK 19:2 Pamuji wenuwo pavi mundu mmonga liina laki Zakayo, avi mkulu wa vatola kodi mwenuyo avi na vindu vyamahele.
LUK 19:3 Mwenuyo aganayi kumlola Yesu ndi yani, nambu ahotwili lepi ndava ya msambi wa vandu, na Zakayo avi mundu mhupi.
LUK 19:4 Hinu, akajumba kulongolo na kukwela mumkongo uvaha ndava amlolayi Yesu, muni Yesu apitayi njila yeniyo.
LUK 19:5 Yesu peahikili pandu penapo, akalola kunani na kumjovela Zakayo, “Huluka kanyata, muni lelu yati niwela munyumba yaku.”
LUK 19:6 Penapo Zakayo akahuluka pahi na kumpokalela Yesu kwa luheku.
LUK 19:7 Vandu voha pevaloli genago, vakatumbula kung'ung'uta na kujova, “Mundu uyu ahambili kutama kwa mundu mweakumbudila Chapanga!”
LUK 19:8 Nambu Zakayo akayima palongolo akamjovela Yesu, “Bambu Yuwanila! Yati nigava pagati vindu vyangu na kuvapela vangangu na ngati natolili chindu cha mundu kwa kuchenjela, yati nimuwuyisila mala mcheche.”
LUK 19:9 Yesu akamjovela, “Lelu usangula uyingili munyumba iyi, muni na mwenuyu mewa chiveleku cha Ibulahimu.
LUK 19:10 Muni Mwana wa Mundu abwelili kulonda na kusangula veviyagili.”
LUK 19:11 Vandu vavi vakumuyuwanila Yesu peavi papipi kuhika ku Yelusalemu vandu vaholalela Unkosi wa Chapanga uvi papipi kuhumila ndava genago Yesu avajovili luhumu wungi.
LUK 19:12 Hinu akavajovela, kwavili na mundu mmonga wa lukolo lwa unkosi, mwaahambili kumulima wa kutali muni avikiwa unkosi na nkosi mkulu na kuwuya.
LUK 19:13 Akavakemela vatumisi vaki kumi, na kuvapela kila mundu mashonga salafu zeziwanangana na luhuna lwa lihengu la mihyei yidatu, kila mmonga na kuvajovela, mhengela lihengu la kugula na kugulisa vindu mbaka peniwuyayi.
LUK 19:14 Nambu vandu va mulima wenuwo vamuhakalili mundu mwenuyo, ndi vatumili vajumbi vamulanda na kuhamba kujova, tigani lepi mundu uyu avyaa nkosi witu.
LUK 19:15 “Mundu mwenuyo agotoliwi unkosi wenuwo na kuwuya pamulima waki. Bahapo akalagiza vakemelewayi vavanda vevapewili mashonga vala, muni aganayi kumanya ngati kila mmonga ayonjokisi mashonga galinga.
LUK 19:16 Akabwela mvanda mtumbula akajova, ‘Bambu, lilundu limonga la mashonga lewanipelili niyonjokisi malundu gangi kumi ga mashonga.’
LUK 19:17 Bambu yula akajova, ‘Chabwina.’ Veve wamtumisi mbwina! Ndava muni usadikiwi mumambu gadebe, ‘Hinu yati nikuvika uvya chilongosi mumiji kumi.’
LUK 19:18 Akagelekela mtumisi yungi akajova, ‘Bambu lilundu la mashonga yewanipelili niyonjakisi malundu ga mashonga gangi mhanu.’
LUK 19:19 Bambu yula akamjovela, ‘Na veve yati nikupela uvya wa chilongosi mumiji mhanu.’”
LUK 19:20 “Muhengaji yungi akabwela na kujova, ‘Bambu, tola lishonga laku muni nakungili muchitambala na kuyifiya pabwina.
LUK 19:21 Ndava muni nakuyogwipi, muni veve wa mundu winonopa. Witola vindu vyangali vyaku nakubena pawangamija.’
LUK 19:22 Bambu yula akamjovela, ‘Yati nikuhamula ndava ya malovi gaku veve mtumisi mhakau! Kumbi wamanyi hotohoto ngati nene ninonopa, ndava nitola vyangali kuvya vyangu na kubena panangamija.
LUK 19:23 Ndava kyani wavikili lepi malundu ga mashonga gangu mubenki? Na nene nganitolili pamonga na chiyonjakesu peniwuya.’”
LUK 19:24 “Akavajovela vevavi penapo, ‘Mumnyagayi lilundu la lishonga lenilo, mukampela yula mweavi na malundu ga mashonga kumi.’
LUK 19:25 Vene vakamjovela, ‘Mwenuyo amali kupewa malundu ga mashonga kumi!’
LUK 19:26 Bambu akavayangula, ‘Nikuvajovela, mundu yoyoha mweavi na chindu yati ipewa na kuyonjokesewa. Nambu mweangali chindu. Hati cheavi nachu yati inyagiwa.
LUK 19:27 Na hinu vamakoko vangu vevakunibela nikotoka kuvya nkosi wavi, muvaletayi penapa na muvahinja palongolo yangu!’”
LUK 19:28 Yesu peamali kujova genago, akavalongolela kuhamba ku Yelusalemu.
LUK 19:29 Peavili papipi kuhika ku Betifage na ku Betania papipi na chitumbi cha mikongo ya Mizeituni, avatumili vavili va vawuliwa vaki,
LUK 19:30 na kuvajovela, “Muhamba muchijiji chechivii palongolo yinu, na pemwitumbula kuyingila muchijiji chenicho yati mulikolela mapapakasi wa punda akungiwi langatumbula kugega mundu. Muwopolayi, mubwela nalu apa.
LUK 19:31 Ngati mundu akuvakota, ndava kyani mukuliwopola lipunda? Mumjovela, ‘Bambu akumgana.’ ”
LUK 19:32 Vevatumiwi vala vakahamba nakukolela ngati chavajoviwi na Yesu.
LUK 19:33 Pevawopolayi punda mpakakasi, vakolo lipunda vakavakota, “Ndava kyani mukuliwopola lipunda mpapakasi ili?”
LUK 19:34 Vakayangula, “Bambu akumgana.”
LUK 19:35 Ndi vampelakili Yesu. Kangi vakatola nyula na kumuyambatisa punda mpapakasi panani na kumtamisa Yesu panani yaki.
LUK 19:36 Yesu ayendalili na lugendu kuni vandu vayendelela kumdandasila nyula zavi munjila.
LUK 19:37 Paavi papipi kuhika ku Yelusalemu paluhelelu lwa chitumbi cha mikongo ya Mizeituni, msambi woha wa vandu na vawuliwa vaki vatumbwili kumlulutila kwa lwami luvaha na kumlumba Chapanga ndava ya mambu gakulu goha gevagaweni,
LUK 19:38 vakajova, “Amotisiwa Nkosi mweibwela kwa uhotola wa Bambu! Uteke uvya kunani kwa Chapanga na Chapanga alumbiwa mweavi kunani!”
LUK 19:39 Vafalisayu vangi vevavili mu msambi wula wa vandu vakamjovela Yesu, “Muwula, vagunisa vawuliwa vaku!”
LUK 19:40 Yesu akavayangula, “Nikuvajovela, ngati venava vaguni, maganga haga yati giywanga.”
LUK 19:41 Paavi papipi neju na kuulola muji wa Yelusalemu, akauvembela muji wenuwo,
LUK 19:42 akajova, “Ngati kuvya umanyili lelu mambu gegileta uteke! Nambu hinu gafiyiki pamihu gaku!
LUK 19:43 Muni galabwela magono, penapo vamakoko vaku yati vakutindikila luwumba, yati vakuhaka na kukuhinya pandi zoha.
LUK 19:44 Penapo yati vakutimbisula veve na vana vaku muluwumba wula, vakulekela lepi hati liganga limonga lelisigalila panani ya liganga lingi, ndava wamanyi lepi lukumbi Chapanga peakubweli kukusangula!”
LUK 19:45 Kangi Yesu akayingila mu Nyumba ya Chapanga, akutumbula kuvavinga vandu vevagulisa na kugula vindu,
LUK 19:46 akajova, “Yiyandikiwi, ‘Nyumba yangu yati yivya nyumba ya kumyupila Chapanga.’ Nambu nyenye muhiyusi kuvya libokoselu la vanyagaji.”
LUK 19:47 Ligono kwa ligono Yesu avawulayi mu Nyumba ya Chapanga. Nambu Vakulu va Kuteta na vawula va malagizu na vachilongosi va vandu, valonda njila ya kumkoma,
LUK 19:48 nambu vavi nakumanya cha kukita ndava vandu voha vagunili kumyuwanila.
LUK 20:1 Ligono limonga, Yesu peavi mukuwula vandu mu Nyumba ya Chapanga na kuvakokosela Lilovi la Bwina, vakulu va kuteta na vawula va malagizu ga Chapanga geampeli Musa na vagogo va Vayawudi, vamhambili.
LUK 20:2 Vakajova, “Utijovelayi! Wikita mambu aga kwa uhotola gani?” Ndi yani mweakupelili uhotola wenuwo?
LUK 20:3 Yesu akavajovela, “Na nene yati nikuvakota likotesi,
LUK 20:4 wu, uhotola wa Yohani wa kubatiza, wahumili kwa Chapanga amala kwa vandu?”
LUK 20:5 Vakakotana vene kwa vene, “Tikajova wahumili kwa Chapanga, yati akutikota, ‘Ndava kyani mwamsadiki lepi?’
LUK 20:6 Nambu tikajova wahumili kwa vandu, vandu voha yati vakutikoma na maganga, muni woha visadika kuvya Yohani avi mlota wa Chapanga.”
LUK 20:7 Vakamyangula, “Timmanyi lepi kwegahumili.”
LUK 20:8 Yesu akavajovela, “Na nene nikuvajovela lepi nikita mambu genago kwa uhotola wa yani.”
LUK 20:9 Yesu akayendelela kuvajovela luhumu ulu, “Mundu mmonga alimili mgunda wa mizabibu, avakodishi valimaji, kangi akahamba mulugendu mbaka mulima wa kutali, akatama kwenuko magono gamahele.
LUK 20:10 Lukumbi lwa kubena mizabibu mundu mwenuyo, amtumili mvanda waki akatola lilundu laki kuhuma ku mgunda. Nambu valimaji wa mumgunda wula vakamtova mvanda yula vakamvinga mawoko gawaka.
LUK 20:11 Mkolo mgunda amtumili kavili mvanda yungi, nambu vene mewawa vakamtova na kumliga na kumvinga mawoko gawaka.
LUK 20:12 Kangi akamutuma mvanda wa datu, mwenuyo ndi vakamulemasa na kumtaga kuvala.
LUK 20:13 Mkolo mgunda yula akahololela, ‘Yati nikita kyani? Yati nikumtuma mwana vangu ngayuyoyo wa chiganu, manya mwenuyo yati vakumtopesa.
LUK 20:14 Nambu valimaji vala, pevamuweni, vakajovesana, mwenuyu ndi mhali waki. Hinu timkomayi muni uhali waki uvya witu!’
LUK 20:15 Ndi, vakamuwusa kuvala ya mgunda wula wa mizabibu, vakamukoma.” Yesu akavakota, “Mkolo mgunda yula yati akuvakita kyani valimaji vala?”
LUK 20:16 “Yati ibwela kuvakoma valimaji venavo, na kuvapela vangi mgunda wenuwo.” Vandu pevayuwini genago, vakajova, “Lepi! Gakotoka kuhumila hati padebe.”
LUK 20:17 Nambu Yesu akavalolokesa na kuvakota. Mayandiku Gamsopi aga mana yaki kyani? Liganga levabeli vajengaji, hinu ndi liganga likulu la kutumbula pakujenga.
LUK 20:18 Mundu yoyoha akagwilila panani ya liganga lenilo yati idenyekana hipandi hipandi, na liganga lenilo lakamgwilila mundu yoyoha ndi likumuyaga nyiminyimi.
LUK 20:19 Vawula va Malagizu na vakulu va kuteta vamanyili kuvya luhumu lwenuwo ukuvavala vene, ndi vaganayi kumkamula bahapo, nambu vayogwipi vandu.
LUK 20:20 Vamlandili cha papipi. Kangi vakavatuma vamang'omesi, vevajidekisi vandu vabwina muni vamyonja kwa malovi gaki, vakitili genago muni vahotola kumkamula na kumgotola muuhotola wa mkulu wa mkowa.
LUK 20:21 Vamang'omesi vala vakamjovela, “Muwula timanyili kuvya wijova na wiwula mambu gachakaka, wala nakumlola mundu pamihu ndi wiwula uchakaka munjila ya Chapanga.
LUK 20:22 Ndi utijovela, wu! Chabwina amala, lepi tete kulipa kodi kwa nkosi wa ku Loma?”
LUK 20:23 Nambu Yesu amanyili likoka lavi, akavajovela,
LUK 20:24 “Munilangisa salafu ya lishonga. Wu, pamihu na liina ndi vya yani?” Vakamyangula, “Vya nkosi wa ku Loma.”
LUK 20:25 Yesu akavajovela, “Hinu mumpela nkosi wa ku Loma vyaki nkosi wa ku Loma na mumpela Chapanga vyaki Chapanga.”
LUK 20:26 Vahotwili lepi kumyonjola hati kwa lilovi limonga palongolo ya vandu, vakakangasa kwa mayangula gaki vakaguna.
LUK 20:27 Kangi Vasadukayu, vevijova kuvya vevafwili viyuka lepi, vakambwelela Yesu, vakajova,
LUK 20:28 “Muwula, Musa atiyandikili ngati mlongo mundu afwili na amlekili mdala waki changali vana, yikumgana mhaja waki amhalayi lipwela mwenuyo, muni ambabakisila vana mlongo waki.
LUK 20:29 Hinu, kwavili na valongo saba va lukolo lumonga. Mhaja wavi agegili mdala, afwili changaleka mwana.
LUK 20:30 Mbena waki yula akamhala lipwela, mwene mewa afwili changali mwana,
LUK 20:31 hati mbena waki wa datu akamhala, mambu gakavya galagala voha saba vafwili, changali kuvelekisa vana.
LUK 20:32 Pamwishu, mdala yula afwili.
LUK 20:33 Wu, palukumbi lwa vevafwili kuyukiswa, mdala yula alavya mdala wa yani? Muni agegiwi na voha saba.”
LUK 20:34 Yesu akayangula, “Vandu va lusenje lwa hinu vigega na kugegewa,
LUK 20:35 Nambu vala vevahaguliwi na veviganikiwa kupewa wumi wa mulima wula, na kuyukiswa kula kuhuma kwa vevafwili, vigega lepi amala kugegewa.
LUK 20:36 Chakaka vifwa lepi kavili ndava viwanangana na vamitumu va kunani kwa Chapanga, ndi vana vaki Chapanga, ndava ya kuyukiswa kwavi.
LUK 20:37 Hati, Musa atilangisi njwe, kuvya vevafwili yati viyukiswa, mu Mayandiku Gamsopi. Pamihu ga padahi pepiyaka motu, akumuluwula Bambu Chapanga ngati Chapanga wa Ibulahimu na Chapanga wa Izaki na Chapanga wa Yakobo.
LUK 20:38 Mwene, lepi Chapanga wa vevafwili nambu kwa vamumi, ndava muni kwa mwene voha vilama.”
LUK 20:39 Vawula va malagizu vangi va Musa vakajova, “Muwula, uvayangwili hotohoto!”
LUK 20:40 Vandu vala vayogwipi kumkota kavili makotesi gangi.
LUK 20:41 Yesu akavakota, vandu vijova wuli, Kilisitu Msangula ndi mwana wa chiveleku cha Daudi?
LUK 20:42 Muni Daudi mwene ajovili muchitabu cha Zabuli, Bambu, amjovili Bambu wangu, Tama muchiwoko changu cha kulyela
LUK 20:43 hati nivavika makoko vaku pahi pa magendelu gaku.
LUK 20:44 Ngati Daudi akumkemela mwene, Bambu, hinu yihotoleka wuli, kuvya mwana waki?
LUK 20:45 Yesu avajovili vawuliwa vaki palongolo ya vandu voha,
LUK 20:46 “Mujiyangalila na vawula va Malagizu ga Chapanga geampeli Musa, vevigana kugendagenda kuni vawalili magwanda gatali. Vigana kujambuswa chakufugwamila pandu pakugulisila vindu, kutama muvigoda vya kulongolo mu nyumba za kukonganekela Vayawudi, kutama muvigoda vya kulongolo ku mselebuko.
LUK 20:47 Vinyaga nyumba za vapwela kwa kuchenjela, na viyupa kwa Chapanga lukumbi lutali, muni valolekanayi na vandu kuvya vabwina. Yati vihamuliwa neju kuliku vangi!”
LUK 21:1 Yesu pealolokesa takataka, avawene vandu vevana vindu vyamahele chevisopa luteta muchijomela cha Nyumba ya Chapanga.
LUK 21:2 Mewa amuwene lipwela mngangu isopa mashonga sendi zivili.
LUK 21:3 Akajova, “Chakaka nikuvajovela, uyu lipwela mngangu asopili neju kuliku voha.
LUK 21:4 Muni, vangi voha vasopili luteta, muvindu vyavi vyeviyonjokisi, nambu mau uyu pamonga na ungangu waki asopili chindu cheavi nachu ndava ya wumi waki.”
LUK 21:5 Vandu vangi valongelelayi malovi ga kuyivala Nyumba ya Chapanga, cheyinyambwisi bwina kwa maganga ga mashonga gamahele, na luteta zezasopiwi kwa Chapanga kangi Yesu akajova.
LUK 21:6 “Goha aga gemkugawona galabwela magono kawaka hati liganga limonga lelisigalila panani ya liganga lingi, kila chindu yati chidenyekana.”
LUK 21:7 Ndi vakamkota, “Muwula mambu, genago yati gihumila ndali? Hinu ulangisu woki weulangisa papipi pagihumila mambu genago?”
LUK 21:8 Yesu akavayangula, “Mujiyangalilayi, mkoto kukongiwa muni vamahele yati vibwela na kulihengela liina langu. Kuni kila mmonga yati ijova kuvya ‘Mwene ndi Kilisitu msangula!’ ‘Lukumbi luhikili!’ Nambu nyenye mkoto kuvalanda.
LUK 21:9 Hinu, pamwiyuwana malovi ga ngondo na mng'anamukanu nakuyogopa, muni yiganikwa genago gahumila hoti, nambu pamwishu wene wakona.”
LUK 21:10 Kangi akayendelela kujova, “Vandu va mulima umonga yati witovana na vandu va mulima wungi, na unkosi umonga yati utovana na unkosi wungi.”
LUK 21:11 Kila pandu yati pivya na mindendemo yivaha ya ndima na njala na matamu ga kukangasa na kuyogofya, na ulangisu ukulu kuhumila kunani kuliundi.
LUK 21:12 Nambu, kwakona kuhumila genago goha, yati vakuvakamula na vakuvang'aha na kuvapeleka munyumba za kukonganekela Vayawudi na kuvakunga muchifungu, yati vakuvapeleka kwa vankosi na vachilongosi, ndava ya liina langu,
LUK 21:13 muhotola kujova kwa vene.
LUK 21:14 Mkangamala mumitima yinu, mkoto kuholela kwakona, wuli mukujikengelela,
LUK 21:15 Ndava namwene yati nikuvapela malovi ga luhala, hati makoko winu yati nakuhotola kukangamala amala kuvabelela.
LUK 21:16 Vadadi na Vanyina vinu, valongo na vandu va lukolo lwinu na vankozi vinu, yati vakuvang'anamukila nyenye, vangi pagati yinu yati mwikomiwa.
LUK 21:17 Vandu voha yati vakuvahakalila nyenye ndava yangu.
LUK 21:18 Nambu, hati luyunju lumonga wa mumitu yinu lwiyaga lepi.
LUK 21:19 Msindimala, kwa kusindimala kwinu, yati mwisangula wumi winu.
LUK 21:20 Nambu, “Pemwilola chikundi cha manjolinjoli chiutindili muji wa Yelusalemu, mumanya kuvya lusenje lwa kudenyeka kwaki luhikili.
LUK 21:21 Hinu, vevavi ku Yudea vajumbalila kuchitumbi na vevavi kumuji vawuka na vevavi kumgunda vala vakotoka kuwuya kumuji.
LUK 21:22 Ndava magono ago ndi magono ga Chapanga kuvabuna vandu vaki, muni kukita mambu goha gegayandikwi mu Mayandiku Gamsopi gahengeka.
LUK 21:23 Valachikolela vadala vana ndumbu na vevinyongesa magono genago! Muni yati kwiva na mang'ahiso gamahele mu mulima na ligoga la Chapanga likuvabwelela vandu va mulima wa Vayawudi.
LUK 21:24 Vangi vikomiwa kwa upanga, vangi vitoliwa na kupechenganwa mumilima yoha, muji wa Yelusalemu yati wilongoswa na vandu vangali Vayawudi, mbaka mwishu wa ulongosi wavi.”
LUK 21:25 “Yati kwivya na ulangisu mulilanga na mwehi na ndondo. Na vandu pamulima yati vivagaya ndava ya wogohi wa kubuma kwa luyuga lwa nyanja.
LUK 21:26 Vandu yati vihinduka ndava ya wogohi, pevilola mambu gegakuukolela mulima, muni vindu vyoha vya kulihundi lilanga na mwehi na ndondo na vingi vyoha yati vinyugusika.
LUK 21:27 Kangi, yati vamlola Mwana wa Mundu ibwela mulihundi, ana makakala na ukulu wamahele.
LUK 21:28 Lukumbi mambu genago pagitumbula kuhumila, myimayi mkangamala, muni kugomboka kwinu kuhegalili.”
LUK 21:29 Kangi akavajovela luhumu, “Mlola mkongo wa mtini na mikongo yingi yoha.
LUK 21:30 Pemwilola yitumbula kumela mahamba, mwavene mwimanya kuvya lusenje lwa fula luhegelili.
LUK 21:31 Mewawa, pamwilola mambu genago gihengeka yati mwimanya kuvya Unkosi wa Chapanga uvi papipi.
LUK 21:32 Chakaka nikuvajovela, chiveleku ichi cha hinu chipita lepi kwakona genago goha kuhengeka.
LUK 21:33 Kunani kwa Chapanga na pamulima yati ziwuka, nambu malovi gangu katu gipita lepi.”
LUK 21:34 “Mujiyangalilayi! Mitima yinu yikotoka kutopelwa, kwa mambu ga kugala na uhutulu na mang'ahiso ga mulima uwu. Muni ligono lenilo likuvabwelela chigafula.
LUK 21:35 Muni yikuvabwelela ngati likoka vandu voha vevitama pamulima poha.
LUK 21:36 Hinu muvyamihu, na muyupayi kwa Chapanga lukumbi lwoha muni muhotola mpata makakala ga kuyepa mambu genago goha pegihumila, na kuyima palongolo ya Mwana wa Mundu.”
LUK 21:37 Kila ligono muhi magono ago, Yesu avi mukuwula vandu mu Nyumba ya Chapanga, nambu kilu ahambayi kuchitumbi cha mizeituni na kutama kwenuko.
LUK 21:38 Na vandu voha vayumwiki lukela hambakucha kuhamba pa Nyumba ya Chapanga, vapata kumyuwanila Yesu.
LUK 22:1 Mselebuko wa mabumunda gangali ngemeku, wewikemiwa Pasaka yavi papipi.
LUK 22:2 Vakulu va kuteta na vawula va malagizu ga Musa vakavya mukulonda njila ya kumkoma Yesu, nambu vavayogwipi vandu.
LUK 22:3 Setani akamyingila Yuda mweikemelewa Isikalioti, mmonga pagati ya vamitumi vala kumi na vavili.
LUK 22:4 Yuda akahamba, kulongela na vakulu va kuteta na vakulu va valonda va Nyumba ya Chapanga, ndava ya kuvagotolela Yesu.
LUK 22:5 Vene vakaheka na vakayidakila kumpela mashonga.
LUK 22:6 Yuda akayidakila, ndi alonda fwasi ya bwina ya kumgotola Yesu changali msambi wa vandu kumanya.
LUK 22:7 Ligono la mabumunda gangasopewa ngemeku likahika. Lenilo ndi ligono la kuhinjwa mwana limbelele wa Pasaka.
LUK 22:8 Yesu akavatuma Petili na Yohani, avajovili “Mhamba mkatendekelayi chakulya cha Pasaka.”
LUK 22:9 Vene vakamkota, “Wigana tikutendelekayi koki?”
LUK 22:10 Yesu akavajovela, “Myuwanila! Pamwiyingila kumuji yati mwikonganeka na mgosi mweagegili chihulu cha manji. Mumlanda mbaka munyumba yeiyingila.
LUK 22:11 Mumjovela mkolo nyumba, ‘Muwula akukota, chivii koki chumba nilyayi chakulya cha Pasaka pamonga na vawuliwa vangu?’
LUK 22:12 Hinu mkolo nyumba yati akuvalangisa chumba chivaha cha kugolofa chechivikiwi kila chindu. Hinu mtendelekeha chakulya mwenumo.”
LUK 22:13 Vakahamba, vakakolela kila chindu chivili ngati Yesu cheavajovili, ndi vakatendelekela chakulya cha Pasaka.
LUK 22:14 Lukumbi palwahikili, Yesu akatama kulya chakulya pamonga na vamitumi vaki.
LUK 22:15 Akavajovela, “Ninogili neju kulya chakulya cha Pasaka yeniyi pamonga na nyenye, kwakona kung'aiswa kwangu.
LUK 22:16 Muni nikuvajovela, yati nilya lepi kavili Pasaka mbaka penapo payikamilika Muunkosi wa Chapanga.”
LUK 22:17 Kangi Yesu akatola chikombi, akamsengusa Chapanga akajova, “Mtola, mpelanayi mwavoha,
LUK 22:18 Muni nikuvajovela, kuhumila hinu ninywa lepi kavili divayi mbaka Unkosi wa Chapanga peubwela.”
LUK 22:19 Mewawa akatola libumunda, akamsengusa Chapanga, akayimetula, akavapela akajova, “Yeniyi ndi higa yangu yemwipewa nyenye. Muni munikumbukayi nene.”
LUK 22:20 Akakita mewawa na chikombi peamali kulya, akajova, “Chikombi ichi ndi lilaganu la mupya yeyilangiswa na ngasi yangu na yeyiyitika ndava yinu.”
LUK 22:21 “Nambu, mlola! Mweakuning'anamukila avi bahapa pachakulya pamonga na nene.
LUK 22:22 Chakaka Mwana wa Mundu ihamba kukomiwa, ngati cheaganili Chapanga, nambu alachikolela mundu yula mweamng'anamukila.”
LUK 22:23 Penapo vakatumbula kukotana vene kwa vene yani pagati yavi mwaihenga lijambu lenili.
LUK 22:24 Vamitumi va Yesu vakatumbula kuhutana kumvala yani mweihololewa kuvya mkulu kuliku vangi.
LUK 22:25 Yesu akavajovela, “Vankosi va milima vakuvalongosa vandu kwa makakala, na vachilongosi vakujikemela kuvya ‘Vankozi va vandu.’
LUK 22:26 Nambu yikoto kuvya chenichi pagati yinu, mweavimkulu pagati yinu yikumgana kuvya ngati mdebe, na mweavi chilongosi yikumgana kuvya ngati mtumisi.
LUK 22:27 Muni, ndi yani mweavi mkulu, mweitama pameza kulya chakulya, amala yula mweitumikila? Chakaka ndi yula mweitama pameza kulya chakulya! Pamonga na genago, nambu nene nivii pagati yinu ngati muhengaji.”
LUK 22:28 “Nyenye ndi mwemwasigalili na nene lukumbi lwoha lwa mang'ahiso gangu,
LUK 22:29 ngati, Dadi cheanigotolili nene uhotola wa kulongosa, mewawa na nene nikuvagotolela nyenye, uhotola wenuwo.
LUK 22:30 Hinu, yati mwinywa na kulya pameza yangu muunkosi wangu na kutama muvigoda vya Unkosi na kuhamula makabila kumi na gavili ga Isilaeli.”
LUK 22:31 “Yesu akajova, Simoni, Simoni! Yuwanila! Setani ayupili luwusa kwa Chapanga lwa kuvalinga nyenye kulola ngati muyendelela kuvya vamsadika.
LUK 22:32 Nambu nene nikukuyupila veve muni kusadika kwaku kukotoka kupungula. Na veve peukuvawuyila vakangamalisa valongo vaku.”
LUK 22:33 Ndi Petili akayangula, “Bambu, nene nijitendelekili kuhamba na veve muchifungu amala kufwa pamonga na veve.”
LUK 22:34 Nambu Yesu akajova, “Nikukujovela Petili, kwakona lijogolo langavika lelu yati ukunibela mala zidatu.”
LUK 22:35 Kangi, Yesu akavakota vawuliwa vaki, “Panakavatumili changali chihaku cha mashonga amala lihaku amala champali za munjila mwapungukiwi na chindu?” Vakamyangula, “Lepi.”
LUK 22:36 Yesu akavajovela, “Nambu hinu mundu mweavi na chihaku cha mashonga agega na mweavi na lihaku mewawa. Na yoyoha angali upanga agulisa likoti laki na akagula umonga.
LUK 22:37 Yiyandikwi mu Mayandiku Gamsopi, ‘Avalangiwi kuvya mmonga pagati ya vandu vanyagaji,’ Nikuvajovela naha, Mayandiku giganikiwa gatimila ndava yangu, ndava muni wumi wangu wihika pamwishu.”
LUK 22:38 Vawuliwa vakajova, “Bambu, lola, penapa zivii panga zivili.” Akavajovela, “Tigaleki!”
LUK 22:39 Yesu akawuka ngati chayavili mvelu waki, akahamba kuchitumbi cha Mizeituni vawuliwa vaki vakamlanda.
LUK 22:40 Pehahikili pandu pala akavajovela vawuliwa vaki, “Muyupayi, mukoto kuyingila mukulingiwa.”
LUK 22:41 Kangi mwene akavaleka, akahamba utali wa mundu kujugumila liganga, akafugama, akayupa.
LUK 22:42 Akajova, “Dadi, ngati wigana uniwusila chikombi ichi cha mang'ahiso, nambu lepi chiganu changu, ndi chewigana wamwene.”
LUK 22:43 Kangi, Mtumu wa kunani kwa Chapanga akahumila akamkangamalisa.
LUK 22:44 Hinu peavi mulipyanda, akamuyupa Chapanga neju, na lihuki ngati matonji ga ngasi, gamhulwili pahi.
LUK 22:45 Peamali kuyupa, akayima kuvawuyila vawuliwa vaki akavakolela vagonili, ndava vavi ngolongondi.
LUK 22:46 Yesu akavajovela, “Ndava kyani mwigona? Muyumuka muyupa, mkoto kuyingila mukulingiwa.”
LUK 22:47 Peavi akona ilongela, msambi wa vandu ukabwela kuni ulongoswa na Yuda mmonga wa vawuliwa kumi na vavili. Yuda akamhegelela Yesu na kumjambusa cha kumkumbatila.
LUK 22:48 Nambu Yesu akamjovela, “Yuda! Wu, ukumng'anamukila Mwana wa Mundu kwa jambusa ya kumkumbatila?”
LUK 22:49 Vawuliwa vala pavachiwene chechihumila vakakota, “Bambu, tivadumula na panga zitu?”
LUK 22:50 Ndi mmonga pagati yavi akamtova mvanda wa Mteta Mkulu wa Chapanga, akamdumula likutu la upandi wa kulyela.
LUK 22:51 Nambu Yesu akajova, “Mleka! Yikoli.” Akampamisa likutu la mundu yula, akamlamisa.
LUK 22:52 Kangi Yesu akavajovela, vakulu va vakulu va kuteta na vakulu va valonda va Nyumba ya Chapanga na vagogo vevabweli kumkamula, “Wu, mbweli na mapanga na vibonga kunikamula ngati nene namnyagaji?
LUK 22:53 Penavi pamonga na nyenye magono goha Munyumba ya Chapanga mwanikamwili lepi. Nambu ulu ndi lukumbi lwinu, lukumbi lwa uchilongosi wa chitita.”
LUK 22:54 Vakamkamula Yesu, na kumtola, kuhamba nayu kunyumba ya Mteta Mkulu wa Chapanga. Petili amlandili cha kutali.
LUK 22:55 Vakakosa motu pagati ya luvanja lwa nyumba vakatama pamonga, na Petili avili pagati yavi.
LUK 22:56 Muhengaji mmonga mdala peamuwene Petili atamili papipi na motu, akamlolokesa akajova, “Mundu uyu mewawa avi pamonga na Yesu.”
LUK 22:57 Nambu petili akabela akajova, “Mdala veve! Nene nimmanyili lepi.”
LUK 22:58 Mwanakandahi, mundu yungi amuweni Petili, akajova “Veve wa mmonga wavi.” Nambu Petili akayangula “Bambu veve, lepi nene!”
LUK 22:59 Ngati lukumbi lwa saa yimonga palongolo, mundu yungi akajova, “Chakaka na mundu uyu avi pamonga na Yesu, ndava mwenuyu mewa Mgalilaya.”
LUK 22:60 Nambu Petili akajova, “Bambu veve, nichimanyili lepi chewijova!” Bahapo peavi akona ilongela lijogolo likavika.
LUK 22:61 Bambu akamng'anamuka na kumlola Petili, ndi Petili agakumbwiki geajoviwi na Bambu gala, “Lelu kilu kwakona lijogolo kuvika yati ukunibela mala yidatu.”
LUK 22:62 Penapo Petili akahuma kuvala akavemba neju.
LUK 22:63 Vandu vevamyangalila Yesu vala, vakamtova na kumvevesa.
LUK 22:64 Vakamgubika mihu na chitambala, vakavya kumkota, lotelayi yani mwaakutovili?
LUK 22:65 Vakamjovela malovi ga mahele ga maligu.
LUK 22:66 Kwapachili, vagogo va mulima na vakulu va kuteta na vawula va malagizu ga Musa, vakonganiki pamonga, vakamtola Yesu vakampeleka mulibanji lavi likulu la Vayawudi.
LUK 22:67 Vene vakamjovela “Utijovela! Wu, veve ndi Kilisitu Msangula?” Nambu Yesu akayangula, “Hati ngati nivajovili, yati mwisadika lepi,
LUK 22:68 Na ngati nivakotili nyenye, yati nakuniyangula.
LUK 22:69 Nambu kutumbula hinu, Mwana wa Mundu yati itama upandi wa kulyela wa Chapanga ana makakala.”
LUK 22:70 Voha vakamkota, “Ndi, veve Mwana wa Chapanga?” Mwene akayangula, “Mwavene ndi mujovili kuvya ndi nene.”
LUK 22:71 Kangi vakajova, “Hinu, tigana lepi ujova wungi ndava yaki? Tavete timyuwini cheijova mumlomo waki mwene.”
LUK 23:1 Msambi wa vandu voha vevakonganiki pala, vakayima na kumpeleka Yesu palongolo ya Pilatu,
LUK 23:2 Vakatumbula kumtakila vakajova, “Tamkolili mundu uyu avayaganisa vandu vitu na kavili akuvabesa vandu vakotoka kumpela kodi nkosi wa ku Loma na kujikemela ati mwene ndi Kilisitu Msangula Nkosi.”
LUK 23:3 Pilatu akamkota Yesu, “Veve ndi Nkosi wa Vayawudi?” Yesu akamyangula, “Veve wamwene ndi ujovili, veve Nkosi wa Vayawudi.”
LUK 23:4 Pilatu akavajovela vakulu va kuteta na msambi wa vandu, “Nakuchiwona chindu cheabudili mundu uyu.”
LUK 23:5 Nambu vene vakajova chinganga, “Akuvakulukisa vandu kwa mawuliwu gaki mumulima woha wa Yudea, atumbwili ku Galilaya na hinu avi penapa.”
LUK 23:6 Pilatu peayuwini genago, akakota, “Wu, mundu uyu ndi mkolonjinji wa ku Galilaya?”
LUK 23:7 Peamanyili Yesu ihuma mumulima wewilongoswa na Helodi, ndi ampeliki kwa Helodi muni lukumbi lwenulo mewa avi ku Yelusalemu.
LUK 23:8 Helodi akavya na luheku neju peamuweni Yesu. Muni amali kuyuwana mambu ga Yesu, ndi magono gamahele anogelayi kumlola Yesu cheikita gachinamtiti.
LUK 23:9 Helodi amkotili Yesu makotesi gamahele, nambu Yesu nakumyangula chindu.
LUK 23:10 Vakulu va kuteta na vawula va malagizu ga Chapanga geampeli Musa vakayima kulongolo na kumtakila chinganganga.
LUK 23:11 Helodi pamonga na vamanjolinjoli vaki vakampeli soni Yesu na kumvevesa, kangi vakamuwalika ligwanda la unkosi na kumuwuyisa kwa Pilatu.
LUK 23:12 Magono gamumbele Helodi na Pilatu vatamanila cha umakoko, nambu kutumbula ligono lenilo vakavya vankozi.
LUK 23:13 Pilatu akavakemele pamonga, Vamteta vakulu na vachilongosi va Chiyawudi na vandu,
LUK 23:14 akavajovela, “Mumletili mundu uyu mwijova akuvayaganisa vandu. Hinu myuwanila! Nimali kulola muhalu uwu palongolo yinu kawaka chindu cheabudili mu mambu goha gemumtakili.
LUK 23:15 Lepi nene ndu, nambu hati Helodi mewa, amuwuyisi kavili, ndava kawaka chindu cheabudili cheachiwene, kwa mundu uyu hati ahamuliwa lifwa.
LUK 23:16 Yati nilagazila atovewa michapilu ya miinga, na kumulekekesa.
LUK 23:17 Mselebuko wa Pasaka, Pilatu yamganili kuvadindulila mundu mmonga kuhuma muchifungu.”
LUK 23:18 Nambu voha vakaywanga, “Mkoma mundu uyu! Utidindulilayi Balaba!”
LUK 23:19 Balaba asopiwi muchifungu ndava ya kukulukisa vandu muchitutu na muchitutu chenicho mundu mmonga akomiwi.
LUK 23:20 Pilatu aganili kumulekekesa Yesu, ndi akalongela nawu kavili vandu vevamtakili Yesu.
LUK 23:21 Nambu vene vakaywanga vakajova, “Mvambayi pamsalaba, mvambayi pamsalaba!”
LUK 23:22 Pilatu akavajovela mala ya datu, “Chindu gani cheabudili mundu uyu? Nichiwona lepi chindu cheabudili hati ahamuliwa kukomiwa! Nene yati nilagiza atovewayi michapilu na kumlekekesa.”
LUK 23:23 Nambu vene vakayonjokesa kuywanga neju, Yesu yiganikwa avambiwayi pamsalaba, lwami zavi pamwishu zayuwaniki.
LUK 23:24 Hinu, Pilatu akahamula gahengeka.
LUK 23:25 Akamulekekesa kuhuma muchifungu yula mweakukingiwi ndava ya kuvya pamonga na vandu muchitutu na kukoma mundu mmonga, ndi akamgotola Yesu vamukita ngati chevigana.
LUK 23:26 Pevavi mukupeleka, vakakonganeka na mundu mmonga liina laki Simoni mkolonjinji wa Kulene, mweahumayi kumgunda waki, ndi vakamkamula na kumgegesa msalaba wula mumbele ya Yesu.
LUK 23:27 Vandu msambi kwa msambi, wamulandili, pagati yavi vavi vadala vevamuvembelayi Yesu ndava ya lipyanda.
LUK 23:28 Yesu akavang'anamukila, akajova, “Vamawu va Yelusalemu! Mkoto kunivembela nene, nambu mujivembela mwavene na vana vinu.
LUK 23:29 Muni chakaka walabwela lukumbi, yati mwijova, ‘Mbanga yavi vadala, vangali vana na vangavaleke, amala vanganyong'esa vana!’
LUK 23:30 Lukumbi lwenulo, yati vandu vakuvijovela vidunda, mutigwilila na tudunda, ‘Mutigubika!’
LUK 23:31 Ngati vandu vakunikitila nene chenicho mwenivili ngati mkongo uvisi, yati yivya wuli kwa nyenye mwemuvi ngati mkongo uyumu?”
LUK 23:32 Mewa vavatoli vandu vangi vavili vanyagaji vavapeliki, kukomiwa pamonga na Yesu.
LUK 23:33 Pavahikili pandu pepikemelawa, “Libangu la Mutu,” Ndi vakamvamba Yesu pamsalaba pamonga na vanyagaji vavili vala mmonga upandi waki wa kulyela na yungi upandi wa kumangeya.
LUK 23:34 Yesu akajova, “Dadi, valekekesa, muni nakumanya chevikita.” Kangi, vakagavana nyula zaki kwa kuhagula kwa gudugudu.
LUK 23:35 Vandu vayimili kulolokesa kuni vakulu va Vayawudi chevamvevisi vijova, “Avasangwili vangi, hinu ajisangula mwene ngati mwene ndi Kilisitu mwehaguliwi na Chapanga!”
LUK 23:36 Manjolinjoli mewa vamvevisi, vamhambili Yesu na kumpela divayi yivavanu,
LUK 23:37 Vakumjovela, “Ngati chakaka veve ndi Nkosi wa Vayawudi, ujisangula wamwene!”
LUK 23:38 Panani ya msalaba vavikili chibawu chechayandikiwi, “Mwenuyu ndi Nkosi wa Vayawudi.”
LUK 23:39 Mmonga wa vanyagaji vala vevavambiwi pamsalaba akamliga Yesu, akajova “Wu, lepi chakaka kuvya veve ndi Kilisitu Msangula? Jisangula wamwene, utisangula na tete!”
LUK 23:40 Nambu mnyagaji yungi yula, akamuywangila muyaki akamjovela, “Veve ukumuyogopa lepi Chapanga hati padebe? Veve uhamuliwi mewawa.
LUK 23:41 Veve na nene yikutigana tihamuliwa ndava ya kunyaga kwitu. Nambu mundu uyu kawaka hati chimonga cheabudili.”
LUK 23:42 Kangi akamjovela Yesu, “Veve Yesu! Ukoto kunikosiwa peuyingila Munkosi waku!”
LUK 23:43 Yesu akamyangula, “Chakaka nikujovela lelu yati tivya na nene kupaladiso.”
LUK 23:44 Kutumbula saa sita muhi, chitita chikagubika mulima woha mbaka saa tisa,
LUK 23:45 na lilanga likakotoka kulangasa na lipazia lelakovikwi mu Nyumba ya Chapanga likapapuka vipandi vivili.
LUK 23:46 Yesu akavemba kwa lwami luvaha, “Dadi! Mumawoko gaku nigotola mpungu wangu!” Akadumuka mpungu.
LUK 23:47 Mkulu wa manjolinjoli yula peagawene gegahumalili, akamulumba Chapanga akajova, “Chakaka mundu uyu avi mbwina!”
LUK 23:48 Na vandu voha vevakonganiki penapo ndava ya lijambu lenilo pavagawene gegahumalili gala, vakawuya kunyumba zavi, kuni vakujitova nganga cha ngolongondi.
LUK 23:49 Vankozi vaki voha pamonga na vadala vealongosini nawu kuhuma ku Galilaya, vayimili cha kutali kulola mambu genago.
LUK 23:50 Kwavi na mundu mmonga liina laki Yosefu, avi mmonga wa vachilongosi wa libanji likulu la Vayawudi. Avi mundu mbwina na kukita geigana Chapanga,
LUK 23:51 mwene nakuyidakilana gevapangili na kugakita vachilongosi vayaki va libanji likulu la Vayawudi. Yosefu avi mkolonjinji wa Alimatei, ndi avi mukulindila kubwela kwa Unkosi wa Chapanga.
LUK 23:52 Mundu mwenuyo akahamba kwa Pilatu kumuyupa atola higa ya Yesu.
LUK 23:53 Akayihulusa higa kuhuma pamsalaba, akayitindisila nyula ya msopi na kuvika mulitinda lelahongoliwi pamhana ya litalau, lavi langavikiwa mundu.
LUK 23:54 Lavi ligono la kutendelekeha, Ligono la Kupumulila ndi latumbukana.
LUK 23:55 Vadala vevalongosini na Yesu kuhuma ku Galilaya vakamulanda Yosefu na kuliwona litinda na higa ya Yesu cheuvikiwi.
LUK 23:56 Kangi vakawuya kunyumba, vakatendelekela mahuta geginungalila bwina ga kunyala higa ya Yesu. Ligono la Kupumulila vapumulili ngati malagizu ga Chapanga geampeli Musa chegilagiza.
LUK 24:1 Ligono la Dominika, lukela hamba kucha, vadala vala vakahamba kulitinda, kuni vagegi mayewani na mahuta gakunungalila gevatendekili.
LUK 24:2 Vakoli liganga lila libilindwisi patali kuhuma pakuyingila mulitinda.
LUK 24:3 Hinu, pavayingili mugati, vayiwene lepi higa ya Bambu Yesu.
LUK 24:4 Pevavi vakona vikangasa ndava ya lijambu lenilo, bahapo vandu vavili vevawalili nyula za kung'asima neju vakahumila papipi yavi.
LUK 24:5 Vadala vala vakavya na wogohi, vakagundama pahi. Ndi vandu vala vakavajovela, “Ndava kyani mukumlonda mundu mweavi mumi pagati ya vevafwili?
LUK 24:6 Avi lepi apa, ayukili. Muholalela cheavajovili peavi akona ku Galilaya.
LUK 24:7 ‘Yikumgana Mwana wa Mundu awusiwayi pavandu vevakumbudila Chapanga, na vene yati vakumvamba pamsalaba na pa ligono la datu yati iyuka.’ ”
LUK 24:8 Penapo vadala vala vakagakumbuka malovi ga Yesu,
LUK 24:9 vakawuya kuhuma kulitinda, vakavajovela vamitumi kumi na mmonga, pamonga na vangi voha, malovi ga mambu ago goha.
LUK 24:10 Vadala vevabweli kujova mambu genago vavi Maliya mkolonjinji wa Magidala na Yoana na Maliya nyina waki Yakobo pamonga na vadala vangi vevalongosini nawu.
LUK 24:11 Nambu vamitumi vala vasadiki lepi malovi ga vadala vala, ndava vagahololela ngati uyimu nunuyu.
LUK 24:12 Nambu Petili, akajumba kuhamba kulitinda, peahikili kulitinda agundimi kulingulila mugati akayiwona ngayene nyula ya msopi. Akawuya kunyumba kuni ikangasa na kujikota gala gegahumili.
LUK 24:13 Ligono lilolo, vavili pagati ya vamulanda va Yesu vavi mulugendu kuhamba kuchijiji chimonga cha ku Emau chechavi utali wa masaa gavili kuhuma ku Yelusalemu,
LUK 24:14 Vavi mukugalongalela mambu goha gegahumalili.
LUK 24:15 Pavayendelela na malongesi gavi, Yesu mwene akavahumila na kugenda nawu,
LUK 24:16 Vamuweni kwa mihu gavi, nambu vadindiwi vakotoka kummanya.
LUK 24:17 Yesu akavakota, “Mwilongela kyani kuni mwigenda?” Vene vakayima pamihu pavi pakwinyini cha ligoga.
LUK 24:18 Mmonga wavi liina laki Kileopa, akamyangula, “Wu nga veve myehe wangamanya mambu gegahumalili pa Yelusalemu magono gagaga?”
LUK 24:19 Yesu akavakota, “Mambu goki?” Vena vakamuyagula, “Mambu gegamkolili Yesu wa ku Nazaleti.” Mwene avi Mlota mweihotola kuhenga na kuwula palongolo ya vandu voha va Chapanga.
LUK 24:20 Vakulu va kuteta na vachilongosi vitu vakamgotola na kumuhamula lifwa, vakamvamba pamsalaba.
LUK 24:21 Nambu tete tamsadiki mwene kuvya ndi mweatumwili kuyigombola Isilaeli! Hinu, lelu ndi ligono la datu pagahengiki mambu genago.
LUK 24:22 Kavili vadala vangi va kwitu vatikenyemwisi, muni vakahambili kulitinda lukela hambakucha,
LUK 24:23 Nambu nakuyikolela higa ya Yesu. Vakawuya nakutijovela vahumiwi na vamitumu va kunani kwa Chapanga, vevavajovili ngati Yesu akona mumi.
LUK 24:24 Vayitu vangi pagati yitu vahambili kulitinda kulola gegajoviwi na vadala vala, nambu nakuyiwona lepi mwene.
LUK 24:25 Kangi Yesu akavajovela, “Nyenye vayimu na mitima yinu yitopa kusadika gegajoviwi na vamlota va Chapanga!
LUK 24:26 Wuli, yamganili lepi Kilisitu msangula kung'ahika, kangi ayingilayi muukulu waki?”
LUK 24:27 Hinu akavadandaulila mambu goha gegamuvala mwene mu Mayandiku Gamsopi kutumbula muhitabu ya Musa mbaka muhitabu ya Vamlota va Chapanga.
LUK 24:28 Pevahegalili na chijiji chevaambayi, Yesu akakita ngati mweiyendelela na lugendu,
LUK 24:29 Nambu vene vakamjovela, chondi pepayi, “Utamayi pamonga na tete, muni lilanga litipimi chitita chibwela.” Ndi akayingila nawu mugati.
LUK 24:30 Peatamili kulya chakuyla pamonga nawu, akalitola libumunda na kumsengusa Chapanga na kulimetula na kuvapela.
LUK 24:31 Bahapo vakagubukuliwa mihu gavi na kummanya, nambu mwene akayaga pagati yavi.
LUK 24:32 Ndi Vakajovesana, “Mitima yitu yasangalwiki neju mugati mwitu peakatidandauli Mayandiku Gamsopi munjila mula?”
LUK 24:33 Balapala vakawuka, kuwuya ku Yelusalemu. Kwenuko vakavakolela vamitumi kumi na mmonga na vangi vevavi pamonga na vene vakonganiki,
LUK 24:34 vakajova, “Chakaka Bambu ayukili! Amuhumalili Simoni!”
LUK 24:35 Hinu vamulanda vavili va Yesu vakavajovela mambu gegavakolili munjila na chevammanyili Yesu pealimetulayi libumunda.
LUK 24:36 Pevavi mukujovewa genago, Yesu mwene bahapo akayima pagati yavi nakujova, “Uteke uvyayi na nyenye.”
LUK 24:37 Vakakenyemuka na kuyogopa neju muni vaholalelayi pangi valiwene lihoka.
LUK 24:38 Nambu mwene akavajovela, “Ndava kyani mwivagaya? Ndava kyani mwikujikota kota mumitima yinu?
LUK 24:39 Mlola mawoko na magendelu, muni mumanyayi kuvya ndi nene. Munipamisa mumanya, muni lihoka langali higa amala lijege ngati chemukunilola.”
LUK 24:40 Peamali kujova genago, akavalangisa mawoko na magendelu.
LUK 24:41 Pevavi vakona kusadika, ndava ya luheku uvaha na kukangasa, Yesu akavakota, “Muvinachu chakulya chochoha penapa?”
LUK 24:42 Vakampela chipandi cha somba yiyochanu,
LUK 24:43 akachitola na kulya kuni woha vakumlola.
LUK 24:44 Kangi akavajovela, “Genaga ndi malovi genavajovili penakavili na nyenye, muni yaganikwi gahengekayi goha gegayandikiwi kunivala nene mu malagizu ga Musa na muvitabu vya vamlota va Chapanga na Muchitabu cha Zabuli.”
LUK 24:45 Kangi, penapo akavalangasila luhala lwavi muni vagamanyayi Mayandiku Gamsopi.
LUK 24:46 Akavajovela, “Gayandikiwi kuvya, Kilisitu msangula yati ing'ahiswa nambu paligono la datu yati iyuka kuhuma pavafwili,
LUK 24:47 yikuvagana mewa vandu va makabila goha, kutumbula ku Yelusalemu vakokoselewayi muliina laki kuleka kumbudila Chapanga. Muni valekekeswa kubuda kwavi.
LUK 24:48 Nyenye ndi mwemugawene mambu genago.
LUK 24:49 Namwene yati nikuvapelekela yula mweavalagazili Dadi wangu, nambu mulindila kumuji mbaka pemumemeswa uhotola kuhuma kunani.”
LUK 24:50 Kangi Yesu akavalongosa vawuliwa kuvala ya muji wenuwo mbaka ku Betania, akayinula mawoko gaki kunani akavamotisa.
LUK 24:51 Peamali kuvamotisa, akavaleka, akatoliwa kuhamba kunani kwa Chapanga.
LUK 24:52 Vawuliwa vakamfugamila Yesu, kangi vakawuya pa Yelusalemu, kuni vavi na luheku luvaha,
LUK 24:53 Vayendalili kuvya Panyumba ya Chapanga magono goha, vakumulumbalila Chapanga.
JOH 1:1 Penapo pakutumbula, kwakona vindu vyoha viwumbiki lepi avili mmonga mweakemeliwi Lilovi. Lilovi avili na Chapanga. Mwene avili Chapanga.
JOH 1:2 Kuhuma kutumbula avili pamonga na Chapanga.
JOH 1:3 Kupitila mwene, Chapanga awumbili vindu vyoha, kawaka chindu hati chimonga chechawumbiki changali mwene.
JOH 1:4 Mwene ndi chinyepa cha wumi na wumi wene uletili lumuli kwa vandu.
JOH 1:5 Lumuli lwenulo lulangasa kuchitita, na chene chitita chihotola lepi kulujimisa.
JOH 1:6 Chapanga amtumili mundu mmonga liina laki Yohani,
JOH 1:7 mwene abweli kuvajovela vandu kuluvala lumuli lwenulo. Abweli muni vandu voha vayuwana na kusadika ujumbi waki.
JOH 1:8 Yohani mwene avi lepi lumuli lwenulo, nambu abweli kuvajovela vandu kuluvala lumuli lwenulo.
JOH 1:9 Lwenulo ndi lumuli lwa chakaka, lumuli lwelubwela pamulima na kuvalangasila vandu voha.
JOH 1:10 Hinu, lilovi lila avili pamulima na kupitila mwene Chapanga awumbili mulima, nambu vandu va pamulima wammanyili lepi.
JOH 1:11 Abwelili pavandu vaki mwene, nambu vandu vaki vampokili lepi.
JOH 1:12 Nambu vandu vevampokili, na kumsadika, avapeli uhotola wa kuvya vana va Chapanga.
JOH 1:13 Vavi vana va Chapanga lepi kwa kuvelekewa ngati vandu chevivelekewa. Amala vavelikwi lepi ngati vandu chevigana, nambu kwa maganu ga Chapanga mwene.
JOH 1:14 Lilovi lila akavya mundu, akatama kwitu. Ndi tiuwene ukulu waki, ukulu waki mwene nga Mwana wa Dadi Chapanga, amemili ubwina wa Chapanga na uchakaka.
JOH 1:15 Yohani avajovili vandu malovi gaki. Akajova kwa lwami, “Mwenuyu ndi yula mwenamuluwili penajovili, ‘Ibwela mundu mweigelekela pahali pangu mkulu kuliku nene, muni amali kuvya kwakona nene kuvelekewa.’ ”
JOH 1:16 Ndava cheavili ubwina waki wamahele tete tavoha tipokili mota yamahele.
JOH 1:17 Chapanga atipeli malagizu kupitila Musa, nambu ubwina wa Chapanga na chakaka utibwelili kupitila Yesu Kilisitu.
JOH 1:18 Kawaka mundu mweamuwene Chapanga katu. Nambu nga Mwana waki yuyo mweavi Chapanga na mweaganiwi na Dadi, mwene atimanyisi mambu gaki.
JOH 1:19 Genaga ndi malovi Yohani geajovili ndava yaki lukumbi vachilongosi va Vayawudi ku Yelusalemu pevavatumili vamteta va Chapanga na Valawi vamkotayi, “Veve wayani?”
JOH 1:20 Yohani abelili lepi kuyangula likotesi lenilo, nambu akajova hotohoto, “Nene lepi Kilisitu Msangula.”
JOH 1:21 Kangi vakamkota, “Hinu veve ndi wayani? Wu, veve ndi Eliya?” Yohani akayangula, “Lepi.” Vakamkota kangi, “Veve ndi yula mlota wa Chapanga?” Akavayangula, “Lepi!”
JOH 1:22 Kangi vakamkota, “Hinu wayani veve? Wijova wuli kukuvala wamwene? Utijovelayi na tete tikavayangula vevatitumili.”
JOH 1:23 Yohani akayangula, nene ndi yula mlota Isaya ajovili malovi gaki, “Nene ndi lwami lwa mundu ikemela kulugangatu. ‘Mgolosayi njila ya Bambu.’ ”
JOH 1:24 Vandu avo vatumwili na Vafalisayu,
JOH 1:25 vakamkota Yohani, “Ngati veve lepi Kilisitu Msangula mweahaguliwi na Chapanga, amala Eliya, amala mlota wa Chapanga, ndava kyani wibatiza?”
JOH 1:26 Yohani akavayangula, “Nene nibatiza kwa manji, nambu avi mmonga pagati yinu, mwakona kummanya.
JOH 1:27 Mweibwela pahali pangu, ndi nene niganikiwa lepi hati kuwopola nyosi za champali zaki.”
JOH 1:28 Mambu genago gakitiki kumuji wa Betania, kumwambu ya mfuleni Yoludani, Yohani kweavi mukubatiza.
JOH 1:29 Chilau yaki, Yohani amuwene Yesu akumbwelela akajova, “Lola, mwenuyu ndi Mwana limbelele wa Chapanga, ndi mweiwusa kumbudila Chapanga pamulima!
JOH 1:30 Ndi mwenamlongalili yula penajovili, ‘Pahali pa nene ibwela mundu mkulu kuliku nene, mwene avili kwakona nene kuvelekewa!’
JOH 1:31 Hati namwene nangammanya, nambu nibweli kubatiza na manji muni vandu va Isilaeli vammanyayi.”
JOH 1:32 Kangi Yohani atijovili gala geagawene, “Namuwene Mpungu Msopi akumuhelelela ngati ngunda kuhuma kunani na kutula panani yaki.
JOH 1:33 Nene nangammanya, nambu yula mweanitumili kubatiza vandu na manji amali kunijovela, ‘Mundu mweakumlola Mpungu Msopi akumuhelelela kuhuma kunani na kutama panani yaki, ndi mweibatiza na Mpungu Msopi.’
JOH 1:34 Kangi Yohani akajova nene nigalolili mambu aga na nikuvajovela uchakaka kuvya mwenuyu ndi Mwana waki Chapanga.”
JOH 1:35 Kangi chilau yaki, Yohani avili pandu penapo, pamonga na vawuliwa vaki vavili.
JOH 1:36 Peamuwene Yesu ipita akajova, “Lola! Uyu ndi Mwana Limbelele wa Chapanga.”
JOH 1:37 Vawuliwa vavili vala pevayuwini malovi geajovayi Yohani gala vakamlanda Yesu.
JOH 1:38 Yesu ang'anamwiki, avawene vawuliwa vala vakumlanda, akavakota, “Mwilonda kyani?” Vakamkota, “Labi witama koki?” Labi mana yaki Muwula.
JOH 1:39 Yesu akavajovela, “Mbwela, na nyenye yati mwilola,” Vawuliwa vala vakamlanda yavili lukumbi lwa saa kumi ya kimihi na vakatama kwaki ligono lenilo.
JOH 1:40 Andelea, mlongo waki Simoni Petili avi mmonga pagati ya vavili avo vevamyuwini Yohani geajovili, vakamlanda Yesu.
JOH 1:41 Andelea akatumbula kumlonda Simoni mlongo waki, akamjovela “Timuwene Msangula.” Ndi kujova “Kilisitu.”
JOH 1:42 Kangi ampeliki Simoni kwa Yesu. Ndi Yesu akamlolokesa Simoni akajova, “Simoni veve mwana wa Yohani. Hinu yati ukemelewa Kefa,” Kwa Chigiliki ndi Petili, mana yaki “Litalau.”
JOH 1:43 Chilau yaki Yesu akawuka, kuhamba kumulima wa Galilaya ndi amkolili Filipi, akamjovela “Nilandayi.”
JOH 1:44 Filipi mkolonjinji wa ku Betisaida, muji wevitama Andelea na Petili.
JOH 1:45 Filipi amkoli Natanyeli, akamjovela, “Timuwene mwene, mweayandikiwi na Musa muchitabu cha malagizu, na vamlota va Chapanga vayandiki mambu gaki, Yesu wa kuhuma kumuji wa Nazaleti mwana wa Yosefu.”
JOH 1:46 Natanyeli akamkota Filipi, “Chindu cha bwina chihotola wuli kuhumila ku Nazaleti?” Mwene akamjovela, “Bwelayi ulole.”
JOH 1:47 Yesu peamuwene Natanyeli akumbwelela, akajova, “Lola! Chakaka mwenuyu ndi Mwiisilaeli chakaka, kawaka udese mugati yaki hati padebe.”
JOH 1:48 Natanyeli akamkota Yesu, “Unimanyi wuli?” “Mwene akamyangula, kwakona Filipi angakukemela nakuwene pewavi pahi pa mkongo wa mkuyu.”
JOH 1:49 Penapo Natanyeli akamjovela, “Muwula,” Veve ndi Mwana wa Chapanga! “Veve ndi Nkosi wa Isilaeli!”
JOH 1:50 Yesu akamjovela usadika ndava nikujovili nakuwene pahi ya mkongo wa mkuyu? Yati ukugawona gavaha neju ya aga.
JOH 1:51 Ndi akayonjokesa kujova, “Chakaka nikuvajovela, yati mwilola kunani kwa Chapanga kudinduka na vamitumu va kunani kwa Chapanga vikwela na kuhelela panani pa Mwana wa Mundu.”
JOH 2:1 Ligono la datu kwavi na mselebuko kumuji wa Kana, mulima wa Galilaya, na nyina waki Yesu avili.
JOH 2:2 Yesu mewa agongoliwi kumselebuko pamonga na vawuliwa vaki.
JOH 2:3 Lukumbi divayi payamaliki, nyina waki akamjovela Yesu, “Divayi yimaliki!”
JOH 2:4 Yesu akamyangula, “Ukotoka kunijovela cha kuhenga. Lukumbi lwangu lwakona kuhika.”
JOH 2:5 Kangi, nyina wa Yesu akavajovela vanalihengu, “Chochoha cheakuvajovela, muhengayi.”
JOH 2:6 Penapo kwavili na vihulu sita ya kuvikila manji kwenuko, kila umonga weuhotola kumema madebe gavili amala gadatu ga manji. Yeyavikiwi penapo ndava ya mvelu wa Vayawudi kujinyambisa ndava ya kumuyupa Chapanga.
JOH 2:7 Yesu akavajovela, “Mumemesa manji muvihulu vyenivyo.” Vakagamemesa mbaka panani.
JOH 2:8 Kangi akavajovela, “Hinu mnegayi mumpelayi myimilila mselebuko, navene vakampelekela.”
JOH 2:9 Myimilila mselebuko peagawonjili manji gala akalola gang'amwiki kuvya divayi. Mwene nakumanya kweyahumili, nambu vala vatumisi vevanegili vamanyili. Myimilila mselebuko amkemili mkolo ndowa,
JOH 2:10 akamjovela, “Vandu voha vitendelekela hoti divayi yabwina na vandu vakanywayi neju, ndi vitendelekela yangali makakala yila, hinu veve uyivikili divayi ya bwina mbaka pamwishu!”
JOH 2:11 Chenicho chavi chinamtiti cha kutumbula cheachikitili Yesu ku Kana, pamulima wa Galilaya. Akalangisa ukulu waki, vawuliwa vaki ndi vakamsadika.
JOH 2:12 Pegamaliki ago, Yesu akawuka pamonga na nyina waki, na valongo vaki na vawuliwa vaki vahambili ku Kapelanaumu kwavatamili magono gadebe.
JOH 2:13 Mselebuko wa Vayawudi wewukemelewa Pasaka wavili papipi kuhika, Yesu akahamba ku Yelusalemu.
JOH 2:14 Hinu avakolili vandu Paluvanja lwa nyumba ya Chapanga, vagulisayi ng'ombi mambelele na ngunda, na vabadilisa mashonga vatamili mumeza zavi.
JOH 2:15 Ndi akabota mchapilu wa nyosi akavavinga voha kuvala ya Nyumba ya Chapanga vene pamonga na ng'ombi na mambelele gavi, kangi akapechengana mashonga gavi akazibilindusa meza zavi.
JOH 2:16 Akavajovela vevagulisa ngunda vala, “Muwusa vindu vyenivi. Mkotokayi kukita nyumba ya Dadi wangu kuvya pandu pa kugulisa na kugula vindu!”
JOH 2:17 Vawuliwa vaki vakumbwiki kuvya Mayandiku Gamsopi gijova “Mwe! Chapanga uganu wangu kwa nyumba yaku ukunitinyisa mugati yangu ngati motu.”
JOH 2:18 Vayawudi vangi vakamkota Yesu, “Wu, ulangisu woki yati wikita kulangisa una uhotola wa kukita genago?”
JOH 2:19 Yesu akavayangula, “Mgwisa Nyumba Chapanga iyi, na nene yati nijenga kangi mu magono gadatu.”
JOH 2:20 Penapo Vayawudi vamkotili, “Wihotola wuli kujenga mu magono gadatu? Ndava nyumba ya Chapanga iyi yijengiwi mulukumbi lwa miyaka alobaini na sita!”
JOH 2:21 Nambu Nyumba ya Chapanga Yesu yeailongelelayi ndi higa yaki.
JOH 2:22 Hinu, peayukisiwi, vawuliwa vaki vakumbwiki kuvya ajovili ago, vakagasadika Mayandiku Gamsopi na malovi Yesu geavajovili.
JOH 2:23 Yesu peavi ku Yelusalemu kumselebuko wa Pasaka, vandu vamahele vamsadiki pavauwene ulangisu weavakitili.
JOH 2:24 Nambu Yesu avasadiki lepi vandu avo muni avamanyili voha.
JOH 2:25 Aganili lepi kujovewa chochoha ndava ya vandu, muni mwene agamanyili bwina mambu gegavi mumitima yavi.
JOH 3:1 Kwavi na chilongosi mmonga Myawudi wa chikundi cha Vafalisayu, liina laki Nikodemu.
JOH 3:2 Ligono limonga kimihi Nikodemu amhambalili Yesu akamjovela, “Muwula, tikumanyii ngati veve muwula mweutumwili kuhuma kwa Chapanga, muni kawaka mundu mweihotola kukita ulangisu weukita changali kuvya na Chapanga.”
JOH 3:3 Yesu akamjovela, “Chakaka nikujovela, mundu ngati avelekiwi lepi kavili ihotola lepi kulola Unkosi wa Chapanga.”
JOH 3:4 Nikodemu akamkota, “Wu, mundu mvaha yihotoleka kuvelekewa kavili? Yihotoleka lepi kuyingila mulileme la nyina waki na kuvelekewa kavili.”
JOH 3:5 Yesu akamyangula, “Chakaka nikukujovela,” Mundu ngati avelekiwi lepi kwa manji na kwa Mpungu Msopi katu nakuhotola kuyingila mu Unkosi wa Chapanga.
JOH 3:6 Mundu ivelekewa chihiga kwa dadi na mau, nambu ivelekewa chimpungu kwa Mpungu Msopi.
JOH 3:7 Ukotoka kukangacha kuvya nijovili yikumgana mundu kuvelekewa kavili.
JOH 3:8 Chimbungululu chibuma, kuhamba kwechigana wiyuwana chibuma, nambu wimanya lepi kwe chihuma amala kwe chihamba. Mewawa kwa kila mundu mweavelekiwi kwa Mpungu Msopi.
JOH 3:9 Nikodemu akamkota, “Mambu genaga gihotoleka wuli?”
JOH 3:10 Yesu akamyangula, “Veve muwula wa vandu va Isilaeli nakugamanya mambu aga?
JOH 3:11 Chakaka nikujovela, tete tijova getikugamanya na tikuvajovela vandu vindu vyetiviwene, nambu nyenye nakuyidakila ujumbi witu.
JOH 3:12 Nivajovili mambu ga pamulima nakusadika, hinu mwihotola wuli kusadika nikavajovela mambu ga kunani kwa Chapanga?
JOH 3:13 Kawaka mundu mwahambili kunani kwa Chapanga, nambu Mwana wa Mundu ndi mweahelili kuhuma kunani kwa Chapanga.”
JOH 3:14 Ngati Musa cheanyakwili Liyoka la Shaba panani ya ndonga kulugangatu kula, mewa na Mwana wa Mundu yati inyakuliwa kunani,
JOH 3:15 muni kila mundu mweakumsadika yati ivya na wumi wa magono goha gangali mwishu.
JOH 3:16 Muni Chapanga avaganili neju vandu va mulima hati amuwusili Mwana waki ngamwene yuyo, muni yoyoha mwaisadika akotoka kuyaga ndi avyayi na wumi wa magono goha.
JOH 3:17 Chapanga amtumili lepi Mwana waki pamulima ndava ya kuvahamula vandu, nambu kuvasangula.
JOH 3:18 Mweakumsadika Mwana ihamuliwa lepi, nambu mwangamsadika amali kuhamuliwa, ndava amsadiki lepi, nga Mwana yuyo wa Chapanga.
JOH 3:19 Na uhamula wene ndi uwu, lumuli lubwelili pamulima nambu vandu vaganili chitita kuliku lumuli, muni matendu gavi gahakau.
JOH 3:20 Mundu yoyoha mweikita gahakau angalugana lumuli, mewa ibwela lepi kulumuli, muni igana lepi matendu gaki gahakau galangalayi.
JOH 3:21 Nambu mundu yeyoha mweilanda gachakaka ibwela kulumuli muni matendu gaki galolekanayi, gahengiki kwa kumyidakila Chapanga.
JOH 3:22 Pegamaliki genago, Yesu na vawuliwa vaki vakahamba kumulima wa Yudea, akatama navu kwenuko na kubatiza vandu.
JOH 3:23 Mewawa Yohani avi mukubatiza vandu ku Ainoni, papipi na ku Salemu, muni kwenuko kwavi na manji gamahele vandu vamhambalili, mwene akavabatiza.
JOH 3:24 Genaga gahumalili lukumbi Yohani peavi angasopewa muchifungu.
JOH 3:25 Ukahumila muhutanu pagati ya vawuliwa va Yohani na myawudi mmonga ndava ya mvelu wa kunyambiswa ndava ya kumuyupa Chapanga.
JOH 3:26 Hinu, vawuliwa avo vakamhambila Yohani na kumjovela “Muwula mundu yula mwewavili nayu kumwambu ya Yoludani, yula veve mwewatijovili malovi gaki, hinu namwene ibatiza na vandu voha vakumlanda!”
JOH 3:27 Yohani akavayangula, “Mundu ihotola lepi kuvya na chindu ngati angapewa na Chapanga.
JOH 3:28 Nyenye mwavene mumanyili kuvya najovili, ‘Nene lepi Kilisitu Msangula, nambu natumiwi nimlongolela.’
JOH 3:29 Mdala wa ndowa ndi waki mkolo ndowa, nambu nkozi wa mkolo ndowa mweiyima kumyuwanila iheka neju kuyuwana mkolo ndowa ijova. Mewa nene nisangalwiki neju.
JOH 3:30 Yesu yikumgana avyayi mkulu na nene nivyayi namdebe.”
JOH 3:31 Mweibwela kuhuma kunani kwa Chapanga ndi mkulu kuliku voha, mweihuma pamulima ndi wa pamulima, na ilongela mambu ga pamulima. Nambu mweibwela kuhuma kunani ndi ilongosa vindu vyoha.
JOH 3:32 Mwene ijova gala geagawene na kuyuwana, nambu kawaka mundu mweiyidakila ujumbi waki.
JOH 3:33 Nambu mundu yoyoha mweiyidakila ujumbi waki ndi ijova Chapanga ndi mchakaka.
JOH 3:34 Ndava yula mweatumwili na Chapanga ijova malovi ga Chapanga, ndava Chapanga ammemisi mundu mwenuyo Mpungu Msopi.
JOH 3:35 Dadi amganili Mwana na amgotolili vindu vyoha.
JOH 3:36 Mweakumsadika Mwana avi na wumi wa magono goha gangali mwishu, nambu angamsadika Mwana avi lepi na wumi, nambu ligoga la Chapanga likumtamila.
JOH 4:1 Vafalisayu vayuwini kuvya Yesu avi mukupata vawuliwa vamahele na kuvabatiza kuliku Yohani.
JOH 4:2 Ndi chakaka kuvya Yesu mwene abatiza lepi, nambu vawuliwa vaki ndi vevabatizayi vandu.
JOH 4:3 Hinu Yesu peagayuwini genago, akawuka ku Yudea na kuwuya ku Galilaya.
JOH 4:4 Mulugendu lwenulo yamganili kuvedukila kumulima wa Samaliya.
JOH 4:5 Ndi peahikili muji umonga pamulima wa Samaliya weukemiwa Sikali, papipi na mgunda wa Yakobo weampelilli mwana waki, mweikemiwa Yosefu.
JOH 4:6 Pandu penapo pavi na chiliva cha Yakobo, na Yesu ndava ya kutotokela na lugendu, akatama pamuhana ya chiliva. Yavili ngati lukumbi lwa muhi.
JOH 4:7 Kangi, akabwela mdala mmonga mkolonjinji wa ku Samaliya kunega manji. Yesu akamjovela, “Nipelayi manji ninywayi.”
JOH 4:8 Lukumbi lwenulo vawuliwa vaki vahambili kumuji kugula chakulya.
JOH 4:9 Nambu mdala yula akamjovela, “Veve wa Myawudi, na nene namdala msamaliya! Uhotola wuli kuniyupa manji?” Muni Vayawudi na Vasamaliya katu vitama lepi pamonga.
JOH 4:10 Yesu akamyangula, “Ngati kuvya umanyayi chindu chechiwusiwa na Chapanga ndi yani mweakukujovela, ‘nipelayi manji ninywai,’ Ngawamali, kumuyupa manji gegileta wumi.”
JOH 4:11 Mdala yula akamjovela, “Bambu, veve wangali ndeve ya kunegela manji, na chiliva chinyoliki. Ugapata koki manji gegavi na wumi?
JOH 4:12 Wu, veve ukujikita wa mkulu kuliku dadi witu Yakobo? Mwene ndi mweatipelili chiliva ichi, mwene na vana vaki pamonga na mifuya yaki vanywayi manji ga chiliva ichi.”
JOH 4:13 Yesu akamyangula, “Yoyoha mweinywa manji aga yati ivya na njota kavili.
JOH 4:14 Nambu yoyoha mweinywa manji gala genikumpela nene, katu ivya lepi na njota magono goha. Manji genikumpela givya mugati yaki ngati chinyepa cha manji ga wumi na kumpela wumi wa magono goha gangali mwishu.”
JOH 4:15 Mdala mwenuyo akamjovela, “Bambu, unipela manji genago muni nikotoka kuvya na njota kavili na nikotoka kubwela penapa kunega manji.”
JOH 4:16 Yesu akamjovela, “Uhamba ukamkemela mngwana waku, ubwela nayu penapa.”
JOH 4:17 Mdala yula akayangula, “Nene nangali mgosi.” Yesu akamjovela “Uyangwili chakaka, wangali mgosi.
JOH 4:18 Muni wavi na vagosi mhanu, na mgosi mweutama nayu hinu mgosi waku lepi. Penapo ujovili chakaka.”
JOH 4:19 Mdala yula akamjovela, “Bambu, niwona kuvya veve wa mlota wa Chapanga.
JOH 4:20 Vagogo vitu vamufugamila Chapanga kuchitumbi ichi, nambu nyenye mwijova kuvya pandu pa kumuyupila Chapanga ndi ku Yelusalemu.”
JOH 4:21 Yesu akamjovela “Unisadika chenijova lwalabwela lukumbi nakumfugamila Dadi, panani ya chitumbi amala ku Yelusalemu kula.
JOH 4:22 Nyenye Vasamaliya mukumfugamila yula mwangammanya, nambu tete tikumfugamila yula mwetimumanyili, ndava muni usangula wihuma kwa Vayawudi.
JOH 4:23 Nambu lukumbi lubwela, kangi lumali kubwela ndi vala vandu vevakumfugamila kwa uchakaka, yati vamfugamila Dadi mukulongoswa na Mpungu Msopi na chakaka. Muni dadi akuvagana vandu vamfugamila chenicho.
JOH 4:24 Chapanga ndi Mpungu na vandu vevamfugamila yikuvagana vamfugamila Dadi mukulongoswa na Mpungu Msopi na kuumanya uchakaka.”
JOH 4:25 Mdala yula akamjovela, “Nimanyili kuvya Msangula mweikemiwa Kilisitu ibwela. Peibwela yati akutimanyisa tete kila chindu.”
JOH 4:26 Yesu akamjovela, “Nene mwenilongela na veve ndi mwene.”
JOH 4:27 Bahapo vawuliwa vaki vakawuya, na kukangasa neju pavamuweni ilongela na mdala. Nambu kawaka mundu mweajovili, “Ugana kyani?” Amala, “Ndava kyani wilongela na mdala?”
JOH 4:28 Hinu, mdala yula akachileka chihulu chaki palapala na kuhamba kumuji na kuvajovela vandu,
JOH 4:29 “Mbwela mukamlola mundu mweanijovili mambu goha genikitili! Wu, yihotoleka kuvya ndi Kilisitu Msangula?”
JOH 4:30 Vandu vakawuka kumuji na kumuhambila Yesu.
