JOH 18:38 Pilatu akamkota, “Uchakaka ndi chindu kiki?” Pilatu peamali kujova ago, akavahambila kavili vachilongosi va Chiyawudi kuvala, “Akavajovela nene nichiwene lepi chindu cheabudili.
JOH 18:39 Nambu ndi mvelu winu nene kuvadindulila, muchifungu mundu mmonga lukumbi lwa Pasaka. Hinu mwigana nivadindulila Nkosi wa Vayawudi?”
JOH 18:40 Penapo vakayangula. “Mwe! Lepi mwenuyo mdindulila Balaba!” Balaba avi mundu mweinyaga vandu vindu.
JOH 19:1 Kangi, Pilatu akalagiza vamtola Yesu na kumtova michapilu.
JOH 19:2 Vala manjolinjoli vakabota njingwa ya minga, vakamuwalika kumutu, vakamuwalika nyula ya chinkosi langi ya zambalau.
JOH 19:3 Vakavya kumbwelela palongolo yaki na kujova, “Tikuwoni, Nkosi wa Vayawudi!” Kuni vakumpamanda.
JOH 19:4 Pilatu akahuma kuvala kavili, akaujovela msambi wula, “Lola, nikumgotola mundu uyu kwinu, muhotola kumanya kuvya nene nichiwene lepi chindu chochoha cheabudili cha kumuhamula.”
JOH 19:5 Hinu, Yesu, akahuma kuvala kuni awalili njingwa ya minga na nyula ya chinkosi. Pilatu akavajovela, “Mlola! Mundu mwene ndi uyu.”
JOH 19:6 Vakulu va kuteta na valonda pavamuwene vakayangula. “Mvambayi pamsalaba! Mvambayi pamsalaba!” Pilatu akavajovela. “Mwavene mumtola hinu, mukamvamba muni nene nichiweni lepi chindu cheabudili.”
JOH 19:7 Vayawudi vakamyangula, “Tavete tivii nagu Malagizu, na malagizu gitu gijova, yikumgana afwayi, ndava mwene ajidetekisi kuvya Mwana wa Chapanga.”
JOH 19:8 Pilatu peagayuwini malovi ago, akayogopa neju.
JOH 19:9 Kangi Pilatu akayingila munyumba ya unkosi, akamkota Yesu, “Veve uhumili koki?” Nambu Yesu amyangwili lepi chindu.
JOH 19:10 Pilatu akamjovela, “Wu, wibela kulongela na nene? Wu, umanyi lepi kuvya nene nihotola kukudindulila na nihotola kulagiza uvambiwa pamsalaba?”
JOH 19:11 Yesu akamyangula, “Ngauvi lepi na uhotola panani yangu changali kupewa na Chapanga. Ndava yeniyo yula mweaniletili kwaku ambudili neju.”
JOH 19:12 Kutumbula penapo, Pilatu alonda njila ya kumlekekesa Yesu, nambu Vayawudi vakaywanga. “Ngati umlekekisi mundu uyu, veve nkozi lepi wa nkosi wa ku Loma, mundu yoyoha mweajikita kuvya nkosi akumpinga nkosi mkulu wa Loma!”
JOH 19:13 Hinu, Pilatu peayuwini malovi ago akamuhumisa Yesu kuvala, akatama pachigoda cha uhamula, pandu pepikemelewa “Luvanja lwelutengenizwi kwa maganga.” Amala kwa Chiebulania Gabata.
JOH 19:14 Yavi lukumbi lwa muhi, ligono la kutendelekela Pasaka. Pilatu akavajovela Vayawudi, “nkosi winu ndi uyu!”
JOH 19:15 Vene vakaywanga, “Mkomayi! Mkomayi! Mvambayi pamsalaba?” Pilatu akavakota, “Wu, nimvamba pamsalaba nkosi winu?” Vakulu va kuteta vakayangula, “Tete tivii lepi na nkosi yungi nambu nga nkosi wa ku Loma!”
JOH 19:16 Hinu, Pilatu akamgotola Yesu mumawoko gavi muni vamvambayi pamsalaba. Manjolinjoli, vakamtola Yesu.
JOH 19:17 Yesu akahuma kuni agegili msalaba waki, mbaka pandu pepikemelewa “Libangu la Mutu.” Kwa Chiebulania pikemelewa Goligota.
JOH 19:18 Penapo ndi pavamvambili pamsalaba, na pamonga nayu vavavambili pamisalaba yavi vandu vangi vavili mmonga upandi wa kulyela na yungi upandi wa kumangeya, Yesu ndi pagati yavi.
JOH 19:19 Pilatu akayandika likokoso pachibau akakivika panani ya msalaba, akayandika, “Yesu Mnazaleti Nkosi wa Vayawudi.”
JOH 19:20 Hinu, Vayawudi vamahele vasomili likokoso ilo, muni pandu peavambiwi Yesu pamsalaba pavi papipi na muji. Kangi likokoso lenilo layandikwi kwa Chiebulania na Chilatini na Chigiliki.
JOH 19:21 Hinu, Vakulu va kuteta vakamjovela Pilatu, “Kotoka kuyandika. ‘Nkosi wa Vayawudi,’ Nambu mundu uyu ajovili kuvya, ‘Nene ndi Nkosi wa Vayawudi.’”
JOH 19:22 Pilatu akayangula, “Geniyandiki gala nimali, kuyandika!”
JOH 19:23 Manjolinjoli pevamali kumvamba Yesu pamsalaba, vakazitola nyula zaki, vakavika malundu mcheche, kila mmonga na lilundu laki. Mewawa vakatola na lijoho laki la unkosi, lijoho ilo labotiwi kwa chipandi chimonga ndu, changali kutotewa.
JOH 19:24 Manjolinjoli vala, vakajovesana. “Tikotoka kuyipapula, muni titova kula yati livya la yani.” Lijambu lenili lahengiki muni Mayandiku Gamsopi gegijova, “Vagavini nyula zangu, Na nyula yangu vakayitovela kula.” Ndi, chevahengili vala manjolinjoli.
JOH 19:25 Papipi na msalaba wa Yesu vayimili nyina waki Yesu, na mlumbu wa nyina waki na Maliya mdala wa Kileopa, na Maliya Magidala.
JOH 19:26 Yesu peamuwene nyina waki, na papipi yaki ayimili muwuliwa yula mweamganili, akamjovela nyina waki. “Mau, Lola, mwenuyo ndi mwana waku.”
JOH 19:27 Kangi akamjovela muwuliwa yula. “Lola, mwenuyo ndi nyina waku.” Na kutumbula lukumbi lula muwuliwa yula akamtola atama kunyumba yaki.
JOH 19:28 Yesu amanyili kuvya goha gamali kutimila, muni Mayandiku Gamsopi gatimilayi, akajova, “Niyuana njota.”
JOH 19:29 Penapo pavi na nkele weumemili divayi yivavanu. Hinu vakajwiga litonji mudivayi yivavanu vakavika mulungoda lwa mkongo weukemiwa hisopo, vakamvikila pamlomo.
JOH 19:30 Yesu peamali kupewa divayi yivavanu yila, akajova, “Goha gatimili!” Kangi akagundama mutu, akafwa.
JOH 19:31 Yavi ijumaa, ligono la kutendelekeha. Ndava muni, higa yikoto kutama pamsalaba Ligono la Kupumulila, muni ligono ilo lavi likulu kwa Vayawudi. Hinu vachilongosi va Vayawudi vakamuyupa Pilatu, magendelu ga vala vevavambiwi pamsalaba gadenyewayi na higa zavi ziwusiwayi.
JOH 19:32 Manjolinjoli vakahamba, vakayidenya magendelu ga mundu wa upandi wa kumangeya na yula wa upandi wa kulyela vevavambiwi pamisalaba pamonga na Yesu vala.
JOH 19:33 Nambu pavamhikili Yesu vamkoli amali kufwa, ndi vamdenyili lepi magendelu.
JOH 19:34 Nambu mmonga wavi amuhomili Yesu muluvafu na mgoha, bahapo yikahuma ngasi na manji.
JOH 19:35 Mwene yula mwealoli lijambu lenilo, alijovili muni na nyenye musadika. Na aga geajovili ndi uchakaka, kavili mwene imanya kuvya ijova chakaka.
JOH 19:36 Lijambu lenili lahengiki muni Mayandiku Gamsopi gatimila. “Kawaka hati lijege laki limonga lelidenyewa.”
JOH 19:37 Mewawa Mayandiku Gamsopi gijova. “Vakumlola yula mwevamuhomili.”
JOH 19:38 Pagamaliki genago, Yosefu mkolonjinji wa Alimatei, akamuyupa Pilatu kuyihulusa higa ya Yesu kuhuma pamsalaba. Yosefu avi mulanda waki Yesu, nambu chamfiyu, muni ayogwipi vachilongosi wa Vayawudi. Ndi Pilatu akamyidakila, Yosefu ahambili kuyiwusa higa ya Yesu.
JOH 19:39 Yosefu alongosini na Nikodemu, mweamuhambili Yesu kimihi, akabwela agegili mahuta gegikemelewa manemane gegahangisini na ubani vibaba selasini.
JOH 19:40 Hinu voha vavili vakayitola higa ya Yesu, na kuyitindisila nyula ya msopi pamonga na mahuta ago ngati cheyavili mivelu ya Vayawudi pakuvika higa mulitinda.
JOH 19:41 Pandu pala pevamvambili Yesu pamsalaba, pavi na lidimba palidimba lenilo pavi na litinda la mupya lelavi lakona kumvika mundu yoyoha mugati yaki.
JOH 19:42 Ndava ya mahengu ga Vayawudi ga kutendelekeha Ligono la Kupumulila, ndava litinda lenilo lavi papipi vakamuvika Yesu mwenumo.
JOH 20:1 Lukela hamba kucha Dominika, kwakona chitita, Maliya mkolonjinji wa Magidala akahamba kulitinda, na kulola liganga liwusiwi pamlyangu wa litinda.
JOH 20:2 Hinu, akajumba kuhamba kwa Simoni Petili na yula muwuliwa yungi, Yesu mwamganili, akavajovela, “Vamuwusili Bambu mulitinda, nakumanya kwevamvikili.”
JOH 20:3 Petili na muwuliwa yungi yula vakahamba kulitinda.
JOH 20:4 Voha vavili, vakajumba kuhamba, yungi yula ajumbili kanyata neju kuliku Petili, akalongolela kuhika kulitinda.
JOH 20:5 Peagundimi na kulingulila, ayiwene nyula ya msopi, nambu nakuyingila mugati.
JOH 20:6 Simoni Petili namwene, akabwela akumulanda akayingila mu litinda, mwenumo ayiwene nyula za msopi zila,
JOH 20:7 chitambala chevamtindisili Yesu kumutu chila. Chitambala chenicho nakuvikwa pamonga na nyula ya msopi yeniyo, muni chagunyiwi na kuvikwa pandu pene.
JOH 20:8 Kangi muwuliwa yungi yula mwealongolili kuhika kulitinda, akayingila mugati akalola na kusadika.
JOH 20:9 Vavi vakona kumanya, Mayandiku Gamsopi gegijova Yamganili kuyuka.
JOH 20:10 Hinu, Vawuliwa vala vakawuya kunyumba.
JOH 20:11 Maliya ayimili kuvala ya litinda, kuni ivemba. Na peayendalili kuvemba, avi mukugundama na kulingulila mu litinda,
JOH 20:12 avawene Vamitumu va kunani kwa Chapanga vavili vevawalili nyula za msopi vatamili pala peyavili higa ya Yesu mmonga kumutu na yungi kumagendelu.
JOH 20:13 Vamitumu vala vakamkota, “Mau, ndava kyani wivemba?” “Maliya akavajovela, vamtoli Bambu wangu nakumanya kwevamvikili!”
JOH 20:14 Maliya peamalili kujova genago, ang'anamwiki mumbele, amuwene Yesu ayimili penapo, nambu amanyili lepi kuvya ndi Yesu.
JOH 20:15 Yesu akamkota, “Mau, ndava kyani uvemba? Ukumlonda yani?” Maliya, akahololela kuvya mwenuyo myimilila lidimba, akamjovela, “Mtopeswa, ngati veve umtolili nijovela kweumvikili, na nene yati nikumtola.”
JOH 20:16 Yesu akamjovela, “Maliya!” Mwene Maliya akang'anamuka, akamjovela kwa Chiebulania, “Laboni.” Mana yaki “Muwula.”
JOH 20:17 Yesu akamjovela, “Kotoka kunikamula, nakona kuhamba kunani kwa Dadi. Nambu hamba kwa valongo vangu uvajovela, nihamba kunani kwa Dadi wangu na Dadi winu, Chapanga wangu na Chapanga winu.”
JOH 20:18 Maliya wa Magidala, akahamba kuvajovela mambu gala vawuliwa, kuvya amuwene Bambu, ndi amjovili genago.
JOH 20:19 Yavili kimihi ya ligono lenilo la Dominika. Vawuliwa vakonganiki pamonga mugati ya nyumba, kuni milyangu yavi yidindiwi, ndava ya kuvayogopa vachilongosi va Vayawudi. Yesu akabwela, akayima pagati yavi, akavajovela, “Uteke uvya na nyenye!”
JOH 20:20 Peamali kujova genago, akavalangisa mawoko gaki na luvafu lwaki. Ndi vawuliwa venavo vakasangaluka neju kumlola Bambu.
JOH 20:21 Yesu akavajovela kavili, “Uteke uvya na nyenye! Ngati Dadi cheanitumili nene, na nene nikuvatuma nyenye.”
JOH 20:22 Peamali kujova genago, akavapulila na kuvajovela, “Mpokela Mpungu Msopi.
JOH 20:23 Vandu vemukuvalekekesa kumbudila Chapanga kwavi, yati vilekekeswa, na vandu mwavangalekekesa, yati vilekekeswa lepi.”
JOH 20:24 Tomasi mmonga wa vawuliwa kumi na vavili vala, mweikemiwa mapaha, avi lepi pamonga nawu lukumbi Yesu peabweli.
JOH 20:25 Vawuliwa vangi vala, vakamjovela, “Timuwene Bambu.” Tomasi akavajovela, “Ngati nakugawona mavamba ga misumali mu mawoko gaki na kuvika lukonji lwangu mu mavamba ago na kuvika chiwoko changu muluvafu lwaki, yati nisadika lepi.”
JOH 20:26 Magono nane gegagelekili, vawuliwa vavi pamonga mugati mula, na Tomasi namwene avi. Milyangu yavi hidindiwi, nambu Yesu akabwela, akayima pagati yavi, akajova, “Uteke uvya na nyenye!”
JOH 20:27 Kangi akamjovela Tomasi, “Vika lukonji lwaku ulola mawoko gangu, leta chiwoko chaku mu luvafu lwangu. Leka mtahu, nambu usadikayi!”
JOH 20:28 Tomasi akamyangula, “Bambu wangu na Chapanga wangu!”
JOH 20:29 Yesu akavajovela, “Ndava uniwene nene ndi usadiki, vamotisiwa vala vanganiwona nambu vanisadiki.”
JOH 20:30 Yesu akitili gachinamtiti gangi gamahele, palongolo ya vawuliwa vaki, nambu gayandikwi lepi muchitabu ichi.
JOH 20:31 Nambu zenizi zeziyandikwi, muni mpata kusadika kuvya Yesu ndi Kilisitu Msangula, Mwana wa Chapanga, ndava ya kusadika mpata na wumi kwa liina laki.
JOH 21:1 Pagamaliki genago, Yesu akavahumila kavili vawuliwa vaki pamuhana ya nyanja Tibelia. Avahumili naha,
JOH 21:2 Simoni Petili, Tomasi mweikemewa Mapaha, na Natanyeli mkolonjinji wa Kana ya ku Galilaya, vana vavili va Zebedayo na vawuliwa vaki vangi vavili, vakavya voha pamonga.
JOH 21:3 Simoni Petili akavajovela, “Nihamba kulova somba.” Vene vakamjovela, “Tete tilongosana na veve.” Vakahamba, vakakwela muwatu, nambu kilu yila nakupata chindu.
JOH 21:4 Hamba kucha, Yesu ayimili kumwambu ya nyanja, nambu vawuliwa vamanyili lepi kuvya avi Yesu.
JOH 21:5 Yesu akavakota, “Vankozi, mupatili lepi somba?” Vakamyangula, “Lepi! Kawaka.”
JOH 21:6 Yesu akavajovela, “Muhelesa ngwanda upandi wa kulyela wa watu na nyenye yati mwipata somba.” Ndi vakazihelesa ngwanda, nambu hinu nakuhotola kuhuta kavili ndava ya somba zamahele.
JOH 21:7 Kangi muwuliwa yula, Yesu mweamganili neju, akamjovela Petili, “Ndi Bambu!” Simoni Petili peayuwini kuvya ndi Bambu, akajikunga nyula yaki ya kuvala muni ahulili, akajitaga mumanji.
JOH 21:8 Nambu vawuliwa vangi vala vabwelili kumbwani na watu kuni vihuta ngwanda zezimemili somba, vavi lepi kutali na pandumba, ndi vavi utali wa mita miya yimonga kuhuma mu mkingisa.
JOH 21:9 Pavahikili pandumba wauwene motu wa makalakala, wiyaka, na panani yaki pavikiwi somba na libumunda.
JOH 21:10 Yesu akavajovela, “Mgava somba zingi mleta penapa zemlovili.”
JOH 21:11 Simoni Petili akayingila muwatu, akahuta mbaka kundumba ngwanda yila yeyimemili somba zivaha miya yimonga na makumi mhanu na zidatu. Pamonga wamemili somba zamahele, nambu ngwanda yadawiki lepi.
JOH 21:12 Yesu akavajovela “Mbwela mlawuka.” Kawaka hati mmonga wavi. Mwealingili kumkota. “Veve ndi wayani,” Vammanyili kuvya Bambu.
JOH 21:13 Yesu akabwela, akatola, libumunda akavapela, akakita mewawa na somba zila.
JOH 21:14 Yeniyi yavi mala ya datu Yesu kuvahumila vawuliwa vaki peamali kuyuka.
JOH 21:15 Pevamali kulya, Yesu akamkota Simoni Petili, “Simoni mwana wa Yohani! Wu, ukunigana nene kuliku ava?” Mwene akayangula, “Ena, Bambu, umanyili kuvya nene nikukugana.” Yesu akamjovela, “Dima vana mambelele vangu.”
JOH 21:16 Kavili akamjovela, “Simoni mwana wa Yohani! Wu, ukunigana?” Petili akamyangula, “Ena, Bambu, umanyili kuvya nikukugana.” Yesu akamjovela “Dima mambelele gangu.”
JOH 21:17 Yesu akamkota mala ya datu, “Simoni mwana wa Yohani! Wu, ukunigana?” Penapo Petili akavya ngolongondi ndava amkotili mala ya datu. “Ukunigana?” Akamjovela, “Bambu, wamwene umanyili kila chindu, umanyili kuvya nene nikukugana.” Yesu akamjovela, “Dima mambelele gangu!
JOH 21:18 Chakaka nikukujovela, pawavi msongolo wayovalili kujitendelekeha wamwene na kuhamba kwewigana. Nambu pawivya mgogolo wiyinula mawoko gaku, mundu yungi ndi yati akukunga na kuhamba kwe wangagana kuhamba.”
JOH 21:19 Yesu ajovili genago, kulangisa namuna Petili cheifwa na kumpela ukulu Chapanga. Kangi akamjovela Petili, “Nilanda.”
JOH 21:20 Petili akang'anamuka, amuwene muwuliwa yula mweaganiwi na Yesu, akumlanda mweneuyo ndi yula mweatamili papipi neju na Yesu lukumbi pevalyayi na kumkota, “Bambu ndi yani mweakukung'anamukila?”
JOH 21:21 Hinu, Petili peamuwene mwenuyo, akamkota Yesu, “Bambu, mundu uyu chikumuhumila kyani?”
JOH 21:22 Yesu akayangula, “Ngati nigana asigalila mbaka penibwela, chikuvala kyani? Veve unilanda nene.”
JOH 21:23 Malovi ago, gadandasiki pagati ya valongo vevakumsadika Kilisitu kuvya muwuliwa mwenuyo yati ifwa lepi. Nambu Yesu amjovili lepi muwuliwa yula ifwa lepi, nambu ajovili, “Ngati nigana asigalila mbaka panibwela yikukuvala kyani?”
JOH 21:24 Mwenuyu ndi muwuliwa, mwealoli mambu ago na kugayandika. Tete timanyili ajovili chakaka.
JOH 21:25 Gavi mambu gangi gamahele geagahengili Yesu. Ngati goha ngagiyandikwayi, niholela hati mulima woha nakuvya pandu pa kuvika hitabu yeyiyandikwi. Ena.
ACT 1:1 Mlongo Teofili, muchitabu cha kutumbula nayandiki kugavala mambu goha, Yesu geagahengili na kugawula kwakona kutumbula lihengu laki,
ACT 1:2 mbaka ligono lila Yesu peatoliwi kunani kwa Chapanga. Avalagizi munjila ya Mpungu Msopi vamitumi vala veavahagwili.
ACT 1:3 Mulukumbi lwa magono alobaini kuhuma mulifwa laki, avahumalili pamahele kulangisa kuvya avi mumi. Vamuwene mwene alongili nawu ndava ya Unkosi wa Chapanga.
ACT 1:4 Lukumbi lwe akonganiki nawu pamonga avalagazili. “Mkotoka kuwuka pa Yelusalemu, ndi mlindila njombi yeavalagazili Dadi, yemmali kuniyuwana nilongela ndava yaki.
ACT 1:5 Yohani abatizi kwa manji, nambu magono gadebe gegigelekela, nyenye yati mbatiziwa kwa Mpungu Msopi.”
ACT 1:6 Vanalihengu pavakonganiki pamonga na Yesu, vakamkota, “Wu Bambu, lukumbi ulu ndi pawiwuyisa unkosi wula kwa Isilaeli?”
ACT 1:7 Nambu Yesu akavajovela, “Lusenje na lukumbi lwa mambu ago uvili pahi ya uhotola wa Dadi wangu, lihengu linu lepi kumanya yati givya ndali.
ACT 1:8 Nambu lukumbi Mpungu Msopi peakuvahelelela nyenye, ndi yati mwipokela makakala na kuvya mwemwijova ndava yangu pagati ya muji wa Yelusalemu pamulima woha wa ku Yudea na ku Samaliya, na hati pamwishu wa mulima.”
ACT 1:9 Peamali kujova genago, kuni voha vakumlolokesa, akatoliwa kunani kwa Chapanga, lihundi likamfiya vakotoka kumlola kavili.
ACT 1:10 Pevayendalili kulolokesa kunani, kuni mwene ihamba, bahapo vandu vavili vevawalili nyula za msopi vayimili papipi na vene,
ACT 1:11 vakajova, “Nyenye vandu va ku Galilaya! Ndava kyani myima kulolokesa kunani? Yesu mwenuyu mweatoliwi kuhuma kwinu, mewawa yati iwuya kavili ngati chemumuwene ihamba kunani kwa Chapanga.”
ACT 1:12 Kangi vamitumi vakawuya Yelusalemu kuhuma kuchitumbi chila chechikemelewa Mizeituni chechavili utali wa kilomita yimonga kuhuma kumujini.
ACT 1:13 Pavahikili pamuji vakakwela kugolofa kwevatamayi, vavi Petili na Yohani na Yakobo na Andelea na Filipi na Tomasi na Batolomei na Matei na Yakobo mwana wa Alufayo, Simoni Zeloti chikundi cha Vayawudi vevibela ulongosi wa Loma, na Yuda mwana wa Yakobo.
ACT 1:14 Voha ava vakakonganeka kumuyupa Chapanga, pamonga na vadala na Maliya nyina waki Yesu na valongo vaki.
ACT 1:15 Magono ago, Petili ayimili pagati ya valongo vamsadika vala vevakonganiki, voha vavi vandu miya yimonga na ishilini,
ACT 1:16 akajova, “Valongo vangu, yaganikiwi Mayandiku Gamsopi gatimilayi, pandu pala Mpungu Msopi, alotili mu malovi ga Daudi kumvala Yuda mweavalongwisi vala vevamkamwili Yesu.
ACT 1:17 Yuda avi mmonga wa chikundi chitu muni ahaguliwi kuhenga lihengu la chitumi pamonga na tete.”
ACT 1:18 Mwene agulili mgunda kwa mashonga geagapatili ndava ya kumng'anamukila Yesu, akagwa pahi na kupapuka, maleme gaki gakahuma kuvala.
ACT 1:19 Lijambu lenilo likayuwanikana kwa kila mundu wa Yelusalemu, hati kwa luga yavi vakaukemela mgunda wula Hakeli Dama, mana yaki “Mgunda wa Ngasi.”
ACT 1:20 Hinu yiyandikiwi muchitabu cha Zabuli, nyumba yaki yisigalila mang'ova, mundu yoyoha akotoka kutama mwenumo. Kangi yiyandikiwi. Mundu yungi atola pandu pa lihengu laki.
ACT 1:21 Ndi mundu mmonga pagati yinu, mwealandini na tete lukumbi lwoha Bambu Yesu peavi mulugendu pamonga na tete ahaguliwa kuwungana na tete,
ACT 1:22 mwenuyo yiganikiwa kuvya mmonga wa vala vevalandini na tete, kutumbula Yohani peavili mukubatiza mbaka ligono lila Yesu peatoliwi kuhuma kwitu kuhamba kunani kwa Chapanga. Mwenuyo ndi iwungana na tete kujova ndava ya kuyuka kwa Yesu.
ACT 1:23 Hinu, vakaluwula mahina gavili, wa mmonga Yosefu mweikemiwa Basaba mewa Yusto, na yungi Matia.
ACT 1:24 Kangi vakamuyupa Chapanga, “Bambu, veve ukiyimanya mitima ya vandu voha. Hinu utilangisa yani mwemhagwili pagati ya vavili ava,
ACT 1:25 muni atola pandu pa lihengu la chitumi lealekili Yuda, mwene awukili kuhamba pandu paki mwene.”
ACT 1:26 Vakamhagula na Matia ndi akahaguliwa mwene ayonjokeswa pagati ya vamitumi kumi na mmonga vala.
ACT 2:1 Ligono la Pentekoste palahikili vamsadika voha vakonganiki pandu pamonga.
ACT 2:2 Chighafula, lwami lukayuwanika kuhuma kunani ngati chimbungululu chivaha, chikamema nyumba yoha yevatamili.
ACT 2:3 Kangi, vikahumila vindu vyevyawonikini ngati lulimi lwa motu, lukalekengana na kutula panani ya kila mmonga wavi.
ACT 2:4 Voha vakamemeswa Mpungu Msopi na kutumbula kujova luga ndalindali ngati Mpungu cheavahotwisi.
ACT 2:5 Na ku Yelusalemu kwavi na Vayawudi, vandu vevakumtopesa Chapanga vevahumila kila likabila pamulima.
ACT 2:6 Pevayuwini lwami lula, msambi uvaha wa vandu ukakonganeka. Voha vakakenyemuka neju muni kila mmonga wavi avayuwini vandu vala vijova kwa luga yaki mwene.
ACT 2:7 Vakavya na chinamtiti na kukangasa vakajova, “Wu, ava vetikuvayuwana, lepi vakolonjinji va ku Galilaya!
ACT 2:8 Hinu, yivi wuli, tete kuvayuwana kila mmonga ijova kwa luga yaki mwene?
ACT 2:9 Pagati yitu vavi vandu kuhuma ku Paliti vangi ku Medi na vangi ku Elami na vangi vakolonjinji va Mesopotamia na Yudea na Kapodokia na Ponto na Asia,
ACT 2:10 Flugia na Pamfulia na Misili na vangi kuhuma Libiya papipi na Kulene na vangi vitu ndi vayehe kuhuma ku Loma,
ACT 2:11 Vayawudi na vangalikuvya Vayawudi, nambu vilanda njila ya kumuyupa Chapanga ya Vayawudi, vangi vahumili ku Kilete na Alabia. Tavete tikuvayuwana vijova kwa luga zitu ndi matendu gakulu ga Chapanga.”
ACT 2:12 Voha vakakangasa na kuvagaya kuni vikotana, “Yeniyi mana yaki kiki?”
ACT 2:13 Nambu vangi vakavavevesa vakajova, “Vandu ava vagalili ugimbi!”
ACT 2:14 Kangi Petili akayima pamonga na vamitumi kumi na mmonga vala akatumbula kuvakokosela vandu. Valongo Vayawudi na mwavoha nyenye mwemwitama ku Yelusalemu, myuwanila malovi gangu.
ACT 2:15 Lepi chemwihololela vandu ava vagalili muni ndi saa yidatu ya lukela.
ACT 2:16 Nambu lijambu lenili ndi chakaka lelalongaliki na Yoeli mweavili mlota wa Chapanga.
ACT 2:17 Bambu ijova, mumagono gala gamwishu, nikuvamemesa Mpungu wangu vandu voha, vana vinu vagosi na vadala yati vilota ulota wa Chapanga, vasongolo vinu yati vilola maono, na vagogo vinu yati vilota munjozi.
ACT 2:18 Ena, hati vatumisi vangu, voha vagosi na vadala, yati nikuvapela Mpungu wangu navene yati vilotela.
ACT 2:19 Yati nikita gachinamtiti kunani, na kukita milangisu pahi pamulima. Yati kwiva na ngasi, motu na lyohi litopanu.
ACT 2:20 Lilanga yati ligubikwa na chitita, na mwehi walavya mdung'u ngati ngasi, kwakona kuhumila ligono likulu la ukulu wa Bambu.
ACT 2:21 Mewawa mundu yoyoha mweiyupa kwa liina la Bambu yati isanguliwa.
ACT 2:22 “Vandu va Isilaeli myuwanila! Yesu wa ku Nazaleti avi mundu, uhotola waki wa uchapanga walangisi kwinu kwa gachinamtiti na makangaso na milangisu. Chapanga yeahengili kwa nyenye kwa njila yaki, ngati mwavene chemwimanya.
ACT 2:23 Ndava ya mpangu waki mwene Chapanga, amali kuhamula kuvya Yesu agotolewa kwa nyenye, na mwavene mwamkomili kwa kuvaleka vandu vahakau vamkoma na kumvamba mu msalaba.
ACT 2:24 Nambu Chapanga amyukisi kuhuma kwa vevafwili, amsangwili kuhuma mu mvinisu wa lifwa, ndava muni yihotoleka lepi lifwa limkunga.
ACT 2:25 Muni Daudi ajovili aga kumvala mwene, ‘Namuwene Bambu palongolo yangu lukumbi lwoha, avi pamonga na nene upandi wa kulyelela, hati ninyugusika lepi.
ACT 2:26 Ndi muni mtima wangu waganisiwi, na kululuta kwa luheku. Hati higa yangu, yati yitama kwa kuhuvalila,
ACT 2:27 Ndava nakuuleka mpungu wangu kulitinda, wala kumlekekesa Msopi waku awola.
ACT 2:28 Unilangisi njila za wumi, ndava ya kuvya kwaku unimemisi luheku.’”
ACT 2:29 “Valongo vangu, nigana kuvajovela hotohoto kumvala mambu gegampatili gogo witu Daudi. Mwene afwili na kuzikiwa na litinda laki livii kwitu mbaka lelu.
ACT 2:30 Nambu Daudi ndava avili mlota wa Chapanga amanyili kuvya Chapanga amlapakisi kwa lilaganu yati akumhagula mmonga wa chiveleku waki kuvya nkosi pahali paki.
ACT 2:31 Daudi agaweni kwakona mambu aga gegihengeka na Chapanga, hinu akajova ndava ya kuyuka kwa Kilisitu, lukumbi peajovili, ‘Nakulekewa mu litinda la mbugu, higa yaki yawoli lepi.’
ACT 2:32 Chapanga amyukisi Yesu na tavoha tete ndi vetijova ndava ya lijambu lenilo.
ACT 2:33 Yesu peamali kukweswa na kuvikwa upandi wa kulyelela wa Chapanga ndi akapokela kuhuma kwa Dadi, Mpungu Msopi yula mweatiahidi, atimemimisi Mpungu wene. Chenicho ndi chetikuchiwona hinu na kuyuwana.
ACT 2:34 Muni Daudi nakukwela mbaka kunani kwa Chapanga, muni ngamwene ajovili, ‘Bambu amjovili Bambu wangu, tama upandi wangu wa kulyela,
ACT 2:35 mbaka penikuvavika makoko gaku kuvya chigoda cha kuvikila magendelu gaku.’”
ACT 2:36 “Vandu voha va Isilaeli viganikiwa kumanya kwa uchakaka kuvya Yesu mwenuyo mwevamkomili na kumvamba mu msalaba, ndi Chapanga amviki kuvya Bambu na Kilisitu.”
ACT 2:37 Hinu, vandu pavagayuwini genago, mitima yawavinili, vakavakota Petili na pamonga na vamitumi vayaki. “Valongo vitu tikita wuli?”
ACT 2:38 Petili akavayangula, “Mumuwuyila Chapanga na kila mmonga winu abatiziwa kwa liina la Yesu Kilisitu, muni mulekekesewayi kubumdila Chapanga na kupokela njombi yila ya Mpungu Msopi.
ACT 2:39 Muni lilaganu lila lavi ndava yinu na ndava ya vana vinu na ndava ya voha vevitama kutali ndava ya kila mundu mweikemiwa na Bambu Chapanga witu.”
ACT 2:40 Kwa malovi gangi gamahele, Petili avajovili hotohoto vandu “Vajisangula na chiveleku ichi chihakau.”
ACT 2:41 Vamahele pagati yavi vagasadiki malovi ga Petili na kubatiziwa, na vandu vevayonjokisiki vavi ngati elufu zidatu ligono lenilo.
ACT 2:42 Venavo voha vayendalili kujiwula kuhuma kwa vamitumi na kutama pamonga cha lukolo, kulya pamonga na kumuyupa kwa Chapanga.
ACT 2:43 Gachinamtiti na makangaso gamahele gahengiki munjila ya vamitumi hati kila mmonga akakangaswa.
ACT 2:44 Vamsadika voha vayendalili kuvya chindu chimonga na vindu vyavi vatangatilanayi kwa pamonga.
ACT 2:45 Vavi mukugulisa kila chindu pamonga na kangi kugavana mashonga kuwanangana ngati avi na la liganu la mmonga wavi.
ACT 2:46 Kila ligono vayendalili kukonganeka pamonga Munyumba ya Chapanga. Mewa lukumbi lwa kulya vakonganiki pamonga munyumba zavi na vilya kwa luheku na mtima wa msopi.
ACT 2:47 Vakamulumbalila Chapanga, vakaganwa na vandu voha. Kila ligono Bambu akavayonjokesela mu msambi vandu vevasanguliwi.
ACT 3:1 Ligono limonga, lukumbi lwa saa tisa ya muhi, Petili na Yohani vavi mukuhamba Kunyumba ya Chapanga lukumbi lwa kumuyupa Chapanga.
ACT 3:2 Hinu mundu mmonga mweavi ngagenda tangia peavelekiwi. Kila ligono vandu vamgegayi na kumvika pamlyangu wa Nyumba ya Chapanga weukemelewa “Mlyangu Wabwina.” Muni avayupayi vindu kwa vala veviyingila Munyumba ya Chapanga.
ACT 3:3 Peavawene Petili na Yohani viyingila Munyumba ya Chapanga, avayupili vampela mashonga.
ACT 3:4 Vene vakamlolokesa takataka, ndi Petili akamjovela, “Utilola!”
ACT 3:5 Ngagenda yula akavalola, ahololela ipewa chindu kuhuma kwavi.
ACT 3:6 Nambu Petili akamjovela, “Nivii lepi na mashonga amala zahabu, nambu chenivi nachu yati nikukupela. Kwa uhotola wa Yesu Kilisitu wa ku Nazaleti, yima ugendayi!”
ACT 3:7 Hinu akamkamula chiwoko cha kulyelela, akamyinula. Bahapo magendelu na mafugamilu gaki gakavya na makakala.
ACT 3:8 Akahumba, akayima na kutumbula kugenda. Ndi akayingila nawu pamonga Munyumba ya Chapanga, igenda na kuhumba humba kuni akumlumbalila Chapanga.
ACT 3:9 Vandu voha vevavi penapo vamuwene igenda na kumlumbalila Chapanga,
ACT 3:10 pavammanyili kuvya mwene ndi yula mweatama papipi na Mlyangu Wabwina Wa Nyumba ya Chapanga, na kuyupa vakakangasa neju hati nakugamanya gegamkolili.
ACT 3:11 Lukumbi pavamuwene mundu yula alongosini na Petili na Yohani, vandu voha vakavya mumkangaso ndi vajumbalili pandu pepakemeliwi “Libanji la Solomoni.”
ACT 3:12 Hinu, Petili peavawene vandu, akavajovela, vandu va Isilaeli, ndava kyani mwikangaswa na lijambu ili? Kyani mukutilolokesa takataka ngati kwa makakala gitu amala ndava ya umsopi witu tavete timuhengili mundu uyu ahotola kugenda?
ACT 3:13 Chapanga wa Ibulahimu na Izaki na Yakobo, ndi Chapanga wa vagogo vitu ampeli amulumbalili mtumisi waki Yesu. Nambu nyenye mwamkamwili na kumgotola kwa vachilongosi na kumng'anamukila na kumbela palongolo ya Pilatu, hati peamwili kumdindulila.
ACT 3:14 Mwene avili mweikita geigana Chapanga na msopi, nambu nyenye mwambelili ndi mwayupili mundu yungi mweavimkomaji adinduliwa.
ACT 3:15 Nyenye mwamkomili chanzu cha wumi, nambu Chapanga amyukisi kuhuma kwa vafwili, tavete taliwene lijambu lenilo.
ACT 3:16 Makakala na kumsadika Yesu ndi vyevi mpeli makakala mundu uyu mwemukumlola na kummanya. Sadika kwa Yesu ndi yeyimlamisi hotohoto mundu uyu ngati mwavoha chemukumlola.
ACT 3:17 “Hinu, valongo vangu, nimanyili kuvya nyenye na vachilongosi vinu mwahengili ago ndava mwamanyili lepi.
ACT 3:18 Nambu Chapanga agahengili ago goha geajovili munjila ya vamlota va Chapanga voha kuvya yamganili Kilisitu ang'aika.
ACT 3:19 Muleka kubuda na mumuwuyila Chapanga, ndi mwene avalekekesa kumubudila.
ACT 3:20 Mukita genago, muni Bambu avapela lusenje lwa kupoleswa mitima na kuvaletela Kilisitu mweavahagulili ndi Yesu.
ACT 3:21 Yikumgana mwene kusigalila kunani kwa Chapanga mbaka palubwela lukumbi vindu vyoha kukitwa vya mupya, ngati Chapanga cheajovili munjila ya vamlota vaki vamsopi vevatamili kadeni.
ACT 3:22 Muni, Musa ajovili, ‘Bambu Chapanga winu akuvayinulila mlota wa Chapanga ngati nene kuhuma kwa nyenye mwavene. Mumyuwanila mwene mu mambu goha geakuvajovela nyenye.
ACT 3:23 Mundu yoyoha mwangamyuwanila mlota wa Chapanga mwenuyo, yati ibaguliwa kutali na vandu va Chapanga na kukomewa.’
ACT 3:24 Vamlota voha va Chapanga kuhuma Samueli na vangi vevagelekili, vakokwisi mambu aga gegihumila magono aga.
ACT 3:25 Na Chapanga alagazili vamlota vaki ndava yinu, na muyingila mu lilaganu leahengili na vagogo vitu, ngati chamjovili Ibulahimu, ‘Mu chiveleku chaku na vandu voha va pamulima yati vimotisiwa.’
ACT 3:26 Ndi Chapanga amyukisi mtumisi waki, amtumili hoti kwa nyenye, avamotisa na kumkita kila mmonga winu alekana na uhakau waki.”
ACT 4:1 Petili na Yohani pevayendalili kuvakokosela vandu, vamteta va Chapanga na valonda va Nyumba ya Chapanga na chikundi cha Vasadukayu ndi vandu vevisadika kuvya vandu nakuhotola kuyuka vakavabwelela.
ACT 4:2 Vakamema ligoga, muni vamitumi vala vakuvakokosela vandu kuvya Yesu ayukili lijambu lelilangisa hotohoto kuvya vafwili yati viyuka.
ACT 4:3 Hinu Petili na Yohani ndi vakamuliwi na kuyingiswa muchifungu mbaka chilau yaki ndava yavi kimihi.
ACT 4:4 Nambu vamahele pagati ya vevayuwini ujumbi wavi vakasadika, na vamsadika vakayonjokeseka jumula yavi vakavya ngati vagosi elufu mhanu.
ACT 4:5 Chilau yaki, vachilongosi va Vayawudi vagogo na vawula va malagizu ga Chapanga geampeli Musa vakakonganeka pamonga ku Yelusalemu.
ACT 4:6 Vakonganiki pamonga na Mteta Mkulu Anasi na Kayafa na Yohani na Alekizanda na vangi voha vevavi va lukolo lwa Mteta Mkulu.
ACT 4:7 Pavavayimiki Petili na Yohani palongolo yavi, vakavakota, “Nyenye mwihenga lijambu lenili kwa makakala ga yani amala kwa uhotola wa yani?”
ACT 4:8 Petili kuni amemiswi Mpungu Msopi akavayangula, “Vachilongosi na vagogo va vandu!
ACT 4:9 Ngati lelu mukutikota kuchivala chitendu chila chabwina cheahengiwi ngagenda yula na kulama,
ACT 4:10 hinu, nyenye na vandu voha va pa Isilaeli yikuvagana kumanya kuvya mundu mwenuyo iyima palongolo yinu lelu, alamili hotohoto, kwa makakala ga Yesu Kilisitu wa ku Nazaleti, nyenye mwevamvambili pamsalaba, nambu Chapanga amyukisi kuhuma kwa vafwili.
ACT 4:11 Yesu mwenuyo ndi Mayandiku Gamsopi chegijova. ‘Liganga lemwabelili nyenye vakujenga, hinu ndi liganga likulu la mkingisa pakujenga.’
ACT 4:12 Usangula wipatikana munjila ya mwene ndu, pamulima poha kawaka hati mmonga mweapewili na Chapanga uhotola wa kutisangula.”
ACT 4:13 Vachilongosi va libanji vakavakangasa Petili na Yohani chavidandaula cha ukekesi, vavamanyili kuvya vavi vandu vangasoma wala ilimu yoyoha. Vakamanya kuvya vavi pamonga na Yesu.
ACT 4:14 Nambu pavamuwene mundu yula mwealamisiwi ayimili pamonga nawu, nakuhotola kujova chindu.
ACT 4:15 Hinu vakavajovela vahuma kuvala ya libanji lila na kuni vene vakasigalila mugati kulongela vene kwa vene.
ACT 4:16 Vakakotana, “Tikita kyani na vandu venava? Mundu yoyoha mweitama pa Yelusalemu imanyalila kuvya ulangisu uwu wa chinamtiti uhengiki, tete nakuhotola kubela lijambu lenilo.
ACT 4:17 Nambu lenili tihotola kugunisa lijambu lenili likoto kudandasika kwa vandu, ndi tivabesa vakotoka kulongela na mundu yoyoha kwa uhotola wa Yesu.”
ACT 4:18 Hinu vakavakemela kavili mugati, vakavabesa vakotoka kulongela amala kuwula vandu kwa uhotola wa Yesu.
ACT 4:19 Nambu Petili na Yohani vakavayangula, “Mwavene muamula ngati chabwina palongolo ya Chapanga kuvayidakila nyenye kuliku kumyidakila Chapanga.
ACT 4:20 Ndava muni nakuhotola kuleka kulongela kugavala mambu gala getagawene na kuyuwana.”
ACT 4:21 Ndi vachilongosi va libanji vakavaywangila cha ligoga, kangi vakavalekekesa. Nakuhotola kuvalipisa ndava muni vandu voha vamlumbalila Chapanga ndava ya lijambu lenilo.
ACT 4:22 Mundu yula mweahengiwi ulangisu wa kulama avi na umuli wa miyaka yeyiyonjokesa alobaini.
ACT 4:23 Bahapo pavalekeswi Petili na Yohani vakawuya kwa vayavi, vakavajovela gala gevajoviwi na vakulu va kuteta va Chapanga na vachilongosi.
ACT 4:24 Navene pavagayuwini malovi ago, vakawungana pamonga kumuyupa Chapanga vakajova, “Bambu, veve ndi mweuwumbili kunani na pamulima na nyanja pamonga vindu vyoha vyeviyili!
ACT 4:25 Ndi mweumhotwisi mtumisi waku, dadi witu Daudi ajova kwa makakala ga Mpungu Msopi, ‘Ndava kyani makabila gamemili ligoga? Ndava kyani vandu vakiti mipangu ya waka?
ACT 4:26 Vankosi va pamulima vayimili ndava ya ngondo, na vachilongosi vakokanganiki pamonga, ndava ya kumbela Bambu na Kilisitu.’
ACT 4:27 Muni, chakaka ndi Helodi na Ponsio Pilatu na vandu va Isilaeli na vandu va vangali Vayawudi vakonganiki pabomani apa, kumbela mtumisi waki wa Msopi ndi Yesu mwewamuhagwili.
ACT 4:28 Muni vahenga mambu geugapangili kutumbula kadeni kwa makakala gaku na kwa uhamula waku.
ACT 4:29 Nambu hinu, Bambu, lola chaviyogofya. Utikangamalisa tavatumisi vaku kukokosa lilovi laku cha ukekesi.
ACT 4:30 Talambula chiwoko chaku uvalamisa vandu, na kita ulangisu na chinamtiti kwa uhotola wa Yesu mtumisi waku wa Msopi.”
ACT 4:31 Pevamalili kuyupa kwa Chapanga pandu pala pakanyugusika, navene voha vakamemeswa Mpungu Msopi. Vakayendelela kukokosa lilovi la Chapanga changali wogohi.
ACT 4:32 Vamsadika voha vavi mtima umonga na mpungu umonga. Avi lepi hati mmonga wavi mweavi na chindu chochoha, mweachivikili kuvya chaki mwene, ndi vagavini vyoha vyevavi navyu.
ACT 4:33 Kwa makakala gavaha, vamitumi vakajova ndava ya kuyuka kwaki Bambu Yesu, na Chapanga akavamotisa neju.
ACT 4:34 Kawaka mundu mwangali chindu, muni vevavi na migunda amala nyumba vagulisi na kugega mashonga gala,
ACT 4:35 na kugagotola kwa vamitumi vala, mashonga ago vagavanayi kwa kila mundu ndava ya vindu vyeaganili.
ACT 4:36 Kwavili na mundu mmonga Mlawi, mkolonjinji wa Kuplo, liina laki Yosefu vamitumi vamkemelayi Banaba mana yaki “Mundu mweikangamalisa mtima.”
ACT 4:37 Mewawa mwene agulisi mgunda waki, akatola mashonga genago na kuvagotolela vamitumi.
ACT 5:1 Nambu mundu mmonga liina laki Anania na mdala waki Safila vagulisi mewa chipandi cha mgunda wavi.
ACT 5:2 Na mdala waki amanyili hotohoto kuvya mgwana waki afiyili mashonga gangi geapewili, na zingi zila azigotwili kwa vamitumi.
ACT 5:3 Petili akamkota, “Anania ndava kyani Setani auyingili mtima waku na kumkonga Mpungu Msopi ujifiyili mashonga gangi geupewili mumgunda wula?
ACT 5:4 Kwakona kugulisa mgunda wenuwo wavi waku, na pawaligulisi mashonga gala gavi gaku, uhengela chewigana. Ndava kyani, wahamwili mumtima waku kuhenga lijambu lenili? Umkongili lepi mundu, nambu umkongili Chapanga!”
ACT 5:5 Anania peagayuwini malovi ago, akagwa pahi akafwa na vandu voha vevagayuwini mambu ago vakayogopa neju.
ACT 5:6 Vasongolo vakabwela, vakamugubika higa yaki kwa nyula ya msopi, vakamuwusa kuvala vakamuzika.
ACT 5:7 Pagamaliki masaa ngati gadatu, mdala waki changali kumanya mambu gegahumalili, akayingila mugati mula.
ACT 5:8 Petili akamkota, “Unijovela! Wu mashonga gemwapewili kwa kugulisa mgunda ndi gagaga?” Ndi mwene akamyangula, “Ena, ndi genaga.”
ACT 5:9 Hinu, Petili akamjovela mdala yula, “Wuli muyidakilini kumlinga Mpungu wa Bambu? Yuwanila! Vandu vala vevahambili kumzika mgwana waku, hinu vavi pamlyangu ndi yati vakukutola mewa na veve.”
ACT 5:10 Bahapo safila akagwa palongolo ya magendelu ga Petili, akafwa. Vasongolo vala pavayingili vamkolili amali kufwa, ndi vakamuwusa kuvala, vakamuzika papipi na mngwana waki.
ACT 5:11 Wogohi uvaha ukavayingila msambi wa vandu vevakumsadika Kilisitu voha na vandu voha, vevayuwini malovi ga lijambu lenilo.
ACT 5:12 Chapanga ahengili kwa njila ya vanalihengu gachinamtiti na makangaso gamahele pagati ya vandu. Na vamsadika vakonganikayi pamonga mulibanji la Solomoni.
ACT 5:13 Mundu yungi yoyoha angalikuvya msadika, valingili lepi kuwungana nawu. Nambu vandu vangi vangasadika vavalumbalili.
ACT 5:14 Nambu vandu vamahele vevamsadiki Bambu, vagosi na vadala vakayonjokeseka neju.
ACT 5:15 Hati vandu vavagegili vatamu vavi munjila na kuvagonesa mu lusongwani na mumipasa, muni Petili akapitayi, mbanga chimuwili chaki chivahikila vangi pagati yavi.
ACT 5:16 Vandu vamahele vabwelili kuhuma mumiji yeyitindila Yelusalemu, vavaletili vatamu wavi na vevavi na mizuka yihakau, ndi voha vakalamiswa.
ACT 5:17 Kangi, Mteta Mkulu na vayaki va chikundi cha Vasadukayu ndi vandu vevisadika kuvya vandu nakuhotola kuyuka va pandu penapo, vakayva na wihu kwa vamitumi.
ACT 5:18 Hinu vakavakamula vamitumi na kuvakunga muchifungu chikulu.
ACT 5:19 Nambu kilu mtumu wa kunani kwa Chapanga, akadindula mlyangu wa muchifungu yikulu, akavahumisa kuvala, akavajovela,
ACT 5:20 “Muhambayi mukayima Munyumba ya Chapanga, mkavajovela vandu malovi ga kuuvala wumi wa mupya.”
ACT 5:21 Vamitumi vakayidakila, vakayingila Munyumba ya Chapanga lukela pehe, vakatumbula kuwula. Mteta Mkulu na vayaki pavahikili, vakemili mngonganu wa libanji likulu na vagogo voha va Isilaeli, kangi vavatumili vandu kujela vavaleta vamitumi vala.
ACT 5:22 Nambu valonda va muchifungu pavahikili, vavakolili lepi. Ndi vakawuya na kujova kwa vakulu va libanji,
ACT 5:23 “Tikolili jela yidindanu na valonda vavi mumilyangu kulindalila. Nambu patadindwili milyangu tamkolili lepi mundu yoyoha mugati.”
ACT 5:24 Mkulu wa valonda wa Nyumba ya Chapanga na Vamteta Vakulu pevayuwini genago, vakavya na wogohi, ndava nakuchimanya chechavakolili.
ACT 5:25 Kangi, akabwela mundu mmonga na kuvajovela, “Yuwanila! Vandu vala vemkavakungili muchifungu, hinu vavi Munyumba ya Chapanga vakuvawula vandu.”
ACT 5:26 Bahapo mkulu wa valonda na vahenga lihengu vaki, vakahamba Munyumba ya Chapanga vakavaleta. Nambu nakuvakamula kwa makakala, muni vayogwipi vandu yati vakuvatova na maganga.
ACT 5:27 Hinu, vavapeliki vamitumi vala, vakavayimika palongolo ya libanji, ndi Mteta Mkulu akavajovela,
ACT 5:28 “Tavabesili hotohoto kuwula paliina la mundu uyu, hinu mugadandisi mawuliwu ginu pa Yelusalemu poha mwigana kutigegesa ngasi ya mundu uyu.”
ACT 5:29 Petili pamonga na vamitumi vayaki vakayangula, “Yikutigana kumyidakila Chapanga, kuliku mundu.
ACT 5:30 Chapanga wa vagogo vitu amyukisi Yesu mwemwamkomili nyenye na kumvamba pamsalaba.
ACT 5:31 Mwenuyu ndi yula mwealumbiwi na Chapanga mbaka upandi wa kulyelela, kuvya Chilongosi na Msangula, muni avakita vandu va Isilaeli vamuwuyila Chapanga, muni vapata kulekekesewa kumbudila.
ACT 5:32 Tete ndi taliwene lijambu lenilo, na Mpungu Msopi, Chapanga avapelili vala vevakumyidakila mwene.”
ACT 5:33 Vajumbi voha va libanji lila pevayuwini genago, vakamema ligoga vakahamula kuvakoma.
ACT 5:34 Nambu mundu mmonga Mfalisayu liina laki Gamalieli, muwula wa malagizu ga Bambu geampeli Musa na mweitopeswa na vandu voha. Akayima mu libanji palongolo ya vandu akalagiza vamitumi vala vawusiwayi kuvala mulukumbi luhupi.
ACT 5:35 Kangi akavajovela vajumbi va libanji vala, “Vandu va Isilaeli, mjiyangalila kwakona mwangakita, chemwigana kuvakitila vandu ava!
ACT 5:36 Magono ga mumbele, ahumalili mundu mmonga liina laki Teudosi, akajijovela kuvya mundu wa kutopela, vandu ngati miya mcheche vakajiwunga nayu. Nambu akomiwi, kangi vamulanda vaki vakapechengana chikundi chaki chafwili.
ACT 5:37 Mwanakandahi kavili, lukumbi lwa kuvalangiwa vandu, ahumalili Yuda wa ku Galilaya. Mewawa mwenuyo avakulukisi vandu vakamulanda, nambu mwenuyo mewawa akomiwi vamulanda vaki vakapechengana.
ACT 5:38 Hinu nene nikuvajovela ndava ya mhalu uwu, mujiyepa na vandu ava! Mvalekayi vahamba. Ndava muni ngati mpangu wenuwo utumbuliwi na vandu yati wiyaga wene.
ACT 5:39 Nambu ngati mpangu wenuwu uhumili kwa Chapanga, nakuhotola kuvabesa vandu ava, muni mwavene yati mukujikolela mukumbela Chapanga!” Ndi vakayidakilana na malovi ga Gamalieli.
ACT 5:40 Hinu, vakavakemele vamitumi vala, vakahamula vatovewa michapilu na kuvabesa vakotoka kuwula kavili paliina la Yesu, ndi vakavaleka vahamba.
ACT 5:41 Hinu, vamitumi vakahuma mu libanji kuni vamemi luheku, muni Chapanga avahololili kuvya vene yavaganili kukola soni ndava ya liina la Yesu.
ACT 5:42 Kila ligono vayendalili kuwula na kukokosa Munyumba ya Chapanga na munyumba za vandu, Lilovi la Bwina la Yesu Kilisitu.
ACT 6:1 Mwanakandahi vawuliwa pevayendalili kuyonjokeseka, gakahumila mang'ung'uta pagati ya vamsadika va Yesu, Vayawudi vevilongela Chigiliki vala na vala vevilongela Chiebulania, vevilongela Chigiliki vala vang'ung'utayi ndava vakuvakosiwa valipwela vavi mukugawiwa vyakulya vya kila ligono.
ACT 6:2 Ndi muni, vamitumi kumi na vavili vala vakavakemela vamsadika, vakajova, “Chabwina lepi tete kuleka kukokosa Lilovi la Chapanga na kuvagavila chakulya.
ACT 6:3 Hinu, valongo vitu, mvahagula vandu saba pagati yinu, vevitopeswa na vevamemili Mpungu Msopi na luhala, tete yati tikuvagotolela lihengu lenili.
ACT 6:4 Tavete yati tivya mukuhenga mukumuyupa Chapanga na lihengu la kukokosa Lilovi la Chapanga.”
ACT 6:5 Lijambu lenilo likavaganisa vamsadika voha, ndi vakavahagula Stefani, mundu mweamemiswi sadika yivaha na Mpungu Msopi na Filipi na Plokolo na Timoni na Pamena na Nikolausi mundu wa ku Antiokia mweajiwungi na njila ya kumuyupa Chapanga ya Vayawudi.
ACT 6:6 Vakavavika palongolo ya vamitumi, kangi vakavayupila kwa Chapanga kuni vavapamisi mawoko.
ACT 6:7 Lilovi la Chapanga likadandasika ku Yelusalemu na vamsadika vakayonjokeseka neju, chikundi chivaha cha vamteta va Chapanga vakalanda sadika.
ACT 6:8 Hinu, Stefani amotisiwi na apewili makakala na Chapanga, hati akahenga chinamtiti na makangaso pagati ya vandu.
ACT 6:9 Nambu vandu vangi vakahumila muni vahutana na Stefani. Vandu venavo vavi va “Nyumba ya kukonganekela Vayawudi la vandu Hulu,” Vene vahumili Kulene na Alekisanda, na vangi vahumili Kilikia na Asia.
ACT 6:10 Nambu vahotwili lepi kumhotola ndava ya luhala lwaki, na Mpungu Msopi mweamlongwisi mukujova.
ACT 6:11 Ndi vakavakulukisa cha mfiyu vandu nunuyu vajova kuvya, “Timyuwini Stefani akumliga Musa na akumliga Chapanga.”
ACT 6:12 Ndava ya yeniyo, vakavakokesa vandu, vachilongosi na vawula va malagizu ga Chapanga geampeli Musa. Ndi vakambwelela Stefani vakamkamula na kumpeleka palongolo ya libanji.
ACT 6:13 Kangi vakaleta vajova malovi ga udese vevajovili, “Mundu uyu katu ikotoka lepi kuliga pandu apa Pamsopi na kuliga malagizu ga Chapanga geampeli Musa.
ACT 6:14 Ndava muni tamali kumyuwanila kuvya Yesu wa ku Nazaleti mwenuyu yati apagwisa pandu apa na kung'anamusa mivelu yila yetapokili kuhuma kwa Musa.”
ACT 6:15 Voha vevatamili mu libanji lila vakamlolokesa takataka Stefani, kangi vakalola pamihu paki pavi ngati mtumu wa kunani kwa Chapanga.
ACT 7:1 Kangi, Mteta Mkulu akamkota, “Wu, mambu genaga ndi chakaka?”
ACT 7:2 Mwene akayangula, “Valongo vangu na vadadi vangu, muniyuwanila! Chapanga amuhumalili gogo witu Ibulahimu peavili ku Mesopotamia kwakona kuhamila ku Halani.
ACT 7:3 Chapanga akamjovela, ‘Wuka pamulima waku, valeka valongo vaku, ndi uhamba pamulima wenikulangisa.’
ACT 7:4 Hinu, Ibulahimu ahamalili kumulima wa Kalidayo akahamba kutama ku Halani. Dadi waki peamali kufwa, Chapanga akamuwusa kavili ku Halani akabwela kutama pamulima uwu wemwitama hinu.
ACT 7:5 Chapanga nakumpela hati pandu padebe pamulima pavyaa uhali waki, nambu amlagizi akumpela mulima wenuwu uvyaa waki, na chiveleku chaki. Lukumbi lwenulo avi lepi na mwana.
ACT 7:6 Chapanga akamjovela, ‘Viveleku vyaku yati vipelekwa kumulima wa vandu vangi, kwenuko ndi yati vivya vavanda na kuhengewa uhakau mulukumbi lwa miyaka miya mcheche.
ACT 7:7 Nambu nene yati nikuvahamula vandu avo, vevavahengili uvanda. Kangi yati nikuvawusa mumulima wenuwo muni vabwela penapa kunifugamila pandu apa.’
ACT 7:8 Kangi Chapanga akampela lilaganu la jandu, Ibulahimu akamyingisa jandu mwana waki Izaki mu ligono la nane, kuhuma kuvelekewa. Mewawa Izaki akamdumula jandu Yakobo, namwene Yakobo mewawa akavakitila vagogo kumi na vavili.”
ACT 7:9 “Vagogo vala vavi na wihu kwa Yosefu ndi vakamgulisa kuuvanda ku Misili. Nambu Chapanga avi pamonga nayu,
ACT 7:10 akamsangula mu mang'ahiso gaki goha, Chapanga akamganisa na luhala palongolo ya Falao, nkosi wa ku Misili, hati Falao akamhagula kuvya chilongosi wa mulima wula na nyumba ya nkosi.
ACT 7:11 Kangi yikahumila njala yikulu, pamulima woha wa ku Misili na ku Kanani, yikaleta ungangu uvaha. Vagogo vitu vahotwili lepi kupata chakulya chochoha.
ACT 7:12 Hinu, Yakobo peayuwini kuvya ku Misili kula kuvi na mabenu, akavatuma vana vaki, ndi vagogo vitu vahamba kwenuko yavi mala ya kutumbula.
ACT 7:13 Mulugendu lwavi lwa pili, Yosefu akajimanyisa kwa valongo vaki, ndi Falao akavamanya valongo va Yosefu.
ACT 7:14 Yosefu atumili ujumbi kwa dadi waki na valongo vaki, vandu sabini na mhanu, vabwela ku Misili.
ACT 7:15 Hinu, Yakobo ahambili ku Misili, kwenuko mwene pamonga na vagogo vitu vafwili.
ACT 7:16 Higa zavi zaletiwi mbaka ku Shekemu, zikazikiwa mu litinda la mbugu leagulili Ibulahimu kuhuma kwa vana va Hamoli kwa mashonga nunuyu.”
ACT 7:17 “Lukumbi palwahikili Chapanga atimilisa lilaganu leajovili akumpela Ibulahimu, ku Misili kula vandu vayonjokisi na kuvya vamahele neju.
ACT 7:18 Pamwishu, nkosi mmonga mweanga mmanya Yosefu, akatumbula kulongosa kula ku Misili.
ACT 7:19 Mwenuyu avakitili uhakau vandu vitu na vagogo vitu changali kugana vene vavavika kuvala vana vavi vadebe muni vafwayi.
ACT 7:20 Musa avelekiwi lukumbi lwenulo, avili mwana mbwina neju palongolo ya Chapanga. Aleliwi panyumba mulukumbi lwa miyehi yidatu,
ACT 7:21 na peaumiswi kuvala, ndi msikana wa Falao akamtola na kumlela ngati mwana waki mwene.
ACT 7:22 Musa awuliwi mambu goha galuhala ga Vamisili akavya mkekesi kwa malovi na matendu.”
ACT 7:23 “Hinu Musa peahikisi miyaka alobaini ndi akahamba kuvagendela kuvalola va Isilaeli vayaki.
ACT 7:24 Kwenuko amuwene mmonga wa valongo vaki ihengewa uhakau, ndi akahamba kumkengelela, ndi akamkoma Mmisili yula.
ACT 7:25 Aholalili manya Vaisilaeli vayaki yati vimanya kuvya Chapanga ngaamtumili mwene kuvagombola, nambu vene nakugamanya ago.
ACT 7:26 Chilalu yaki Musa avawene Vaisilaeli vavili vitovana, akalinga kuvatepulanisa akavajovela, ‘Nyenye mwavalongo ndava kyani hinu, mukomana mwavene?’
ACT 7:27 Nambu yungi mweamtovayi yula muyaki akamkang'a Musa pamuhana akajova, ‘Yani mweakuvikili veve kuvya chilongosi na mhamula pagati yitu?
ACT 7:28 Wu, ugana kunikoma ngati chewamkomili Mmisili golo?’
ACT 7:29 Musa peagayuwini malovi ago, akatila na kuhamba kutama kumulima wa Midiani kwenuko akavya myehe ndi akavya na vana vasongolo vavili.”
ACT 7:30 “Peyahikili miyaka alobaini, mtumu wa kunani kwa Chapanga akamhumila Musa padahi pepiyaka motu kulugangatu papipi na Chitumbi cha Sinai.
ACT 7:31 Musa akakangasa kulola lijambu lenilo hati akahegelela papipi muni alingulila, ndi akayuwana lwami lwa Bambu.
ACT 7:32 ‘Nene ndi Chapanga wa vagogo vaku, Chapanga wa Ibulahimu wa Izaki na Yakobo.’ Musa akavagaya kwa wogohi ndi nakuhotola kulolokesa neju.
ACT 7:33 Bambu akamjovela, ‘Hula champali zaku muni peuyima apa ndi pandu pamsopi.
ACT 7:34 Nigawene mahakau gevihengiwa vandu vangu ku Misili kula. Niyuwini lwami lwa mang'ahiso gavi, ndi nene nibweli kuvagombola. Hinu bwela, yati nikukutuma ku Misili.’ ”
ACT 7:35 “Musa mwenuyu ndi yula mweabeleliwi na vandu va Isilaeli pavamjovili, ‘Yani mweakuvikili kuvya chilongosi na mhamula pagati yitu?’ Chapanga amtumili Musa kuvya chilongosi na mgombozi, kwa njila ya mtumu wa kunani kwa Chapanga mweamhumalili padahi pepiyaka motu.
ACT 7:36 Ndi mweavalongwisi vandu vala vawuka ku Misili kwa kuhenga ulangisu wa gachinamtiti na makangaso pamulima wa Misili na Kunyanja ya Shamu na kulugangatu, mulukumbi lwa miyaka alobaini.
ACT 7:37 Musa ndi mweavajovili vandu va Isilaeli, ‘Chapanga yati akuvahagulila mlota waki ngati nene pagati ya valongo vinu mwavene.’
ACT 7:38 Mwene ndi mweavili kulugangatu kula, pevakonganiki vandu va Isilaeli. Musa avili ngati mjumbi pagati ya vagogo vitu, na mtumu wa kunani kwa Chapanga, lukumbi pealongili nayu kuchitumbi cha Sinai ndi mweagotoliwi malovi ga wumi atijovela tete.”
ACT 7:39 “Nambu vagogo vitu ndi vabelili kumyidakila, ndi vakamkang'a pamuhana kuni mumitima yavi vakanogela kuwuya ku Misili.
ACT 7:40 Vakamjovela mlongo wa Musa Aloni, ‘Utikitila vachapanga yeyikutulongosa munjila, muni nakumanya chechimkolili Musa mweatilongwisi kuhuma ku Misili!’
ACT 7:41 Penapo ndi pavajikitili chimong'omong'o cha mpapakasi wa ng'ombi, vakayitetela na vakakita mselebuko ndava ya lihengu la mawoko gavi vene.
ACT 7:42 Nambu Chapanga akawuka pagati yavi na kuvaleka vazifugundamila ndondo za kunani, ngati cheyiyandikwi muhitabu ya vamlota va Chapanga. ‘Nyenye vandu va Isilaeli! Lepi nene mwemwanihinjili hinyama ndava ya luteta, Mumiyaka alobaini kulugangatu kula!
ACT 7:43 Nyenye mwagegili chindanda cha chapanga Moloki, na vindu vyemwajikitili kwa luhumu lwa ndondo ya chapanga winu Lefani. Vindu vyemwajikitili ndi vyemwavifugamili. Ndava ya yeniyo yati nikuvapeleka uvanda kutali na Babeli.’
ACT 7:44 Kulugangatu kula vagogo vitu vavi na lindanda la kulangisa, lakitiwi ngati Chapanga cheamlagazili Musa ahengayi, ulangisu wulawula ngati weauwene.
ACT 7:45 Kangi Vagogo vitu vahalilini lindanda vene kwa vene mbaka lukumbi lwa Yoshua, pevatolili mulima wula kuhuma kwa milima, Chapanga mweavingili palongolo yavi. Penapo ndi latamili mbaka lusenje lwa Daudi.
ACT 7:46 Daudi apewili uganu na Chapanga, akamuyupa ayidakila amujengela pandu pa kutama, mwene mweavi Chapanga wa Yakobo.
ACT 7:47 Nambu Solomoni ndi mweamjengili Chapanga nyumba.”
ACT 7:48 “Nambu Chapanga Mkulu, itama lepi munyumba zezijengiwi na vandu ngati cheajovili mlota wa Chapanga,
ACT 7:49 ‘Bambu ijova, kunani ndi chigoda changu cha unkosi, na mulima ndi chigoda cha kuvikila magendelu gangu. Nyumba ya namuna yoki yemukunijengela nene? Ndi pandu poki penipumulila?
ACT 7:50 Namwene ndi mwenihengili vindu vyoha?’ ”
ACT 7:51 “Nyenye vandu mwemwinonopa, mitima na makutu ginu ndi ngati vandu va milima yangamulanda Chapanga. Nyenye ngati vagogo vinu. Magono goha mukumbela Mpungu Msopi.
ACT 7:52 Vagogo vinu vamng'aisi mlota wa Chapanga yeyoha yula, vevavakomili avo, Chapanga avatumili kukokosa kubwela kwa yula mweikita geigana Chapanga. Nambu nyenye mwamgewukili na kumkoma.
ACT 7:53 Nyenye mwapokili malagizu gala gegaletiwi na mtumu wa kunani kwa Chapanga, nambu mwayidakili lepi.”
ACT 7:54 Vala vagogo va libanji pavamuyuwanili Stefani, vakaviniswa mitima, ndi vakajiluma minu cha ligoga.
ACT 7:55 Nambu Stefani kuni amemiswi Mpungu Msopi, akalolokesa kunani kwa Chapanga, auwene ukulu wa Chapanga na Yesu ayimili muchiwoko cha kulyela cha Chapanga.
ACT 7:56 Stefani akajova, “Mlola! Niwona kunani kwa Chapanga kudindwiki na Mwana wa Mundu ayimili pachiwoko cha kulyela cha Chapanga!”
ACT 7:57 Vakulu va libanji, vakaywanga na vakagubika makutu gavi kwa mawoko. Kangi vakamuhumbila voha kwa pamonga.
ACT 7:58 Vakamkwekwesa kuvala ya muji, na kutumbula kumtova na maganga, vevavawene vakagavika makoti gavi paulonda wa msongolo mmonga liina laki Sauli.
ACT 7:59 Pevayendalili kumtova na maganga Stefani kuni mwene iyupa kwa Chapanga, “Bambu Yesu upokela mpungu wangu!”
ACT 7:60 Akafugama, akavemba kwa lwami luvaha, “Bambu, ukotoka kuvavalangila chevakubudila Chapanga!” Peamalili kujova ago, akafwa. Sauli ayidakili chitendu cha ukomaji wenuwo.
ACT 8:1 Na mwene Sauli awene chabwina kukomewa kwa Sitefani. Ligono lenilo msambi wa vandu vevakumsadika Kilisitu va ku Yelusalemu, vatumbwili kung'ahiswa neju. Vamsadika voha, Yavaganili kupechenganika kudahi pandi za ku Yudea na ku Samaliya, nambu kwa vamitumi ndu.
ACT 8:2 Vandu vevisadika vakamuzika Stefani na kumvembela neju.
ACT 8:3 Nambu lukumbi lwenulo Sauli alingili kuvang'aisa msambi wa vandu vevakumsadika Kilisitu, ahambili nyumba kwa nyumba akavahumisa vamsadika kuvala vagosi kwa vadala na kuvasopa muchifungu.
ACT 8:4 Hinu vala vamsadika vevapechangini vakahamba kila pandu kukokosa Lilovi la Bwina.
ACT 8:5 Filipi namwene akahelela pamuji wa ku Samaliya na kumkokosa Kilisitu kwa vakolonjinji va penapo.
ACT 8:6 Vandu vakajiwunga kuyuwanila ujumbi wa Filipi na kulola milangisu yila yeahenga.
ACT 8:7 Ndava muni vandu vevatalaliwi mizuka mihakau, yavahumili kwa lwami luvaha, vandu vevapolili higa na vangagenda valamisiwi.
ACT 8:8 Kwavili na luheku luvaha pamuji wenuwo.
ACT 8:9 Hinu pamuji wenuwo kwavili na mundu mmonga liina laki Simoni, mweakitili uhavi waki, pamuji wenuwu na kuvakangasa vandu va ku Samaliya, akujikwiha kuvya mwene ndi mweitopela,
ACT 8:10 na vandu voha vadebe na vavaha, vamyuwanili hotohoto vakajova, “Simoni ndi makakala ga uchapanga gegikemelewa ‘Makakala gavaha.’ ”
ACT 8:11 Vamlandili ndava avakangisi kwa lukumbi lutali ndava ya uhavi waki.
ACT 8:12 Nambu pavasadiki ujumbi wa Filipi kulivala Lilovi la Bwina la Unkosi wa Chapanga na kuyuwana makokoso ga Yesu Kilisitu, vagosi na vadala vabatiziwi.
ACT 8:13 Hati Simoni mwene, asadiki na peamali kubatiziwa, akalongosana na Filipi, akakangasa makangaso na gachinamtiti geahengili.
ACT 8:14 Vamitumi vala vevavili ku Yelusalemu, pevayuwini kuvya vakolonjinji va ku Samaliya vayidakili Lilovi la Chapanga, ndi vakavatuma kwenuko Petili na Yohani.
ACT 8:15 Hinu pavahikili vakavayupila kwa Chapanga vamsadika vala, muni vampokela Mpungu Msopi.
ACT 8:16 Ndava lukumbi lwenulo Mpungu Msopi avi akona kuvahelelela yeyoha pagati yavi, nambu vamali kubatiziwa paliina la Bambu Yesu ndu.
ACT 8:17 Kangi Petili na Yohani vakavavikila mawoko gavi vamsadika, navene mewa vampokili Mpungu Msopi.
ACT 8:18 Hinu Simoni pealoli kuvya mukuvikiwa mawoko na vamitumi, vamsadika vampokili Mpungu Msopi. Alingili kuvapela mashonga Petili na Yohani, akajova,
ACT 8:19 “Mnipela na nene uhotola wenuwo muni nakamvikila mawoko mundu yeyoha, apokela Mpungu Msopi.”
ACT 8:20 Nambu Petili akamyangula, “Fwila kulongolo na mashonga gaku ndava wihololela kuvya wihotola kugula makakala ga Chapanga kwa mashonga!
ACT 8:21 Veve uvi lepi na lilundu amala pandu popoha mulihengu ili, muni mtima waku uganisa lepi palongolo ya Chapanga.
ACT 8:22 Ndava muni, umuwuyila Chapanga waku kwa kukotoka uhakau waku, kavili umuyupa Bambu mwene ihotola kukulekekesa maholo ngati ago.
ACT 8:23 Nikulola hotohoto umelili wihu neju, ndi mkungiwa wa kumbudila Chapanga.”
ACT 8:24 Simoni akayangula, “Chondi, muniyupilayi kwa Bambu, likoto kunikolela hati limonga pagati ya ago gemujovili.”
ACT 8:25 Petili na Yohani pevamalili kujova malovi gavi ga kukokosa ujumbi wa Bambu, vakawuya ku Yelusalemu. Hinu pavavi mukuwuya vakakokosa Lilovi la Bwina muhijiji yamahele ya ku Samaliya.
ACT 8:26 Mtumu wa kunani kwa Chapanga akamjovela Filipi, “Jitendelekela uhamba kusini kupitila njila yeyihuma ku Yelusalemu mbaka ku Gaza.”
ACT 8:27 Filipi peamali kujitendelekela, akatumbula lugendu lwa kuhamba Yelusalemu. Lukumbi lwenulo kwavili na mkolonjinji mmonga wa ku Ethiopia. Avi mvika mashonga wa Kandake, nkosi wa Chidala wa ku Ethiopia.
ACT 8:28 Mweavili munjila kuwuya kunyumba kuhuma ku Yelusalemu kweahambili kumlumba Chapanga, atamili mumkokoteni wa kubiluswa kuni ajisomelayi kwa lwami chitabu cha mlota wa Chapanga Isaya.
ACT 8:29 Mpungu Msopi akamjovela Filipi, “Hamba papipi na mkokoteni wenuwo ulongosana nayu.”
ACT 8:30 Filipi akajumbalila papipi na mkokoteni wula, akamyuwana mundu yula isoma muchitabu cha mlota wa Chapanga Isaya. Penapo Filipi akamkota, “Wu, ukuchimanya chewisoma?”
ACT 8:31 Mundu yula akamyangula, “Nihotola wuli kumanya changali mundu kunidandaulila?” Ndi akamgongolela Filipi akwela mumkokoteni wula na kutama pamonga na mwene.
ACT 8:32 Pandu pa Mayandiku Gamsopi peasomayi vayandiki aga, “Avi ngati limbelele lelihamba kuhinjwa, chinunu ngati mwana limbelele cheidumuliwa mangoma, nakuyahamula mlomo.
ACT 8:33 Akoliwi soni na kunotewa chechikumvala. Avi lepi wa kuhotola kulongela ndava ya mundu yoyoha chaki, muni wumi waki uwusiwi pamulima.”
ACT 8:34 Muyimila hindu yula akamkota Filipi, “Nijovela, mlota wa Chapanga uyu ijova mambu aga ndava yaki mwene, amala ndava ya mundu yungi?”
ACT 8:35 Hinu Filipi akatumbula pandu pa Mayandiku Gamsopi ago, akamjovela Lilovi la Bwina ndava ya Yesu.
ACT 8:36 Pevavi vakona munjila, vakahika pandu pepavi na manji ndi mundu yula akajova, “Pandu apa pana manji, wu, chivii chindu kiki chechikunibesa nene kubatiziwa?”
ACT 8:37 Filipi akajova, “Ngati wisadika kwa mutima waku woha wihotola kubatiziwa.” Namwene akajova, “Nisadika Yesu Kilisitu ndi Mwana wa Chapanga.”
ACT 8:38 Hinu myimila hindu yula akahamula mkokoteni wa kubiluswa wula uyima, Filipi na mwene vakahuluka mumanji ndi Filipi akambatiza.
ACT 8:39 Pavahumili mumanji Mpungu wa Bambu amkitili Filipi awuka, myimilila hindu akotoka kumlola kavili, nambu mwene akayendelela na lugendu lwaki kuni avi na luheku.
ACT 8:40 Nambu Filipi akahumila ku Azoto, na munjila avi mukukokosa Lilovi la Bwina mbaka peahikili ku Kaisalia.
ACT 9:1 Nambu lukumbi lwenulo, Sauli ayonjokisi kuvayogofya kwa kuvakoma vamulanda va Bambu. Akahamba kwa Mteta Mkulu,
ACT 9:2 akayupa balua ya kummanyisa kwa nyumba za kukonganekela Vayawudi zezavi ku Damasko, muni akavakolela vandu vevilanda Njila ya Bambu, vagosi amala vadala, avakamula na kuvaleta ku Yelusalemu.
ACT 9:3 Sauli peavi munjila papipi kuhika ku Damasko, chigafula lumuli kuhuma kunani kwa Chapanga lukamtindila kumlangasa mwene pandi zoha.
ACT 9:4 Sauli akagwa pahi ndi akayuwana lwami lukumjovela, “Sauli, Sauli! Ndava kyani ukuning'aha?”
ACT 9:5 Sauli akakota, “Ndi wayani veve, Bambu?” Na lwami lula lukayangula, “Nene ndi Yesu mweukuning'aha.
ACT 9:6 Nambu hinu yima uhamba kumujini, kwenuko ndi kwewijoviwa chechikugana kuchihenga.”
ACT 9:7 Vandu vevavi mulugendu pamonga na Sauli vayimili nuu ndava ya kukangaswa, vayuwini lwami lula nambu vamuwene lepi mundu yoyoha.
ACT 9:8 Sauli akayinuka, peagubukwili mihu gaki, nakuhotola kulola, hinu vandu vevavi mulugendu nawu vakamkamula chiwoko kumlongosa mbaka ku Damasko.
ACT 9:9 Sauli atamili magono gadatu changalola, na lukumbi lwenulo lwoha atamii changalya chindu amala kunywa chindu chochoha.
ACT 9:10 Damasko kula ndi kwavili na msadika mmonga liina laki Anania. Mwenuyo akemeliwi kujovewa na Bambu mumawono, “Anania!” Mwene akayidika, “Nivii apa, Bambu.”
ACT 9:11 Mwene Bambu akamjovela, “Ujitendelekahi uhamba kunjila yeyikemelewa Selede mbaka kunyumba ya Yuda ukotayi kumvala mundu yula mweahumili ku Taso, liina laki Sauli. Hinu akumuyupa Chapanga,
ACT 9:12 na Sauli amali kuloleswa mumaono na Bambu, kuvya mundu mweikemiwa Anania avi kuyingila mugati na kumvikila mawoko muni alola kavili.”
ACT 9:13 Nambu Anania akayangula, “Bambu, vandu vamahele nivayuwini mambu gakumvala mundu uyu, niyuwini gahakau neju geavahengili vamsadika vaku ku Yelusalemu kula.
ACT 9:14 Na hinu vamteta vakulu vampeli uhotola Sauli abwela kuni ku Damasko kuvakamula voha vevakukusadika veve.”
ACT 9:15 Nambu Bambu akamjovela Anania, “Uhamba ndu, muni mwenuyo nimuhagwili muni anihengela, kukokosa ndava ya liina langu kwa vandu vangali Vayawudi na vankosi vavi na kwa vandu va Isilaeli.
ACT 9:16 Namwene yati nikumlangisa mambu gamahele gegakumgana kung'aiswa ndava yangu.”
ACT 9:17 Hinu Anania akahamba mbaka panyumba yeniyo, akayingila mugati, kangi akamvikila mawoko Sauli. Akamjovela “Mlongo Sauli, Bambu Yesu ndi mweanitumili, mwene akuhumalili pawakavili munjila kubwela kuni, anitumili nene muni uhotola kulola kavili na kumemeswa Mpungu Msopi.”
ACT 9:18 Bahapo vindu ngati magagau vikagwa pahi kuhuma mumihu mwa Sauli, ndi akalola kavili. Hinu akayima, akabatiziwa,
ACT 9:19 na peamali kulya chakulya makakala gaki gakamuwuyila. Sauli atamili pamonga na vawuliwa magono gadebe ku Damasko kula.
ACT 9:20 Bahapo akatumbula kukokosa munyumba za kukonganekela Vayawudi, kuvya Yesu ndi Mwana wa Chapanga.
ACT 9:21 Vandu voha vevamyuwini vakakangasa, vakakota, “Wu, mundu mwenuyu lepi yula mweavakomili vandu vala vevamuyupayi kwa liina la Yesu wa ku Yelusalemu? Na ndava ya mpangu wenuwo ndi abwela penapa, avakamula vandu na kuvapeleka kwa vamteta vakulu!”
ACT 9:22 Sauli akayonjokeseka ukekesi na makakala, ndava ya kujova hotohoto kuvya Yesu ndi Kilisitu, Vayawudi va ku Damasko luhala lukavayaga.
ACT 9:23 Pagamaliki magono gamahele, Vayawudi vakakonganeka na kukita mpangu wa kumkoma Sauli.
ACT 9:24 Nambu Sauli ayuwini mpangu wavi. Kilu na muhi vamlindili mumilyangu ya kuyingalila kumujini muni vahotola kumkoma.
ACT 9:25 Lukumbi lwa kilu vawuliwa vaki vakamtola na kumhulusa pahi mugati ya lidengu livaha mufwasi ya luwumba.
ACT 9:26 Sauli pahaikili ku Yelusalemu akalinga kujiwunga na vawuliwa vala. Nambu vandu voha vamyogwipi vamsadiki lepi kuvya mwene ndi mulanda wa chakaka.
ACT 9:27 Kangi Banaba akamtola Sauli na kumpeleka kwa vamitumi, akavadandaulila kumvala Sauli cheamuwene Bambu munjila, na Bambu chealongili nayu. Mewawa avadandaulili kuvya Sauli cheahotwili kukokosa muuhotola wa Yesu changali wogohi, ku Damasko kula.
ACT 9:28 Hinu Sauli akatama pamonga nawu, akagendelela pa Yelusalemu poha kuni ikokosa liina la Bambu changali wogohi.
ACT 9:29 Mewawa alongili na kuhutana na Vayawudi vevilongela Chigiliki, nambu vene vapangili kumkoma.
ACT 9:30 Valongo vala pevayuwini mpangu wenuwo, vakamtola Sauli na kuhamba nayu ku Kaisalia ndi vakamtuma ahamba ku Taso.
ACT 9:31 Lukumbi lwenulo msambi wa vandu vevakumsadika Kilisitu vakavya na uteke na mumiji yoha ya ku Yudea na ku Galilaya na ku Samaliya. Layendalili kukula mukuyupa Bambu na kuyonjokeseka na kutangatiliwa na Mpungu Msopi.
ACT 9:32 Petili peavi mulugendu kila pandi mewa avahikilili vandu va Chapanga vevatamayi kumuji wa Luda.
ACT 9:33 Kwenuko akamkolili mundu mmonga liina laki Ainea mweavi na utamu wa kupola higa, ndi agonili pa mpasa mulukumbi lwa miyaka nane.
ACT 9:34 Petili akamjovela, “Ainea, Yesu Kilisitu akukulamisa. Yimuka, ujitandikila mpasa waku.” Bahapo Ainea akayima.
ACT 9:35 Vandu voha va ku Luda na ku Saloni pavawene Ainea, vakamuwuyila Bambu.
ACT 9:36 Kumuji wa Yopa kwavili na mulanda mmonga mdala liina laki Tabita, kwa Chigiliki ndi Doka mana yaki huluku. Mdala mwenuyo ahengayi mambu ga kumganisa Chapanga na kuvatangatila vangangu.
ACT 9:37 Magono genago alwalili na kufwa. Hinu vandu vayisambisi higa yaki, vakamgonesa kugolofa.
ACT 9:38 Muji wa Luda wavi papipi na muji wa Yopa, hinu vamsadika vala pevayuwini kuvya Petili avi kwenuko, ndi vakavatuma vandu vavili na ujumbi uwu, “Chondi, ubwela kwitu kanyata.”
ACT 9:39 Hinu, Petili akawuka na kulongosana na vajumbi vala, pevamali kuhika vampeliki kugolofa. Valipwela voha vevavi penapo vamtindili Petili vakavembeneka na kumlangisa magwanda na nyula zoha zeatengenezayi Doka pavi mumi.
ACT 9:40 Petili avahumisi kuvala vandu voha akafugama akayupa kwa Chapanga. Kangi akahegelela payavi higa pala na kujova, “Tabita, yumuka!” Mwene akagubukula mihu, hinu peamuwene Petili ndi akayinuka na kutama.
ACT 9:41 Petili akamkamula chiwoko, akamyinula. Kangi akavakemela vamsadika na valipwela vala ndi akavagotolela kuni avi mumi.
ACT 9:42 Malovi ga lijambu lenilo gadandasiki pandu poha ku Yopa, na vandu vamahele vakamsadika Bambu.
ACT 9:43 Petili atamili ku Yopa kwa magono nunuyu, munyumba ya mundu mweitendelekela vindu vya chikumba liina laki Simoni.
ACT 10:1 Pamuji wa Kaisalia kwavili na mundu mmonga liina laki Kolineli, mwene avi mkulu wa manjolinjoli va chikundi chechikemelewa “Msambi wa Italia.”
ACT 10:2 Mwene avi mundu mbwina, mwene pamonga na lukolo lwaki voha vamuyupayi Chapanga. Ahengayi mambu gamahele ga kuvatangatila vangangu va Vayawudi na kumuyupa Chapanga magono goha.
ACT 10:3 Ligono limonga lukumbi lwa saa tisa ya muhi awene maono hotohoto, Mtumu wa kunani kwa Chapanga akumbwelela na kumjovela, “Kolineli!”
ACT 10:4 Kolineli akamlolokesa takataka cha wogohi Mtumu wa kunani kwa Chapanga yula, ndi akamkota “Chivii kyani Bambu?” Mtumu wa kunani kwa Chapanga akamyangula, “Chapanga ayuwini kumuyupa kwaku na aganisiwi na kuvatangatila kwaku vangangu ndi akukumbwiki.
ACT 10:5 Hinu, uvatumayi vandu ku Yopa vakamtola mundu mmonga liina laki Simoni. Ndi mewa ikemelewa Petili.
ACT 10:6 Mwene ndi myehe munyumba ya Simoni, mundu mweitendelekela vindu vya chikumba. Nyumba yaki yivii pamuhana ya nyanja.”
ACT 10:7 Mtumu wa kunani kwa Chapanga yula peawukili, Kolineli akavakemela vatumisi vavili va nyumba na mmonga wa manjolinjoli vaki mweakumyidakila Chapanga.
ACT 10:8 Peavadandaulili mambu goha gegahumalili, akavatuma ku Yopa.
ACT 10:9 Chilau yaki, lukumbi lwa saa sita ya muhi, vandu avo vadatu mulugendu lwavi, papipi kuhika ku Yopa, Petili akakwela kunani ya nyumba kumuyupa Chapanga.
ACT 10:10 Njala yamvinili, akanogela kulya. Nambu chakulya pachatendelekewayi mwene akalola maono.
ACT 10:11 Awene kunani kwa Chapanga kudinduliwi na chindu ngati shuka yivaha yihuluswa pahi, kuni yikamuliwi pandi zoha mcheche za mulima.
ACT 10:12 Na mugati ya shuka yila mwavi hinyama ndalindali, hinyama ya magendelu mcheche na hinyama yeyilandala pamulima na videge vyevimbululuka.
ACT 10:13 Akayuwana lwami lukumjovela, “Petili, yimuka hinja na ulyayi.”
ACT 10:14 Nambu Petili akamyangula, “Lepi Bambu! Nene katu niwonjili lepi chindu chochoha changayidakiliwa kulya.”
ACT 10:15 Nambu lwami lula lukamuyila kavili, “Lukamjovela vindu vyeaviyidakiliwi na Chapanga kulya, kotoka kuvikelamela vihakau.”
ACT 10:16 Lijambu lila lahengiki mala zidatu, kangi shuka yivaha yila yikawuyiswa kanyata kunani kwa Chapanga.
ACT 10:17 Petili peavi akona ikangasa maono gala mana yaki kyani, hinu vandu vala vevatumwili na Kolineli pevamanyiswi nyumba ya Simoni, vakahika pamlyangu.
ACT 10:18 Vakahodisa kwa lwami, “Vakakota kuvya kuna myehe mweitama apa ikemiwa Simoni Petili?”
ACT 10:19 Petili pealinga kuhololela mana ya maono gala, Mpungu Msopi akamjovela, “Yuwanila! Vavi vandu vadatu vakukulonda.
ACT 10:20 Huluka kanyata na ulongosana nawu kuhamba changali mtahu, muni nene ndi mwenivatumili.”
ACT 10:21 Hinu, Petili akahuluka pahi, akavajovela vandu vala, “Mwemukunilonda ndi nene. Ndava kyani munibwelili?”
ACT 10:22 Vene vakamyangula, atitumili “Kolineli mkulu wa manjolinjoli, mundu mbwina, mweakumuyupa Chapanga, itopeswa na Vayawudi. Ajoviwi na mtumu wa Kunani kwa Chapanga akumgongolela kunyumba yaki, muni ayuwana chochoha chila cheukumjovela.”
ACT 10:23 Petili akavakemela mugati mula, akavapela pandu pa kugona kilu yila. Chilau yaki, Petili akatumbula lugendu pamonga nawu. Vamsadika vangi vevatamayi ku Yopa vakalongosana.
ACT 10:24 Ndi pamalau yaki vakahika pamuji wa Kaisalia. Kolineli avi mukuvalindila mwene na vanalukolo lwaki pamonga na vankozi veavagongolili.
ACT 10:25 Petili peavi mukuyingila Kolineli akahamba kumkumbatila cha uganu, akamfugamila mumagendelu gaki akamgundamila.
ACT 10:26 Nambu Petili akamuyinula, akamjovela, “Yima, muni nene namundu ngati veve.”
ACT 10:27 Petili na Kolineli viyingila mugati, kuni vilongela ndi vavakolili vandu vamahele vakonganiki.
ACT 10:28 Petili akavajovela, “Mwavene mmanyi hotohoto, kuvya Myawudi abesiwi na malagizu kwa njila ya kumuyupa Chapanga yaki kutangatilana na mundu angali kuvya Myawudi, amala kumgendela nambu Chapanga anilangisi nene kuvya nakuyidakiliwa kumkemela mundu yoyoha iganikiwa lepi amala mhakau.
ACT 10:29 Ndava ya yeniyo, pamwakanikemili nibweli changali mtahu. Hinu munijovela munikemelili kyani?”
ACT 10:30 Kolineli akayangula, “Magono gadatu gamumbele, lukumbi lwa saa tisa ya muhi, nene navi muchumba changu kumuyupa Chapanga. Chigafula namuwene mundu mweawalili nyula zezing'asima neju, ayimili palongolo yangu,
ACT 10:31 anijovili, Kolineli! Chapanga ayuwini chewiyupa pamonga na teta zaku kwa vangangu.
ACT 10:32 Hinu uvatuma vandu vahamba ku Yopa, vakamkemela mundu mmonga liina laki Simoni mweikemelewa mewa Petili. Mwenuyo avili kunyumba ya Simoni, mundu mweitendelekela vindu vya chikumba, nyumba yaki yivii pamumhana ya nyanja.
ACT 10:33 Ndi kanyata navatumili vajumbi kwaku, wamwene ukitili chabwina kubwela. Tavoha apa tivii palongolo ya Chapanga, ndava ya kukuyuwanila chindu chochoha cheakulagizi Bambu utijovela.”
ACT 10:34 Kangi Petili akatumbula kujova, “Hinu nimanyili kuvya Chapanga ibagula lepi.
ACT 10:35 Nambu mundu yeyoha mumulima mweiyupa na kuhenga gakumganisa Chapanga yati iyidakiliwa namwene.
ACT 10:36 Umanyili ujumbi wula Chapanga weavapelekili vandu va ku Isilaeli, ikokosa Lilovi la Bwina lelileta uteke kwa njila ya Yesu Kilisitu mwene ndi Bambu wa voha.
ACT 10:37 Mwavene mumanyili lijambu lelahumalili pamulima woha wa Vayawudi kutumbula ku Galilaya Yohani peamali kukokosa ndava ya ubatizu.
ACT 10:38 Mwimanya kuvya Chapanga cheamhagwili Yesu wa ku Nazaleti, ndi akammemesa Mpungu Msopi na kumpela makakala. Chapanga avi pamonga nayu, mwene ahambili kila pandu kuhenga gabwina na kuvalamisa vandu voha vevang'aiswi na Setani.
ACT 10:39 Tavete tagawene mambu goha geagahengili pamulima wa Vayawudi na muji wa ku Yelusalemu. Vamkomili na kumvamba munjila ya msalaba.
ACT 10:40 Nambu Chapanga amyukisi pagamaliki magono gadatu kuhuma kwa vevafwili. Akaloleka hotohoto,
ACT 10:41 awonikini lepi kwa vandu voha, nambu kwa tete ndu tetamali kuhaguliwi na Chapanga kuvya vetagawene. Ndi tete vetalili na kunywelela pamonga nayu peamali kuyuka kwaki.
ACT 10:42 Atilagazili kuvakokosela vandu voha Lilovi la Bwina na kuvajovela kuvya mwene ndi mweahaguliwi na Chapanga, kuvya mhamula wa vandu vevavili mumi na vandu vevafwili.
ACT 10:43 Vamlota voha va Chapanga vijova ndava yaki kuvya mundu yoyoha mweakumsadika Yesu, yati ilekekeswa kumbudila Chapanga, paliina laki.”
ACT 10:44 Petili pavi akona ilongela malovi ago, Mpungu Msopi akavahelelela vandu voha vevayuwanila ujumbi wula.
ACT 10:45 Vayawudi vamsadika vevabweli pamonga na Petili kuhuma ku Yopa, vakangisi kulola Chapanga avamemisi njombi ya Mpungu Msopi vandu vangali Vayawudi.
ACT 10:46 Muni vavayuwini vilongela kwa muluga za chiyehe kuni vakumulumbalila Chapanga. Kangi Petili akajova,
ACT 10:47 “Vandu ava vampokili Mpungu Msopi ngati tete. Wu, avi mundu yoyoha, mweakuvabesa vakotoka kubatiziwa na manji?”
ACT 10:48 Ndi akalagiza vabatiziwa kwa uhotola wa Yesu Kilisitu, kangi vakamuyupa Petili atama nawu magono nunuyu.
ACT 11:1 Vamitumi na vamsadika nunuyu vevavi ku Yudea vayuwini kuvya vandu vangali Vayawudi navene mewa vapokili Lilovi la Chapanga.
ACT 11:2 Hinu Petili, peawuyili ku Yelusalemu, vamsadika va Vayawudi vala vevaganisiwi kuvya vandu vangali Vayawudi vevadumwili jandu. Ndi vakang'ung'uta vakajova,
ACT 11:3 “Veve uhambili kutama na vandu vanga yingila jandu na hati kulya pamonga nawu!”
ACT 11:4 Penapo Petili akavadandaulila hotohoto kugavala mambu gala gegahengiki.
ACT 11:5 “Ligono limonga namuyupayi Chapanga kumuji wa Yopa, nagawene maono, nachiwene chindu ngati shuka yivaha yihuluswa pahi kuhuma Kunani kwa Chapanga, kuni yikamuliwi pandi zoha mcheche, yavikiwi pamuhana yangu.
ACT 11:6 Panakalingulili bwina mugati naloli hinyama ya magendelu mcheche, na hinyama ya mudahi na hinyama yeyilandala pamulima na hidege yeyimbululuka.
ACT 11:7 Kangi nayuwini lwami lukunijovela, ‘Petili, yimuka uhinja na kulya.’
ACT 11:8 Nambu nene nikajova, ‘Lepi Bambu, muni chakulya chochoha changayidakiliwa katu nakuyingila hati padebe mumlomo wangu.’
ACT 11:9 Nambu lwami lwa Kunani kwa Chapanga lwayuwaniki kavili, ‘Nakuvikelema vyangayidakiliwa vyakulya vyeavinyambisi Chapanga.’
ACT 11:10 Lijambu lenilo lahengiki mala yidatu, pamwishu vindu vyoha vikawuyiswa Kunani kwa Chapanga.
ACT 11:11 Chigafula vandu vadatu kuhuma Kaisalia vevatumiwi kubwela kwangu vakahika panyumba mwenatamayi.
ACT 11:12 Mpungu Msopi akanijovela nihamba pamonga nawu changali mtahu. Vamsadika ava sita nalongosini nawu kuhamba Kaisalea na kwenuko tavoha tayingili munyumba ya Kolineli.
ACT 11:13 Mwene atijovili namuna cheamuwene mtumu wa kunani kwa Chapanga, cheamuhumili munyumba yaki na kumjovela, ‘Tuma vajumbi vahamba ku Yopa vakamkemela mundu mmonga liina laki Simoni paliina lingi Petili.
ACT 11:14 Mwene yati akukujovela malovi gegakusangula veve pamonga na valongo vaku.’
ACT 11:15 Panatumbwili kulongela, Mpungu Msopi avahelili ngati cheatumbwili kutihelela tete.
ACT 11:16 Kangi nakumbwiki malovi geajovili Bambu, ‘Yohani abatizi kwa manji nambu nyenye yati mwibatiziwa kwa Mpungu Msopi.’
ACT 11:17 Hinu ngati Chapanga avapelili njombi vandu vangali Vayawudi ngati cheatipelili tete tetamsadiki Bambu Yesu Kilisitu, wu, nayani nene hati nilinga kumbesa Chapanga?”
ACT 11:18 Pevagayuwini malovi ago, vakaleka mhutanu, vakamlumba Chapanga, mukujova, “Kumbi! Chapanga avapeli fwasi vandu vangali Vayawudi vamuwuyila mwene vapata wumi!”
ACT 11:19 Kangi, ndava ya mang'ahiso gegahumalili lukumbi Stefani ikomiwa, vamsadika vapechengini. Vangi vakahamba mbaka Foinike vangi Kuplo na vangi ku Antiokia mukukokosa ujumbi wula kwa Vayawudi ndu.
ACT 11:20 Nambu vamsadika vangi vevahumili Kuplo na Kulene, vakahambili ku Antiokia vakakokosa ujumbi wenuwo kwa vandu vangali Vayawudi, vakokosayi Lilovi la Bwina la kumvala Bambu Yesu.
ACT 11:21 Bambu avatangatili na vandu vamahele vasadiki na kumuwuyila Bambu.
ACT 11:22 Malovi ga lijambu lila lahikili msambi wa vandu vevakumsadika Kilisitu va ku Yelusalemu. Ndi vamtumili Banaba ahamba ku Antiokia.
ACT 11:23 Peahikili kwenuko avawene vandu vamotisiwi na Chapanga, ndi akavya na luheku na kuvakangamalisa mitima voha vasindimala musadika yavi kwa Bambu.
ACT 11:24 Banaba avili mundu mbwina na mweamemiswi Mpungu Msopi na sadika, ndava ya lihengu la Banaba msambi uvaha wa vandu wayonjokisiki kwa Bambu.
ACT 11:25 Kangi, Banaba akawuka na kuhamba ku Taso kumlonda Sauli.
ACT 11:26 Hati peamuwene, amletili ku Antiokia. Voha vavili vakatama pamonga na msambi wa vandu vevakumsadika Kilisitu mu mwaka mmonga, kuni viwula msambi uvaha wa vandu. Ku Antiokia kwenuko ndi vawuliwa va kutumbula vakemeliwi Vakilisitu.
ACT 11:27 Mu magono genago, vamlota vangi va Chapanga vahumili ku Yelusalemu vakahelela ku Antiokia.
ACT 11:28 Hinu, mmonga wavi mweikemiwa Agabo alotili yati kwiva na njala yivaha pamulima wula. Njala yeniyo yahumalili lukumbi lwa ulongosi wa Kilaudio.
ACT 11:29 Vawuliwa vala vakahamula kuvatangatila vamsadika vevatama ku Yudea, kila mmonga apeleka chindu chochoha cheihotola.
ACT 11:30 Ndi vakakita mewa na kuvapela njombi zavi Banaba na Sauli vakavagotolela vagogo va vamsadika.
ACT 12:1 Papipi na Lukumbi lwenulo, Nkosi Helodi atumbwili kuvang'aha msambi wa vandu vevakumsadika Kilisitu.
ACT 12:2 Ahamwili Yakobo akomiwa na upanga, mlongo wa Yohani.
ACT 12:3 Peamanyili kuvya lijambu lenilo lavaganisi Vayawudi, ndi ayendalili akamkamula Petili. Lenilo lahengiki lukumbi lwa Mselebuko wa Mabumunda gangali ngemeku.
ACT 12:4 Peamali kumkamula Petili, akamsopa muchifungu, akavika manjolinjoli mcheche mu msambi mcheche. Helodi aganili kumuhumisa pavandu pawimalika Mselebuko wa Pasaka.
ACT 12:5 Hinu, lukumbi Petili avi muchifungu, nambu msambi wa vandu vevakumsadika Kilisitu vayendalili kumuyupa Chapanga kwa kukangamala.
ACT 12:6 Kilu kwakona ligono Helodi lealindila kumuhumisa Petili pavandu, Petili agonili pagati ya manjolinjoli vavili. Kuni akungiwi minyololo yivili, na valonda vavi mlyangu wa kujela mukulindila.
ACT 12:7 Bahapo, mtumu wa kunani kwa Chapanga akamuhumila na kuyima papipi nayu na lumuli wamlangisi muchifungu. Mtumu wa Kunani kwa Chapanga yula akamtova Petili muluvafu akamuyumsa akamjovela, “Yumuka kanyata!” Bahapo, minyololo yevamkungalili mu mawoko yikadaukana na kugwa pahi.
ACT 12:8 Hinu mtumu wa Kunani kwa Chapanga akamjovela, “Kunga mkungi na champali zaku.” Kangi akamjovela, “Uwala likoti laku na unilandayi.”
ACT 12:9 Petili akamlanda mbaka kuvala, nambu nakumanya kuvya gegihengeka na mtumu wa kunani kwa Chapanga gala ndi gachakaka, aholalili manya ilota maono.
ACT 12:10 Vapitili msambi wa valonda va kutumbula na kugelekela chingi, ndi vakahika pamlyangu wa lyuma wa kuyingila pamuji. Mlyangu wula wadindwiki wene, navene vakahuma kuvala. Pavagendayi munjila bahapo mtumu wa kunani kwa Chapanga yula akamleka Petili.
ACT 12:11 Hinu Petili peamanyili gegahumili, akajova, “Hinu nimanya chakaka kuvya Bambu amtumili mtumu wa kunani kwa Chapanga anisangula kuhuma mu mawoko ga Helodi na mambu goha Vayawudi gevalindalila.”
ACT 12:12 Peamanyili genago, ndi akahamba mbaka kunyumba ya Maliya nyina waki Yohani mweikemiwa mewawa Maluko. Mwenumo vandu vamahele vakonganiki kumuyupa Chapanga.
ACT 12:13 Petili ahodisi mlyangu wa kuvala na mdala mmonga mtumisi liina laki Loda, akamyidakila.
ACT 12:14 Msikana yula amanyili kuvya mweihodisa ndi Petili, akavya na luheku neju, hati kwakona kudindula mlyangu wula ndi akajumbalila mugati kuvajovela kuvya Petili ayimili kuvala ya mlyangu.
ACT 12:15 Vakamjovela msikana yula, “Una lupengu!” Nambu mwene akakangamala kujova chakaka. Vene vakamyangula, “Mwenuyo ndi manya mtumi waki.”
ACT 12:16 Lukumbi lwenulo Petili ayendelela kuhodisa mlyangu. Pamwishu vakadindula mlyangu pavamuwene vakakangasa neju.
ACT 12:17 Mwene akavagunisa kwa kuvalangisa chiwoko, akavadandaulila Bambu cheamusiwi muchifungu. Kangi akavajovela lijambu lenilo vavajovela Yakobo na vamsadika vangi vala, kavili akawuka na kuhamba pandu pangi.
ACT 12:18 Kwapachili wogohi wavayingili manjolinjoli vala, vakatumbula kukotana, “Kyani chechimkolili Petili?”
ACT 12:19 Helodi akalagazila vamlonda, nambu vamuwene lepi. Hinu akalagiza manjolinjoli vala vakotiwa, kangi akahamula vakomiwa. Helodi akawuka ku Yudea kula, na kuhamba kumuji wa Kaisalia na kutama.
ACT 12:20 Helodi ayomiswi neju na vandu va ku Tilo na vandu va ku Sidoni, hinu vene vampelekili vajumbi. Vene vakahotola kumkulukisa hoti Blasto avyaa upandi wavi, Blasto avi myimilila mkulu wa nyumba ya Unkosi. Kangi vakamhambila Helodi na kumuyupa kuvya na uteke, muni mulima wavi wahuvalila mulima wa Nkosi ndava ya chakulya.
ACT 12:21 Ligono limonga lelahaguliwi, Helodi kuni awalili nyula yaki ya unkosi na kutama pachigoda cha unkosi, avakokosili vandu.
ACT 12:22 Vandu vala vakaluluta kwa lwami vakajova, “Lwenulo ndi lwami lwa chapanga, lepi lwa mundu.”
ACT 12:23 Bahapo mtumu wa kunani kwa Chapanga akamgwisa Helodi pahi ndava amlumbalili lepi Chapanga, ndi akamemenwa na mangokoko ndi afwili.
ACT 12:24 Nambu Lilovi la Chapanga likayonjokesa kukula na kudandasika.
ACT 12:25 Banaba na Sauli pevamalili lihengu lavi, vakawuya ku Yelusalemu vakamtola Yohani mweikemiwa Maluko.
ACT 13:1 Mu msambi wa vandu vevakumsadika Kilisitu va ku Antiokia kwavili na vandu vangi vevavi vamlota va Chapanga na vawula, pagati yavi vavi Banaba na Sauli na Simioni mweikemiwa mtitu, Lukio wa Kulene, Manaeni mwealeliwi pamonga na Nkosi Helodi.
ACT 13:2 Pavamuyupayi Bambu na kujihinisa chakulya, Mpungu Msopi akavajovela, “Mnihagulila Banaba na Sauli ndava ya lihengu lenivakemelili.”
ACT 13:3 Hinu vakajihinisa chakulya neju na kumuyupa Chapanga, vakavapamisa mawoko panani yavi vakavatuma vahamba.
ACT 13:4 Hinu, Mpungu Msopi peamali kuvatuma Banaba na Sauli, vakahelela mbaka Seleukia na kuhuma kwenuko vakayingila muwatu mbaka kukisiwa cha Kuplo.
ACT 13:5 Pavahikili ku Salami vakakokosa Lilovi la Chapanga munyumba za kukonganekela Vayawudi. Yohani Maluko avi mtangatila wavi.
ACT 13:6 Vagendili kuhuma upandi umonga na kuhamba upandi wungi wa kisiwa na kuhika Pafo, vamkolili mundu mmonga Myawudi mhavi liina laki Bal yesu mlota wa udese.
ACT 13:7 Mwenuyo avi pamonga na Seligio Pauli, mkulu wa kisiwa chila avi mundu wa luhala neju. Selgio Pauli avakemili Banaba na Sauli muni ayuwana Lilovi la Chapanga.
ACT 13:8 Nambu mhavi yula Bal yesu mweikemelewa Elima kwa Chigiliki, alingili kuvabelelela muni kumbesa mkulu wa kisiwa chila akotoka kusadika sadika ya Chikilisitu.
ACT 13:9 Hinu Sauli mweikemiwa mewa Pauli, kuni amemisiwi Mpungu Msopi, akamlolokesa takataka mhavi yula,
ACT 13:10 na kujova, “Veve wamwana wa Setani, likoko wa kila chindu chechimganisa Chapanga, mweumemili uhakau na udese. Nakuleka hati padebe kubudisa uchakaka wa njila selede za Bambu!
ACT 13:11 Hinu, chiwoko cha Bambu yati chikubuna, yati wivya ngalola nakuhotola kulola lilanga mulukumbi.” Bahapo Elima chitita chikayingila mumihu gaki hati gakakoyoko, hati akatumbula kupamisa kuni na kuni, kulonda mundu wa kumkamula chiwoko amulongosa.
ACT 13:12 Mkulu wa kisiwa yula peagawene mambu gala, akasadika, akakangasa neju ndava ya mawuliwu gakumvala Bambu.
ACT 13:13 Kangi Pauli na vayaki vakawuka Pafo, vakayingila muwatu na kuhamba kumuji wa Peliga mulima wa Pamfulia. Nambu Yohani Maluko avalekili na kuwuya ku Yelusalemu.
ACT 13:14 Nambu vene vayendalili na lugendu kuhuma Peliga mbaka pamuji wa Antiokia ya Pisidia. Ligono la Kupumulila vakayingila munyumba ya kukonganekela Vayawudi na kutama pahi.
