ACT 13:15 Pevamali kusoma muchitabu cha malagizu ga Bambu geampeli Musa na Mayandiku ga Vamlota va Chapanga, vala vachilongosi va nyumba ya kukonganekela Vayawudi yila vavatumili ujumbi uwu, “Valongo ngati kuvi na malovi ga kuvakangamalisa mitima vandu ava mujova.”
ACT 13:16 Ndi Pauli akayima na kuvapungila chiwoko na kutumbula kuvajovela, “Vakolonjinji va Isilaeli na voha mwemumtopesa Chapanga, muniyuwanila!
ACT 13:17 Chapanga wa mulima uwu wa Isilaeli avahagwili vagogo vitu, akavakita vandu va kuvya mulima uvaha pavatamayi kuuyehe ku Misili. Kangi akavawusa kwenuko kwa makakala gaki.
ACT 13:18 Akasindimala nawu mulukumbi lwa miyaka alobaini kulugangatu kula.
ACT 13:19 Akagakomekesa makabila saba ga mulima wa Kanani ndi akavapela mulima wenuwo vandu avo kuvya uhali wavi.
ACT 13:20 Mambu ago gahengiki kwa lukumbi lwa miyaka miya mcheche na hamsini.” “Kangi akavapela vahamula mihalu vavalongosa mbaka magono ga mlota wa Chapanga Samueli.
ACT 13:21 Chechagelekili ndi vakamyupa nkosi, ndi Chapanga akavapela Sauli mwana wa Kishi wa lukolo lwa Benjamini, akalongosa mulukumbi lwa miyaka alobaini.
ACT 13:22 Peamuwusili Sauli, Chapanga akamhagula Daudi avya nkosi wavi. Chapanga mwene akavajovela hotohoto, nimhagwili Daudi mwana wa Yese, ndava muni mundu mweakuniganisa. Mwenuyo ndi mweihenga mambu goha genikugagana.
ACT 13:23 Kuhuma mu chiveleku cha mundu mwenuyo, Chapanga ngati cheavalagizi vandu va Isilaeli kuvapelekela Msangula ndi Yesu.
ACT 13:24 Yesu peavi akona kutumbula lihengu laki, Yohani amlongolili na kuvakokosela vandu voha va Isilaeli kuvya yikuvagana vamuwuyila Chapanga na kubatiziwa.
ACT 13:25 Yohani peavi mukumala ujumbi waki avajovili vandu, Mwiholela nene ndi yani? Mwemkumlindila lepi nene. Nambu yuwanila! Mweibwela mumbela yangu, nene nakuganikiwa hati kuwopola nyosi za champali zaki!”
ACT 13:26 “Valongo vangu, nyenye chiveleku cha Ibulahimu, na vangi voha mwemkumtopesa Chapanga! Ujumbi uwu wa usangula uletiwi kwitu!
ACT 13:27 Muni vakolonjinji va Yelusalemu na vakulu vavi vammanyili lepi Yesu kuvya Msangula, katu nakugamanya malovi ga vamlota va Chapanga gegasomewa kila Ligono la Kupumulila. Pamonga na ago vakagatimilisi kwa kumkoma Yesu lifwa.
ACT 13:28 Pamonga na avi lepi na yeyikumgana akomiwa, vamyupili Pilatu amhukumwa lifwa.
ACT 13:29 Na pevamali kuhenga goha gegayandikiwi kumvala Yesu, vakamuhulusa kuhuma mu msalaba, vakamvika mu litinda la mbugu.
ACT 13:30 Nambu Chapanga amuyukisi kwevafwili.
ACT 13:31 Mwene kwa magono gamahele, avahumalili vealongosini nawu kuhuma ku Galilaya mbaka ku Yelusalemu. Venavo ndi hinu vandu vevakujovela vandu va Isilaeli mambu ga Yesu.
ACT 13:32 Hinu tete tikuvakokosela nyenye Lilovi la Bwina, lenilo ndi lilaganu kwa vagogo vitu,
ACT 13:33 Chapanga ahengili lilaganu lenilo ndava yitu tete chiveleku chavi kwa kumyukisa Yesu, ngati cheyiyandikiwi Muzabuli ya pili, ‘Veve ndi Wamwana vangu na nene lelu na Dadi waku.’
ACT 13:34 Na ndava ya kumyukisa kwevafwili, nakuwuya kavili kwenuko ndi awolili lepi. Chapanga ajovili, ‘Yati nikupela mota ya usopi na uchakaka zezanamlagazili Daudi.’
ACT 13:35 Hinu wijova mu mayandiku gangi ga Zabuli, ‘Umleka lepi Msopi waku awola.’
ACT 13:36 Daudi mwene ahengili geigana Chapanga mulukumbi lwaki, na kangi afwili na kuvikiwa mu litinda la mbugu papipi na vagogo vaki, na higa yaki yawolili.
ACT 13:37 Nambu yula mweayukiswi na Chapanga kwa vafwili awolili lepi.
ACT 13:38 Ndava muni valongo vitu tigana nyenye mumanya chakaka kuvya munjila ya Yesu, ujumbi wa kulekekesewa kumbudila Chapanga ukokoswa kwinu,
ACT 13:39 mundu yoyoha mweamsadika mwene ndi ilekekesewa kumbudila Chapanga kwoha, lijambu langahotoleka ndava ya kulanda Malagizu ga Bambu geampeli Musa.
ACT 13:40 Mujiyangalila, gegajoviwi na vamlota va Chapanga gala gakotoka kuvakolela,
ACT 13:41 ‘Myuwanila, nyenye mwemuvi na likomo, mkangasayi na mfwayi! Muni chindu chenihenga hinu, mulusenje lwinu, yati musadika lepi hati ngati mundu avajovoli.’ ”
ACT 13:42 Pauli na Banaba pavawukili munyumba ya kuyupila Chapanga mula, vandu vala vakavagongolela vabwela Ligono la Kupumulila leligelekela, vavakangamalisa mambu gala.
ACT 13:43 Mngonganu wula pawamaliki Vayawudi vamahele na vandu vangali Vayawudi vevayingili njila ya kumuyupa Chapanga ya Vayawudi ndi vakavalanda Pauli na Banaba. Vene vakalongela nawu na kuvakangamalisa mitima vayendelela kutama kwa kuhuvalila ubwina wa Chapanga.
ACT 13:44 Ligono la Kupumulila lila lelagelekili kila mundu pamuji wula abwelili kuyuwanila Lilovi la Bambu.
ACT 13:45 Nambu Vayawudi pavawaweni vandu vamahele vakamema wihu, vakagabela malovi gaajovayi Pauli na vakamliga.
ACT 13:46 Pauli na Banaba vakalongela kwa ukekesi neju, “Yaganikiwi Lilovi la Chapanga litumbula kuvahikila hoti nyenye, nambu ndava mulibelili na kuvya nakuhotola kupokela wumi wa magono goha, hinu tikuvaleka na kuvahambila vandu vangali Vayawudi.
ACT 13:47 Muni Bambu atilagazili aga, ‘Nikuviki lumuli lwa vandu va pamulima, muni vandu voha vasanguliwa pamilima yoha.’ ”
ACT 13:48 Vandu vangali Vayawudi pevayuwini lijambu lila vakavya na luheku, vakaulumbalila ujumbi wa Bambu na vevahaguliwi vala kupewa na wumi wa magono goha wangali mwishu, vakavya vamsadika.
ACT 13:49 Lilovi la Bambu ladandasiki kila pandu pamulima.
ACT 13:50 Nambu Vayawudi vakavakulukisa vadala vangali Vayawudi vevitopeswa vevakumuyupa Chapanga na vagosi vevimanyikana wa muji wula. Vakatumbula kuvang'aha Pauli na Banaba, vakavavinga vahuma pamuji wavi.
ACT 13:51 Hinu vamitumi vala vakakung'unda lububu mumagendelu gavi kulangisa vabeli Lilovi la Bambu na vakahamba ku Ikonio.
ACT 13:52 Na vamsadika va ku Antiokia, ndi vamemiswi luheku na Mpungu Msopi.
ACT 14:1 Mewawa ku Ikonio kula, Pauli na Banaba vakayingila munyumba ya kukonganekela Vayawudi. Vakalongela cha ukekesi hati msambi uvaha wa Vayawudi na Vagiliki vakasadika.
ACT 14:2 Nambu Vayawudi vevabeli kusadika vakavakulukisa vandu vangali Vayawudi vavayomela Pauli na Banaba.
ACT 14:3 Vayendalili kutama kwenuko mulukumbi lutali. Vakalongela cha ukekesi ndava ya Bambu, na Bambu mwene ajilangisi uchakaka wa ujumbi wevihumisa kwa ubwina waki, kwa kuvahotosa kukita gachinamtiti na makangaso.
ACT 14:4 Vandu va muji wula vakalekengana, vangi vakavya upandi wa Vayawudi na vangi vakavya upandi wa vamitumi vala.
ACT 14:5 Kangi vandu vangali Vayawudi na Vayawudi pamonga na vachilongosi wavi, vakakita mpangu wa kuvakitila gahakau na kuvakoma kwa maganga.
ACT 14:6 Vamitumi vala pevamanyili mpangu wenuwo, vakajumbalila ku Lusitila na ku Delibe, miji ya ku Lukonia, na pamwambu ya miji ya papipi,
ACT 14:7 ndi vakayendelela kukokosa Lilovi la Bwina.
ACT 14:8 Lusitila kwenuko kwavili na mundu mmonga mweavi ngagenda kutumbula kuvelekewa kwaki, katu nakuhotola kugenda.
ACT 14:9 Ngagenda yula amyuwanilayi Pauli peakokosayi. Hinu Pauli akamlolokesa takataka na peamanyili kuvya avi na sadika ya kuhotola kulamiswa,
ACT 14:10 akamjovela kwa lwami luvaha, “Yima na magendelu gaku!” Bahapo mundu yula akahumba na kutumbula kugenda.
ACT 14:11 Msambi wa vandu pavawene lijambu leakitili Pauli, vakajova kwa lwami luvaha muluga ya Kilukaonia, “Hinu vachapanga vatibwelili kwa musula ya mundu!”
ACT 14:12 Vakavapele mahina ga uchapanga, Banaba vakamkemela Zeu, na Pauli ndava muni avi mjovaji mkulu, vakamkemela Helime.
ACT 14:13 Mteta wa chapanga Zeu, nyumba yaki yavi pamuhana ya muji, akagega ng'ombi mpapakasi na njingwa ya maluva palongolo ya mlyangu ukulu muji pamonga na msambi wa vandu vagana kuvawusila luteta vamitumi.
ACT 14:14 Nambu Banaba na Pauli pevayuwini malovi gala vakapapula nyula zavi na kujumbalila pamsambi wa vandu wula, na kujova kwa lwami luvaha.
ACT 14:15 “Vagosi nyenye, ndava kyani mwikita lijambu lenili? Tete mewa tavandu ngati nyenye. Ndi tikuvakokosela Lilovi la Bwina, nyenye mukoto kugundamila chimong'omong'o, mumuwuyila Chapanga wa wumi, mweawumbili kunani na mulima na nyanja pamonga na vindu vyoha.
ACT 14:16 Kadeni Chapanga avalekekisi vandu voha vahenga chevigana vene.
ACT 14:17 Nambu Chapanga alekili lepi kujilangisa kwa mambu gabwina geavahengili, kuvatonyela fula kuhuma kunani, kuvapela mabenu mulukumbi lwaki na kuvapela chakulya cha kuyimemesa mitima yavi luheku.”
ACT 14:18 Pamonga na vamitumi kujova malovi genago, yavili nakunonopa kuubelelela msambi wa vandu ukoto kuvawusila luteta.
ACT 14:19 Kangi Vayawudi nunuyu vakabwela kuhuma Antiokia na Ikonio, vakavakulukisa vandu, vamtova Pauli na maganga. Vakamkwega mbaka kuvala ya muji, kuni vahololela afwili.
ACT 14:20 Nambu vawuliwa pavamtindili akayumuka akawuya kumujini. Chilau yaki mwene pamonga na Banaba vakahamba ku Delibe.
ACT 14:21 Pauli na Banaba vakakokosa Lilovi la Bwina ku Delibe, ndi vakayonjokeseka vawuliwa vamahele. Kangi vakawuya ku Antiokia vakavedukila Lusitila na Ikonio.
ACT 14:22 Ndi vakavakangamalisa mitima vamsadika, vasindimala na sadika yavi, vakavajovela ngati tavoha yikutigana kuyingila Muunkosi wa Chapanga munjila ya mang'ahiso gavaha.
ACT 14:23 Pauli na Banaba vakavahagula vagogo mukila msambi wa vandu vevakumsadika Kilisitu ndava ya kuyupa Chapanga na kujihinisa chakulya, vakavavika muulonda wa Bambu mwevakumsadika.
ACT 14:24 Pevamalili kupitila Pisidia ndi vakahika Pamfulia.
ACT 14:25 Kangi pevamalili kuvakokosela ujumbi wula vandu va ku Peliga, ndi vakahamba ku Atalia.
ACT 14:26 Mulugendu vakahuma ku Atalia vakawuya ku Antiokia kwevayupiwi ubwina wa Chapanga, ndava ya lihengu levakitili.
ACT 14:27 Na pavahikili vahengili mngonganu na vamsadika vakavajovela vandu mambu goha, Chapanga geagahengili pamonga nawu, na cheavadindulili vandu vangali Vayawudi mlyangu wa sadika.
ACT 14:28 Ndi vakatama pamonga mulukumbi lutali na vamsadika vala.
ACT 15:1 Hinu, vandu vangi vakahuma ku Yudea na kubwela ku Antiokia, vakatumbula kuvawula valongo vala, nakuhotola kusanguliwa ngati mwangayingila jandu, ngati mvelu wa Musa cheulagiza.
ACT 15:2 Pauli na Banaba vakavya na mhutanu na vandu vala ndava ya lijambu lila, ndi vakahamuliwa Pauli na Banaba pamonga na vamsadika vangi va Antiokia vahamba ku Yelusalemu kukonganeka na vagogo na vamitumi ndava ya lijambu lenilo.
ACT 15:3 Mulugendu lwavi msambi wa vandu vevakumsadika Kilisitu ndi vavatangatili, vakapitila ku Foinike na ku Samaliya na kuvajovela vandu vangali Vayawudi chavamsadiki Chapanga. Malovi ago gavagahekisi neju vamsadika voha.
ACT 15:4 Pavahikili ku Yelusalemu, vakagongolelewa na msambi wa vandu vevakumsadika Kilisitu na vamitumi na vagogo, vene vakavajovela mambu goha Chapanga geagahengili pamonga nawu.
ACT 15:5 Nambu vamsadika vangi va msambi wa Vafalisayu vakayima na kujova, “Yikuvagana vandu vangali Vayawudi vadumuliwa jandu na kuvalagiza kulanda mhilu wa Musa.”
ACT 15:6 Hinu vamitumi na vagogo vakakonganeka ndava ya kulongalela lijambu lenilo.
ACT 15:7 Ndi pavakotini neju, Petili akayima na kujova, “Valongo vangu, mumanyili kuvya Chapanga anihagwili nene kadeni pagati yinu muni nikokosayi Lilovi la Bwina kwa vandu vangali Vayawudi navene vayuwana na vasadikayi.
ACT 15:8 Na Chapanga mweimanya mitima ya vandu, ajilangisi kuvayidakila kuvapela Mpungu Msopi vene ngati cheatipeli tete.
ACT 15:9 Nakuvabagula vandu, tete amala vene, ainyambisi mitima yavi ndava vakumsadika.
ACT 15:10 Hinu ndava kyani kumlinga Chapanga, mukuvagegesa ndwika vamsadika vala, ndwika vagogo vitu wala tavete tihotola lepi kugega?
ACT 15:11 Lepi, ndi tete tisadika ngati vene, yati tisanguliwa munjila ya ubwina wa Bambu Yesu.”
ACT 15:12 Mngonganu wa vandu voha wagunili nuu, ukuwayuwanila Pauli na Banaba vidandaula gachinamtiti na makangaso, Chapanga geagahengili muujumbi wavi kwa vandu vangali Vayawudi.
ACT 15:13 Pevamali kulongela, Yakobo akatumbula kujova, “Muniyuwanila valongo vangu!
ACT 15:14 Simoni Petili atidandaulili Chapanga penapo kadeni cheajilangisi kwa vandu vangali Vayawudi na kuvahagula vangi pagati yavi, vavyai vandu vaki.
ACT 15:15 Lijambu lenilo ndi liyidakilana na malovi ga vamlota va Chapanga, ngati Mayandiku Gamsopi chegijova,
ACT 15:16 ‘Bambu ajovili, pagenaga yati niwuya, na kuujenga kavili nyumba ya Daudi, yeyigwili.
ACT 15:17 Vandu vangi voha na vandu vangali Vayawudi, voha venivakemili vavyayi vangu yati vakunilonda Bambu.
ACT 15:18 Ndi cheajovili Bambu, mweagamanyisi mambu aga kuhuma kadeni.’ ”
ACT 15:19 Yakobo akayendelela kujova, “Nene nilola kuvya chabwina lepi kuvang'aha vandu vangali Vayawudi vevakumsadika Chapanga.
ACT 15:20 Nambu chabwina tivayandikila ujumbi kuvajovela, vayepa kulya vyakula vihakasa vya mahoka, vayepa ukemi vayepa kulya hinyama yidodanu na vayepa kulya ngasi.
ACT 15:21 Ndava muni kutumbula kadeni mhilu wa Chapanga weampelili Musa, wisomiwa kila Ligono la Kupumulila munyumba za kukonganekela Vayawudi, na malovi gaki gikokoselewa kila muji.”
ACT 15:22 Kangi vamitumi na vagogo va msambi wa vandu vevakumsadika Kilisitu voha vakahamula kuvahagula vandu nunuyu mumasambi wavi na kuvatuma ku Antiokia pamonga na Pauli na Banaba. Ndi vakamhagula Yuda mweikemiwa Basaba na Sila, vevitopeswa neju na vamsadika.
ACT 15:23 Vavapelili ujumbi weuyandikiwi aga, “Tete vamitumi na vagogo, valongo vinu, tikuvajambusa vayitu mwangali kuvya Vayawudi mwemuvi ku Antiokia na ku Silia na ku Kilikia.
ACT 15:24 Tiyuwini kuvya vandu nunuyo vakuhuma kwitu vavang'aisi mtima yinu na malovi gavi, vahengili genago changali malagizu gitu.
ACT 15:25 Hinu kwa pamonga tiyidakilini kuvahagula vajumbi vangi, valongosana pamonga na vankozi vitu Pauli na Banaba tivatumili kubwela kwinu.
ACT 15:26 Vandu vevajiwusili kuyagisa wumi wavi ndava ya kumhengela Bambu witu Yesu Kilisitu.
ACT 15:27 Ndava muni tivatumili Yuda na muyaki Sila, vene yati vakuvadandaulila malovi goha getivayandikili.
ACT 15:28 Hinu yimganisi Mpungu Msopi na tete tikotoka kuvagegesa ndwika neju ya mambu gala gegalagaziwi.
ACT 15:29 Mkoto kulya vyakulya veviwusiwi mahoka, kavili ngasi ya hinyama mkoto kunywa na mewawa hinyama yevadodili mkoto kulya, myepa ukemi. Yati muhenga chabwina ngati muyepili kuhenga mambu ago!”
ACT 15:30 Ndi pevamali kulagana, vajumbi vala vakawuka na kuhamba ku Antiokia. Kwenuko vakaukemela msambi wa vamsadika na kuvagotolela balua yeyiyandikwi yila.
ACT 15:31 Hinu pevamali kusoma ujumbi wula, malovi gaki gakavangamalisa mitima, vakavya na luheku neju.
ACT 15:32 Yuda na Sila vevavi vamlota va Chapanga, valongili nawu mulukumbi lutali vakuvapolesa na kuvakangamalisa mitima.
ACT 15:33 Pevamali kutama kwa lukumbi, valongo va ku Antiokia vakalagana nawu, vakavaganila uteke, kangi vakawuya kuhamba kula kwevatumwili.
ACT 15:34 Nambu sila ahamwili kusigalila.
ACT 15:35 Nambu Pauli na Banaba vasigalili ku Antiokia, kwenuko vene pamonga na vandu vangi vamahele vawulili na kuvakokosela Lilovi la Bambu.
ACT 15:36 Magono nunuyu gegagelekili Pauli akamjovela Banaba, “Tiwuya tikavagendela valongo vala vetavakokosili lilovi la Bambu tikaloli cheviyendelela.”
ACT 15:37 Banaba aganili mewa vamtola Yohani mweikemiwa Maluko.
ACT 15:38 Nambu Pauli aganili lepi kumtola Maluko, ndava mumbele avalekili ku Pamfulia na kubela kuvya pamonga mulihengu lavi.
ACT 15:39 Ndi ukahumila muhutanu uvaha pagati yavi, hati vakalekengana. Banaba akamtola Maluko, vakayingila muwatu na kuhamba ku Kuplo.
ACT 15:40 Pauli mwene akamhagula Sila, hinu vamsadika pevamali kuvayupila ubwina wa Bambu vakawuka.
ACT 15:41 Mulugendu lula vakapitila ku Silia na Kukilikia kuvakangamalisa msambi wa vandu vevakumsadika Kilisitu.
ACT 16:1 Hinu akahika ku Delibe na ku Lusitila, kweatamayi muwuliwa mmonga liina laki Timoti. Nyina waki mewawa avi msadika Myawudi, nambu dadi waki avi Mgiliki.
ACT 16:2 Timoti alumbiwi bwina na vamsadika va ku Lusitila na ku Ikonio.
ACT 16:3 Pauli aganili kulongosana na Timoti mulugendu, hinu akamdumula jandu. Akitili chenicho ndava Vayawudi voha vevatamayi pandi zila, vamanyili kuvya dadi wa Timoti avi Mgiliki.
ACT 16:4 Pavavi mulugendu lwa mumiji vavajovela vandu malagizu ga vamitumi vala na vagogo vala va ku Yelusalemu, vakavajovela vagalanda.
ACT 16:5 Hinu msambi wa vandu vevakumsadika kilisitu vakangamala muusadika, ndi vakayonjokeseka kila ligono.
ACT 16:6 Vakapitila mumiji ya Flugia na Galatia muni Mpungu Msopi nakuvayidakila kukokosa ujumbi wula ku Asia.
ACT 16:7 Pavahikili mumibaka ya Musia, valingili kuyingila mulima wa Bisunia. Nambu Mpungu wa Yesu nakuvayidakila.
ACT 16:8 Hinu vapitili ku Musia na kuhamba lumonga ku Tloa.
ACT 16:9 Lukumbi lwa kilu, Pauli akalota maono amuwene mundu mmonga wa ku Makedonia ayimili balapala na kumuyupa, “Kupuka ubwela ku Makedonia utitangatila.”
ACT 16:10 Pauli peagawene maono gala, bahapo tajitendelekili kukupuka kuhamba Makedonia muni tamanyili chakaka Chapanga atikemili tihamba kuvakokosela Lilovi la Bwina kwenuko.
ACT 16:11 Tagendili muwatu kuhuma ku Tloa mbaka Samotilake, na chilau yaki tahikili Neapoli.
ACT 16:12 Kuhuma kwenuko tikahamba ku Filipi muji mmonga pamulima wa Makedonia, Likoloni la Valumi. Ndi tatamili muji wenuwo mulukumbi lwa magono.
ACT 16:13 Ligono la Kupumulila tahumuli kuvala ya muji, na kuhamba pamuhana ya mfuleni pandu petahololela pakuyupila Chapanga. Ndi tikatama na kulongela na vadala vevakonganiki penapo.
ACT 16:14 Mmonga wa vadala vevatiyuwanila vala, avi mdala mmonga msadika liina laki Lidia, mkolonjinji wa Tuatila, mweigula na kugulisa nyula za mashonga gamahele. Bambu amdindwili mtima waki hati akagalanda malovi gala geajova Pauli.
ACT 16:15 Mdala yula pamonga na vandu va munyumba yaki pevamali kubatiziwa, akatigongolela, “Ngati chakaka myidakili kuvya nene namsadika wa Bambu, mbwela kutama kunyumba yangu.” Akakangamala kutijovela tihamba.
ACT 16:16 Ligono limonga patakavi mukuhamba pandu pa kumuyupa Chapanga, takonganiki na msikana mmonga mvanda mweavi na mzuka wa kulondola. Mdala mwenuyo avapela mashonga gamahele vandu vana vindu vyamahele ndava ulondola waki.
ACT 16:17 Msikana yula akatilanda Pauli na tete, ijova kwa lwami luvaha, “Vandu ava ndi vatumisi va Chapanga Mkulu! Vakuvadandaulila njila ya kusanguka!”
ACT 16:18 Akitili chenicho kwa magono gamahele mbaka ligono limonga Pauli akayoma, akamng'anamukila na kuujovela mzuka wula, “Muuhotola wa Yesu Kilisitu nikulagiza muwuka mundu uyu!” Bahapo mzuka wula ukamuwuka.
ACT 16:19 Vakulu va mvanda yula pavawene mpangu wavi wa kupata mashonga kuhuma kwa mvanda wavi umaliki, vakavakamula Pauli na Sila na kuvakwekesa pandu pakugulisila vindu, palongolo ya vakulu va muji.
ACT 16:20 Vakavatakila kwa vahamula mihalu va Loma na kujova, “Vandu ava vileta chitututu pamuji witu navene ndi Vayawudi.
ACT 16:21 Viwula mivelu yeyibesiwi kwa tete vandu va ku Loma kuyidakila na kuyilanda.”
ACT 16:22 Na msambi wa vandu wewavi penapo ukavatova Pauli na Sila. Kangi vahamula mihalu vala vakavapapula nyula za Pauli na Sila, vakahamula vatovewayi ndonga.
ACT 16:23 Pevamali kuvatova neju, vakavasopa muchifungu na linjolinjoli wa jela alagaziwi kuvya mihu muulonda.
ACT 16:24 Ndava ya malagizu genago, linjolinjoli wa jela akavasopa muchumba cha mugati neju na kuvakunga magendelu gavi muhibiki.
ACT 16:25 Peyahikili pagati ya kilu Pauli na Sila vamuyupayi na kumuyimbila nyimbu za kumulumbalila Chapanga, kuni vafungwa vayavi vakuvayuwanila.
ACT 16:26 Chigafula mndendemo mvaha wa ndima ukahumila, wewanyugwisi mikingisa ya jela. Bahapo milyangu hikadinduka na minyololo yevakungiwi vafungwa yikawopoka.
ACT 16:27 Linjolinjoli wa jela peayumwiki na kulola milyangu ya jela gavi mbee, akatola upanga na kugana kujikoma, ndava aholalili kuvya vafungwa voha vatilili.
ACT 16:28 Nambu Pauli akakemela kwa lwami luvaha, “Ukoto kujikoma wamwene, muni tee tavoha takona tivii!”
ACT 16:29 Linjolinjoli yula peamali kuyupa hahi, akajumbalila mugati akajigwisa pahi pa magendelu ga Pauli na Sila kuni ivagaya kwa wogohi.
ACT 16:30 Kangi akavalongosa mbaka kuvala, akavakota, “Mwavakulu vangu, nikita kyani nihotola kusanguka?”
ACT 16:31 Vene vakamyangula, “Umsadika Bambu Yesu ndi veve pamonga na vandu va munyumba yaku yati mwisanguliwa.”
ACT 16:32 Hinu vakamkokosela Lilovi la Bambu mwene pamonga na vandu va munyumba yaki.
ACT 16:33 Lukumbi lulolo lwa kilu, linjolinjoli wa jela yula akavatola na kuvasambisa mavamba gavi, kangi mwene na vandu va munyumba yaki vabatiziwi bahapo.
ACT 16:34 Kangi akavagongolela Pauli na Sila kunyumba yaki, kuvapela chakulya. Mwene pamonga na vandu va munyumba yaki vakavya na luheku neju ndava hinu vakumsadika Chapanga.
ACT 16:35 Chilau yaki lukela, vahamula mihalu va Chiloma vavatumili vakulu va manjolinjoli na malagizu aga, “Muvadindulila vandu vala.”
ACT 16:36 Linjolinjoli wa jela akamjovela Pauli, “Vahamula mihalu va Loma vatumili na ujumbi uwu kwa veve na Sila mudinduliwayi. Hinu mwihotola kuhuma na muhamba na uteke.”
ACT 16:37 Nambu Pauli akamyangula, “Gavi wuli? Tahokili lepi vatitovili ndonga pavandu kuni tavete tavakolonjinji wa ku Loma. Kangi vatisopili muchifungu na hinu vigana kutidindulila cha mfiyu! Hati padebe! Yikuvagana vene vahamula mihalu ndi vabwela kutidindulila.”
ACT 16:38 Vakulu va manjolinjoli vakavadandaulila lijambu lila vahamula mihalu, hinu vene pevayuwini kuvya Pauli na Sila vavi vakolonjinji va mulima wa ku Loma vayogwipi.
ACT 16:39 Ndi vakahamba na kujova, “Chondi mpepayi,” Na pavavahumisi mugati, vakavayupa vawuka pamuji wula.
ACT 16:40 Pauli na Sila pavahumili muchifungu vakahamba kunyumba ya Lidia, kwenuko vakakonganeka na vamsadika. Pevamali kuvakangamalisa mitima vakawuka.
ACT 17:1 Mulugendu lwavi vakapitila Amfipoli na Apolonia, vakahika ku Tesalonike kwavili na nyumba ya kukonganekela Vayawudi.
ACT 17:2 Na ngati chayavili mvelu wa Pauli, akayingila mugati mula na kukotana nawu kugavala mu Mayandiku Gamsopi Magono gadatu ga Kupumulila gegagekilini.
ACT 17:3 Avadandaulili na kuvalangisa kuvya yikumgana Kilisitu kung'aiswa na kuyuka. Akavajovela, “Yesu mwenikuvakokosela nyenye ndi Kilisitu.”
ACT 17:4 Vangi pagati yavi vakasadika na kuvya pamonga na Pauli na Sila. Mewawa Vagiliki vamahele vevakumsadika Chapanga pamonga na vadala vevitopeswa vakavya pamonga.
ACT 17:5 Nambu Vayawudi vakavya na wihu, hati vakavakoka valauni va pabomani na kukita msambi na kuhenga chitututu muji woha. Vakaizangila nyumba ya Yasoni vahuvalilayi vihotola kuvapata Pauli na Sila muni vavaleta pavandu.
ACT 17:6 Ndava vavapatili lepi, ndi vakamukwega Yasoni na vamsadika vangi mbaka pavakulu va muji, vakajova kwa lwami luvaha, “Vandu ava ndi vevikita chitututu pamulima woha na hinu vahikili kwitu.
ACT 17:7 Yasoni avagongolili kunyumba yaki. Voha vihenga chimumbele na malagizu ga nkosi wa ku Loma, vijova kuvya avi nkosi yungi liina laki Yesu.”
ACT 17:8 Ndava ya malovi ago vakavamesa ligoga vandu vamahele na vachilongosi va muji.
ACT 17:9 Hinu pevamali kumlipisa mashonga Yasoni na vayaki kangi vakavaleka vahamba.
ACT 17:10 Kanyata kilu yila, vamsadika vala vakavatuma Pauli na Sila vahamba ku Belea. Navene pavahikili kwenuko vakayingila munyumba ya kukonganekela Vayawudi.
ACT 17:11 Vayawudi va ku Belea vavi vayuwanaji neju kuliku Vayawudi va ku Tesalonike, valipokili Lilovi la Chapanga na kugalingulila bwina Mayandiku Gamsopi muni vamanya ngati Pauli na Sila ijova malovi ga chakaka.
ACT 17:12 Vandu vamahele pagati yavi vasadiki, vavi na vadala va Chigiliki vevitopeswa mewa na vagosi.
ACT 17:13 Nambu Vayawudi wa ku Tesalonike pevamanyili kuvya Pauli akokosayi Lilovi la Chapanga Belea, vakahamba kwenuko na kutumbula chitututu na kuvakokeha vandu vamahele.
ACT 17:14 Vamsadika vala vakamhindikila kanyata Pauli ahamba kumbwani, nambu Sila na Timoti vasigalili balapala.
ACT 17:15 Vandu vala vakamhindikila Pauli mbaka Atene. Kangi vakawuya na kuni valagaziwi na Pauli kuvya, Sila na Timoti vamlanda kanyata.
ACT 17:16 Pauli peavalindilayi Sila na Timoti ku Atene kula, akaviniswa neju mumtima waki ndava auwene muji wula umemili vimong'omong'o vya uchapanga.
ACT 17:17 Ajovisini na Vayawudi na vandu vangi vevakumsadika Chapanga, munyumba ya kukonganekela Vayawudi, ndi kila ligono ajovesana na vandu vevahumila pandu pakugulisila vindu.
ACT 17:18 Vandu vevalanda mawuliwu ga Epikulo na Stoiki vakotini nayu. Ndi vangi vakajova, “Igana kujova kyani muyimu uyu?” Hinu vangi vakajova, “Ikokosela vachapanga vachiyehe.” Ndava Pauli avakokosela malovi ga kumvala Yesu na kuyuka,
ACT 17:19 Kangi vakamgongolela Pauli na ahamba palongolo ya libanji lelikemelewa Aleopago, vakajova, “Tigana utimanyisa mawuliwu aga gamupya geukugajova.
ACT 17:20 Ndava muni ukutijovela mambu ga chiyehe mumakutu gitu. Tigana kumanya maana ya mambu ago.”
ACT 17:21 Vandu va ku Atene pamonga na vayehe va kwenuko lukumbi lwavi lwoha vadandaulilana na kuyuwanila mambu gamupya.
ACT 17:22 Pauli akayima pa libanji la Aleopago, akajova, “Vandu va ku Atene! Nikuvalola nyenye kuvya vandu mwemukumuyupa Chapanga.
ACT 17:23 Ndava panapitayi kuni na kula na kulola mambu ga kuyupa kwinu, nayiwene lusanja lwa luteta lweluyandikwi, ‘Kwa Chapanga Angamanyikana.’ Hinu nene nikuvakokosela malovi gaki mwenuyo mwemukumuyupa changali kumanya.
ACT 17:24 Chapanga mweawumbili mulima pamonga vindu vyoha yvevivi mugati yaki, ndi Bambu wa kunani na pamulima, mwene nakutama Nyumba za Chapanga zezijengiwi na mawoko ga vandu.
ACT 17:25 Mwene igana lepi kuhengewa na vandu, ngati kuvya igana utangatila wowoha wula, ndava muni mwene ndi mweakuvapela vandu wumi, mweakuvahotosa kukeka na kuvapela kila chindu.
ACT 17:26 Kuhuma kwa mundu mmonga, mwene awumbili vandu va milima yoha muni vatama pamulima woha, avapangili lusenje na mibaka ya pandu pakutama.
ACT 17:27 Chapanga aganili vandu vamulanda na hati cha kupapasa, vahotola kumhikila. Nambu mwene avi lepi patali na kila mmonga witu.
ACT 17:28 Ngati cheajovili mundu mmonga kuvya, ‘mugati mwaki tete titama na kugenda na tivili!’ Ngati vayimbaji vangi chavijova, ‘Tete ndi vana vaki.’
ACT 17:29 Muni tete tavana vaki Chapanga, nakuganikiwa kumhololela mwene kuvya avi ngati zahabu amala mashonga amala liganga lelihongoliwi kwa luhala na vandu.
ACT 17:30 Chapanga akitili ngati ilola lepi lusenje lula vandu pavahimwiki. Nambu hinu, ihamula vandu voha kila pandu vamuwuyila mwene.
ACT 17:31 Ndava amali kuhagula ligono leihamula mulima pangali kumganisila yoyoha munjila ya mundu mmonga mweamhagwili. Chapanga avalangisi voha lijambu lenilo kwa kumyukisa mundu mwenuyo kwevafwili.”
ACT 17:32 Pavamuyuwini Pauli ijova lijambu la kuyuka kuhuma kwa vafwili, vangi vakamuheka nambu vangi vakajova, “Tigana kuyuwana kavili lijambu lenili.”
ACT 17:33 Na Pauli akavaleka akahuma mu libanji.
ACT 17:34 Nambu vandu nunuyu vakawungana nayu, vakavya vamsadika. Pagati yavi avi Dionisi wa ku Aleopago na mdala mmonga liina laki Damali, pamonga na vandu vangi.
ACT 18:1 Pagamaliki ago, Pauli akawuka ku Atene na kuhamba Kolinto.
ACT 18:2 Kolinto kula amkolili Myawudi mmonga liina laki Akula, mkolonjinji wa Ponto. Akula pamonga na mdala waki Plisika, vawuyili magono gagago kuhuma ku Italia ndava chilongosi Kaisali Kilaudio ahamwili Vayawudi voha vawuka ku Loma. Ndi Pauli akahamba kuvalola,
ACT 18:3 na ndava vene vavi vevitengeneza mandanda lihengu ngati laki, ndi Pauli akatama nawu kuhenga.
ACT 18:4 Kila Ligono la Kupumulila akotanayi nawu munyumba ya kukonganekela Vayawudi alingayi kuvakulukisa Vayawudi na Vagiliki.
ACT 18:5 Sila na Timoti pavahikili kuhuma Makedonia, hinu lukumbi lwaki lwoha Pauli atumili ndava ya kuvakokosela Vayawudi, kuvya chakaka Yesu ndi Kilisitu Msangula.
ACT 18:6 Nambu Vayawudi pavampingayi na kutumbula kumliga, mwene akakung'unda lububu lwa munyula zaki akavajovela, “Mwakayaga kwali mwavene, nene nihokili lepi. Na kutumbula hinu nikuvahambalila vandu vangali Vayawudi.”
ACT 18:7 Kangi Pauli akawuka penapo na kuhamba kutama kunyumba ya mundu mmonga Mgiliki mweakumsadika Chapanga liina laki Tito Yusto nyumba yaki yavili papipi na nyumba ya kukonganekela Vayawudi.
ACT 18:8 Kilisipo chilongosi wa nyumba ya kukonganekela Vayawudi yula, mwene pamonga vandu va nyumba yaki vamsadiki Bambu, Vakolinto vamahele pevayuwini ujumbi wula vakasadika na kubatiziwa.
ACT 18:9 Ligono limonga kilu, Bambu akamjovela Pauli mumaono, “Ukoto kuyogopa, yendelela kukokosa changali kudenyeka mtima,
ACT 18:10 Muni nene nivii pamonga na veve na kawaka mundu wa kulinga kukulemasa muni pamuji wenuwo vandu vamahele vavi upandi wangu.”
ACT 18:11 Hinu Pauli atamili kwenuko mulukumbi lwa mwaka umonga na upinga kuni iwula vandu Lilovi la Chapanga.
ACT 18:12 Nambu lukumbi Galio peavi chilongosi wa Akaya, ndi Vayawudi vakamzangila Pauli kwa pamonga na kumpeleka kulibanji la mihalu.
ACT 18:13 Vakajova “Timtakila mundu uyu ndava akuvakulukisa vandu vamuyupa Chapanga munjila yeyiyidakilana lepi na malagizu.”
ACT 18:14 Pauli akona kuyangula, Galio akavajovela Vayawudi, “Myuwanila Vayawudi nyenye! Ngati kuvya chakaka lijambu lenili ngalavi la unyagaji amala uhakau nga nivayuwanili.
ACT 18:15 Nambu ngati ndava ya muhutanu wa malovi na mahina na mhilu winu, muhamula nyenye mwavene. Nene niganili lepi kuvya mhamula wa lijambu ili!”
ACT 18:16 Ndi akavavinga kuhuma mu libanji la mihalu.
ACT 18:17 Hinu vene vakamkamula Sostene chilongosi wa nyumba ya kukonganekela Vayawudi, vakamtova balapala palongolo ya libanji la mihalu. Nambu Galio nakutangatila nawu hati padebe.
ACT 18:18 Pauli akayendelela kutama na valongo va ku Kolinto kwa magono gamahele. Kangi akavalaga akayingila muwatu kuhamba ku Silia pamonga na Plisika na Akula. Kenkelea kwenuko aketili mayunju gaki ndava amali kutimilisa chilapu chaki kwa Chapanga.
ACT 18:19 Pavahikili ku Efeso ndi Pauli akavaleka Plisika na Akula, akahamba munyumba ya kukonganekela Vayawudi, akakotana na Vayawudi.
ACT 18:20 Vamuyipili atama nawu palukumbi lutali, nambu nakuvayidakila.
ACT 18:21 Nambu akalagana nawu peawukayi, akavajovela, “Ngati Chapanga aganili yati nibwela kavili.” Akawuka ku Efeso muwatu.
ACT 18:22 Peahulwiki Kaisalia, Pauli akahamba pa Yelusalemu na kuvajambusa msambi wa vandu vevakumsadika Kilisitu. Kangi akahamba ku Antiokia.
ACT 18:23 Ndi akatama kwenuko mu magono gadebe akayendelela na lugendu kupitila miji ya Galatia na Flugia avakangamalisa vamsadika voha.
ACT 18:24 Magono gagago Myawudi mmonga liina laki Apolo mkolonjinji wa Alekisanda, ndi abwelili ku Efeso. Avi na luhala lwa kulongela na mweimanya bwina Mayandiku Gamsopi.
ACT 18:25 Mundu mwenuyo awuliwi njila ya Bambu, kuni mtima waki uvi heyuheyu akatumbula kudandaula na kuwula uchakaka malovi ga Yesu, nambu mwene amanyili nga ubatizu wa Yohani.
ACT 18:26 Mwene akatumbula kulongela kwa ukekesi munyumba ya kukonganekela Vayawudi, hinu Plisika na Akula pavamuyuwini vakamtola kuhamba nayu kunyumba yavi na kumuwula Njila ya Chapanga kwa uchakaka neju.
ACT 18:27 Apolo peaganili kuhamba ku Akaya, vamsadika va ku Efeso vakamkangamalisa mtima na kuvayandikila vamsadika vala vampokelayi. Peahikili kwenuko avatangatili neju vandu vevasadika vala kwa makakala ga ubwina wa Bambu.
ACT 18:28 Ndi ayendalili kwa ukekesi kujovesana na kuvashinda Vayawudi pavandu ijova hotohoto mu Mayandiku Gamsopi kuvya Yesu ndi Kilisitu Msangula.
ACT 19:1 Lukumbi Apolo avi Kolinto, Pauli akagenda mu vidunda na kuhika ku Efeso kwenuko avakolili vawuliwa nunuyu,
ACT 19:2 akavakota, “Wu, mwampokili Mpungu Msopi lukumbi pamwasadiki?” Vene vakamyangula, “Lepi! Hati kuyuwana kuvi Mpungu Msopi.”
ACT 19:3 Pauli akavakota, “Ubatizu woki wemwapatili?” Vene vakamyangula, “Ubatizu wa Yohani.”
ACT 19:4 Namwene Pauli akajova, “Ubatizu wa Yohani wavi ndava ya kulangisa kuvya vandu vamali kumuwuyila Chapanga. Yohani avajovili vandu kuvya vamsadikayi yula mweibwela palongolo yaki ndi Yesu.”
ACT 19:5 Hinu pevamali kugayuwanila genago, ndi vakabatiziwa muliina la Bambu Yesu.
ACT 19:6 Pauli avapamisi mawoko panani yavi na Mpungu Msopi akavahelelela, vakatumbula kulongela luga ya chiyehe na kukokosa ujumbi wa Chapanga.
ACT 19:7 Jumula vavi vagosi kumi na vavili.
ACT 19:8 Mulukumbi lwa miheyi yidatu Pauli ayendalili kuyingila munyumba ya kukonganekela Vayawudi, na kukokosa cha ukekesi na kukotana nawu ndava kuvakofwa kuuvala Unkosi wa Chapanga.
ACT 19:9 Nambu vangi vavi na mitima yeyitopa hati vakabela kusadika, vakajova gahakau ndava ya Njila ya Bambu palongo ya msambi wa vandu. Ndi Pauli akajibagula mwene pamonga na vamsadika vala, na kila ligono akakotana nawu mu libanji la mawuliwu la mundu mmonga liina laki Tilano.
ACT 19:10 Mambu ago gehengiki mulukumbi lwa miyaka yivili hati vakolonjinji voha va Asia, Vayawudi na vandu vangali Vayawudi vakayuwana Lilovi la Bambu.
ACT 19:11 Chapanga akitili gachinamititi ga kukangasa gamahele mu mawoko ya Pauli.
ACT 19:12 Hati vandu vavi mukutola hitambala ya kuhungulila na nyula zeazipamisi Pauli. Vavapelekili vatamu wavi ndi vakalama na vana mizuka mewawa, mizuka yikavahuma.
ACT 19:13 Mewawa kwavili na Vayawudi vevatyalatyala kuni na kula, kuvinga mizuka navene valinga mewa kuluwula liina la Bambu Yesu. Mewa vijova, “Nikulagiza umuhuma paliina la Yesu yula mweakumkokosa Pauli.”
ACT 19:14 Vevakita genago pagati yavi vavi vasongolo saba va Sikewa, mmonga wa Vateta Vakulu wa Vayawudi.
ACT 19:15 Nambu mzuka mhakau wula ukavayangula, “Nikummanya Yesu, na kavili nikummanya Pauli, nambu mwavayani nyenye?”
ACT 19:16 Na mundu mweatalaliwi na mzuka yula akavahumbila kwa chigigi voha vavili avashindili makakala. Navene vakajumba changali nyula kuni vana mavamba.
ACT 19:17 Mundu yeyoha mweitama ku Efeso, Myawudi na angali kuvya Myawudi, ayuwini lijambu lenilo. Voha vakavya na wogohi, vakalilumba liina la Bambu Yesu.
ACT 19:18 Vamsadika vamahele vakabwela na kujova hotohoto pavandu mambu gahakau gevahengili.
ACT 19:19 Vandu vamahele pagati ya vala vevikita mambu ga uhavi vakatola hitabu yavi na kuyocha motu palongo ya voha. Vakavalanga bei ya hitabu yahikili mashonga elufu hamsini.
ACT 19:20 Munjila yeniyo ndi Lilovi la Bambu chalayonjokisiki kudandasika na kuvya na makakala neju.
ACT 19:21 Chechagelekili mu mambu ago, Pauli akahamwili kuhamba ku Yelusalemu kwa kupitila Makedonia na Akaya. Akajova, “Nakahika kwenuko, mewawa yikunigana nigendelela ku Loma.”
ACT 19:22 Kangi avatumili vamtangatila vaki, Timoti na Elasito, vamlongolela kuhamba ku Makedonia, kuni mwene asigalili ku Asia magono gadebe.
ACT 19:23 Lukumbi lwenulo kweahumili chitututu neju ku Efeso ndava ya Njila yeniyo ya Bambu.
ACT 19:24 Mfukuta vindu vya madini ga mashonga mmonga liina laki Demetilio, mweavi na lihengu la kutengeneza majengu gadebe gadebe gegiwanangana na nyumba ya chapanga mdala Atemi. Lihengu lila lavapelili chiyonjokesu chivaha vahengati vaki.
ACT 19:25 Demetilio avakemili pamonga na vanalihengu vangi ngati laki akavajovela, “Vagosi, mmanyili kuvya mashonga gemwipata gihumila mulihengu lenili.
ACT 19:26 Hinu mwihotola kuyuwana na kujilolela mwavene mambu geihenga Pauli, lepi Pa Efeso pene, nambu mewa ku Asia yoha. Mwene akuvakulukisa na kuvang'anamusa vandu vasadikayi kuvya vachapanga vala vevitengenezwa na vandu, hati padebe lepi vachapanga.
ACT 19:27 Nga lepi lihengu litu livii muhatali ya kuveveswa, nambu mewawa na nyumba ya chapanga mdala mweavimkulu, Atemi, kuvalangiwa chindu lepi. Na kuwusiwa ukulu waki, mwene mweigundamiliwa Asia na mulima woha.”
ACT 19:28 Pevayuwini genago, vakamema ligoga na kutumbula kuywanga, “Mkulu ndi Atemi wa ku Efeso!”
ACT 19:29 Muji woha ukamema chitututu, vakavakamula Gayo na Alistako vakolonjinji va Makedonia, vevavi mulugendu pamonga na Pauli, vakavajumbisa mbaka mu libanji la mikinu.
ACT 19:30 Pauli aganili kujilangisa mu msambi wa vandu, nambu vawuliwa vakambesa.
ACT 19:31 Hati vakulu nunuyu va muji wa Asia vevavi vankozi vaki, vampelekili ujumbi Pauli, vakamjovela akotoka kujiyagisa mukuhamba kulibanji la mikinu.
ACT 19:32 Lukumbi lwenulo kila mundu aywangayi, vangi vijova aga na vangi vijova gala, hati mngonganu wula ukapechengana. Vangi nakumanya hati ndava ya kukonganeka kwavi.
ACT 19:33 Vayawudi vakamkang'a palongolo ya vandu mundu mmonga mweikemiwa Alekisanda, ndi vakamuwusa mwene palongolo ya vandu, Alekizanda akavapungila vandu chiwoko kuvagunisa. Muni aganayi kujikengelela palongolo yavi.
ACT 19:34 Nambu pevamanyili kuvya mwene ndi Myawudi, voha kwa pamonga vakaywanga, “Mkulu ndi Atemi wa ku Efeso!” Mewawa vakayendelela kuywanga mulukumbi lwa masaa gavili.
ACT 19:35 Pamwishu myimilila lihengu wa muji akahotola kuvagunisa vandu, akavajovela, “Vakolonjinji va ku Efeso, kila mundu imanya kuvya muji witu ndi mlonda wa nyumba ya chapanga Atemi na liganga lamsopi leligwili kuhuma kunani kwa Chapanga.
ACT 19:36 Avi lepi mweihotola kubela mambu aga. Ndi, yikuvagana kuguna, mkotoka kuhenga chindu changa hololela.
ACT 19:37 Ndava muni muvaletili vandu apa, pamonga vayivi lepi vindu vya nyumba ya chapanga amala kumliga chapanga witu wa chidala.
ACT 19:38 Ngati, Demetilio na vana lihengu vaki vavi na mhalu wavi ndava ya vandu ava, gavi kulibanji la mihalu na kwa na vakulu va miji, vihotola kutakila kwenuko.
ACT 19:39 Ngati muvi na mambu gangi, mugapeleka mumngonganu wewuyidakiliwa.
ACT 19:40 Muni tivii muhatali ya kutakiliwa ndava ya chitututu cha lelu, muni kawaka chanzu cha chitututu chenichi.”
ACT 19:41 Peamali kujova genago, akamala mngonganu.
ACT 20:1 Chitututu chila pechamaliki Pauli avakemili vamsadika vala akavakangamalisa mtima. Kangi akalagana nawu na kuhamba Makedonia.
ACT 20:2 Apitayi pandi za muji wula kuvakangamalisa vandu mitima mu malovi gaki gamahele, na kuhika ku Ugiliki.
ACT 20:3 Kwenuko atamili miyehi yidatu. Hinu peajitendeleka kuhamba ku Silia, akamanya kuvya Vayawudi vavi mukumkitila mpangu uhakau, ndi akahamula kuwuya munjila ya ku Makedonia.
ACT 20:4 Vandu ava ndi vealongosini nawu, Sapato mwana wa Piho mundu wa ku Belea, Alistako na Sekundo vandu va ku Tesalonike, vangi vavi Gayo mkolonjinji ku Delibe, Timoti pamonga na Tukiko na Tofimo vandu va kuhuma muji wa Asia.
ACT 20:5 Vandu ava vatilongolili na kuhamba kutilindila ku Tloa kula.
ACT 20:6 Nambu tete, pawamaliki Mselebuko wa Mabumunda gangali ngemeku, tayingili muwatu kuhuma ku Filipi, mulugendu lwa magono mhanu ndi tikahika ku Tloa. Tatamili kwenuko lijuma limonga.
ACT 20:7 Ndi Jumamosi kimihi takonganiki ndava ya kulya pamonga. Muni Pauli aganayi kuwuka chilau yaki, ndi avakokosili vandu mbaka pagati ya kilu.
ACT 20:8 Kugolofa kwetakonganiki kwavili na hahi zamahele ziyaka.
ACT 20:9 Msongolo mmonga liina laki Eutuko atamili palidilisha lukumbi Pauli ikokosa palukumbi lutali. Eutiko atumbwili kutitila lugono hati pamwishu lugono lwamgalisi akagwa kuhuma ku golofa ya datu mbaka pahi. Pevahambili kumyinula vamkoli amali kufwa.
ACT 20:10 Pauli akahuluka pahi, akajigonesa panani yaki na kumkumbatila, akajova, “Mkoto kuvemba ndava avi mumi.”
ACT 20:11 Akakwela kavili kuchumba cha kunani kula, akanukula libumunda na kulya. Akayendelela kukokosa kwa lukumbi lutali mbaka hambakucha, kangi akawuka.
ACT 20:12 Vandu vala vakawuya nayu msongolo yula kunyumba alamili hotohoto, ndi vakapoleswa neju.
ACT 20:13 Nambu tete tayingili muwatu kulongolela ku Aso kwetikumtola Pauli. Ndi cheapangili mwene muni aganili kuhika kwenuko munjila ya kundumba.
ACT 20:14 Hinu atikolili ku Aso tikamutola muwatu, na kuhamba nayu Mitulene.
ACT 20:15 Tavi mulugendu lwa kuhuma kwenuko na chilau yaki tahikili Kio. Pamalau yaki tahikili ku Samo na Pamtondogolo yaki tikahika ku Mileto.
ACT 20:16 Ndava Pauli aganili lepi kuvedukila ku Efeso muni akotoka kutamakisa neju mulima wa Asia. Ayumbatika kuhika ku Yelusalemu kumselebuko wa Pentekoste ngati yihotoleka.
ACT 20:17 Kuhuma Mileto Pauli avatumili ujumbi kwa vachilongosi va msambi wa vandu vevakumsadika Kilisitu va ku Efeso vakonganika nayu.
ACT 20:18 Hinu pavamhikalili akavajovela, mwavene mmanyili chenitamili na nyenye magono goha kutumbula ligono la kutumbula panahikili mulima uwu wa Asia.
ACT 20:19 Mmanyili chenimuhengili Bambu cha ungolongondi woha, na maholi, mu mang'ahiso goha geganikolili ndava mipangu mihakau ya Vayawudi.
ACT 20:20 Mmanyili kuvya hati padebe nayogwipi lepi kuvakokosela pavandu na munyumba zinu, kuvawula chochoha chechikuvatangatila.
ACT 20:21 Navabesili vandu voha, Vayawudi na vangali Vayawudi, vamuwuyila Chapanga na kumsadika Bambu witu Yesu.
ACT 20:22 Hinu, myuwanila! Nikumyidakila Mpungu Msopi, nihamba ku Yelusalemu changali kumanya gegakunikolela.
ACT 20:23 Nga chindu chimonga chenikuchimanya, Mpungu Msopi akunilangisa kuvya mukila muji chifungu na mang'ahiso ndi vyevyi kunilindila.
ACT 20:24 Nambu nivalanga lepi wumi wangu kuvya chindu, kwa nene ndi kumalakisa utumi wa lihengu lila leanipelili Bambu Yesu, kujova ndava ya Lilovi la Bwina la ubwina wa Chapanga.
ACT 20:25 “Nigendili pagati yinu mwavoha kukokosa Unkosi wa Chapanga. Nambu hinu, nimanyili avi lepi mundu hati mmonga winu mweakuniwona kavili.
ACT 20:26 Hinu lelu nijova chakaka, kuvya mmonga winu akayaga, mhalu wa nene lepi.
ACT 20:27 Ndava muni hata padebe naleki lepi kuvakokosela mwapangu woha wa Chapanga.
ACT 20:28 Mujiyangalila mwavene, myungayi msambi wa vandu vevakumsadika Kilisitu uwu, Mpungu Msopi avaviki nyenye mvya valonda vaki. Leajipatili kwa ngasi ya Mwana waki.
ACT 20:29 Nimanyili kuvya peniwukayi, mabwa gakali ga kudahi yati gavazangila changali lipyana msambi wenuwo.
ACT 20:30 Hati pagati yinu yati vihumila vandu veviwula mawuliwu ga udese muni vavayaganisa vamsadika, vavalanda vene.
ACT 20:31 Ndava ya yeniyo, mvya mihu kuni mukumbukayi kuvya mulukumbi lwa miyaka yidatu muhi na kilu katu nalekili lepi kumbesa kila mmonga winu kwa maholi.”
ACT 20:32 “Hinu ndi, nikuvavika nyenye pahi muulonda waki Chapanga na ujumbi wa mota yaki. Mwene anauhotola wa kuvasindimalisa na kuvapela uhali pamonga nawu vandu vaki vamsopi.
ACT 20:33 Nene nanogili lepi mashonga amala zahabu amala nyula za mundu yeyoha.
ACT 20:34 Mwavene mmanyili kuvya namwene nihegili lihengu mu mawoko gangu, ndava ya kupata gegiganikiwa kwa nene na vayangu.
ACT 20:35 Pamahele nivalangisi luhumu kuvya kuhenga mahengu neju, yikutigana kuvatangatila vangali makakala, na tikumbuka mu malovi ga Bambu Yesu mwene, ‘Mbanga neju kuwusa kuliku kupokela.’ ”
ACT 20:36 Peamali kujova genago, Pauli akafugama pamonga nawu voha akayupa kwa Chapanga.
ACT 20:37 Voha vakavya mukuvemba neju, pevalaga Pauli kuni vamkumbatili cha uganu.
ACT 20:38 Lijambu lelavavinisi neju ndi lila leajovili yati vakumlola lepi kavili. Hinu ndi vamhindikili mbaka muwatu.
ACT 21:1 Patamali kulagana nawu, tayingili muwatu na kuhamba lumonga mbaka Kosi. Chilau yaki tahikili kumuji wa Lode, na patahumili kwenuko tikahamba kumuji wa Patala.
ACT 21:2 Kula taukolili watu wewihamba mbaka ku Foinike, ndi tikayingila na kuyendelela lugendu.
ACT 21:3 Ndi patahikili pandu patahotwili kulola Kuplo, tikahamba upandi wa kusini mbaka Silia. Tikahamba kuyima ku Tilo ndi pandu pa watu wula payahulusayi ndwika.
ACT 21:4 Kwenuko tavakoli vamsadika, tatamili nawu mulukumbi lwa lijuma limonga. Vamsadika venavo vakavya vilongela mukulongoswa na Mpungu Msopi, vakamjovela Pauli akotoka kuhamba ku Yelusalemu.
ACT 21:5 Nambu lukumbi lwitu palwamaliki tavoha tawukili. Vawuliwa pamonga na vadala na vana vavi vatihindikili mbaka kuvala ya muji. Patahikili kumbwani tavoha tikafugama na kumuyupa Chapanga.
ACT 21:6 Kangi patamali kulagana nawu, tayingili muwatu na vene vakawuya kunyumba zavi.
ACT 21:7 Tete tayendalili na lugendu lwitu tahumili ku Tilo na kuhamba Tolemai kwetavajambwisi valongo vitu, tatamili nawu ligono limonga.
ACT 21:8 Chilau yaki tahumili penapo na kuhamba Kaisalia. Kwenuko tikatama kunyumba ya Filipi mkokosa wa Lilovi la Bwina. Mwene ndi avi mmonga wa vamtangatila saba vevahaguliwi ku Yelusalemu kula.
ACT 21:9 Mwenuyu avi na vakamwali mcheche vevavi na chipanji cha kulota malovi ga Chapanga.
ACT 21:10 Patatamili kwenuko magono gamahele, mlota mmonga wa Chapanga liina laki Agabo ahikili kuhuma ku Yudea.
ACT 21:11 Ndi atibwelili, akatola mkungi wa Pauli akajikunga mawoko na magendelu, akajova, “Mpungu Msopi ajovili aga, ‘Vayawudi va ku Yelusalemu kula yati vakumkunga mewa mundu mweavi na mkungi uwu na kumgotola kwa vandu vangali Vayawudi.’ ”
ACT 21:12 Patayuwini genago, tete pamonga na vandu vangi vevavi penapo, tamuyupili Pauli akotoka kuhamba ku Yelusalemu.
ACT 21:13 Nambu Pauli avayangwili, “Ndava kyani mwivemba? Na kunidenya mtima? Nijitendelekili, lepi ndava ya kukungiwa ndu ku Yelusalemu, nambu hati mewawa kufwa ndava ya liina la Bambu Yesu.”
ACT 21:14 Peabeli getamjovili tagunii tikajova, “Maganu ga Bambu gahengekayi!”
ACT 21:15 Patamali kutama mulukumbi, ndi takungili ndwika yitu, tayendalili na lugendu kuhamba ku Yelusalemu.
ACT 21:16 Vamsadika nunuyu va ku Kaisalia valongosini na tete, vatipeliki kunyumba ya mundu mmonga liina laki Mnasoni, ndi mwetahambayi kutama kwa lukumbi. Mwenuyo avi mkolonjinji wa muji wa Kuplo, msadika wa kadeni.
ACT 21:17 Hinu patahikili ku Yelusalemu, vamsadika vayitu vatipokili kwa luheku.
ACT 21:18 Chilau yaki Pauli pamonga na tete tahambili kumjambusa Yakobo na vagogo voha va msambi wa vandu vevakumsadika Kilisitu.
ACT 21:19 Patamali kuvajambusa, Pauli avajovili mambu goha Chapanga geagahengili kwa vandu vangalikuvya Vayawudi munjila ya lihengu laki.
ACT 21:20 Ndi pavagayuwini ago, vakamulumba Chapanga. Kangi vakamjovela Pauli, “Mlongo, uhotola kulola kuvya vavi maelufu ga Vayawudi vevavi vamsadika hinu na voha vilanda cha kukangamala malagizu ga Bambu geampeli Musa.
ACT 21:21 Vayuwini mambu gaku gewiwula Vayawudi vevitama pagati ya vandu vangalikuvya Vayawudi, kuvya vakotoka kulanda malagizu ga Bambu geampeli Musa, vakotoka kuvadumula jandu vana vavi kavili vakotoka kulanda mivelu ya Vayawudi.
ACT 21:22 Hinu tikita wuli? Chakaka yati viyuwana kuvya ubwelili.
ACT 21:23 Hinu kitayi ngati chetikujovela, penapa tivii na vagosi mcheche vevaviki chilapu kwa Chapanga.
ACT 21:24 Uwungana nawu mukuyupa kunyambiswa, ulipa mashonga gegiganikwa, kangi vaketewayi mayunju gavi. Ndi vandu voha yati vimanya kuvya mambu gala gevayuwini kukuvala veve gangali mana, ndi wamwene wakona witama na kulanda malagizu ga Malagizu ga Musa.
ACT 21:25 Nambu kuvavala vandu vangalikuvya Vayawudi vevasadiki, tivapelekili balua yetiyandiki mambu getihamwili, vakotoka kulya chindu chochoha chechiwusiwi luteta vachapanga va udese, vakotoka kunywa ngasi, na vakotoka kulya nyama ya hinyama yidodanu, vayepa ukemi.”
ACT 21:26 Hinu chilau yaki Pauli akavatola vandu vala muni ajinyambisa nawu pamonga, kangi akayingila Munyumba ya Chapanga, na kujova ligono la mwishu la kunyambiswa na luteta lweluwusiwa ndava ya kila mmonga.
ACT 21:27 Hinu magono gala saba pagihegelela kumalika, Vayawudi vevahumili wa Asia vamuwene Pauli Munyumba ya Chapanga. Ndi vakavakohokea ligoga msambi woha wa vandu, ndi vakamkamula.
ACT 21:28 Vakaywanga, “Vagosi va Isilaeli, mutitangatila! Mundu mwenuyu ndi mweakuvawula vandu kila pandu mambu gegibelana na vandu va Isilaeli, gegibesa malagizu ga Chapanga geampeli Musa na pandu apa Pamsopi. Hati hinu avayingisi vandu vangali Vayawudi Munyumba ya Chapanga na kupahakasa pandu pamsopi.”
ACT 21:29 Vajovili genago ndava vamuwene Tofimo mkolonjinji wa ku Efeso, alongosini na Pauli kumujini, vakaholalela manya Pauli amuyingisi Munyumba ya Chapanga.
ACT 21:30 Chitututu chadandasiki muji woha, vandu vakonganiki kuhuma pandi zoha, vakamukamula Pauli, vakamuhuta na kumuhumisa kuvala ya Nyumba ya Chapanga, na bahapo milyangu hikadindwa.
ACT 21:31 Pavalingili kumkoma Pauli, malovi gala gakamhikila mkulu wa msambi wa ku Loma kuvya Yelusalemu yoha yimemili chitututu.
ACT 21:32 Bahapo mkulu wa msambi akavatola manjolinjoli na vachilongosi wavi, vakavajumbila kuhamba. Vayawudi pavamuwene mkulu wa msambi pamonga na manjolinjoli vakaleka kumtova Pauli.
ACT 21:33 Mkulu wa msambi yula akamhegelela Pauli, akamkamula na kulagiza akungiwayi minyololo yivili. Kangi akakota, “Mwenuyu ndi yani? Abudili kyani?”
ACT 21:34 Vangi mu msambi wula vakavya mukuywanga vangi aga na vangi gala. Ndava ya chitututu, mkulu wa msambi wa manjolinjoli amanyili lepi uchakaka wa mhalu waki. Ndi akahamula vandu vaki vampeleka mugati ya ngomi ya manjolinjoli.
ACT 21:35 Pauli pahaikili pangazi, yavaganili manjolinjoli kumgega ndava ya chitututu cha vandu.
ACT 21:36 Ndava muni msambi wa vandu uvaha vamlandili kuni viywanga, “Mkomayi!”
ACT 21:37 Pavamuyingisa mungomi, Pauli akamuyupa mkulu wa msambi wa manjolinjoli yula, “Nihotola kukujovela chindu?” Mkulu wa msambi wa manjolinjoli akamkota, “Wu, umanya kujova Chigiliki?
ACT 21:38 Wu, veve ndi Mmisili yula magono gegapitili atumbwili chitututu na kuvalongosa vakomaji elufu mcheche kuhamba kulugangatu?”
ACT 21:39 Pauli akayangula, “Nene na Myawudi, mkolonjinji wa ku Taso muji wa Kilikia, muji weutopeswa. Chondi niyidakila nilongela na vandu.”
ACT 21:40 Mkulu wa msambi wa manjolinjoli yula akamyidakila. Ndi Pauli akayima panani ya ngazi akavapungila vandu chiwoko, muni vaguna, akatumbula kulongela nawu muluga ya Chiebulania.
ACT 22:1 “Valongo vangu na vadadi vangu, muyuwanila hinu chenikujikengelela palongolo yinu!”
ACT 22:2 Pevamuyuwini ilongela nawu kwa luga ya Chiebulania vakatama nuu neju. Kangi Pauli akayendelela kujova,
ACT 22:3 “Nene na Myawudi mkolonjinji wa ku Taso muji wa Kilikia. Nambu naleliwi bahapa pa Yelusalemu. Muwula wangu Gamalieli. Nawuliwi kulanda malagizu ga vagogo vitu, najiwusili mtima woha kwa Chapanga ngati chemuvi nyenye lelu.
ACT 22:4 Navang'ahisi hati kuvakoma vandu vala vevalanda Njila ya Bambu. Navakamwili vagosi na vadala na kuvakunga muchifungu.
ACT 22:5 Mteta mkulu wa Chapanga, vagogo voha va libanji vihotola kujova ndava ya lijambu lenili. Kuhumila kwavi napokili balua yevayandikiwi valongo Vayawudi vala, vevavi ku Damasko. Nahambili ku Damasko muni nivakamulayi vandu avo na kuvaleta kuni ku Yelusalemu, muni vabuniwayi.”
ACT 22:6 “Hinu, panavili munjila papipi kuhika Damasko, lukumbi lwa saa sita ya muhi, lumuli luvaha kuhuma kunani kwa Chapanga chigafula ukahumila na kunilangasa pandi zoha.
ACT 22:7 Penapo ndi nagwili pahi, nakuyuwana lwami lukunijovela, ‘Sauli, Sauli! Ndava kyani, ukuning'aha?’
ACT 22:8 Hinu nakotili, yani Bambu? Aniyangwili, ‘Nene ndi Yesu wa ku Nazaleti mweukumung'aha.’
ACT 22:9 Vayangu vala valuwene lumuli lula, nambu nakummanya lwami lwa mwenilongela nayu.
ACT 22:10 Ndi nikakota, ‘Nikita kyani, Bambu?’ Bambu akaniyangula, ‘Yima, uhamba ku Damasko na kwenuko yati ujoviwa goha geupangiwi kugahenga.’
ACT 22:11 Mihu nakuhotola kulola ndava ya lumuli lula, hinu yavaganili vayangu vala kunilongosa mbaka kuhika ku Damasko.”
ACT 22:12 “Kwenuko kwavili na mundu mmonga liina laki Anania, mundu mweakumtopesa Chapanga, mweilanda Mhilu wa Chapanga weampeli Musa na mweitopeswa neju na Vayawudi voha vevitama ku Damasko.
ACT 22:13 Mwene abwelili kunilola, akanihegelela na kunijovela, ‘Mlongo wangu Sauli! Lola kavili.’ Bahapo nikahotola kumlola.
ACT 22:14 Kangi Anania akajova, ‘Chapanga wa vagogo vitu akuhagwili veve uhotola kumanya maganu gaki, kumlola Mweikita geigana Chapanga, na kumyuwana malovi gaki.
ACT 22:15 Ndava muni yati wijova ndava yaki kwa vandu voha gala geugawene na kuyuwana.
ACT 22:16 Hinu ndi, ndava kyani kutamakisa? Yima, ubatiziwayi na kulekekeswa geumbudili Chapanga kwa njila yeniyi ukulikemela liina la Yesu.’ ”
ACT 22:17 “Hinu nawuyili ku Yelusalemu, na panavili mukuyupa Munyumba ya Chapanga, nagawene maono.
ACT 22:18 Namuwene Bambu akunijovela, ‘Yumbatika! Wuka Yelusalemu kanyata, ndava muni vandu va penapa yati vakukuyidakila lepi mukujova kwaku ndava yangu.’
ACT 22:19 Nikamyangula, Bambu, vandu ava vimanya hotohoto kuvya nene ndi yula mwenahambayi munyumba za kukonganekela Vayawudi na kuvakamula na kuvatova vala vevakusadikayi.
ACT 22:20 Na lukumbi Stefani mweijova ndava yaku peakomiwi, namwene navili nayidakili lepi chitendu chenicho hati navi mlonda wa nyula za vakomaji vala.
ACT 22:21 Kangi Bambu akanijovela, ‘Hamba, Yati nikutuma kutali kwa vangali Vayawudi.’ ”
ACT 22:22 Msambi wa vandu wamuyuwanili Pauli mbaka peajovili malovi ago. Kangi vakajova kwa lwami luvaha, “Mkoma mundu uyu! Mundu ngati uyu iganikiwa lepi kutama pamulima.”
ACT 22:23 Ndi vayendalili kuywanga kuni vitaga nyula zavi na kutikula lububu kunani.
ACT 22:24 Mkulu wa msambi wa manjolinjoli avalagizi vandu vaki vampeleka Pauli mungomi, akavajovela vamtova michapilu muni amanya ndava kyani Vayawudi vakumywangila.
ACT 22:25 Nambu pevamalili kumkunga Pauli muni vamtovayi, mwene akamkota chilongosi mmonga wa manjolinjoli mweayimi penapo, “Malagizu ginu yikuvayidakila kumtova mkolonjinji wa ku Loma angahamuliwa?”
ACT 22:26 Hinu chilongosi yula peayuwini genago, akamjovela mkulu wa msambi wa manjolinjoli akajova, “Wigana kukita kyani? Mundu uyu ndi mkolonjinji wa ku Loma!”
ACT 22:27 Hinu mkulu yula amhambalili Pauli, akamkota, “Nijovela, veve ndi mkolonjinji wa ku Loma?” Pauli akayangula, “Ena.”
ACT 22:28 Kangi mkulu yula akayendelela kujova, “Nene namkolonjinji wa Loma wa kugula kwa mashonga gamahele.” Pauli akajova, “Nambu nene namkolonjinji wa Loma mukuvelekewa.”
ACT 22:29 Vandu vala vevamkotekesayi na kumtova michapilu Pauli bahapo vakawuka. Hati mkulu yula akayogopa peamanyili kuvya Pauli mkolonjinji wa ku Loma na kuni amkungili minyololo.
ACT 22:30 Chilau yaki mkulu wa msambi wa manjolinjoli aganili kumanya matakilu ga Vayawudi gevamtakili Pauli. Ndi amuwopwili minyololo na akalagiza vamteta vakulu va Chapanga na vagogo va libanji loha vakonganeka. Kangi amletili Pauli na kumyimika palongolo yavi.
ACT 23:1 Pauli avalolokisi takataka vandu vevakonganiki palibanji vala na kujova, “Valongo vangu, mbaka lelu iyi nihotwili kutama kwa kuhenga gakumganisa Chapanga.”
ACT 23:2 Mkulu wa kuteta wa Chapanga, mweikemiwa Anania akalagazila vevayimili papipi na Pauli vampamanda likofi mumlomo.
ACT 23:3 Hinu Pauli akamjovela, “Chapanga mwene yati akutova likofi wamwene mweukujikita mbwina, mweuvi ngati luwumba lwevabakili chokaa! Wihotola wuli kutama na kuhukumwa malagizu kuni wamwene ukugadenya malagizu genago kwa kulagiza nene nitoviwayi?”
ACT 23:4 Vandu vevayimili penapo vakamjovela Pauli “Ukumliga Mteta Mkulu wa Chapanga!”
ACT 23:5 Pauli akajova, “Valongo vangu, namanyili lepi ngati mwene ndi Mteta Mkulu wa Chapanga. Ndava muni Mayandiku Gamsopi gijova, ‘Ukotoka kujova gahakau kumvala chilongosi wa vandu vaku.’ ”
ACT 23:6 Lukumbi lwenulo ndi Pauli amali kumanya vandu vangi mu libanji lila vavi Vafalisayu na vangi Vasadukayu. Akajova kwa lwami luvaha, “Valongo vangu, nene namfalisayu mwana wa mfalisayu. Vanitakili mu libanji kuvya nisadika vandu vevafwili yati viyuka.”
ACT 23:7 Peamali kujova malovi ago kanyata ukahumila muhutanu pagati ya Vafalisayu na Vasadukayu mngonganu wapechengini.
ACT 23:8 Muhutanu wene wavi, Vasadukayu vijova kuvya vandu vevafwili viyuka lepi, vavi lepi vamitumu va kunani kwa Chapanga. Mpungu nawene uvi lepi. Nambu Vafalisayu visadika goha ago gadatu.
ACT 23:9 Pakavya na njowo zamahele neju ndi vawula vangi va chikundi cha Vafalisayu vakayima na kujovesana kwa makakala, “Tichiweni lepi chihakau chochoha kwa mundu uyu, pangi kuvya mpungu amala mtumu wa kunani kwa Chapanga valongili nayu.”
ACT 23:10 Muhutanu wavi uvaha neju hati mkulu wa msambi ayogwipi kuvya Pauli yati vakumpapulana hipandi hipandi. Ndi avalagizi manjolinjoli waki kuyingila pagati yaki, vamuwusayi Pauli na kumuwuyisa muchifungu.
ACT 23:11 Kilu yiyoyo Bambu akamuhumila Pauli na kumjovela “Jipolesa mtima! Cheujova ndava yangu ku Yelusalemu apa yati wikita mewa Kumuji wa Loma.”
ACT 23:12 Kwapachili Vayawudi vakakonganeka na kukita mpangu, vakalapa yati vinywa lepi amala kulya mbaka vamkomayi Pauli.
ACT 23:13 Vala vevakitili mpangu wenuwo vavi neju ya vandu alobaini.
ACT 23:14 Ndi vakahamba kwa vakulu va vakuteta va Chapanga na vagogo, vakajova, “Tete tiviki chilapu yati nakulya chindu chochoha mbaka timkomayi Pauli.
ACT 23:15 Hinu, nyenye pamonga na libanji mutuma ujumbi kwa mkulu wa msambi muni amletayi Pauli kwinu kudetekesa kuvya mwigana kuyuwana malovi goha ga kumvala mwene. Tijitendelekili kumkoma kwakona hati kuhika kwa nyenye.”
ACT 23:16 Nambu mwana wa mlumbu waki Pauli ayuwini mpangu wula, ndi akahamba muchifungu kumjovela Pauli malovi genago.
ACT 23:17 Kangi Pauli akamkemala mmonga wa valonda, akamjovela “Mtola msongolo mwenuyu, mpeleka kwa chilongosi wa msambi muni avi na lijambu la kumjovela.”
ACT 23:18 Ndi akamtola na kuhamba nayu mbaka kwa mkulu wa msambi akamjovela, “Pauli mweavimuchifungu yula anikemili na kuniyupa nimletayi msongolo uyu kwa veve muni avi na lilovi leigana kukujovela.”
ACT 23:19 Mkulu wa msambi akamkamula chiwoko msongolo yula na kuhamba nayu pandu pachiepela, akamkota, “Ugana kunijovela kyani?”
ACT 23:20 Na akajova, “Vayawudi vayidakilini kukuyupa umpeleka Pauli chilau pa libanji chakudetekesela vandu va libanji vigana kuyuwana hotohoto malovi gaki.
ACT 23:21 Nambu veve belayi luyupu lwavi ndava vavi vandu neju ya alobaini vakumbajamila, vaviki chilapu vinywa lepi amala kulya chindu mbaka vamkomayi, hinu vilindila uhamula waku.”
ACT 23:22 Mkulu wa msambi akamleka awuka, akambesa akotoka kumjovela mundu yoyoha kuvya anidandaulili.
ACT 23:23 Kangi Mkulu wa msambi akavakemela vakulu vaki vavili va vachilongosi akavalagiza, “Mutendelekela manjolinjoli miya zivili, vakwela falasi sabini, na manjolinjoli miya zivili wa migoha, vahamba ku Kaisalia, muwuka kwakona kuhika saa yidatu ya kilu lelu.
ACT 23:24 Mutendelekela falasi yungi ndava kumgega Pauli, mumhikisa changalemaswa kwa Felikisi Mkulu wa ku Yudea.”
ACT 23:25 Mkulu wa msambi yula ndi akayandika balua iyi,
ACT 23:26 “Nene Kilaudio Lusia nikuyandikila mtopeswa mkulu Felikisi. Tikuwoni!
ACT 23:27 Mundu uyu akamuliwi na Vayawudi na vavi papipi kumkoma, penayuwini kuvya mwene mkolonjinji wa ku Loma, nikahamba pamonga na chikundi cha manjolinjoli, nikamkengelela.
ACT 23:28 Nampeliki palongolo ya libanji lavi likulu nihotola kumanya muhalu wewamtakili.
ACT 23:29 Ndi namanyili kuvya vamtakili ndava ya muhutanu wa malagizu gavi, nambu akitili lepi uhakau wowoha wewukumgana akomiwa amala akungiwa muchifungu.
ACT 23:30 Panayuwini kuvya Vayawudi vaviki mpangu wa kumkoma, nahamwili vamletayi kwaku, mewawa nivajovili vevamtakili valeta matakilu gavi kwaku.”
ACT 23:31 Hinu, manjolinjoli vala vamtolili Pauli ngati chavalagaziwi. Kilu yilayila vakamupeleka mbaka Antipatili.
ACT 23:32 Chilau yaki manjolinjoli va magendelu vala vawuyili kujela, vavalekili vayavi vevikwela falasi vayendelela na lugendu pamonga na Pauli.
ACT 23:33 Pavahikili ku Kaisalia, vakampela Felikisi mkulu wa mkowa balua yila na kumgotola Pauli.
ACT 23:34 Felikisi peamali kuyisoma balua yila akamkota Pauli ahumili mulima woki. Peamanywisi kuvya ahumili Kukilikia,
ACT 23:35 akajova, “Yati nikuuyuwanila muhalu waku vala vevakutakili vakamala kuhika.” Kangi akalagiza Pauli avikiwayi munyumba ya unkosi wa Helodi na kumlindalila.
ACT 24:1 Peyahikili ligono la mhanu, Mteta mkulu Anania ahikili Kukaisalia pamonga na vagogo vangi na mmanya malagizu mmonga wa Loma, liina laki Tetulo, ndi vamhambalili mkulu wa mkowa na kumtakila Pauli.
ACT 24:2 Pauli akakemelewa, na Tetulo akatumbula kumtakila, “Mtopeswa Felikisi, ulongosi waku utiletili uteke uvaha na kavili utiletili mang'amusi gamahele gabwina ndava ya vandu vitu.
ACT 24:3 Lijambu lenili tikulipokela cha luheku magono goha na tikusengusa neju.
ACT 24:4 Nambu changali kuyagisa lukumbi lutali, chondi kwa lipyana laku utiyuwanila padebe malovi gitu.
ACT 24:5 Tihumbwili kuvya mundu uyu avi na luhonda, mtumbulanu wa chitututu pagati ya Vayawudi kila pandu pamulima. Mewawa ndi chilongosi wa chikundi cha njila ya kumuyupa Chapanga chechikemelewa va Nazaleti.
ACT 24:6 Na hati alingili kuhakasa Nyumba ya Chapanga, tete tamkamwili. Taganili kumuhukumwa kwa mhilu witu.
ACT 24:7 Nambu Lusia mkulu wa msambi abwelili na kumuwusa pagati yitu kwa makakala,
ACT 24:8 Wamwene ngati ukumkota mundu uyu yati wimanyalila mambu gala getamtakili tete.”
ACT 24:9 Vayawudi kwa pamonga vakayidakila na kujova goha ago ndi gachakaka.
ACT 24:10 Kangi mkulu Felikisi akamlangisa Pauli kujova, mwene akajova, “Nimanyili kuvya veve ndi mhamula mihalu wa magono gamahele wa vandu vitu, nihekelela kujikengelela namwene.
ACT 24:11 Wihotola kumanya kuvya gapiti lepi magono kumi na gavili kuhumila penahambili ku Yelusalemu kumuyupa Chapanga.
ACT 24:12 Vandu ava vanikoli lepi nikotana na mundu yoyoha amala vanikoli lepi nikuvakoakeha vandu mu Nyumba ya Chapanga amala munyumba za kukonganekela Vayawudi, amala pandu popoha pamuji wenuwo.
ACT 24:13 Vihotola lepi kujova uchakaka wa mambu aga gevakunitakila.
ACT 24:14 Nambu chindu cheniyidakila ndi kuvya nikumuhengela Chapanga wa vagogo vitu, nitama mukulanda Njila yevikemela chikundi cha njila ya kumuyupa Chapanga. Nene nisadika goha gegayandikiwi muhitabu ya malagizu na muhitabu ya vamlota va Chapanga.
ACT 24:15 Nene nikumsadika Chapanga ngati chavisadika vandu ava, kuvya vandu vevamganisa na vevakum'budila Chapanga voha ya viyuka kwevafwili.
ACT 24:16 Ndava yeniyo nikujikangamalisa magono goha kutama wumi wa bwina changali kumbudila Chapanga na vandu.”
ACT 24:17 “Panakatamili kutali mumiyaka yamahele, nawuyili ku Yelusalemu muni nivaletela vakolonjinji vayangu mtangatilu na kuwusa luteta.
ACT 24:18 Lukumbi lwe nahengayi mambu ago ndi pavanikolili Munyumba ya Chapanga, namali kuwusa luteta lwa kunyambiswa. Pavi lepi msambi wa vandu amala chitututu.
ACT 24:19 Nambu kwavili na Vayawudi vangi kuhuma mulima wa ku Asia, venavo ndi veviganikiwa kuhika palongolo yaku na kunitakila ngati vana lilovi la kujova ndava yangu.
ACT 24:20 Amala, vandu ava vevavi penapa vajova chenibudili pevanikolili niyimili palongolo ya libanji lavi likulu.
ACT 24:21 Ndi malovi ndu aga genajovili panakavili palongolo yavi, ‘Mukunihamula lelu iyi ndava ya kusadika kuvya vevafwili yati viyuka.’ ”
ACT 24:22 Hinu Felikisi, mweamanyili bwina njila yeniyo, akahegelesa muhalu wula mu ligono lingi. Akavajovela, “Yati nihamula muhalu uwu lukumbi Lusia Mkulu wa msambi, peibwela.”
ACT 24:23 Kangi akamlagiza chilongosi wa manjolinjoli yula vamlindalila Pauli, nambu avyai mukulekekeswa padebe, vankozi vaki vayidakiliwa kumtangatila.
ACT 24:24 Mu magono gegagelekili Felikisi abwelili pamonga na mdala waki Dilusila mweavi Myawudi. Akalagiza Pauli aletewayi, akamyuwanila ilongela ndava ya kumsadika Yesu Kilisitu.
ACT 24:25 Nambu lukumbi Pauli peatumbwili kudandaula gakumganisa Chapanga, na kujiyepesa na uhamula wa Chapanga wewibwela, Felikisi ayogwipi, akajova, “Ndava hinu wihotola kuhamba, yati nikukukemela kavili panipata nafwasi.”
ACT 24:26 Lukumbi lwenulo alindila manya Pauli ngaampeli mashonga. Ndava ya yeniyo amkemela pamahele kulongela nayu.
ACT 24:27 Payamaliki miyaka yivili, Polikio Festo akavya Mkulu wa ku Yudea. Nambu Felikisi ndava ya kujiganisa kwa Vayawudi, mwene akamlekekesa Pauli kuhuma muchifungu.
ACT 25:1 Magono gadatu, Festo patumbwili lihengu akawuka ku Kaisalia na kuhamba ku Yelusalemu.
ACT 25:2 Vakulu va kuteta pamonga na vachilongosi va Vayawudi vakamjovela matakilu gegakumvala Pauli. Vakamuyupa neju Festo,
ACT 25:3 vakamuyupa neju Festo, alagazila Pauli vamletayi ku Yelusalemu, muni vavikili mpangu wa kumkoma akona munjila.
ACT 25:4 Nambu Festo avayangwili, “Pauli yati isigalila kukoko muchifungu Kaisalia namwene yati nihamba kanyata kwenuko.
ACT 25:5 Mvajovela vachilongosi vinu valongosana na nene kuhamba kwenuko, vakamtakila palongolo yangu, ngati abudili chindu.”
ACT 25:6 Festo akatama nawu mulukumbi lwa magono nane amala kumi, kangi akawuya ku Kaisalia. Chilau yaki akahamba pa libanji, akalagizila Pauli vamletayi mugati.
ACT 25:7 Lukumbi Pauli ahikili, Vayawudi vevahumili ku Yelusalemu vamtindili vakatumbula kumtakila gamahele geginonopa nambu nakuhotola kujova uchakaka.
ACT 25:8 Kangi Pauli ajikengelili mukujova, “Nene nibudili lepi chindu chochoha pa malagizu ga Vayawudi amala ndava Nyumba ya Chapanga amala kumvala Nkosi wa ku Loma.”
ACT 25:9 Nambu Festo ndava aganili kujiganisa kwa Vayawudi akamkota Pauli, “Wu wigana kuhamba ku Yelusalemu uhamuliwa palongolo yangu ndava ya matakilu genaga?”
ACT 25:10 Pauli akayangula, “Niyima pa libanji la mihalu la nkosi wa ku Loma, bahapa ndi peniganikiwa kuhamuliwa. Wamwene umanyili bwina nivabudili lepi chindu chochoha Vayawudi.
ACT 25:11 Ngati nene nambudaji amala nikitili chindu chechikunigana kukomiwa, nibela lepi kufwa. Nambu ngati kawaka uchakaka wa malovi gevanitakili ago, avi lepi mundu wa kunigotola kwa vene. Niyupa muhalu wangu ukahamuliwa kwa nkosi wa ku Loma.”
ACT 25:12 Hinu Festo peamali kulongela na vamtangatila vaki mu libanji, ndi akamjovela Pauli, “Uyupili lufani kwa nkosi wa ku Loma, yati wipelekwa kwa mwene.”
ACT 25:13 Magono gadebe gegagelekili, nkosi wa pandu pangi liina laki Agilipa na Belinike mweavi mlumbu waki, vahikili ku Kaisalia kumjambusa cha kumtopesa Festo.
ACT 25:14 Ndi vatamili kwenuko mu magono gamahele, Festo akamdandaulila nkosi mhalu wa Pauli, “Penapa avi mundu mmonga Felikisi amlekekesi Pauli kuhuma muchifungu.
ACT 25:15 Penakahambili ku Yelusalemu vakulu va kuteta va Chapanga na vachilongosi va Vayawudi vamtakili na kuniyupa nimuhamula akomiwa.
ACT 25:16 Nambu nene navayangwili kuvya mvelu lepi wa vandu va ku Loma kumgotola mundu alipiswai kwakona angakonganeka na vevamtakili mihu kwa mihu na kupata fwasi ya kujikengelela ndava ya mambu gevamtakili.
ACT 25:17 Hinu, pevamali kuhika penapa, ndi kanyata nakitili muhalu mulibanji chilau yaki, nalagazili mundu mwenuyu vamleta.
ACT 25:18 Vamtakila vaki vayimili nambu nakudandaula matakilu geabudili ngati chenalindilayi.
ACT 25:19 Pahali paki ndi vavi na muhutanu pamonga nayu ndava ya njila ya kumuyupa Chapanga wavi na mundu mmonga liina laki Yesu mweamali kufwa, nambu Pauli ikangamala kujova akona muni.
ACT 25:20 Namanyili lepi nikita kyani ndava ya muhalu wenuwo. Hinu, namkotili Pauli ngati igana kuhamba kulibanji la mihalu Yelusalemu kula, ndava ya matakilu ago.
ACT 25:21 Nambu Pauli akangamili kuyupa kusigalila muchifungu mbaka uhamula wa muhalu waki uhamuliwa na nkosi wa ku Loma. Ndava yeniyo nalagizi atama muchifungu mbaka penihotola kumpeleka kwa Kaisali.”
ACT 25:22 Kangi Agilipa akamjovela Festo, “Namwene nigana kumuyuwanila mundu mwenuyo.” Festo akamyangula, “Yati ukumuyuwanila chilau.”
ACT 25:23 Hinu, chilau yaki Agilipa na Belinike vahikili kwa chilulu mu libanji la mihalu kuni valongosini na vakulu va msambi na vachilongosi va muji. Festo akalagiza Pauli vampeleka mugati.
ACT 25:24 Festo akajova, “Nkosi Agilipa pamonga na vandu voha mwemuvi apa na tete! Palongolo yinu avi mundu, vandu voha va mulima wa Vayawudi va bahapa na ku Yelusalemu, vakumng'ung'utila kuvya iganikiwa lepi kulama wumi waki kavili.
ACT 25:25 Nambu namwene nichiwene lepi chindu chochoha cheabudili hati kuganikiwa akomiwa. Hinu ndava mwene ayupili muhalu waki uhamuliwayi na Nkosi wa Loma, nahamwili kumpeleka.
ACT 25:26 Mewa namwene nivii lepi na malovi gakumyandikila Nkosi wa ku Loma ndava ya muhalu uwu. Ndi mana nimletili palongolo yinu, ndi neju veve Nkosi Agilipa, muni mukamala kumkotakesa, nimanya chindu cha kumyandikila.
ACT 25:27 Ndava muni nihololela kuvya malovi gangali luhala kumpeleka mfungwa changali kulangisa matakilu gegakumvala.”
ACT 26:1 Hinu Agilipa akamjovela Pauli, “Wihotola kujova malovi ga kujikengelela.” Ndi Pauli akakwesa chiwoko na kutumbula kujova.
ACT 26:2 “Nkosi Agilipa, lelu niheka neju, kujikengelela palongolo yaku ndava ya mambu goha gevanitakili Vayawudi.
ACT 26:3 Neju ndava wamwene wimanya bwina mivelu ya Vayawudi na muhutanu wavi, nikuyupa uniyuwanila bwina.”
ACT 26:4 “Vayawudi voha vamanyili wumi wangu kutumbula uwana wangu, chenitamili kutumbula kadeni pamulima wangu ndi mewa ku Yelusalemu.
ACT 26:5 Vanimanyili mu magono gamahele na vihotola kujova ndava yangu ngati vigana, kuvya kutumbula kadeni navili mmonga pagati ya chikundi cha Vafalisayu chechikangamalisa neju kulanda mvelu wa njila ya kumuyupa Chapanga yitu.
ACT 26:6 Na hinu nivii palongolo yaku nihamuliwa ndava nisadika lilaganu lila Chapanga avalagazili vagogo vitu.
ACT 26:7 Malaganu gene ndi galagala gegihuvalila na makabila kumi na gavili ga vandu vitu, vakumhengela Chapanga muhi na kilu. Mtopeswa nkosi, Vayawudi vakunitakila ndava ya sadika yeniyo!
ACT 26:8 Ndava kyani nyenye mwivya na mtahu kusadika kuvya Chapanga akuvayukisa vevafwili?
ACT 26:9 Chakaka namwene naholalili kuvya yikunigana kuhenga mambu kubela uhotola wa Yesu wa ku Nazaleti.
ACT 26:10 Mambu genakitili ku Yelusalemu, napatili uhotola kuhuma kwa vakulu va kuteta va Chapanga, navasopili muchifungu vandu vamahele vevakumganisa Chapanga, ndi pavahukumiwi kukomiwa, nayidakili kuvya vakomiwa.
ACT 26:11 Pamahele navalipisi munyumba za kukonganekela Vayawudi zoha, navajovili kwa makakala vayibela sadika yavi. Namemili ligoga ndava yavi hati navahakili mbaka mumiji ya kutali.”
ACT 26:12 “Kwa lihengu lenilo, nahambili kumuji wa Damasko kwa uhotola na malagizu ga vamteta va vakulu va Chapanga.
ACT 26:13 Mtopeswa Nkosi, lukumbi nivii munjila, muhi wa saa sita nauwene lumuli luvaha kuliku wa lilanga utilangasa kuhuma kunani kwa Chapanga, wanitidili nene pamonga na vamulugendu vayangu.
ACT 26:14 Tavoha tete tagwili pahi, ndi nayuwini lwami lukunijovela kwa luga ya Chiebulania, ‘Sauli, Sauli! Ndava kyani ukuning'aha? Ukujilemasa waka ngati ng'ombi yeyitakula ndonga ya bambu waki.’
ACT 26:15 Ndi nene namkotili, ‘Veve wayani Bambu?’ Bambu akayangula, ‘Nene ndi Yesu mweukuning'aha.
ACT 26:16 Nambu hinu yimuka, uyimayi. Nikuhumalili muni nikuvika kuvya mtangatila wangu. Ukavajovela vandu vangi mambu geugaweni lelu na gala genivii nakona kukulangisa.
ACT 26:17 Yati nikusangula kuhuma kwa vandu va Isilaeli na vandu vangali Vayawudi, ndi nene kwenikutuma kwavi.
ACT 26:18 Yati ukugagubukula mihu gavi muni uvang'anamusa vahuma muchitita na kuyingila mu lumuli, vahuma muulongosi wa Setani, vamuwuyila Chapanga, muni kunisadika nene valekekeswa gevamubudili Chapanga muni vatola uhali pamonga na vandu vevahaguliwi na Chapanga.’ ”
ACT 26:19 “Ndi, Nkosi Agilipa, nabelili lepi maono ago ga kunani kwa Chapanga.
ACT 26:20 Hinu natumbwili hoti kuvakokosela vandu va ku Damasko, kangi kwa vandu va ku Yelusalemu na mulima woha wa ku Yudea mewawa kwa vandu vangali Vayawudi. Navakokosili vamuwuyila Chapanga kwa kulangisa mumatendu kuvya vang'anamwiki.
ACT 26:21 Ndava ya genago Vayawudi vanikamwili Munyumba ya Chapanga, vakalinga kunikoma.
ACT 26:22 Nambu kwa ulonda wa Chapanga nakona muni hati lelu, nikuvajovela vadebe na vavaha. Nidandaula galagala vamlota va Chapanga na Musa vajovili yati gihumila,
ACT 26:23 kuvya yamganili Kilisitu kung'aiswa na mutumbula kuyuka, muni akokosayi kuvya lumuli lwa usangula lukuvalangasa vandu voha, Vayawudi na vandu vangali Vayawudi.”
ACT 26:24 Pauli peajikengelelayi mu malovi ago, Festo akajova kwa lwami luvaha, “Pauli! Wipenga! Usomili neju ndi wipenga luhala.”
ACT 26:25 Nambu Pauli akajova, “Mtopeswa Festo, nipenga lepi mu malovi genijova ndi gachakaka na gana luhala.
ACT 26:26 Wamwene Nkosi, ukugamanya mambu aga, hinu nihotola kulongela kwa ukekesi palongolo yaku. Mambu genago gamanyikini kwaku muni lijambu ilo lahengiki lepi mumfiyu.
ACT 26:27 Nkosi Agilipa, wu, ukugasadika gegajoviwi na vamlota vakadeni va Chapanga? Nimanyili kuvya ukugasadika.”
ACT 26:28 Agilipa akamyangula Pauli, “Wihololela kuvya mu malovi gadebe wihotola kunikulukisa kuvya Mkilisitu?”
ACT 26:29 Pauli akayangula, “Nikumuyupa Chapanga kuvya mulukumbi luhupi amala lutali lepi wamwene ndu, nambu voha vevakuniyuwanila lelu vahotola kuvya ngati chenivii nene, changali kukungwa minyololo.”
ACT 26:30 Kangi Nkosi Agilipa, mkulu Festo na Belinike na vandu voha vevatamii pamonga nawu, vakayima.
ACT 26:31 Pevamali kuwuka ndi vajovisini, “Mundu mwenuyu ahengili lepi chindu chihakau hati kuganikiwa kukomiwa amala chifungu.”
ACT 26:32 Agilipa akamjovela Festo “Mundu uyu ngaihotoliki kulekekeswa kuvyaa ayupili lepi uhamula kwa Nkosi wa ku Loma.”
ACT 27:1 Pevamali kuvika mpangu wa lugendu lwa tete kuhamba Italia, Pauli pamonga na vafungwa vangi vagotoliwi pahi pa ulonda wa Juliasi mweavi Mkulu wa msambi wa manjolinjoli pagati ya chikundi chechikemelewa “Chikundi cha Augusti.”
ACT 27:2 Tayingili muwatu wewahuma ku Adilamito wewavedukila mumbwani ya miji ya Asia. Kangi tawukili pamonga na mkolonjinji wa Makedonia kuhuma Tesalonike liina laki Alistako.
ACT 27:3 Chilau yaki tahikili kumbwani ya Sidoni. Juliasi amhengili lipyana Pauli kwa kumyidakila avalola vankozi vaki na kupata vindu vyaaganili.
ACT 27:4 Kuhuma kwenuko, tagendili mumhana mwa chisiwa cha Kuplo ndava ya kuyepa mpungu wewabuma kuhuma kulongolo yitu.
ACT 27:5 Kangi takupwiki nyanja ya upandi wa Kilikia na Pamfulia, tahikili Mula muji wa Lukia.
ACT 27:6 Penapo Mkulu wa msambi yula, aukolili watu wewihuma ku Alekisandalia na kuhamba ku Italia, ndi akatiyingisa mugati.
ACT 27:7 Tagendili mbolimboli mulukumbi lwa magono gamahele cha kutyalatyala neju tahikili papipi na muji wa Nido. Ndava ya mpungu wewatikang'ayi kuhuma kulongolo ndi tikahamba lumonga upandi wa Kilete kuhamba pandu pa yeyikemiwa Salimone.
ACT 27:8 Tapitili mumhana ya mbwani kwa kutyalatyala na kuhika pandu pepikemelewa “Bandali ya Bwina,” Papipi na muji wa Lasea.
ACT 27:9 Lukumbi lwamahele lwamali kupita, hati magono ga kujihinisa chakulya gamaliki. Hinu vayogwipi neju lugendu lwa muwatu. Pauli akavajovela malovi aga.
ACT 27:10 “Mwavagosi, nihololela kuvya lugendu lwitu yati wivya na mang'ahiso na kuyagisa lepi ndava ya ndwika na watu ndu, nambu mewa na wumi witu.”
ACT 27:11 Nambu Mkulu wa manjolinjoli yula akasadika neju malovi ga mgendesa watu na ga mkolo watu, kuliku malovi ga Pauli.
ACT 27:12 Hinu ndava bandali yeniyo yavi lepi nafwasi ya bwina kutama lukumbi lwa mbepu. Ndi vamahele pagati yavi vayidakilini kuwuka penapo na kuhamba mbaka Foinike ngati yihotoleka na kutama kwenuko mkulukumbi lwa mbepu. Bandali ya Kilete yeyihamba kwelihumila lilanga na kusini kwelitipama lilanga.
ACT 27:13 Hinu, mpungu wa bwina pawatumbwili kubuma, vene vakahololela kuvya mpangu wavi wihotoleka, hinu vakahuta nanga vakatumbula lugendu kuni vigendesa watu papipi na mbwani ya Kilete.
ACT 27:14 Kwakona vangahika patali, mpungu ukali weukemiwa “Mpungu Eulokilo.” Watumbwili kubuma kuhuma muchisiwa.
ACT 27:15 Mpungu waukang'ili watu, wene wahotwili lepi kukangamala nawu, ndi taulekili mpungu uyikang'ayi.
ACT 27:16 Na petapitayi pachisiwa chidebe chechikemiwa Kauda, tatyalityali nambu tahotwili kuukunga mtumbwi wa watu.
ACT 27:17 Vanalihengu va muwatu pevamali kuyigisa mtumbwi wula mugati, ndi vakaukunga nyosi kwa makakala. Vayogwipi kukwama pa lilundu la masavati ga papipi na mbwani ya ku Libya, vakahelesa nyosi na kuleka watu wikang'iswa na mpungu.
ACT 27:18 Mpungu na manji gatimbungini na pachilau yaki, vakatumbula kutaga ndwika munyanja.
ACT 27:19 Na ligono la datu vakatumbula kutaga vindu vya watu kwa mawoko gavi vene.
ACT 27:20 Mu magono gamahele valiwene lepi lilanga amala ndondo, mpungu na manji vyayendalili kutimbugana neju, kuhuvalila kwa kusanguka gavamaliki.
ACT 27:21 Pavatamili magono gamahele changalya, Pauli akayima pagati yavi akajova, “Vamtopeswa, mbanga kuvya muniyuwanili malovi gangu ga kuleka kuwuka Kilete, ngatiyepili mang'ahiso ago pamonga na kuyagisa vindu ivi.
ACT 27:22 Nambu hinu nivayupa mjikangamalisa mtima, muni kawaka hati mundu mmonga mweiyagisa wumi waki, nambu watu wene ndi wewiyaga.
ACT 27:23 Ndava muni golo kilu Mtumu wa kunani kwa Chapanga, kuhuma kwa Chapanga mwenikumuhengela, anihumalili,
ACT 27:24 akanijovela, ‘Pauli, kotoka kuyogopa! Yikukugana kuyima palongolo ya Nkosi wa ku Loma, Chapanga mwene yimganisi, ndi kwa ubwina waki akuvasangula wumi wa voha mulugendu lwinu.’
ACT 27:25 Hinu vamtopeswa, mjikamngamalisa mtima ndava muni nikumsadika Chapanga kuvya givya mewawa ngati chenijoviwi.
ACT 27:26 Nambu yikutigana kutagwa kundumba ya chisiwa chimonga.”
ACT 27:27 Ligono la kumi na mcheche kilu manji pagatumbwili kutimbugana tikanga'iswa kuni na kula munyanja ya Adilia. Pagati ya kilu vanalihengu muwatu vaholalili kuvya papipi na pandumba.
ACT 27:28 Vakalonda utali wa pahi wa nyanja kwa kuhelesa nyosi yeyakungiwi chindu chechitopa, vapatili utali wa mita alobaini. Na pavapimili kavili mwanakandahi vapatili utali wa mita selasini.
ACT 27:29 Ndava ya kuyogopa kukwama mumatalau ndi vakahelesa nanga mcheche za upandi mumbele mwa watu, vakamuyupa Chapanga kwicha kanyata.
ACT 27:30 Vanalihengu va muwatu, vaganili kutila ndi vamali kuhelesa mtumbwi wavi mumanji, vakongayi kuvya vihamba kulongolo kuhelesa nanga za muwatu.
ACT 27:31 Nambu Pauli amjovili Mkulu wa msambi yula pamonga na manjolinjoli vangi, “Vanalihengu ava ngati vitama lepi mugati ya watu, yati mwisanguliwa lepi.”
ACT 27:32 Penapo ndi manjolinjoli vala vakadumula nyosi zezakamwili mtumbwi wula, vakauleka uhamba na manji.
ACT 27:33 Papipi na hamba kucha, Pauli akavayupa voha valyayi chakulya, “Lelu ndi ligono la kumi na mcheche vavili na wogoyi lukumbi lwoha ulo mwangalya chindu.
ACT 27:34 Hinu, nikuvayupa mlyayi chakulya muni mukuchigana muhotola kulama, Muni kawaka hati luyunju lumonga wa mitu yinu lweluyaga.”
ACT 27:35 Peamali kujova malovi ago, Pauli akatola libumunda, akamsengusa Chapanga palongolo yavi voha akametula akatumbula kulya.
ACT 27:36 Kangi voha vakasindimala mtima, navene mewa vakalya chakulya.
ACT 27:37 Mugati ya watu wula tavi vandu miya zivili na sabini na sita.
ACT 27:38 Pevamali kulya na kuyukuta kila mundu, ndi vapungwizi utopa kwa watu, kwa kutaga nganu munyanja.
ACT 27:39 Kwapachili, vanalihengu vala vaumanyili lepi mulima wula, ndi vayiwene ndumba yeyivi papipi na manji, vakajovesana vayegeka watu kwenuko ngati yihotoleka.
ACT 27:40 Ndi, vakadumula nanga na kuzileka munyanja, mewa vakahuta nyosi za kugendesela watu, kangi vakatola chitambala chimonga kulongolo kukinga mpungu, vakahamba kundumba.
ACT 27:41 Nambu vahikili pamngonganu wa manji, na watu wakwamili, upandi wa kulongolo wajwigwimi mumasavati changali kunyugusika. Upandi wa mumbele wa watu watumbwili kudenyekana hipandi hipandi ndava kukang'wa na mpungu ga manji ga kutimbugana.
ACT 27:42 Manjolinjoli vavi na mpangu wa kuvakoma vafungwa voha ndava ya kuyogopa kuvya vihotola kusambalila mbaka kundumba na kutila.
ACT 27:43 Nambu Mkulu wa msambi yula aganili kumsangula Pauli, avabesili valeka mpangu wavi. Akalagiza vevimanya kusambalila vahumba kuhuma muwatu na kusambalila mbaka kundumba,
ACT 27:44 na vevasigalili vajisangula kwa kukamulila mbau amala chipandi cha watu weudenyiki, ndi tavoha tahikili tavamumi kundumba.
ACT 28:1 Patamali kuhika bwina kundumba ndi tamanyili kuvya chisiwa chila chikemelewa Malita.
ACT 28:2 Takangisi ndava vakolonjinji vatihengili gabwina neju tete. Fula ndi yatumbula kutonya na kwavili na mbepu, hinu vakoyili motu na kutigongolela.
ACT 28:3 Pauli anongili ndwika udebe wa sagala akazikohokea pamotu, penapo ndava ya lyoto la motu, limoma lahumalili musagala na lamulumili Pauli muchiwoko na kujikamulisa.
ACT 28:4 Vala vakolonjinji pavawene limoma lijikamulisi dombeka muchiwoko cha Pauli, vakajovesana, “Chakaka mundu uyu mkomaji, pamonga na kusanguka kufwa munyanja, nambu lihoka litu lelikemiwa ganisa Chapanga likumleka lepi alama.”
ACT 28:5 Nambu mwene akakung'undila limoma pamotu na alemili lepi hati padebe.
ACT 28:6 Vandu vala vevalolokesa kuvya yati ihimba amala kugwa pahi na kufwa. Pavalindili mulukumbi lutali changalola kuvya Pauli apatili lepi lijambu loloha lihakau, ndi vakang'anamusa maholo gavi vakujova mwene ndi lihoka.
ACT 28:7 Papipi na pandu apo pavili na migunda ya Publio, chilongosi wa chisiwa chila. Ndi mwene atigongolili cha uganu na tatamili munyumba yaki mu magono gadatu.
ACT 28:8 Hinu, dadi waki Publio agonili palusongwani, ndava ya utamu na kuseka ngasi. Ndi Pauli ahambili kumlola na peamali kumuyupa Chapanga, akavika mawoko gaki panani ya mtamu ndi akamlamisa.
ACT 28:9 Palahumalili lijambu lenilo, vatamu voha muchisiwa chenicho vabwelili na kulamiswa mewa.
ACT 28:10 Vandu vatipelili njombi ndalindali lukumbi patatumbwili kavili lugendu vayingisi vindu vyoha vyetaganilli muwatu.
ACT 28:11 Payamaliki miyehi yidatu tatumbwili kavili lugendu muwatu wewihuma ku Alekisandalia yeyihongoliwi chimong'omong'o ya “Vachapanga Mapaha.” Watu wenuwo wayimili muchisiwa icho mulukumbi lwoha lwa mbepu.
ACT 28:12 Patahikili pamuji wa Silakusa, tatamili penapo mu magono gadatu.
ACT 28:13 Kuhuma kwenuko tagendili na kuhika kumuji wa Legio. Chilau yaki, mpungu wa kusini watumbwili kubuma, ndi mulugendu lwa magono gavili tahikili pamuji wa Putioli.
ACT 28:14 Kwenuko tavakoli valongo vamsadika, ndi vatigongolili titama nawu mulijuma limonga. Kangi tayendalili na lugendu kuhika ku Loma.
